			//Puku
			Message(17,"Pino　is　hiding","in　the　human　town.","","");
			Message(17,"Can　you　find　her　for　me?","","","");
		}
	}
	if (ch[1545] && !ch[2317])
	{
		// 兄たま発見イベント
		PostScr(1194);
		return 0;
	}

	ch[400] = -1;
	return 0;
}
#EndScript
//////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
// Motoro
#Script:00063
int main()
{
	int mg;
	string str;
	string txt;
	string str2;
	int a;
	int b;
	int tute;
	mg = 0;

	ch[2145] = 0;
	ch[2325] = 0;

	if (ch[2497])
	{
		return 0;
	}

	ch[400] = 19;
	
	KaguTest(20010,0);
	if (ch[420] == 310)
	{
		// Sanctuary
		//Motoro
		Message(19,"He　is　headed　for　the　room　where","Tokaron　has　been　imprisoned.","","");
		Message(19,"We　must　make　haste!","","","");
		ch[400] = -1;
		return 0;
	}

//	if (!ch[1789])
	{
		if (ch[2320])
		{
			//Motoro
			Message(19,"What　can　I　do　for　you?","","","");
		}
		else
		{
			if (ch[1571] && !ch[1538])
			{
				//Motoro
				Message(19,"Hello.","","","");

				//Parin
				Message(0,"Ah!　It's　you!!","","","");

				//Motoro
				Message(19,"I　am　Motoro.","You've　come　far，　young　lady.","","");

				//Parin
				Message(0,"You　beat　me　here　again!","","","");

				//Motoro
				Message(19,"Well，　this　is　my　home，　after　all.","","","");

				//Parin
				Message(0,"Oh　really?","What　a　strange　house.","","");
				Message(0,"What　do　you...do?","","","");

				//Motoro
				Message(19,"Me?","","","");
                // JP line is 我輩はホッカーに燃えているメダルマニアの間では有名なネコおばけである
				//Message(19,"I　am　a　cat　monster.　I　like","to　collect　rare　medals.","I　also　love　hoccer.","");
                Message(19,"I am a well-known cat monster amongst","medal enthusiasts. My collection is second to none.","I also love hoccer.","");

				//Parin
				Message(0,"Hoccer?","","","");

				//Motoro
				Message(19,"Human's　don't　know　about　it，","but　in　the　monster　world，","hoccer　is　an　incredibly　popular　sport.","");
				Message(19,"Night　and　day，　I　train　with","the　mole　brothers.","I　will　take　the　world　title!","");

				//Parin
				Message(0,"Is　that　right?","","","");

				//Motoro
				Message(19,"By　the　way，　what　brings　you　to","my　humble　home?","","");
			}
			if (!ch[1571])
			{
				//Motoro
				Message(19,"Hello.","","","");

				//Parin
				Message(0,"Ah!　It's　you!!","","","");

				//Motoro
				Message(19,"I　am　Motoro.","You've　come　far，　young　lady.","","");

				//Parin
				Message(0,"Aren't　you　going　to　run　away","from　me　like　last　time?　","","");

				//Motoro
				Message(19,"This　is　my　home　and　you","are　my　guest.　Running　and","hiding　would　be　very　rude.","");

				//Parin
				Message(0,"Good　point.","So，　who　ARE　you，　exactly?","","");

				//Motoro
				Message(19,"Me?","","","");
                // JP line is 我輩はホッカーに燃えているメダルマニアの間では有名なネコおばけである
				//Message(19,"I　am　a　cat　monster.　I　like","to　collect　rare　medals.","I　also　love　hoccer.","");
                Message(19,"I am a well-known cat monster amongst","medal enthusiasts. My collection is second to none.","I also love hoccer.","");

				//Parin
				Message(0,"Hoccer?","","","");

				//Motoro
				Message(19,"Human's　don't　know　about　it，","but　in　the　monster　world，","hoccer　is　an　incredibly　popular　sport.","");
				Message(19,"Night　and　day，　I　train　with","the　mole　brothers.","I　will　take　the　world　title!","");

				//Parin
				Message(0,"Is　that　right?","","","");

				//Motoro
				Message(19,"By　the　way，　what　brings　you　to","my　humble　home?","","");
			}
			ch[2320] = 1;
		}

		SelStart(50);
		KaguTest(20001,54);
		if (ch[430])
		{
			SelText("Give　him　a　Platinum　Medal.",1);
		}
		SelText("I　came　to　visit　you.",2);
		SelText("No　reason.",3);
		SelEnd();

		if (ch[50] == 2)
		{
			// ミニゲーム
			if (ch[2322] && ch[2323])
			{
				Message(19,"You've　assembled","your　team.","","");
				Message(19,"Good.　Let　us　prepare　to　play.","","","");
				mg = 1;
			}
			else
			{
				//Motoro
				Message(19,"Hoccer　is　a　3-on-3　sport.","","","");
				Message(19,"You　need　3　team","members　to　play　hoccer.","","");
				//Parin
				Message(0,"Okay then.","","","");
				Message(0,"I'll　go　invite　some","more　monsters.","","");
				ch[2327] = 1;
				ch[400] = -1;
				return 0;
			}
		}
		if (ch[50] != 2 && ch[50] != 1)
		{
			if (!ch[2324])
			{
				// スカッシュしたことない。
				Message(19,"I　see.","Please　come　again.","","");
			}
			else
			{
				// 過去ベスト言う
				if (ch[2321] > ch[2318])
				{
					// Motoroが勝っている
					str = "The　highest　scoring　match　was　" + ch[2318] + "　to　"+ch[2321]+".";
					txt = "We，　the　Motoro　Astrals";
					str2 = "won　that　match.";
				}
				else
				{
					int douten;
					douten = 0;
					str2 = "";
					str = "The　highest　scoring　match　was　" + ch[2318] + "　to　"+ch[2321]+".";
					if (ch[2321] == ch[2318])
					{
						// 同点
						txt = "The　match　was　a　tie.";
						douten = 1;
					}
					// プレイヤーが勝っている
					if (ch[2321] < 1)
					{
						if (ch[2321] != ch[2318])
						{
							txt = "We　were　soundly　beaten";
							str2 = "by　the　Monster　Dream　Team.";
						}
					}
					else
					{
						if (ch[2318] - ch[2321] > ch[2321] && !douten)
						{
							txt = "We　were　soundly　beaten";
							str2 = "by　the　Monster　Dream　Team.";
							douten = 2;
						}
						if (ch[2318] - ch[2321] <= ch[2321] && !douten)
						{
							txt = "The　Monster　Dream　Team";
							str2 = "won　that　match.";
						}
						
					}
					
				}
				Message(19,str,txt,str2,"");
				Message(19,"Please　come　again.","","","");
				
			}
			ch[400] = -1;
			return 0;
		}
		
		if (ch[50] == 1)
		{
			if (!ch[2117])
			{
				Message(0,"...By　the　way，　you　said","you're　a　medal　collector?","","");
				Message(19,"Indeed.","I　was　once　a　certified　","Medal　Maniac...","");
				Message(0,"Then　take　this","Platinum　Medal.","","");
				Message(19,"W-w-what?!","A　legendary　Platinum　Medal!!","","");
//                 Checks if you show Grandpa a Platinum medal. This dialogue was left out by Falcom since it contradicts the ending where Motoro states that only children can see them
//				if (ch[2115])
//				{
//					Message(19,"なるほど。","彼の言っていた女の子は","君の事だったであるか……","");
//					Message(0,"なんのこと？","彼って…？","","");
//					Message(19,"な、なんでも無いのである。","気にしないでほしいのである","","");
//				}
				ch[2117] = 1;
			}

			if (ch[1789])
			{
				// メダルを換金する
				switch(ch[2055])
				{
				case 0:	// 初３００００ぺんね
					Message(19,"Oh　my...","How　did　you　find　this...?","","");
					Message(19,"I'll　give　you　￥30，000　for　it.","","","");
					ch[420] = 1;
					KaguTest(20006,54);
					SetGP(GetGP() + 30000);
					break;
				case 1: // １００００ぺんね
					Message(19,"Oh　my...","How　did　you　find　this...?","","");
					Message(19,"This　time，　how　about　￥10，000?","","","");
					ch[420] = 1;
					KaguTest(20006,54);
					SetGP(GetGP() + 10000);
					break;
				case 2: // ５０００ぺんね
					Message(19,"You　found","yet　another　medal?","","");
					Message(19,"Platinum　Medals　have","become　more　common.","They've　decreased　in　value.","");
					Message(19,"This　time，　how　about　￥5，000?","","","");
					ch[420] = 1;
					KaguTest(20006,54);
					SetGP(GetGP() + 5000);
					break;
				case 3: // １０００ぺんね
					Message(19,"You　found　yet","another　one　for　me?","","");
					Message(19,"Platinum　Medals　have","become　more　common.","They've　decreased　in　value.","");
					Message(19,"This　time，　how　about　￥1，000?","","","");
					ch[420] = 1;
					KaguTest(20006,54);
					SetGP(GetGP() + 1000);
					break;
				case 4: // ５００ぺんね
					Message(19,"You've　brought　me","yet　another　medal?","","");
					Message(19,"However，　now　the　market","is　much　lower　now.","","");
					Message(19,"All　I　can　offer","is　￥500，　I'm　afraid.","","");
					ch[420] = 1;
					KaguTest(20006,54);
					SetGP(GetGP() + 500);
					break;
				case 5: // １００ぺんね
					Message(19,"Wow，　you　certainly　keep","these　medals　coming.","","");
					Message(19,"However，　now　the　market","has　hit　rock　bottom.","","");
					Message(19,"All　I　can　offer","is　￥100，　I'm　afraid.","","");
					ch[420] = 1;
					KaguTest(20006,54);
					SetGP(GetGP() + 100);
					break;
				default: // １ぺんね
					Message(19,"What　a　shame.　These","Platinum　Medals　are　now　worthless.","","");
					Message(19,"But　because　you　went　through　all","that　trouble，　have　￥1.","","");
					ch[420] = 1;
					KaguTest(20006,54);
					SetGP(GetGP() + 1);
					break;
				}
				ch[2055] = ch[2055] + 1;
				ch[400] = -1;
				return 0;
			}
			if (ch[430] >= 11)
			{
				Message(19,"I see you","have 11　medals.","","");
				Message(19,"As　a　token　of　my　gratitude，　let","me　give　you　these　drill　parts.","","");
				ch[420] = 11;
				KaguTest(20006,54);
			}
			else
			{
				Message(19,"You　don't　have","all　11　medals　quite　yet.","","");
				Message(19,"I'll　give　you","some　special　drill　parts　if","you　find　all　11!","");
				ch[400] = -1;
				return 0;
			}
			
			// 限界突破ゲット
			KaguTest(20025,0);
			Wait(15);
			KaguTest(30032,-100);
			KaguTest(30033,65);
			Wait(10);
			Camera(-1,0,0,0);

	//		GetItem(13);
			ch[1789] = 1;
			ch[2139] = 1;

	//		KaguTest(20034,ch[50]);
	//		SetGP(GetGP() - 9999);
			b = 1;

			txt = "Max　drill　level　has　increased.";
			tute = 10;
			
			KaguTest(20051,0);
			KaguTest(20051,0);
			KaguTest(20051,0);
			KaguTest(20051,0);

			KaguTest(20023,0);
			Wait(15);
			Mes(txt);
			SE(955);
			Wait(50);
			KaguTest(20024,0);

			// チュートリアル表示
//			KaguTest(10006,0);
//			KaguTest(10007,7);
//
//			KaguTest2(10009,0,"dparts10.bmp");
//
//			ch[423] = 180;
//			ch[424] = 42;
//			ch[425] = 460;
//			ch[426] = 438;
//			ch[427] = 0;
//			ch[428] = 0;
//			ch[429] = 320;
//			ch[430] = 452;
//			ch[431] = 512;
//			KaguTest(10010,10);
//			Wait(10);
//			Message(0,"","","","");
//			ch[420] = 0;
//			KaguTest(10011,10);
//			Wait(10);

			ch[400] = -1;
			Camera(-1,0,0,0);
			KaguTest(30032,0);
			KaguTest(30033,100);
			Look(0,19);

			return 0;
		}
	}
	
	ch[400] = -1;
	
	if (ch[1538])
	{
		return 0;
	}

	if (mg)
	{
		int ln;
		// ミニゲームする	
		ch[2145] = 0;

		ch[420] = -1250;
		ch[421] = 0;
		ch[422] = 625;
		ch[423] = 670;
		ch[424] = 0;
		ch[425] = 70;
		KaguTest(30019,1);
		CrossFade();
		Wait(15);
		Event(231);
		SE(480);
		Wait(25);

		ln = Door2C(1);	
		KaguTest(30077,ln);
		SE(481);
//		Wait(5);
		KaguTest(30019,0);
		ch[420] = -1249;
		ch[421] = 0;
		ch[422] = 624;
		ch[423] = 0;
		ch[424] = 1349;
		ch[425] = 69;
//		Camera(ln,-1250,0,625);
		KaguTest(30019,1);
		CrossFade();
		Wait(25);
		ch[420] = 250;
		ch[421] = 1350;
		ch[422] = 0;
		ch[423] = 740;
		ch[424] = 0;
		ch[425] = 0;
		ch[426] = 0;
		ch[427] = 100;
		ch[428] = 0;
		KaguTest(30045,0);
		ch[420] = 250;
		ch[421] = 1550;
		KaguTest(30045,0);
		ch[420] = 0;
		KaguTest(30045,0);
		ch[420] = -250;
		KaguTest(30045,0);
		ch[421] = 1350;
		KaguTest(30045,0);
//		KaguTest2(30016,0,"7391827364");
		SE(482);
		Wait(1);

		KaguTest(30078,ln);
		Wait(25);
		ln = Door2C(2);	
		KaguTest(30077,ln);
		SE(481);
//		Wait(15);
		ch[420] = -1249;
		ch[421] = 0;
		ch[422] = 624;
		ch[423] = 0;
		ch[424] = -1349;
		ch[425] = 69;
//		Camera(ln,-1250,0,625);
		KaguTest(30019,1);
		CrossFade();

		Wait(25);
		ch[420] = 250;
		ch[421] = -1350;
		ch[422] = 0;
		ch[423] = 740;
		ch[424] = 0;
		ch[425] = 0;
		ch[426] = 0;
		ch[427] = 100;
		ch[428] = 0;
		KaguTest(30045,0);
		ch[420] = 250;
		ch[421] = -1550;
		KaguTest(30045,0);
		ch[420] = 0;
		KaguTest(30045,0);
		ch[420] = -250;
		KaguTest(30045,0);
		ch[421] = -1350;
		KaguTest(30045,0);
//		KaguTest2(30016,0,"7391827364");
		SE(482);
		Wait(1);

		KaguTest(30078,ln);
		Wait(25);
		
		Black(0,100,15);
		Wait(15);
		KaguTest(30019,0);
		ch[2144] = 5400;
		ch[2497] = 1;
		LoadMap(24);
		Camera(-1,0,0,0);
		Event(232);

		CharPos(0,0,-750,0);		
		CharPos(60,-300,-750,0);
		CharPos(61,300,-750,0);
		CharPos(64,0,750,0);
		CharPos(62,-300,750,0);
		CharPos(63,300,750,0);
		Camera(0,-450,-2380,840);
		Look(0,64);
		Look(64,0);
		Look(60,62);
		Look(62,60);
		Look(61,63);
		Look(63,61);
		KaguTest(12000,60);
		KaguTest(12001,60);
		KaguTest(12000,61);
		KaguTest(12001,61);
		KaguTest(12000,62);
		KaguTest(12001,62);
		KaguTest(12000,63);
		KaguTest(12001,63);

		CrossFade();
		Wait(15);
		Black(0,0,15);
		Wait(15);

		ch[400] = 64;

		Message(64,"Shall　I　explain　the　rules?","","","");
		Message(64,"Simply　score　a　point","by　getting　the　ball　in","the　opposing　goal.","");
		Message(64,"After 3 minutes，　the team","with　the　most　goals　wins.","","");
		
		if (!ch[2324])
		{
			Message(64,"Have　you　chosen　your","team's　name　yet?","","");
			Message(60,"The　Monster　Dream　Team!","","","");
			Look(0,60);
			Wait(10);
			Message(0,"Hey!","When　did　we　decide　that?","","");
			Look(61,0);
			Look(0,61);
			Message(61,"Just　now.","","","");
			Look(0,64);
			Look(61,63);
			Message(64,"The　Monster　Dream　Team...","Sounds　very　strong　indeed.","","");
			Message(64,"We　are　the　Motoro　Astrals.","We　will　someday　be　world　champions!","","");
			Message(0,"Wow.","Go　easy　on　us，　ok?","","")
			ch[2324]=1;
		}
		else
		{
			Message(0,"OK.","","","");
		}

		Message(64,"Let　us　begin.","","","");

		KaguTest(12000,58);
		KaguTest(12001,58);
//		Walk2(58,0,2,1);
//		KaguTest(20021,58);
//		Walk2(0,0,2,1);
//		KaguTest(20021,0);

		Wait(10);
		Camera(0,-800,-1375,370);
//		KaguTest(12000,58);
//		KaguTest(12000,59);
//		KaguTest(12001,58);
//		KaguTest(12001,59);
		Wait(15);
		ch[3982] = 4;
		ch[400] = -1;
		
		// テクスチャ読み込んでおく
		KaguTest2(10009,0,"minigm.iti");

		Camera(-1,0,0,0);		
		Wait(90);
		BGM(10);
		ch[2061] = 1;
	}
	
	return 0;

}
#EndScript

int main()

	ch[3610] = 0;
	ch[3611] = 0;
	ch[3612] = 0;
	ch[3613] = 0;
	ch[3614] = 0;
	ch[3615] = 0;
	ch[3616] = 0;
	ch[3610 + a] = 1;
	
	KaguTest(40002,0);

	MapEvent(0);
	Walk(0,-8,11);
	Wait(11);
	Event(100);
	Walk(0,-5,20);
	Wait(20);
	MapEvent(1);

//202 -> 203 改め 202 -> ミニマップ ///////////////////////////////////3/28new!
#Script:00504
int main()
{
	MapEvent(0);

	if (ch[2497])
	{
		 //出る
		WaitD(0);
		ch[50] = 0;
		string st1,st2;
		SelStart(50);
		st1 = "Leave　"+StageName(ch[1107]-2260);
		st2 = "Don't　leave　"+StageName(ch[1107]-2260);
		SelText(st1,1);
		SelText(st2,2);
		SelEnd();
		
		if (ch[50] == 1)
		{
			MapEvent(0);
			Walk(0,8,30);
			Black(0,100,30);
			Wait(30);
			
			KaguTest(10100,0);
			KaguTest(99999,0);
			TekiStop(0);
			MapEvent(1);
		}
		else
		{
			MapEvent(0);

			KaguTest(30058,0);
			while(ch[420])
			{
				Walk(ch[421],ch[422],ch[423]);
				Wait(ch[423]);
				KaguTest(30058,0);
			}

			Walk(0,-8,20);
			Wait(20);
			MapEvent(1);
			TekiStop(0);
		}
	}
	else
	{
//		if (ch[11])
		{
			// クリア
			int a;
			a = ch[2264];
			
			KaguTest(40002,0);

			TekiStop(1);
			MapEvent(0);
//			Walk(0,8,15);
				// 評価表示
			KaguTest(10500,120);

			if (ch[2264] < 1)
			{
				ch[2264]=1;
			}
			
			Wait(90);
			
			Message(0,"","","","");
			
			// ミニフィールドへ戻る
//			Black(0,100,30);
//			Wait(30);
			KaguTest(10011,10);
			Wait(10);
//			KaguTest(10100,0);
//			KaguTest(99999,0);

			MapEvent(1);
			
//			KaguTest(20025,0);
			PostScr(1192);
			
//			if (!a)
//			{
//				ch[429] = 3;
//				PostScr(1052);
//			}
			
		}
	}
	
	MapEvent(1);
}

#Script:00513
int main()
{
	KaguTest(20010,0);

	if (ch[420] == 301)
	{
		KaguTest(40002,0);
		MapEvent(0);
		Walk(0,-8,11);
		Wait(11);
		Event(100);
		Walk(0,-5,20);
		Wait(20);
		MapEvent(1);
	
		return 0;
	}

	int a;
	a = ch[2284];

	MapEvent(0);
	KaguTest(40002,0);
	// クリア
	TekiStop(1);
	MapEvent(0);
//	Walk(0,-8,15);
		// 評価表示
	KaguTest(10500,120);

	if (ch[2284] < 1)
	{
		ch[2284]=1;
	}
	
	Wait(90);
	
	Message(0,"","","","");
	
	// ミニフィールドへ戻る
	Black(0,100,30);
	Wait(30);
	KaguTest(10011,10);
	Wait(10);
	KaguTest(10100,0);
	KaguTest(99999,0);
	TekiStop(0);
	MapEvent(1);

	return 0;

}

//303 -> 302 ///////////////////////////////////3/28new!
#Script:00517
int main()
{
//	ch[2501] = 1;
	MapEvent(0);
	KaguTest(40002,0);

	if (ch[2497])
	{
		Walk(8,0,11);
	}
	else
	{
		Walk(-8,0,11);
	}
	
	Black(0,100,11);
	Wait(11);
	Event(100);
	Wait(15);
	Black(0,0,15);
	
	// イベント起こす
	if (ch[2497])
	{
		// 岩をどける
		int rock;
		int c;
		int pt1;
		int pt2;
		int pt3;
		int x;
		int y;
		int z;
		ch[421] = 3;
		KaguTest(30034,3);
		rock = ch[420];
		KaguTest(30025,1);
		c = ch[420];
		KaguTest(12004,c);
		pt1 = ch[420];
		KaguTest(12004,c+1);
		pt2 = ch[420];
		KaguTest(12004,c+2);
		pt3 = ch[420];
		KaguTest(12000,c);
		KaguTest(12000,c+1);
		KaguTest(12000,c+2);

		GetCharPos(rock,x,y,z);		
		CharPos(rock,x,y,2000);
		GetCharPos(rock+1,x,y,z);		
		CharPos(rock+1,x,y,2000);
		GetCharPos(rock+2,x,y,z);		
		CharPos(rock+2,x,y,2000);
		CharPos(c,-4650,-75,0);
		CharPos(c+1,-4350,0,0);
		CharPos(c+2,-4350,-150,0);
		
		// Parin歩く
		Walk(5,0,20);
		ch[429] = 0;
		KaguTest(30039,0);

		// Phantomたち歩く
		Walk2(c,6,0,60);
		ch[429] = 0;
		KaguTest(30039,0);
		Walk2(c+1,8,0,60);
		ch[429] = 0;
		KaguTest(30039,0);
		Walk2(c+2,8,0,60);
		ch[429] = 0;
		KaguTest(30039,0);
		Wait(20);
			// カメラを奴らに
		SaveCamera();
		ch[420] = -5089;
		ch[421] = -55;
		ch[422] = 320;
		ch[423] = -4039;
		ch[424] = -72;
		ch[425] = 20;
		KaguTest(30093,40);
		KaguTest(30019,14);
		CrossFade();
		Wait(40);
		// エモ出し
		ch[420] = 15;
		ch[429] = 1;
		KaguTest(30036,c+1);
		Wait(10);
		KaguTest(30036,c+2);
		Wait(10);
		ch[420] = 8;
		KaguTest(30036,c);
		Wait(20);
		
		// 岩ふってくる
		KaguTest(30077,rock);
		KaguTest(30077,rock+1);
		KaguTest(30077,rock+2);
		ch[420] = 478;
		KaguTest(30100,rock);
		
		// 魚人は前方によける
		Walk2(c+1,10,15,15);
		ch[429] = 1;
		KaguTest(30039,0);
		Walk2(c+2,10,-15,15);
		ch[429] = 1;
		KaguTest(30039,0);
		ch[421] = 30;
		ch[422] = 1;
		KaguTest(30037,c+1);
		KaguTest(30037,c+2);
		
		// しいたけスライムは後方に
		Walk2(c+1,15,0,15);
		ch[429] = 1;
		KaguTest(30039,0);
		ch[421] = 30;
		ch[422] = 1;
		KaguTest(30037,c);
		Wait(15);
		Look(c+1,rock);
		Look(c+2,rock);
		Wait(23);
		
		// 岩着地
		KaguTest(30078,rock);
		KaguTest(30078,rock+1);
		KaguTest(30078,rock+2);
		int x2;
		int y2;
		GetCharPos(rock,x,y,z);
		x2 = x;
		y2 = y;
		CharPos(rock,x,y,0);
		GetCharPos(rock+1,x,y,z);
		x2 = x2 + x;
		y2 = y2 + y;
		CharPos(rock+1,x,y,0);
		GetCharPos(rock+2,x,y,z);
		x2 = x2 + x;
		y2 = y2 + y;
		CharPos(rock+2,x,y,0);
		
		// エフェクト
		ch[420] = x2 / 3;
		ch[421] = y2 / 3;
		ch[422] = 0;
		ch[423] = 734;
		ch[424] = 0;
		ch[425] = 0;
		ch[426] = 0;
		ch[427] = 100;
		ch[428] = 0;
		KaguTest(30045,0);
		ch[422] = -20;
		KaguTest(30045,0);
		ch[422] = -5;
		KaguTest(30045,0);
		ch[422] = 15;
		ch[423] = 2105;
		KaguTest(30045,0);
		KaguTest2(30016,0,"4545");
		ch[420] = 477;
		KaguTest(30100,rock);
		
		Wait(7);
		
		// 涙エモと汗エモだす
		ch[420] = 2015;
		ch[429] = 1;
		KaguTest(30036,c);
		ch[420] = 2011;
		ch[429] = 1;
		KaguTest(30036,c+1);
		KaguTest(30036,c+2);
		Wait(30);
		
		// イベント終わり
		ch[420] = pt1;
		KaguTest(12002,c);
		ch[420] = pt2;
		KaguTest(12002,c+1);
		ch[420] = pt3;
		KaguTest(12002,c+2);
		ch[420] = 3;
		KaguTest(12005,c);
		KaguTest(12005,c+1);
		KaguTest(12005,c+2);
		
		KaguTest(30019,0);
		RestoreCamera();
		CrossFade();
		Wait(15);
	}
	else
	{
		Walk(-5,0,20);
		Wait(20);
	}
	MapEvent(1);
}

#EndScript		

//303 -> 304 改め 303 -> ミニマップ ///////////////////////////////////3/28new!
#Script:00518
int main()
{
	MapEvent(0);

	if (ch[2497])
	{
	}
	else
	{
		// クリア
		int a;
		a = ch[2268];
		
		KaguTest(40002,0);

		TekiStop(1);
//		Walk(8,0,15);

			// 評価表示
		KaguTest(10500,120);

		if (ch[2268] < 1)
		{
			ch[2268] = 1;
		}
		
		Wait(90);
		
		Message(0,"","","","");
		
		// ミニフィールドへ戻る
		Black(0,100,30);
		Wait(30);
		KaguTest(10011,10);
		Wait(10);
		KaguTest(10100,0);
		KaguTest(99999,0);
		TekiStop(0);
		MapEvent(1);
		
		if (!a)
		{
			ch[429] = 5;
			PostScr(1052);
		}
		
	}

//304 -> 303 ///////////////////////////////////3/28new!
#Script:00519
int main()
{
	if (ch[2497])
	{
		int a;
		a = ch[2283];
	
		KaguTest(40002,0);

		// クリア
		TekiStop(1);
		MapEvent(0);
//		Walk(8,0,15);
			// 評価表示
		KaguTest(10500,120);

		if (ch[2283] < 1)
		{
			ch[2283]=1;
		}
		
		Wait(90);
		
		Message(0,"","","","");
		
		// ミニフィールドへ戻る
		Black(0,100,30);
		Wait(30);
		KaguTest(10011,10);
		Wait(10);
		KaguTest(10100,0);
		KaguTest(99999,0);
		TekiStop(0);
		MapEvent(1);
		
		if (!a)
		{
			ch[429] = 5;
			PostScr(1052);
		}
		
	}
	else
	{
		MapEvent(0);
		Walk(-8,0,11);

		Wait(11);
		Event(100);

		Walk(-5,0,20);

		Wait(20);
		MapEvent(1);
	}
}

#EndScript

//305 -> 306 改め 305 -> ミニマップ///////////////////////////////////3/28new!
#Script:00522
int main()
{
	MapEvent(0);
	
	if (ch[2497])
	{
		WaitD(0);
		ch[50] = 0;
		string st1,st2;
		SelStart(50);
		st1 = "Leave　"+StageName(ch[1107]-2260);
		st2 = "Don't　leave　"+StageName(ch[1107]-2260);
		SelText(st1,1);
		SelText(st2,2);
		SelEnd();
		
		if (ch[50] == 1)
		{
			MapEvent(0);
			Walk(-8,0,30);
			Black(0,100,30);
			Wait(30);
			
			KaguTest(10100,0);
			KaguTest(99999,0);
			TekiStop(0);
			MapEvent(1);
		}
		else
		{
			MapEvent(0);

			KaguTest(30058,0);
			while(ch[420])
			{
				Walk(ch[421],ch[422],ch[423]);
				Wait(ch[423]);
				KaguTest(30058,0);
			}

			Walk(8,0,20);
			Wait(20);
			MapEvent(1);
			TekiStop(0);
		}
	}
	else
	{
		// クリア
		KaguTest(40002,0);

		TekiStop(1);
		MapEvent(0);
//		Walk(8,0,15);
			// 評価表示
		KaguTest(10500,120);

		if (ch[2269] < 1)
		{
			ch[2269]=1;
		}
		
		Wait(90);
		
		Message(0,"","","","");
		
		// ミニフィールドへ戻る
		Black(0,100,30);
		Wait(30);
		
//		if (!ch[2635])
//		{
//			PlayMovie("ouen3.txt",0);
//		}
		
		KaguTest(10011,10);
		Wait(10);
		KaguTest(10100,0);
		ch[298] = 1;
		KaguTest(99999,0);
		ch[397] = 1;
		
		if (!ch[2235])
		{
			ch[2235] = 1;
//			ch[296] = 1;
		}

		if (!ch[2635])
		{
//			KaguTest(99990,0);
			ch[2635] = 1;
		}
		Black(0,100,15);
		Wait(15);
		ch[298] = 0;
		ch[420] = 100;
		ch[421] = 100;
		ch[422] = 100;
		KaguTest(30046,1);
		Wait(10);
		Black(0,0,15);

		TekiStop(0);
		MapEvent(1);
	}

//	ch[3609] = 1;
//	ch[2502] = 0;
//	if (ch[2497])
//	{
//		Walk(-8,0,11);
//	}
//	else
//	{

//		Walk(8,0,11);

//	Event(110);

//	}

//	}
//	Wait(20);

//	MapEvent(1);
}

//312 -> 307 または 312 -> 308///////////////////////////////////3/28new!
//312 -> 315 315 -> 308
#Script:00524
int main()
{
	KaguTest(20010,0)
	
	if (ch[2497] && ch[420] == 315)
	{
		// Black Bean中間マップ
		float fx;
		float fy;
		int x;
		int y;
		// 裏マップ
		MapEvent(0);
		SaveCamera();
		ch[424] = 0;
		ch[425] = -4550;
		ch[426] = 12;
		KaguTest(30061,0);
		KaguTest(30060,0);
		Walk(ch[421],ch[422],ch[423]);
		Wait(ch[423]);
		ch[420] = 0;
		ch[421] = -3115;
		ch[422] = 220;
		ch[423] = 0;
		ch[424] = -4567;
		ch[425] = -200;
		KaguTest(30019,1);
		KaguTest(20042,180);
		CrossFade();
		Wait(35);
		Event(112);
		ch[420] = 762;
		KaguTest(30100,0);
		Wait(115);
		Walk(0,-5,130);
		Wait(30);
		Event(113);
		ch[420] = 762;
		KaguTest(30100,0);
		Wait(100);
		Event(114);
		Black(0,100,30);
		Wait(30);
		RestoreCamera();
		CrossFade();
		Event(111);
		Blur(5,0,30);
		Black(0,0,30);
		Walk(0,8,30);
		KaguTest(30057,0);
		Wait(30);
		MapEvent(1);
		KaguTest2(30014,3,"trance2");
		KaguTest2(30014,2,"trance3");
		Blur(5,120,90);
		return 0;
	}
	
	if (ch[2497])
	{
		float fx;
		float fy;
		int x;
		int y;
		// 裏マップ
		MapEvent(0);
		SaveCamera();
		ch[424] = 50;
		ch[425] = 535;
		ch[426] = 12;
		KaguTest(30061,0);
		KaguTest(30060,0);
		Walk(ch[421],ch[422],ch[423]/2);
		Wait(ch[423]/2);
		ch[420] = 50;
		ch[421] = -550;
		ch[422] = 370;
		ch[423] = 45;
		ch[424] = 675;
		ch[425] = 375;
		KaguTest(30019,1);
		KaguTest(20042,180);
		CrossFade();
		Wait(35);
		Event(112);
		ch[420] = 762;
		KaguTest(30100,0);
		Wait(115);
		Walk(0,5,130);
		Wait(30);
		Event(113);
		ch[420] = 762;
		KaguTest(30100,0);
		Wait(100);
		Event(114);
		Black(0,100,30);
		Wait(30);
		RestoreCamera();
		CrossFade();
		Event(111);
		Blur(5,160,90);
		Black(0,0,30);
		Walk(6,-2,30);
		KaguTest(30057,0);
		Wait(30);
		MapEvent(1);
	}
	else
	{
		ch[50] = 1;
		if (ch[1541])
		{
			// 選択させる
			WaitD(0);
			SelStart(50);
			SelText("Fight　Tokaron",1);
			SelText("Fight　Armored　Tokaron",2);
			SelEnd();
		}
		
		MapEvent(0);
		Walk(-8,0,11);
		Wait(11);

		if (ch[50] == 2)
		{
			// 308へ
			White(0,100,15);
			Wait(15);
			CharPos(0,0,-300,0);
			LoadMap(308);
			CharPos(0,0,-300,0);
		// モンスター_MONSHITO取得して配置
			KaguTest(20020,0);
			CharPos(ch[425],0,900,0000);
			KaguTest(30028,ch[425]);
			Wait(5);
			Walk(0,5,1);
			KaguTest(30057,0);
			
			TekiStop(1);
			White(0,0,30);
			Wait(30);
			TekiStop(0);
			MMV("boss08.mmv");
			MapEvent(1);
			return 0;
		}
		
		Black(0,100,15);
		Wait(15);
//		ch[1541] = 0;
		Event(110);
	//	Walk(-5,0,20);
	//	Wait(20);
		MapEvent(1);
	//	ch[2502] = 1;
		PostScr(413);
	}
}

// Dungeon１トラップ等

// 103:スイッチ入れたらリフトが動く
// 103裏:表のドアが開く
#Script:00552
int main()
{
	int x;
	int y;
	int z;
	int bt15;
	int ln;

//  表
	if (!ch[2497])
	{	
		ln = Lift2C(2);
		
		GetCharPos(ln,x,y,z);
		bt15 = Getbt15(ln);

		if (!bt15)
		{

	// スイッチ入れる
//			if (!ch[100])
			{
				if (!ch[2600])
				{
					SE(950);
				}
				Wait(5);

				TekiStop(1);
				Lock();
				SaveCamera();
//				KaguTest(30005,0);
//				Camera(ln , ch[421] , ch[422] , ch[423] );
				Camera(ln , 2175 , -1400 , 1100);
				CrossFade();
				Unlock();

				Wait(10);

				ch[100] = 1;
				Event(102);

				Wait(25);

//				if (!ch[2304])
//				{
////					KaguTest(10006,2);
////					ch[423] = -50;
////					KaguTest(10007,4);
////					KaguTest2(10008,0,"スイッチリフト");
////					KaguTest2(10008,1,"中心のボタンに乗ったり、レバーを引いたりすると");
////					KaguTest2(10008,2,"動き出して、上に乗っている人や物を運びます。");
////					KaguTest2(10008,3,"勝手に動くリフトや全く動かないリフトもあります。");
////					KaguTest(10010,10);
////					
////					Wait(10);
////					
////					Message(0,"","","","");
////					
////					KaguTest(10011,10);
//
//					KaguTest(10006,0);
//					KaguTest(10007,7);
//					KaguTest2(10009,0,"tute_07.bmp");
//					ch[423] = 180;
//					ch[424] = 42;
//					ch[425] = 460;
//					ch[426] = 438;
//					ch[427] = 0;
//					ch[428] = 0;
//					ch[429] = 320;
//					ch[430] = 452;
//					ch[431] = 512;
//					KaguTest(10010,10);
//					Wait(10);
//					Message(0,"","","","");
//					ch[420] = 0;
//					KaguTest(10011,10);
//					Wait(10);
//						
//					ch[2304] = 1;
//				}

				Lock();
				RestoreCamera();
					Camera(-1 , 0 , 0 , 0 );
				CrossFade();
				Unlock();
				TekiStop(0);
			}

		}
	}
	else
	{
//		裏
		if (!ch[260])
		{
			TekiStop(1);
		
			ch[260] = 1;
			ln = Door2C(1);
			
			GetCharPos(ln,x,y,z);
			
			SE(950);
			
			SaveCamera();
			Camera(ln,x - 1200,y + 400,z + 400);
			CrossFade();

			Wait(15);
			
			Event(102);
			
			Wait(40);
			
			Camera(-1,0,0,0);
			RestoreCamera();
			CrossFade();
			
			Wait(15);
			TekiStop(0);
		}

	}
}
#EndScript

	Wait(20);
	
	ch[420] = 100000;
	ch[427] = 0;
	KaguTest(30015,3);
	Wait(30);
	
	TekiStop(0);
	KaguTest(30019,0);
	RestoreCamera();
	CrossFade();
	Wait(15);
}

// 204:あたりに触れると敵が飛び降りてくる
#Script:00565
int main()
{
	int c;
	int pt1;
	int pt2;
	int pt3;
	
	SaveCamera();
	// 出現させておく
	ch[420] = 100000;
	ch[427] = 6;
	KaguTest(30015,1);
	KaguTest(30025,1);
	c = ch[420];
	
	KaguTest(12004,c);
	pt1 = ch[420];
	KaguTest(12004,c+1);
	pt2 = ch[420];
	KaguTest(12004,c+2);
	pt3 = ch[420];
	KaguTest(12000,c);
	KaguTest(12000,c+1);
	KaguTest(12000,c+2);
	
	TekiStop(1);
	// カメラ向ける
	ch[420] = -1998;
	ch[421] = 200;
	ch[422] = -755;
	ch[423] = -1039;
	ch[424] = -9;
	ch[425] = -254;
	KaguTest(30093,15);
	KaguTest(30019,14);
	CrossFade();
	Wait(25);
	// 二匹飛ぶ
	Look(0,c);
	Walk2(c,-12,0,20);
	ch[429] = 1;
	KaguTest(30039,0);
	Wait(3);
	ch[421] = 25;
	ch[422] = 1;
	KaguTest(30037,c);
	Walk2(c+1,-12,0,20);
	ch[429] = 1;
	KaguTest(30039,0);
	Wait(3);
	ch[421] = 25;
	ch[422] = 1;
	KaguTest(30037,c+1);
	Wait(30);
	Look(c,0);
	Look(c+1,0);
	// 残り一匹飛ぶ
	Look(0,c+2);
	ch[420] = -1861;
	ch[421] = 217;
	ch[422] = -830;
	ch[423] = -1344;
	ch[424] = -616;
	ch[425] = -329;
	KaguTest(30093,20);
	Wait(25);
	Walk2(c+2,0,12,20);
	ch[429] = 1;
	KaguTest(30039,0);
	Wait(3);
	ch[421] = 25;
	ch[422] = 1;
	KaguTest(30037,c+2);
	Wait(30);
	Look(c+2,0);
	
	// 後始末
	ch[420] = 3;
	KaguTest(12005,c);
	KaguTest(12005,c+1);
	KaguTest(12005,c+2);
	ch[420] = pt1;
	KaguTest(12002,c);
	ch[420] = pt2;
	KaguTest(12002,c+1);
	ch[420] = pt3;
	KaguTest(12002,c+2);
	
	KaguTest(30019,0);
	RestoreCamera();
	CrossFade();
	Wait(15);
	TekiStop(0);
}
#EndScript

// 201:敵自販機
#Script:00566
int main()
{
// 購入可能な時
	int leftgp;
	int paygp;
	
	TekiStop(1);
	
	if (ch[2499] == 9)
	{
		// もうNot usable
		Message(0,"I　can't　use　it　anymore.","","","");
		TekiStop(0);
		ch[2111] = 1;
		return 0;
	}
	
	if (ch[2499] == 9 && ch[418] == 0)
	{
		ch[2499] = 8;
	}

	if (ch[402] == 0 && ch[2499] < 9)
	{
		// メッセージ表示
		if (ch[2499] == 0)
		{
			ch[2499] = 1;
		}
		
		Message(0,"There's　a　slot　for　coins.","","","");
		
		SelStart(50);
		switch( ch[2499] )
		{
		case 1:
			SelText("Put　in　￥10" , 1);
			SelText("Don't　put　in　￥10" , 2);
			paygp = 10;
			break;
		case 2:
			SelText("Put　in　￥20" , 1);
			SelText("Don't　put　in　￥20" , 2);
			paygp = 20;
			break;
		case 3:
			SelText("Put　in　￥50" , 1);
			SelText("Don't　put　in　￥50" , 2);
			paygp = 50;
			break;
		case 4:
			SelText("Put　in　￥100" , 1);
			SelText("Don't　put　in　￥100" , 2);
			paygp = 100;
			break;
		case 5:
			SelText("Put　in　￥200" , 1);
			SelText("Don't　put　in　￥200" , 2);
			paygp = 200;
			break;
		case 6:
			SelText("Put　in　￥500" , 1);
			SelText("Don't　put　in　￥500" , 2);
			paygp = 500;
			break;
		case 7:
			SelText("Put　in　￥1，000" , 1);
			SelText("Don't　put　in　￥1，000" , 2);
			paygp = 1000;
			break;
		case 8:
			SelText("Put　in　￥2，000" , 1);
			SelText("Don't　put　in　￥2，000" , 2);
			paygp = 2000;
			break;
//		case 9:
//			SelText("￥２５０００入れる" , 1);
//			SelText("￥２５０００入れない" , 2);
//			paygp = 25000;
//			break;
		}
		SelEnd();
		
		if (ch[50] == 1)
		{
			leftgp = GetGP();
			// お金を取る
			if (leftgp < paygp)
			{
				ch[50] = -1;
				Message(0,"Not　enough　money.","","","");
			}
			else
			{
				leftgp = leftgp - paygp;
				SE(893);
			}
			SetGP(leftgp);
		}
//		else
//		{
//			SetGP(45000);
//		}
		
		if (ch[50] == 1)
		{
			ch[402] = 1;
			
			// 自販機から出させる
			TekiStop(0);
			Wait(2);
			
			if (ch[2499] == 8)
			{
				// 指定位置に宝箱移動させる
				TekiStop(1);
				SE(566);
				Wait(20);
				ch[2111] = 1;
				TekiStop(0);
				
				ch[2499] = 9;
			}
			else
			{
				// 敵止めて移動させる
				TekiStop(1);
				SE(951);
				Wait(15);
				KaguTest(20020,0);
				Walk2(4 + ch[425] + ch[2499],-8,0,35);
				KaguTest(20061,4 + ch[425] + ch[2499]);
				KaguTest(20021,0);
				Wait(35);
				TekiStop(0);
				Wait(1);
				KaguTest(30028,4 + ch[425] + ch[2499]);
			}
		}
	}
	else
	{
		Message(0,"I　can't　use　it　now.","","","");
	}
	TekiStop(0);
}
#EndScript

}

// 201:イベントあたりの敵倒した
#Script:00568
int main()
{

	{
		Wait(30);
	
		SE(950);
//	SE(952);

		TekiStop(1);

		SaveCamera();
		Camera(Door2C(5) , -150 , -550 , 550 );
		CrossFade();
		Wait(20);

		Event(117);

		Wait(30);
		Lock();
		RestoreCamera();
		Camera(-1,0,0,0);
		CrossFade();
		Unlock();
		Wait(15);

		TekiStop(0);

		ch[261] = 1;
	}
}

 		SE(950);

 		Wait(5);

		CrossFade();

		{
			y = 1;

			ch[420] = -140;

			ch[425] = 70;

			ch[422] = 70;

		}

		ch[423] = -145;

		ch[425] = 170;
		KaguTest(30093,20);
		ch[420] = -145;
		ch[421] = 4129;
		ch[422] = 170;
		KaguTest(30094,20);
		KaguTest(30019,15);
		Wait(20);

		ch[423] = -129;
		ch[424] = 7430;
		ch[425] = 220;

//	ch[422] = -735;
//	KaguTest(30094,20);

	Blur(3,110,15);
	Wait(20);
	ch[420] = 1775;
	ch[421] = -3104;
	ch[422] = -301;
	ch[423] = 1492;
	ch[424] = -4157;
	ch[425] = -735;

	Wait(20);

// 204:扉開ける
#Script:00574
int main()
{
	int x;
	int y;
	int z;

	SE(950);
	Black(0,100,30);
	Wait(30);

	ch[2497] = 0;

	SaveCamera();
	GetCharPos(0,x,y,z);

	LoadMap(204);
//	TekiStop(1);
	Camera(Door2C(10),500,150,200);
	CharPos(0,-100000,0,0);
	ResetFade();
	Wait(25);
	Black(0,0,10);
	Wait(10);

	Event(102);
	Wait(50);
	Black(0,100,10);
	Wait(10);

	ch[2497] = 1;
	Camera(-1,0,0,0);
	LoadMap(204);
	CharPos(0,x,y,z + 5);
	TekiStop(1);
	RestoreCamera();
	ResetFade();
	Black(0,0,30);
	Wait(30);

	TekiStop(0);

}
#EndScript

// 0301:空の宝箱あけたら敵が出る
#Script:00581
int main()
{
	TekiStop(1);
	Wait(45);
	ch[420] = -143;
	ch[421] = 2085;
	ch[422] = 310;
	ch[423] = -166;
	ch[424] = 3119;
	ch[425] = -42;
	KaguTest(30019,1);
	CrossFade();

	ch[420] = 15;
	ch[429] = 1;
	KaguTest(30036,0);

	Wait(15);

	ch[420] = 100000;
	ch[427] = 3;
	KaguTest(30015,1);	
	int c;
	int pt[5];
	int i;
	KaguTest(30025,2);
	c = ch[420];
	// ID3は表示番号同じにする
	ch[420] = 1;
	KaguTest(30051,c+3);
	KaguTest(30051,c+4);
	for (i = 0;i < 5;i++)
	{
		KaguTest(12004,c+i);
		pt[i] = ch[420];
		KaguTest(12000,c+i);
	}
	Wait(15);
	ch[420] = 100000;
	KaguTest(30015,2);
	Wait(15);
	KaguTest(30015,3);
	Wait(15);
	ch[420] = 9;
	ch[429] = 1;
	KaguTest(30036,c);
	KaguTest(30036,c+1);
	KaguTest(30036,c+2);
	KaguTest(30036,c+3);
	KaguTest(30036,c+4);
	Wait(30);
	for (i = 0;i < 5;i++)
	{
		ch[420] = pt[i];
		KaguTest(12002,c+i);
		ch[420] = 3;
		KaguTest(12005,c+i);
	}

	KaguTest(30019,0);
	CrossFade();
	Wait(15);
	ch[100] = 1;
	TekiStop(0);
}
#EndScript

// 0302:敵を倒すと扉が開く
#Script:00582
int main()
{
	Wait(30);
	
	SE(950);
	
	TekiStop(1);
		Lock();
		SaveCamera();
	Camera(Door2C(56),3100,-75,500);
		CrossFade();
		Unlock();
	Wait(20);
	
	Event(103);
	
	Wait(30);
		Lock();
		RestoreCamera();
	Camera(-1,0,0,0);
		CrossFade();
		Unlock();
	Wait(20);
	TekiStop(0);
	ch[163] = 1;
}
#EndScript

// 302:飾台に雷ついたらリフト動く
#Script:00583
int main()
{
	TekiStop(1);
	if (ch[261] && ch[262] && ch[263] && ch[264])
	{
		// 全部の飾台に雷がついた
		SaveCamera();
		Wait(15);
		SE(950);
		ch[420] = -150;
		ch[421] = -3675;
		ch[422] = 360;
		ch[423] = -150;
		ch[424] = -2300;
		ch[425] = -440;
		KaguTest(30019,1);
		CrossFade();
		Wait(25);
		
		// SE出しながら動きだす
//		SE(891);
		ch[361] = 1;
//		Wait(10);
//		SE(891);
		ch[362] = 1;
//		Wait(10);
		SE(891);
		ch[363] = 1;
		Wait(20);
		SE(891);
		ch[364] = 1;
		Wait(40);
		KaguTest(30019,0);
		RestoreCamera();
		CrossFade();
		Wait(15);
	}
	TekiStop(0);
}
#EndScript

// 0302:リフト移動させる
#Script:00584
int main()
{
//	SE(950);
	int a;
	a = 0;
	
	TekiStop(1);
	SaveCamera();

	if (!Getbt15(Lift2C(11)))
	{
		Wait(15);
		Camera(Lift2C(11),500,650,800);
		CrossFade();
		Wait(20);
		
		Event(107);
		
		Wait(90);
		a = 1;
	}
	if (!Getbt15(Lift2C(12)))
	{
		Camera(Lift2C(12),-225,-1100,525);
		CrossFade();
		Wait(20);
		
		Event(111);
		Wait(90);
		a = 1;
	}

	if (a)
	{	
		RestoreCamera();
		Camera(-1,0,0,0);
		CrossFade();
		Wait(20);
	}
	
	TekiStop(0);
}
#EndScript

// 0302:早登りリフトオン

		CrossFade();
		Unlock();
	Wait(20);
	
	Event(108);

	Wait(90);
		Lock();
		RestoreCamera();
	Camera(-1,0,0,0);
		CrossFade();
		Unlock();
	Wait(20);
	
}
#EndScript

// 304: When you touch the area, Kaiser Horn and 2 Slime Soldiers will appear.
#Script:00586
int main()
{
	TekiStop(1);
	ch[420] = 1540;
	ch[421] = 566;
	ch[422] = 758;
	ch[423] = 1856;
	ch[424] = 2175;
	ch[425] = 120;
	KaguTest(30019,1);
	CrossFade();
	Wait(30);
	
	// 出現
	ch[420] = 100000;
	ch[427] = 0;
	KaguTest(30015,3);
	KaguTest(30015,4);
	KaguTest(30015,5);
	KaguTest(30025,3);
	int c;
	c = ch[420];
	ch[420] = 2009;
	ch[421] = 30;
	ch[429] = 1;
	Wait(45);
	KaguTest(30053,c);
	Wait(45);
	ch[420] = 9;
	ch[429] = 1;
	KaguTest(30036,c+1);
	KaguTest(30036,c+2);
	Wait(30);
	
	KaguTest(30019,0);
	CrossFade();
	Wait(15);
	TekiStop(0);
}
#EndScript

// 0304:火つけると扉開く
#Script:00587
int main()
{
	TekiStop(1);

	Wait(20);

	SE(950);
	KaguTest(30025,6);
	KaguTest(30114,ch[420]);
	
	SaveCamera();

	ch[420] = -1347;
	ch[421] = 489;
	ch[422] = 295;
	ch[423] = -298;
	ch[424] = 456;
	ch[425] = -4;
	KaguTest(30093,20);
	KaguTest(30019,14);
	CrossFade();
	Wait(20);
	ch[420] = -262;
	ch[421] = 490;
	ch[422] = 246;
	ch[423] = 575;
	ch[424] = 463;
	ch[425] = 95;
	KaguTest(30093,20);
	Wait(40);
	
	if (!ch[363])
	{
		Ksk(17);
		Wait(30);
	}
	Event(106);
	
	Wait(30);
	
	// The enemy appears
	ch[420] = 100000;
	ch[427] = 7;
	KaguTest(30015,1);
	int c;
	int pt1;
	int pt2;
	KaguTest(30025,1);
	c = ch[420];
	KaguTest(12004,c);
	pt1 = ch[420];
	KaguTest(12004,c+1);
	pt2 = ch[420];
	KaguTest(12000,c);
	KaguTest(12000,c+1);

	ch[420] = 474;
	ch[421] = 177;
	ch[422] = 288;
	ch[423] = -182;
	ch[424] = 452;
	ch[425] = 45;
	KaguTest(30019,1);
	CrossFade();
	Look(c+1,0);
	Wait(15);

	// Phantom meeting?
	ch[420] = 2009;
	ch[429] = 1;
	KaguTest(30036,c+1);
	Wait(45);
	Look(c+1,c);
	Wait(30);
	ch[420] = 15;
	ch[429] = 1;
	KaguTest(30036,c);
	KaguTest(30036,c+1);
	
	// Phantom出撃
	Walk2(c+1,0,6,30);
	ch[429] = 0;
	KaguTest(30039,0);
	Wait(30);
	Walk2(c+1,-12,0,60);
	KaguTest(30039,0);
	Walk2(c,0,-12,15);
	KaguTest(30039,0);
	Wait(15);
	Walk2(c,-12,0,45);
	KaguTest(30039,0);
	ch[420] = -2235;
	ch[421] = 1115;
	ch[422] = 458;
	ch[423] = -683;
	ch[424] = 505;
	ch[425] = 70;
	KaguTest(30019,1);
	CrossFade();
	Wait(15);
	Look(0,c+1);
	ch[420] = 15;
	ch[429] = 1;
	KaguTest(30036,0);
	Wait(30);
	Look(c+1,0);
	Look(c,0);

	KaguTest(30019,0);
	CrossFade();
	Wait(15);
	
	TekiStop(0);
	
	ch[420] = pt1;
	KaguTest(12002,c);
	ch[420] = pt2;
	KaguTest(12002,c+1);
	ch[420] = 3;
	KaguTest(12005,c);
	KaguTest(12005,c+1);
	
	ch[267] = 1;
}
#EndScript

		ch[421] = -160;
		ch[422] = 334;
		ch[423] = 1942;
		ch[424] = -155;
		ch[425] = -4;
		KaguTest(30019,1);
		CrossFade();
		Wait(30);
			
		Event(101);
		Wait(20);
		ch[420] = 100000;
		ch[427] = 1;
		KaguTest(30015,1);
		KaguTest(30025,1);
		int c;
		c = ch[420];
		TekiStop(0);
		KaguTest(12006,c);
		KaguTest(12006,c+1);
		KaguTest(12006,c+2);
		KaguTest(12006,c+3);
		TekiStop(1);
		
		Wait(40);

		KaguTest(30019,0);
		RestoreCamera();
		CrossFade();
		Wait(15);
		TekiStop(0);
		ch[305] = 1;
	}
}

// 305: If you touch the hit, a boxer slime will appear (Rocky's opening act?)

{

	TekiStop(1);
	Event(314);
	Wait(15);
	ch[420] = 15;
	ch[429] = 1;
	KaguTest(30036,0);
	Look(0,Door2C(2));
	Wait(30);
	
	ch[420] = 2750;
	ch[421] = 2475;
	ch[422] = 320;
	ch[423] = 3807;
	ch[424] = 2475;
	ch[425] = 20;
	KaguTest(30019,1);
	CrossFade();
	Wait(15);
	
	ch[420] = 100000;
	ch[427] = 0;
	KaguTest(30015,2);
	KaguTest(30025,2);
	int c;
	c = ch[420];
	Look(0,c);
	Wait(30);
	ch[420] = 9;
	ch[429] = 1;
	KaguTest(30036,c);
	Wait(30);
	
	KaguTest(30019,0);
	CrossFade();
	Wait(15);
	
	TekiStop(0);
}

// 305裏：あたりに触れたらトゲ中ボスがダイブしてトゲボールと合体（してるようにみせたい）
#Script:00599
int main()
{
	int c;
	SaveCamera();
	KaguTest(30025,1);
	c = ch[420];
	Look(0,c);
	ch[420] = 15;
	ch[429] = 1;
	KaguTest(30036,0);
	Wait(30);
	
	ch[420] = -829;
	ch[421] = 449;
	ch[422] = 370;
	ch[423] = -215;
	ch[424] = -402;
	ch[425] = 70;
	KaguTest(30019,1);
	CrossFade();
	Wait(25);

	KaguTest(12000,c + 1);
	ch[420] = 2;
	KaguTest(12005,c);
	KaguTest(30095,c + 1);
	
	Walk2(c + 1,-6,-4,45);
	Wait(5);
	ch[421] = 45;
	ch[422] = 1;
	KaguTest(30037,c + 1);
	ch[420] = 2;
	KaguTest(30095,c);
	Wait(40);
	CharPos(c + 1,-200000,0,0);
	Wait(30);

	ch[420] = 1;
	ch[421] = 1;
	ch[422] = 1;
	KaguTest(30090,c);
	ch[420] = 3;
	KaguTest(12005,c);
	ch[420] = 1;
	KaguTest(30095,c);
	Wait(30);
	
	KaguTest(30019,0);
	RestoreCamera();
	CrossFade();
	Wait(15);
}
#EndScript

// シナリオ進行用

// 0208:Dungeon２石版DAO
#Script:00400
int main()
{
	if (!ch[512] && !ch[1542])
	{
		// 壊されたイベントまだ
		Mes("A　giant　stone　is　blocking　you.");
		return 0;
	}

	{
		if (!ch[1542])
		{
			// 石版２回目以降
			Message(0,"I　have　to　find　Doug.","","","");
//			Message(0,"たしか、ラディスの森にいるとか……","","","");
		}
		else if (!ch[1502])
		{
			Black(0,100,30);
			Wait(30);
//			PlayMovie("skowa0.txt",0);
			ch[1502] = 1;
//			PlayMovie("ouen.txt",0);
			ch[1503] = 1;
			Black(0,100,0);
			LoadMap(208);
			Walk(-5,0,1);
			KaguTest(30057,0);
			Black(0,0,30);
			Wait(30);

//			Event(150);
		}
	}
}
#EndScript

// 0206:逃げるLassi (Roger)
#Script:00405
int main()
{
//	Mes("「イベント」ボス撃破②");
//	White(0,0,0);
//	White(0,100,30);
//	Wait(60);

	KaguTest(40002,0);
	
	// Debug
	if (ch[3982] == 1)
	{
		// 純粋ボスラッシュ中
//		ch[1790]++;
//		ch[1791] = 100;
//		if (ch[1790] > 2) ch[1790] = 2;
		KaguTest(20051,0);
		Scop(0);
		Scop(1);
		
		LoadMapB(606);
		CharPos(0,0,2000,1050);

		KaguTest(20020,0);
	//		CharPos(ch[425],0,-300,20);
			CharPos(ch[425],0,2300,1050);
			KaguTest(30028,ch[425]);
			
			Scop2(ch[425],1,"scop.it3");
			
			KaguTest2(30013,50001,"fall_atari_ue");

		Black(0,0,30);
		Wait(30);
		SetSavePos2(207,0,0,0);	// 死んだら手巣とマップに戻れ
//		BGM(7);
		return 0;
	}
	if (ch[3982] == 2)
	{
		// シナリオボスラッシュ中
//		ch[1790]++;
//		ch[1791] = 100;
//		if (ch[1790] > 2) ch[1790] = 2;
		KaguTest(20051,0);
		Scop(0);
		Scop(1);
		
//		PlayMovie("dkt_3_3.txt",1);
		ch[1505] = 1;
		Wait(10);
//		PlayMovie("houkoku.txt",1);
		ch[1506] = 1;
		ch[1515] = 1;
		ch[528] = 1;
		Wait(10);
//		PlayMovie("fukkou.txt",1);
		ch[1516] = 1;
		Wait(10);
//		PlayMovie("pflush2.txt",1);
		ch[1507] = 1;
		ch[1508] = 1;
		Wait(10);
//		PlayMovie("nise.txt",1);
		ch[1512] = 1;
		Wait(10);
		
		LoadMapB(606);
		CharPos(0,0,2000,1050);

		KaguTest(20020,0);
	//		CharPos(ch[425],0,-300,20);
			CharPos(ch[425],0,2300,1050);
			KaguTest(30028,ch[425]);
			
			Scop2(ch[425],1,"scop.it3");
			
			KaguTest2(30013,50001,"fall_atari_ue");

		Black(0,0,30);
		Wait(30);
		SetSavePos2(207,0,0,0);	// 死んだら手巣とマップに戻れ
//		BGM(7);
		return 0;
	}
	//Debug ends here
	
//	BGM(6);

//	Lock();
	// 評価表示
	KaguTest(20020,0);
	CharPos(ch[425],-200000,0,0);
	CharPos(ch[425]+1,-200000,0,0);
	CharPos(ch[425]+2,-200000,0,0);
	CharPos(ch[425]+3,-200000,0,0);
	CharPos(ch[425]+4,-200000,0,0);
	CharPos(ch[425]+5,-200000,0,0);
	CharPos(ch[425]+6,-200000,0,0);
	White(0,0,30);
	Wait(30);
	KaguTest(10500,120);
		
	if (ch[2265] < 1)
	{
		ch[2265]=1;
	}
	
	Wait(90);
		
	Message(0,"","","","");
	
	// If you have already defeated the boss, just exit
	if (ch[1505])
	{
		Black(0,100,30);
		Wait(30);
		KaguTest(10011,5);
		Wait(5);
		KaguTest(10100,0);
		KaguTest(99999,0);
		TekiStop(0);
		MapEvent(1);
		return 0;
	}	

	White(0,100,30);
	Wait(30);
	KaguTest(10011,5);
	Wait(5);
//	BGM(0);

	Mouse(0);
	KaguTest(20065,7);
	PlayMovie("dkt_3_3.txt",0);
	Mouse(1);
//	PlayMovie("houkoku.txt",0);
	ResetFade();
	Black(0,100,0);
//	Black(0,0,30);
	Unlock();

//	SetSavePos2( 206 , 0 , 0 , 38 );

	// いろいろフラグ立てる
	// ボス撃破　１５０５
	// 偽Parin誕生イベント見るためのフラグ　１５１５
	// 町復興フラグ　５２８
	ch[1505] = 1;
	ch[1515] = 1;
	ch[528] = 1;
	
	ch[298] = 1;
	KaguTest(99999,0);
	
	KaguTest(99990,0);
	Black(0,100,15);
	Wait(15);
	ch[298] = 0;
	ch[420] = 100;
	ch[421] = 100;
	ch[422] = 100;
	KaguTest(30046,1);
	Wait(10);
	Black(0,0,15);

	TekiStop(0);
	MapEvent(1);
}
#EndScript

// 0206 -> 0205（ボス撃破後初回時）:偽Parin誕生
#Script:00406
int main()
{
	MapEvent(0);
	Walk(8,0,11);
	Wait(5);
	Black(0,100,30);
//	Wait(11);

//	Mes("「イベント」偽Parin誕生");
	Wait(30);

//	Black(0,0,0);
//	Black(0,100,30);
//	Wait(30);

	Lock();	

	SaveMap();

	LoadMap(209);
//	PlayMovie("houkoku.txt",0);
	ResetFade();

	RestoreMap();
	ResetFade();

	Black(0,100,0);
	Black(0,0,30);
	Unlock();


	ch[1506] = 1;
	ch[1515] = 0;

	Event(100);

	Walk(5,0,20);
	Wait(20);
	MapEvent(1);
}
#EndScript

// 0606:偽Parin戦
#Script:00411
int main()
{

	if (!ch[300])
	{
		if (!ch[1513])
		{
			// リフト位置関連フラグ
//			ch[2502] = 1;

			Black(0,100,30);
			Wait(30);
			Lock();
			Scop2(58,1,"scop.it3");
//			PlayMovie("yama_b0.txt",ch[1512]);
			Mouse(0);
			KaguTest(20065,28);
			PlayMovie("yam_3_2.txt",ch[1512]);
			Black(0,100,0);
			Wait(5);
//			Black(0,0,15);
			Walk(0,5,1);
			KaguTest(30057,0);
			Mouse(1);
//			BGM(28);	// 山ボス曲

			LoadMapB(606);
//			BGM(28);
			CharPos(0,0,2000,1050);

			TekiStop(1);
	//		LiftEnable(0);
			Black(0,100,0);
			MapEvent(0);
			ResetFade();
			Black(0,0,30);	

	//		CharPos(10,-500001,0,0);
	//		CharPos(58,0,0,0);

			Unlock();
	//		LoadMap(306);


			//Mes("イベント「偽Parin戦」");
			
			// リフトの移動
			Event(160);

			// 偽Parin戦やったフラグ	
			ch[1512] = 1;
			// 二度実行防止フラグ
			ch[300] = 1;

			// ゲームオーバー時用のリフト位置フラグ
//			ch[2502] = 0;

			MapEvent(1);

			CharPos(10,-500001,0,0);
	// モンスター_MONSHITO取得して配置
		KaguTest(20020,0);
	//		CharPos(ch[425],0,-300,20);
			CharPos(ch[425],0,2300,1065);
			KaguTest(30028,ch[425]);
			
			Scop2(ch[425],1,"scop.it3");
			
			KaguTest2(30013,50001,"fall_atari_ue");
			TekiStop(0);
		}
		else
		{
			TekiStop(1);
			
			Black(0,100,30);
			Wait(30);
			CharPos(0,0,2000,1050);

			KaguTest(20020,0);
	//		CharPos(ch[425],0,-300,20);
			CharPos(ch[425],0,2300,1065);
			KaguTest(30028,ch[425]);
			
			Scop2(ch[425],1,"scop.it3");
			ch[300] = 1;

			KaguTest2(30013,50001,"fall_atari_ue");
			BGM(28);
			
			Look(ch[425],0);
			Look(0,ch[425]);

			TekiStop(0);
			Black(0,0,30);
			
		}
		KaguTest(10600,ch[1107]-2260);
//		MMV(StageMMV(ch[420]));
		MMV("boss04.mmv");

	}

	SetSavePos2(606,0,-1050,-450);

	LiftEnable(0);
}
#EndScript

// 0606:偽Parin倒した
#Script:00412
int main()
{
//	Mes("偽Parin倒した");

//	Wait(100);
	// クリア表示
//	MapEvent(0);
//	TekiStop(1);

	KaguTest(40002,0);

//	White(0,0,30);
//	Wait(30);
	
	// Debug
	if (ch[3982] == 1)
	{
		// 純粋ボスラッシュ中
//		ch[1790]++;
//		ch[1791] = 100;
		KaguTest(20051,0);
		Scop(0);
		Scop(1);
		
		LoadMapB(307);
		CharPos(18,235,75,6555);
		CharPos(0,2100,0,6535);
		ch[301] = 1;
		
		Black(0,0,30);
		Wait(30);
		SetSavePos2(207,0,0,0);	// 死んだら手巣とマップに戻れ
//		BGM(7);
		return 0;
	}
	if (ch[3982] == 2)
	{
		// シナリオボスラッシュ中
//		ch[1790]++;
//		ch[1791] = 100;
		KaguTest(20051,0);
		Scop(0);
		Scop(1);
		
//		PlayMovie("nise2.txt",1);
		ch[1513] = 1;
		ch[1509] = 1;
		Wait(10);
//		PlayMovie("skowa2.txt",1);
		ch[1510] = 1;
		ch[1511] = 1;
		Wait(10);
//		PlayMovie("lasboss.txt",1);
		ch[1514] = 1;
		Wait(10);
		
		LoadMapB(307);
		CharPos(18,235,75,6555);
		CharPos(0,2100,0,6535);
		ch[301] = 1;
		
		Black(0,0,30);
		Wait(30);
		SetSavePos2(207,0,0,0);	// 死んだら手巣とマップに戻れ
//		BGM(7);
		return 0;
	}
	//Debug ends here
	// 評価表示
//	BGM(0);
	KaguTest(10500,120);
		
	if (ch[2267] < 1)
	{
		ch[2267]=1;
	}
		
	Wait(90);
		
	Message(0,"","","","");
	

	// If you have already defeated the boss, just exit
	if (ch[1513])
	{
		Black(0,100,30);
		Wait(30);
		KaguTest(10011,5);
		Wait(5);
		KaguTest(10100,0);
		KaguTest(99999,0);
		TekiStop(0);
		MapEvent(1);
		return 0;
	}	

	TekiStop(0);

	White(0,100,30);
	Wait(30);
	KaguTest(10011,5);
	Wait(5);
//	PlayMovie("yama_b1.txt",0);
	Mouse(0);
	KaguTest(20065,14);
	PlayMovie("yam_3_3.txt",0);
	
	// エッグプラントへの道開けるイベント出す
	PostScr(1240);
	SetWaku(1);
	KaguTest(99999,1);
	Wait(15);
}
#EndScript

// 0307:トカロン戦
#Script:00413
int main()
{
	int x;
	int y;
	int z;

	// 二度実行防止フラグ
	ch[300] = 1;

//	Mes("イベント「トカロン戦」");
		MapEvent(0);
		Black(0,100,30);
		Wait(30);
//		PlayMovie("lasboss.txt",ch[1514]);
		Mouse(0);
		KaguTest(20065,32);
		PlayMovie("GF_1.txt",ch[1514]);
		Black(0,100,0);
		Wait(5);
//		Black(0,0,15);
		Walk(-5,0,1);
		KaguTest(30057,0);
		Mouse(1);
//		BGM(32);
		MapEvent(0);
//		LiftEnable(0);
		Black(0,100,0);
		ResetFade();
		Black(0,0,30);	

//		CharPos(10,-500001,0,0);
//		CharPos(58,0,0,0);
		CharPos(18,235,75,6555);
		GetCharPos(0,x,y,z);
		CharPos(0,2100,0,6535);

//		SetSavePos2(306, 1050 , 450 , 1500);
		SetSavePos2(312, -675 , 0 , 0);

		Wait(15);
		ch[301] = 1;

		MapEvent(1);
		MMV("boss07.mmv");
	

	// トカロン戦やったフラグ	
	ch[1514] = 1;
}
#EndScript

///////////////////////////////////////////////
//  conversation用

// Doug (Moguren)
#Script:00380
int main()
{
	string str;
	int mg;
	int map;
	int nukeru;
	mg = 0;
	nukeru = 0;

	ch[400] = 2;
	ch[202]++;
	
	KaguTest(20010,0);
	map = ch[420];
	
	if (ch[2514] && !ch[2648])
	{
		// 岩壊しを依頼する
		if (ch[2515])
		{
			Message(2,"Howdy　miss!　What　can　I...","","","");
		}
		else
		{
			Message(2,"Hmm...?","","","");
            // Original JP line carries a different implication, since it more bluntly states that a human has been in Parin's position before, so I added it to Mastiff's TL. ここへニンゲンが訪ねて","来るなんて何十年ぶりだべか
			//Message(2,"A　human!　Well，　aren't　you","a　rare　sight　around　here!","","");
            Message(2,"A human! Well， aren't you","a rare sight around here!","","");
            Message(2,"It's been decades since","a human visited me.","","");
			Message(2,"What　can　I　do　for　you?","","","");
		}
		Message(0,"Actually...","","","");
		Black(0,100,15);
		Wait(45);
		Black(0,0,15);
		Wait(15);
		//Doug (Moguren)
		Message(2,"A　giant　rock?","","","");
        // In JP, his acceptance is because of work pride rather than in the prescence of the goddess Parin. So I added a second speech bubble.
        // 他の仕事が入ってるけど頼まれごとを断ってはモグラがすたるべ
		Message(2,"I　have　a　ton　of　work，","but　I　can't　say　no","to　a　pretty　lady.","");
		Message(2,"Besides， if I refuse a digging request，","I'd be a failure as a mole.","","");
		//Parin
		Message(0,"So　you'll　do　it?","","","");
		//Doug (Moguren)
		Message(2,"There's　one　catch!","","","");
		//Parin
		Message(0,"What?","","","");
		//Doug (Moguren)
		Message(2,"You　wield　that　drill，","so　you're　a　miner　like　me.","","");
		Message(2,"When　two　miners　meet，　they","ought　to　have　a　showdown!","","");
		//Parin
		Message(0,"If　you　win，　I'll　help　you.","Sound　fair?","","");
		ch[2648] = 1;
		nukeru = 1;
	}
	if (ch[2514] && !ch[2509])
	{
		//Doug (Moguren)
		Message(2,"So，　ready　for　my　challenge?","","","");
		SelStart(50);
		SelText("Let's　do　it!",1);
		SelText("Maybe　later.",2);
		SelEnd();
		if (ch[50] == 1)
		{
			mg = 1;
		}
		else
		{
			Message(2,"Come　back　anytime!","I'll　be　waiting!","","");
		}
		nukeru = 1;
	}
	
	ch[2515] = 1;

	if (ch[2509] && !ch[2510])
	{
		// 岩壊し失敗ムービー
		PostScr(1197);
		ch[400] = -1;
		return 0;
	}
	if (ch[2510] && !ch[2511])
	{
		//Doug (Moguren)
		Message(2,"This　would　be　easy　if　my","brother　Digby　was　here.","","");
		Message(2,"He　should　be　in　Monster　Village.","","","");
		ch[400] = -1;
		return 0;
	}
	if (ch[2511] && !ch[2512])
	{
		//Doug (Moguren)
		Message(2,"Did　you　find　my　brother?","","","");
		//Parin
		Message(0,"Isn't　he　here?","","","");
		//Doug (Moguren)
		Message(2,"He's　directionally","challenged.","","");
		Message(2,"He　probably　got　lost","on　the　way　here.","","");
		//Parin
		Message(0,"Challenged?","","","");
		//Doug (Moguren)
		Message(2,"You'd　better　go","find　my　brother.","","");
		//Parin
		Message(0,"Uh，　ok...","","","");

		ch[400] = -1;
		ch[2512] = 1;
		return 0;
	}
	if (ch[2512] && !ch[2516])
	{
		//Doug (Moguren)
		Message(2,"I'm　sorry，　but　you　have　to","find　my　brother.","","");
		ch[400] = -1;
		return 0;
	}
	if (ch[2516] && !ch[2517])
	{
		Message(2,"Did　you　find　my　brother?","","","");
		Message(0,"He's　not　here?　Again?","","","");
		ch[400] = -1;
//		ch[2517] = 1;
		return 0;
	}
	if (ch[2517] && !ch[2513])
	{
		PostScr(1198);
		ch[400] = -1;
		return 0;
	}

	if (!nukeru)
	{
		if (ch[1538])
		{
			//Doug (Moguren)
			if (ch[2090])
			{
				// バッド
				//Doug (Moguren)
				Message(2,"The　rebuilding","is　going　well.","","");
				Message(2,"I　hope　the　Dark　Mist","clears　up　soon.","","");
			}
			else
			{
				if (ch[202] < 2)
				{
					//Doug (Moguren)
					Message(2,"My　brother　and　I　once","fought　with　the　two　","legendary　heroes.","");

					//Parin
					Message(0,"Oh　really?","","","");

					//Doug (Moguren)
					Message(2,"Sure.　And　now　we're","helping　you.","","");

					//Parin
					Message(0,"Helping　me...?","","","");

					//Doug (Moguren)
					Message(2,"Hehe.　Our　camouflage","was　perfect.　You　didn't","even　notice　us.","");
				}
				else
				{
					//Doug (Moguren)
					Message(2,"Those　were　the　days...","","","");
					Message(2,"My　brother　hit　the　road　","after　fighting，　hoping","to　be　a　rock　star.","");
				}
			}
		}
		if (ch[1571] && !ch[1538])
		{
			//Doug (Moguren)
			Message(2,"That　earthquake","really　shook　me　up!","","");
			Message(2,"I　hope　Monster","Village　is　OK...","","");
		}
		if (ch[1513] && !ch[1571])
		{
			//Doug (Moguren)
			Message(2,"We　are　making　good　progress，","but　we　still　need　help.","","");
			Message(2,"There　must　be　a　way...","","","");
		}
		if (ch[1505] && !ch[1513])
		{
			if (ch[1505] && !ch[2524])
			{
				//Doug (Moguren)
				Message(2,"I'm　off　to　work　on　that　mansion","at　Pimento　Mountain.","","");
				Message(2,"I'm　done　packing.","I　should　be　leaving　soon.","","");
			}
			if (ch[2527])
			{
				if (ch[202] < 2)
				{
					//Doug (Moguren)
					Message(2,"It's　strange，　but　I　saw","a　tattoo　when　you","were　with　Pino.","");
					//Parin
					Message(0,"A　tattoo?　","What　an　obvious　fake!","","");
					Message(0,"And　no　one　noticed?!","","","");
				}
				else
				{
					//Doug (Moguren)
					Message(2,"It's　strange，　but　I　saw","a　tattoo　when　you","were　with　Pino.","");
				}
			}
		}
		if (ch[1542] && !ch[1505])
		{
			if (!ch[2514])
			{
				if (!ch[3203])
				{
					//Doug (Moguren)
					Message(2,"The　Dark　Mist　is　keeping　me","from　my　work　on　that","mountain　mansion.","");
					Message(2,"What'll　I　do?","","","");
				}
				else
				{
					//Doug (Moguren)
					Message(2,"That　Dark　Mist　is　gone!","Now　I　can　work　on　that　mansion.","","");
					Message(2,"I'll　be　off　for　the","mountains　soon.","","");
				}
			}
			else
			{
				//Doug (Moguren)
				Message(2,"My　brother　Digby　is","helping　me　with　my　work.","","");
				Message(2,"We'll　help　with　any","job，　just　ask　us!","","");
			}
		}
		if (ch[507] && !ch[1542])
		{
			if (!ch[2514])
			{
				//Doug (Moguren)
				Message(2,"My　brother　Digby!","He's　finally　coming　home!","","");
				Message(2,"...If　he　makes","it　without　getting　lost...","","");
			}
			else
			{
				//Doug (Moguren)
				Message(2,"Remember，　if　you　need","any　holes　dug...","","");
				Message(2,"Call　the　Super　Mole　Bros!","","","");
			}
		}
		if (!ch[507])
		{
			if (ch[202] < 2)
			{
				//Doug (Moguren)
				Message(2,"Hmm...?","","","");
				Message(2,"A　human!　Well，　aren't　you","a　rare　sight　around　here!","","");
				//Parin
				Message(0,"Who　are　you?","","","");
				//Doug (Moguren)
				Message(2,"I'm　Doug　the　mole.","","","");
				Message(2,"What　can　this　Master　Digger","do　for　you?","","");
				//Parin
				Message(0,"I'm　a　bit　of　a　digger　myself!","","","");
				//Doug (Moguren)
				Message(2,"Ho　ho!　I've　got　a　rival?","","","");
				Message(2,"We'll　have　a　showdown","sometime!","","");
			}
			else
			{
				//Doug (Moguren)
				Message(2,"Ho　ho!　I've　got　a　rival?","","","");
				Message(2,"We'll　have　a　showdown","sometime!","","");
			}
		}
	}
	
	if (ch[2513] && map == 21 && !ch[1538])
	{
		// 岩壊ししたことがある
		if (ch[2143] < 27)
		{
			// 岩壊し不合格
			if (ch[2143] == 26)
			{
				str = "The　highest　scoring　match　was　" + (ch[2143] - 1) + "　to　" + (51 - ch[2143]) + ".　It　was　a　tie.";
			}
			else
			{
				str = "The　highest　scoring　match　was　" + (ch[2143] - 1) + "　to　" + (51 - ch[2143]) + ".　I　won!";
			}
			
			Message(2,"How　about　a　showdown?",str,"","");
			
			SelStart(50);
			SelText("Let's　do　it!",1);
			SelText("Not　right　now.",2);
			SelEnd();
			
			if (ch[50] == 1)
			{
				Message(2,"All　right，","get　ready!","","");
				
				// ミニゲーム準備
				mg = 1;
			}
			else
			{
				Message(2,"See　you　later.","","","");
			}

		}
		else
		{
			// 岩壊し合格
			{
				if (ch[2143] - 1 < 50)
				{
					str = "The　highest　scoring　match　was　" + (ch[2143] - 1) + "　to　" + (51 - ch[2143]) + ".　You　won!";
				}
				else
				{
					str = "The　highest　scoring　match　was　" + (ch[2143] - 1) + "　to　" + (51 - ch[2143]) + ".　You　got　us　good!";
				}
			}
			Message(2,"What　can　I　do　for　ya?","","","");

			SelStart(50);
			SelText("Let's　have　a　showdown!",1);
			SelText("Nothing　today.",3);
			SelEnd();

			if (ch[50] == 1)
			{
				Message(2,"All　right，","get　ready!","","");
				
				// ミニゲーム準備
				mg = 1;
			}
			if (!mg && ch[50] != 2)
			{
				Message(2,"Showdown　Results:",str,"","");
				Message(2,"Come　back　anytime!","","","");
			}
			
		}
	}
	
	ch[400] = -1;
	
	if (ch[1538])
	{
		return 0;
	}

	if (mg)
	{
		// ミニゲームする
		ch[420] = -1110;
		ch[421] = 600;
		ch[422] = 480;
		ch[423] = 850;
		ch[424] = 600;
		ch[425] = -75;
		KaguTest(30019,1);
		CrossFade();
		Wait(15);
		ch[420] = 812;
		ch[421] = 685;
		ch[422] = -150;
		ch[423] = 724;
		ch[424] = 0;
		ch[425] = 0;
		ch[426] = 0;
		ch[427] = 100;
		ch[428] = 0;
		KaguTest(30045,3);
		KaguTest(30045,5);
		KaguTest(30045,7);
		KaguTest(30045,9);
		ch[421] = 560;
		KaguTest(30045,3);
		KaguTest(30045,5);
		KaguTest(30045,7);
		KaguTest(30045,9);
		Event(231);
		SE(479);
		Wait(30);
		
		ch[2145] = 0;
		Black(0,100,15);
		Wait(15);
		ch[2144] = 1;
		ch[2497] = 1;
		LoadMap(21);
		KaguTest(30019,0);
		Event(232);
		CharPos(0,0,450,-93);
		CharPos(58,0,900,-93);
//		CharPos(59,150,900,-93);
		CharPos(1,-200000,0,0);
		CharPos(2,-200000,0,0);
		Camera(58,0,-600,370);
		Look(0,58);
		Look(58,0);
		Look(59,0);
		KaguTest(12000,58);
		KaguTest(12001,58);
		KaguTest(12000,59);
		KaguTest(12001,59);
		CrossFade();
		Wait(15);
		Black(0,0,15);
		
		ch[400] = 4;
		if (ch[2143] < 27)
		{
			// 合格して無いとき
			Message(58,"The　rules　are　simple，　Miss.","","","");
			Message(58,"Who　ever　destroys　the","most　rocks　is　the　winner!","","");
			Message(58,"Beat　me，　and　I'll　help","you　with　that　big　rock.","","");
		}
		else
		{
			Message(58,"Who　ever　destroys　the","most　rocks　is　the　winner!","","");
		}
		Message(58,"Ready?　Let's　go!","","","");
		Wait(15);
//		Camera(0,0,-800,420);
		Camera(-1,0,0,0);
		CrossFade();
		Wait(30);
		ch[3982] = 4;
		ch[400] = -1;
		// テクスチャ読み込んでおく
		KaguTest2(10009,0,"minigm.iti");
		Wait(90);
		BGM(10);
		ch[2061] = 1;
	}
	
	return 0;
}
#EndScript

// 家具屋（Disk）
#Script:00382
int main()
{
	int a;
	int b;
	int c;
	int d;
	int e;
	int f;
	int sumi;
	sumi = 0;
	int kaizou;
	kaizou = 1;
	int qnuke;
	qnuke = 0;
	
	if (ch[2007] && !ch[2018])
	{
		// クエスト中
		ch[205]++;
		ch[400] = 5;
		if (ch[2002])
		{
			// のぞきクエスト
			ch[420] = ch[2006];
			KaguTest(20043,4);
			if (!ch[420])
			{
				ch[420] = ch[2006];
				KaguTest(20052,4);
				ch[2006] = ch[420];

				//Disk
				Message(5,"Oh，　hello　Parin.","You　look　well.","","");

				//Parin
				Message(0,"Have　you　seen　Cylinder　around?","","","");

				//Disk
				Message(5,"Cylinder　came　by","early　this　morning.","","");

				//Parin
				Message(0,"Do　you　know　where　he　","is　right　now?　","","");

				//Disk
				Message(5,"I'm　afraid　I'm","not　exactly　sure.","","");
			}
			else
			{
				//Disk
				Message(5,"Cylinder　came　by","early　this　morning.","","");
				Message(5,"I　don't　know　where　he　is　now.","","","");
			}
			
			if (ch[2003] == 2 && ch[2006] == 15)
			{
				// Fan以外の全員から話を聞いた
				ch[2003] = 3;
			}
		}
		if (ch[2010])
		{
			// ビラ貼りクエスト
			if (!ch[2012] || !ch[2013] || !ch[2014])
			{
                //Original JP is 一枚残らず、街の中に貼ってきちゃってよ
				Message(5,"Just　put　all","of　them　up　for　me.","Thanks　again!","","");
			}
			else
			{
				//Disk
				Message(5,"Oh， hello Parin. Thanks for putting up","those ads for me.","","");
                // Original JP is ありがとう、これはお礼だよ
				Message(5,"This is for you, just a token of my appreciation.","","","");

				//システム
				SE(853);
				KaguTest(10006,0);
				KaguTest(10007,1);
				KaguTest2(10008,0,"Got　Wallpaper　#7:　|A　Young　Hero.|");
				KaguTest2(10008,2,"You can use the desk in Parin's house");
				KaguTest2(10008,3,"to change a desktop wallpaper.");
				KaguTest2(10009,0,"kb007s.bmp");
				KaguTest(10010,10);
//				Wait(10);
				Message(0,"","","","");
				KaguTest(10011,10);

				GetItem(2);

				//Parin
				Message(0,"How's　the　shop?","Is　business　picking　up?","","");

				//Disk
				Message(5,"A-actually...","","","");
				Message(5,"A　mistake　in　my　ad","listed　a　20，000　Pockle","item　as　a　20　Pockle　item.","");
				Message(5,"I　honored　the　ad　to　protect","my　shops　reputation，","but　now　I'm　almost　bankrupt.","");

				//Parin
				Message(0,"Oh...","","","");
				
				ch[2010] = 0;
				ch[2011] = 1;
				ch[2006] = 0;
				ch[2007] = 0;
				ch[2008] = 0;
				ch[2009] = 0;
			}
		}
		if (ch[2020])
		{
			// プラチナメダルクエスト中
			qnuke = 1;
		}
		
		if (!qnuke)
		{
			ch[400] = -1;
			return 0;
		}
	}
	
//	if (ch[2018])
	if (ch[2501] != 6)
	{
		// わらしべクエストチェック
		KaguTest(20001,17);
		if (ch[430] && !ch[291])
		{
			// ダイヤモンド持っている
			// 売り払う
			//Disk
			Message(5,"That　diamond　you　have...","","","");

			//Parin
			Message(0,"Nice　isn't　it?","Worth　anything?","","");

			//Disk
			Message(5,"I'll　have　a　look.","","","");
			Message(5,"Oh!　This　is...","","","");

			//Parin
			Message(0,"Gulp!","","","");

			//Disk
			Message(5,"A　fake　diamond.","It's　worth　1，000　Pockles.","","");

			//Parin
			Message(0,"Aww...　Is　that　all?","","","");

			//Disk
			Message(5,"I　can　take","it　off　your　hands　if　you'd　like?","","");
			
			SelStart(50);
			SelText("Sell　the　diamond",1);
			SelText("Don't　sell　the　diamond",2);
			SelEnd();
			
			if (ch[50] != 1)
			{
				ch[291] = 0;
				ch[400] = -1;
				return 0;
			}

			//Parin
			Message(0,"I　don't　need　a　fake　diamond.","Take　it.","","");

			//Disk
			Message(5,"Thanks!","","","");
			SetGP(GetGP() + 1000);
			KaguTest(20002,17);
			SE(893);	// 勘定音

//			ch[2018] = 0;
//			ch[2007] = 0;
			
			ch[400] = -1;
			return 0;
		}
		else
		{
			KaguTest(20001,18);
			if (ch[430])
			{
				// ドラスレと錬金術の書交換
				//Disk
				Message(5,"Is　that...　Could　it　be...?","","","");

				//Parin
				Message(0,"This　big　old　sword?","","","");

				//Disk
				Message(5,"It's　the　legendary","Dragon　Slayer，　wow!","","");
				Message(5,"And　it's　the　real　deal!","","","");

				//Parin
				Message(0,"It's　worth　something?","","","");

				//Disk
				Message(5,"This　sword　killed　the","famous　King　Dragon!","It's　priceless!","");
				Message(5,"How　about　you　trade　it　in","for　something　I　have?","","");

				//Parin
				Message(0,"All　right.","I　only　know　how　to","use　drills　anyway.","");

				//Disk
				Message(5,"Thank　you!","Here　you　go.","","");

				//システム
				Mes("You　got　an　|Alchemy　Book.|");
				KaguTest(20022,25);
				KaguTest(20002,18);
				GetItem(25);
				Wait(60);
				ch[400] = -1;
				return 0;
			}
		}
	}


	// ビラ貼りクエスト発生チェック
	KaguTest(20001,42);
	a = ch[430];
	KaguTest(20001,45);
	b = ch[430];
	KaguTest(20001,21);
	c = ch[430];
	d = 1;
	KaguTest(20001,40);
	e = ch[430];
	f = 1;
	if (ch[2063])
	{
		KaguTest(20001,37);
		f = ch[430];
	}
	
	int quest;
	quest = 0;
	int aaaa;
	aaaa = 0;
	if (!ch[2007] && ch[205] < 1 && ch[2300])
	{
		if (a && b && c && d && f)
		{
			aaaa = 1;
		}
	}
	
	if (aaaa && ch[3960])
	{
		if (e && f && ch[2501] != 6)
		{
			quest = 1;
		}
	}
	
	if (quest)
	{
		if (!ch[2011] && !ch[2010])
		{
			//Disk
			Message(5,"Oh，　hello　Parin.","You're　looking　well.","","");

			SelStart(50);
			SelText("Sure",1);
			SelText("Sorry",2);
			SelEnd();

			{
				//Disk
				Message(5,"Really?","Thank　you!","","");

				//システム
				Mes("You　got　some　|Ads.|");
				KaguTest(20022,8);
				Wait(60);
				GetItem(8);
				GetItem(8);
				GetItem(8);

				//Disk
				Message(5,"Just　put　all","of　them　up　for　me.","Thanks　again!","");

				ch[2010] = 1;
				ch[2006] = 0;
				ch[2007] = 1;
				ch[2008] = 0;
				ch[2009] = 0;
			}
			else
			{
				//Disk
				Message(5,"Talk　to　me　if　you","change　your　mind!","","");
			}
			ch[205]++;
			ch[400] = -1;
			return 0;
		}
		else
		{
			// おかしいぞ？
		}
	}
	
	int nuke;
	nuke = 0;
	if (!ch[2063] && ch[2501] == 4 && ch[2300])
	{
		ch[2063] = 1;
		// ヘッドドレス販売イベント
		Message(5,"Oh，　hello　Parin.","Isn't　that　a　cute　outfit.","","");

		Message(5,"It's　a　bit　pricy，　but","I'm　sure　you'll　love　it.","","");

	}

	ch[205]++;
	
	if (!nuke && ch[1545] && !ch[2054])
	{
		//Disk

		//Parin
		Message(0,"Upgrading?","","","");

		//Parin
		Message(0,"But　they　don't　look","any　different，　do　they?","","");
		//Disk
		Message(5,"It's　not　about　the　looks!","Try　it!　You　won't　be　sorry!","","");
		Message(5,"If　you　upgrade　an　item","multiple　times，　it　will","get　even　stronger!","");

		Message(0,"So　I　just　pay　you　when","I　want　to　upgrade?","","");
		//Disk
		Message(5,"No　no.　You　need　Junk","to　upgrade　your　items.","","");
		//Parin
		Message(0,"Junk?","","","");
		//Disk

		//Parin

		Message(5,"Say　again?","","","");

		KaguTest(10006,0);
		KaguTest(10007,7);
		KaguTest2(10009,0,"tute_12.bmp");

		ch[424] = 42;
		ch[425] = 460;
		ch[426] = 438;
		ch[427] = 0;
		ch[428] = 0;
		ch[429] = 320;
		ch[430] = 452;
		ch[431] = 512;

		Message(0,"","","","");
		ch[420] = 0;
		KaguTest(10011,10);
		Wait(10);

		ch[205] = 0;

	else
	{

			//Disk」
			Message(5,"What　an　earthquake!","Something　happen　at　the　mines?","","");

					//Parin

					//Parin
//					Message(0,"とってないわよ。","ちゃんとメガネしてるじゃない","","");
					Message(0,"Glasses?","What　glasses?","","");
					Message(0,"Besides，　you're　wearing","them　right　now!","","");
					//Disk
					Message(5,"These　are　fake.","I　can't　see　a　thing.","","");
					Message(5,"A　little　bit　ago，　I　accidentally","sold　Fan　some　dynamite","instead　of　candles!","");
					Message(5,"I　need　those　glasses.","I　can't　tell　what　I'm　selling!","","");
				}
				else
				{
					//Disk
					Message(5,"I　need　those　glasses.","I　can't　tell　what　I'm　selling!","","");
				}
			}
		}
		if (!nuke && ch[1542] && !ch[1505])
		{
			//Disk
			Message(5,"Cylinder　asked　me　to","order　explosives　for　him.","","");
			Message(5,"But　honestly，　I'm　a　little","uncomfortable　selling　him","these　explosives.","");
			Message(5,"Who　knows　what　he's","got　planned?","","");
		}
		if (!nuke && ch[507] && !ch[1542])
		{
			if (ch[205] < 2)
			{
				KaguTest(20001,42);
				//Disk
				Message(5,"There　was　a　gas　leak","in　the　mines　a　bit　ago.","","");

					//Parin

				Message(5,"What　a　bargain!","You　have　to　buy　now!","","");
				if (ch[430])
				{
					//Parin
					Message(0,"I　told　you，　I　have　one!","","","");
				}
			}
			else
			{
				//Disk
				Message(5,"There　was　a　gas　leak","in　the　mines　a　bit　ago.","","");
				Message(5,"You　know　what　that　means?","Time　to　buy　a　Gas　Mask!","","");
			}
		}
		if (!nuke && ch[2330] && !ch[507])
		{
			//Disk
	//		Message(5,"う～ん、もっと","売り上げを伸ばさないとなぁ","","");

			Message(5,"Working　outside　could　be","nice，　but　mining　is","dangerous　work.","");
			Message(5,"I　hope　all　the　miners","are　safe.","","");
		}
		if (!nuke && ch[1545] && !ch[2330])
		{
			//Disk
			Message(5,"The　cake　shop　was","robbed　of　all　its　cakes!","","");
			Message(5,"I　have　to　take","precautions　myself!","","");
		}
		if (!nuke && ch[1545] && !ch[1545])
		{
			//Disk
			Message(5,"Today，　I've　decided　to　start","a　new　upgrading　service!","","");
			Message(5,"Give　it　a　try!","","","");
		}
		if (!nuke && !ch[1545] && ch[2300])
		{
			if (ch[205] < 2)
			{
				kaizou = 0;
				//Disk
				Message(5,"Oh，　hello　Parin.","I'll　be　starting　a　new","service　pretty　soon.","");

				//Parin

				//Disk

				//Disk
				kaizou = 0;
				Message(5,"I'll　be　starting　a　new","service　pretty　soon.","","");
				Message(5,"It'll　be　ready　soon.","Come　back　later.","","");
			}
		}
		if (!nuke && !ch[2300])
		{
			kaizou = 0;
			//OP前
			ch[400] = 5;
			
			if (!ch[2551])
			{
				ch[2551] = 1;
				Message(5,"Welcome!","","","");
				Message(5,"A　little　girl?　How　rare!","New　in　town?","","");
				Message(0,"That's　right.　I'm　Parin.","","","");
				Message(5,"What　a　pretty　name!","My　name　is　Disk.","","");
				Message(0,"What　kind　of　store　is　this?","","","");
				Message(5,"Glad　you　asked　me　that!","This　is　Disk's　Discount　Shop!","","");
				Message(0,"Discount　Shop?","But　what　do　you　sell?","","");
				Message(5,"Well，　look　at　this!","These　are　brand　new　Goggles!","","");
				Message(5,"These　are　a　store　exclusive!","First　rate　materials　and","a　killer　design!","");
				Message(0,"I　see...","","","");
				//Disk
				Message(5,"But　that's　not　all!","Look　at　this!","","");
				Message(5,"Just　put　them　on，　and　they'll","reduce　water　damage!","","");
				//Parin
				Message(0,"Cool...","","","");
				//Disk
				Message(5,"I'd　like　you　to　have　them　as","a　welcoming　gift　from　me.","","");

				KaguTest(20022,41);
				GetItem(41);
				Mes("You　got　the　|Goggles.|");
				Wait(70);

				Message(0,"Cool!","Very　generous!","","");
				Message(5,"No　money　down，　and　no　payments","for　12　whole　months!　After　that...","","");
				Message(5,"...only　200　Pockles　a　month!","","","");
				Message(0,"Hey!","Nice　'gift'.","","");
				Message(5,"Just　a　joke，　a　joke!","","","");
				Message(5,"Oh　by　the　way，　don't　forget","to　equip　items!","","");
				Message(5,"Bargains　galore，　here!","Please　take　a　look　around!","","");
				sumi = 1;

				// チュートリアル表示
				KaguTest(10006,0);
				KaguTest(10007,7);
				KaguTest2(10009,0,"tute_03.bmp");
				ch[423] = 180;
				ch[424] = 42;
				ch[425] = 460;
				ch[426] = 438;
				ch[427] = 0;
				ch[428] = 0;
				ch[429] = 320;
				ch[430] = 452;
				ch[431] = 512;
				SE(399);
				KaguTest(10010,10);
				Wait(10);
				Message(0,"","","","");
				ch[420] = 0;
				KaguTest(10011,10);
				Wait(10);
			}
			else
			{
				Message(5,"Oh　by　the　way，　don't　forget","to　equip　items!","","");
				Message(5,"Bargains　galore，　here!","Please　take　a　look　around!","","");
			}
			
			ch[2551] = 1;
			
			if (ch[2547] && ch[2548] && ch[2549] && ch[2550])
			{
				// 全員と conversation済み
	//			Message(0,"誰も相手してくれないのね。","","","");
	//			Message(0,"どこかに面白いことないかしら。","","","");
	//			Message(0,"路地裏にでも入ってみようかな。","","","");
				ch[2553] = 1;
			}
			
			if (sumi)
			{
				ch[400] = -1;
				return 0;
			}
		}
	}
	ch[400] = 5;

	int story;
	int map;
	string str;

	KaguTest(20001,42);
	a = ch[430];
	KaguTest(20001,45);
	b = ch[430];
	KaguTest(20001,21);
	c = ch[430];
//	KaguTest(20001,43);
//	d = ch[430];
	d = 1;
	KaguTest(20001,40);
	e = ch[430];
	f = 1;
	if (ch[2063])
	{
		KaguTest(20001,37);
		f = ch[430];
	}

	SelStart(50);
	SelText("Buy",1);
	if (kaizou)
	{
		SelText("Upgrade",2);
	}
	SelText("Cancel",3);
	SelEnd();

	if (ch[50] == 1)
	{
		if (a && b && c && d && e && f)
		{
			Message(5,"You've　cleaned　me　out!","Nothing　left　to　sell!","","");
		}
		else
		{
			ch[3976] = 100;
			// Motoroマジック適応
			if (ch[3975] == 0)
			{
				ch[3975] = 100;
			}
			ch[3976] = (ch[3976] * ch[3975]) / 100;
			ShopStart();
			if (!a)
			{
				ShopItem(42); // ガスマスク
			}
			if (!e)
			{
				ShopItem(40); // ネコミミ
			}
			if (!d)
			{
				ShopItem(43); // ヘルメット
			}
			if (!b)
			{
				ShopItem(45); // リボン
			}
			if (!c)
			{
				ShopItem(21); // 吸血キット
			}
			if (!f)
			{
				ShopItem(37); // ヘッドドレス
			}
			
			ShopEnd();
			
			KaguTest(20001,42);
			a = ch[430];
			KaguTest(20001,45);
			b = ch[430];
			KaguTest(20001,21);
			c = ch[430];
//			KaguTest(20001,43);
//			d = ch[430];
			d = 1;
			KaguTest(20001,40);
			e = ch[430];
			f = 1;
			if (ch[2063])
			{
				KaguTest(20001,37);
				f = ch[430];
			}
			
			if (a && b && c && d && e && f)
			{
				Message(5,"Wow!　You　cleaned　out","my　entire　inventory!","","");
			}
			else
			{
				Message(5,"Come　again!","","","");
			}
		}
	}
	else
	{
		if (ch[50] == 2)
		{
			// 改造
			//改造できるかチェック
			if(Custom3(0))
			{
				//改造メニュー表示
				if(Custom())
				{
					
					Message(5,"So，　you　want　to　upgrade　your　"+Custom2(0)+"?","That　will　take　"+Custom2(1)+"　pieces　of　Junk.","Ready　to　upgrade?","");
					SelStart(50);
					SelText("Upgrade",1);
					SelText("Never　mind",2);
					SelEnd();
					if(ch[50]==1)
					{
						//改造実行
						Black(0,100,15);
						Wait(15);
						Custom3(1);
						SE(512);
						Wait(30);
						Black(0,0,15);
						Wait(15);
						//改造結果表示
						while(Custom3(2))
						{
							SE(513);
							Wait(60);
						}
						Message(5,"Come　again!","","","");
					}
					else
					{
						Message(5,"Change　your　mind?","OK.　Come　again!","","");
					}
				}
				else
				{
					Message(5,"Change　your　mind?","OK.　Come　again!","","");
				}
			}
			else
			{
				Message(5,"You　don't　have　anything　you　can　upgrade.","","","");
			}
		}
		else
		{
			Message(5,"Come　again!","","","");
		}
	}

	ch[400] = -1;
	return 0;
}
#EndScript

// Pierre（ヒゲ男爵） conversation
#Script:00383
int main()
{
	int a;
	int b;
	int c;
	c = 0;
	int kagu;
	int kaguage;
	int kagudame;
	int check;
	kagu = 0;
	kaguage = ch[294];
	ch[294] = 0;

	ch[400] = 6;

	if (ch[2007])
	{
		kagudame = 1;
	}

	// Chucky・鼻眼鏡クエスト中
	KaguTest(20010,0);
	if (ch[2030] && ch[420] == 401)
	{
		//Pierre
		Message(6,"Bonjour，　Mademoiselle.","Quite　chilly，　isn't　it?","","");
		Message(6,"Achooo!　I'm　afraid　that","I　might　catch　a　cold.","","");
		ch[400] = -1;
		
		ch[420] = ch[2035];
		KaguTest(20052,4);
		ch[2035] = ch[420];
		
		return 0;
	}

	// ソンブレロチェック
	KaguTest(20010,0);
	KaguTest(20001,39);
	if (ch[3962] || ch[3964] || ch[3965])
	{
		// かぶりものだめ
		ch[430] = 0;
		kagudame = 1;
	}
	if (ch[430] && ch[420] == 401 && !ch[3963] && !kaguage && !kagudame)
	{
		// ソンブレロ持ってる
		//Pierre
		Message(6,"Bonjour, my pretty","Mademoiselle!","","");

		//Parin
		Message(0,"Still　in　love　with　France，　I　see.","","","");

		//Pierre
		Message(6,"J'aime　la　France　!","You　can　take　the　monster","out　of　France，　but...","");

		//Parin
		Message(0,"Right...","By　the　way，　I　found　a　hat","that　would　look　great　on　you.","");

		//Pierre
		Message(6,"A　hat?　For　me，　Mademoiselle?","By　all　means!","","");

		//Parin
		Message(0,"Close　your　eyes　and　I'll","put　it　on　your　head.","","");

		// ソンブレロつけている
		{
			KaguTest(20001,33);
			if (ch[430])
			{
				// Francoisがいる
				//Pierre
				Message(6,"Why，　my　best　amigo，","Francois!","","");

				//Francois
				int x;
				int y;
				int z;
				int x2;
				int y2;
				int z2;
				int yoko;
				GetCharPos(0,x,y,z);
				GetCharPos(6,x2,y2,z2);
				x = x - x2;
				y = y - y2;
				
				if (x * x > y * y)
				{
					yoko = 1;
				}
				else
				{
					yoko = 0;
				}
				GetCharPos(0,x,y,z);
				if (yoko)
				{
					CharPos(61,x,y+50,z);
				}
				else
				{
					CharPos(61,x+50,y,z);
				}
				Look(61,6);
				
				Message(61,"Coo!","","","");

				//Pierre
				Message(6,"If　my　new　hat　doesn't　suit　you，","let's　go　back　to　my　old　one!","","");
				Message(6,"Please　don't　leave","me，　Amigo!","","");

				//Francois

				Wait(15);

				KaguTest(20002,33);

					}
				}
				else
				{
					// 壁紙初めて
					//システム

					KaguTest(10006,0);
					KaguTest(10007,1);
					KaguTest2(10008,0,"Got　Wallpaper　#9:　|Yearning　for　Home.|");
					KaguTest2(10008,2,"You can use the desk in Parin's house");
					KaguTest2(10008,3,"to change a desktop wallpaper.");

					KaguTest(10010,10);
//					Wait(10);
					Message(0,"","","","");
					KaguTest(10011,10);

					GetItem(2);
					
					ch[2029] = 1;
				}
				//Pierre
				Message(6,"This　silk　hat　suits","me　best　after　all.","","");
			}
			else
			{
				// Francoisいない
				ch[207]++;
				//Pierre

				Message(6,"He　couldn't　have　gotten","very　far...right?","","");
			}
			
		}
