			ch[3979] = 16;
			ch[420] = 22;
			KaguTest(12002,6);
			KaguTest(30019,0);
			KaguTest(30072,0);
			KaguTest(99999,1);
			ch[298] = 1;
			ch[400] = -1;

			return 0;
		}
		else
		{
			Message(6,"Allow　me　to　take　it","if　you　change　your　mind.","","");
			ch[400] = -1;
			return 0;
		}
	}

	if (kaguage && !kagudame)
	{
		SetWaku(0);
		Mouse(1);

		KaguTest(30059,0);

		Black(0,0,15);
		Wait(15);
		ch[400] = 6;
		if (ch[3959] == 63)
		{
			//Pierre
			Message(6,"Now　I　can　finally　relax.","","","");
			Message(6,"And　I　can　devote","more　time　to　rebuilding.","","");
			ch[400] = -1;
			return 0;
		}
		if (ch[3959] == 60)
		{
			//Pierre
            // Localization, in JP he says arigatou.
			Message(6,"Merci，","Now　I　shall　enjoy　my","coffee　and　croissants.","");
			ch[400] = -1;
			return 0;
		}
		if (ch[3959] == 69)
		{
			//Pierre
			Message(6,"Thank　you，　Mademoiselle.","Now　my　silk　hat　is","safe　and　sound.","");
			ch[400] = -1;
			return 0;
		}
		if (kagu < 5)
		{
			//Pierre
			Message(6,"Merci.","","","");
			Message(6,"My　heirs　shall　receive","tales　of　your　heroism","with　my　lovely　furniture.","");
			ch[400] = -1;
			return 0;
		}
		if (kagu > 4)
		{
			//Pierre
			Message(6,"Merci，","beautiful　Mademoiselle.","","");
			Message(6,"Words　cannot　express　my","gratitude.","","");
			ch[400] = -1;
			return 0;
		}
	}

	int story;
	int map;
	string str;

	ch[400] = 17;

	KaguTest(11000,0);
	story = ch[420];
	KaguTest(20010,0);
	map = ch[420];

	if (map == 401 && ch[2510] && !ch[2511])
	{
		// Digby (Moguro)初出現時Home
		Message(6,"Bonjour!","I　see　Monsieur　Digby","is　paying　us　a　visit.","");
		Message(6,"Have　you　met　him，","Mademoiselle?","","");
		Message(6,"If　my　house　weren't　in　such","disrepair，　I'd　invite　him　in.","","");
		ch[400] = -1;
		ch[206] = 0;
		return 0;
	}

	ch[206]++;
	
	if (ch[1538])
	{
		ch[420] = ch[1792];
		KaguTest(20043,7936);
		if (ch[420] == 7936)
		{
			// Pierreの家具は全部そろっている
			if (ch[206] < 2)
			{
				//Pierre
				Message(6,"Bonjour，　Mademoiselle.","How　are　you　today?","","");
				//Parin
				Message(0,"Fine.　Your　house　is　looking　nice.","","","");
				//Pierre
                // In JP, he calls her a brave Mademoiselle, but English it's just courageous hero, so I went with a split.
                // おお、これも勇敢な","マドモアゼルのおかげです
				Message(6,"I　owe　it　all　to　you，","you，　our　courageous　Mademoiselle.","","");
				Message(6,"Monster　Village　is　nearly","rebuilt.　Tomorrow　we　start　on","homes　for　the　Phantoms.","");
				//Parin
				Message(0,"That　should　liven　things　up.","","","");
				//Pierre
                // In JP, he says that he will build the city up so much that it will be called the City of Flowers, but in English he compares it to Paris. According to Jisho, 花の都 (City of Flowers) is a nickname mainly for Paris and Florence.. If you look at a photo of Florence, it actually looks a lot like the town Gurumin takes place in, but Falcom was obviously going for Pierre the Frenchman. "City of Lights" is the more well-known phrase in English, so I suppose I'll leave this.
                // ええ、このHomeを花の都と呼ばれるくらいの街にしてみせます
				Message(6,"Monster　Village　will","rival　the　City　of　Lights　itself!","","");
			}
			else
			{
				//Pierre
				Message(6,"Bonjour，　Mademoiselle.","How　are　you　today?","","");
				Message(6,"Monster　Village　will","rival　the　City　of　Lights　itself!","","");
			}
		}
		else
		{
			//Pierre
			if (ch[206] < 2 || ch[3210])
			{
				Message(6,"Bonjour，　Mademoiselle.","How　are　you　today?","","");
				Message(6,"Peace　has　returned，　but　I","still　feel　a　bit　sad...","","");
			}
			
			if (!ch[3210])
			{
				// 鉢植えなし
				Message(6,"Speaking　of　which，　I　wonder","where　my　beloved　Potted　Plant","could　have　gotten　to...","");
				Message(6,"Puku　said　he　may　have","saw　it　in　the　ruins","where　he　was　held　prisoner.","");
			}
		}
	}
	if (ch[1571] && !ch[1538])
	{
		if (ch[206] < 2)
		{
			//Pierre
			Message(6,"That　was　the　largest","earthquake　I've　ever　felt.","","");
			Message(6,"You're　not　hurt，　are you，　Mademoiselle?","","","");
			//Parin
			Message(0,"I'm　fine，　thanks　for　asking.","","","");
		}
		else
		{
			//Pierre
			Message(6,"That　was　the　largest","You're　not　hurt，　are　you，　Mademoiselle?","","");
		}
	}
	if (ch[1513] && !ch[1571])
	{
		if (ch[206] < 2)
		{
			//Pierre
			Message(6,"Bonjour，　Mademoiselle.","","","");
			Message(6,"When　I　was　a　prisoner，　the","Phantoms　said　their　kingdom","was　destroyed　long　ago.","");
			//Parin
			Message(0,"I　wonder　what　destroyed　it...","","","");
			//Pierre
			Message(6,"That　I　do　not　know...","They　wandered　lost　","and　ended　up　here.","");
			Message(6,"I　almost　feel　sorry　for　them...","","","");
		}
		else
		{
			//Pierre
			Message(6,"That　I　do　not　know...","They　wandered　lost　","and　ended　up　here.","");
			Message(6,"I　almost　feel　sorry　for　them...","","","");
		}
	}
	if (ch[1505] && !ch[1513])
	{
		if (ch[1505] && !ch[2524])
		{
			//Pierre
			Message(6,"Bonjour，　Mademoiselle.","The　village　repairs　are　going　well.","","");
			Message(6,"We　owe　everything　to","you，　our　courageous　hero.","","");
		}
		if (ch[2526] && !ch[2527])
		{
//			if (ch[206] < 2)
//			{
				//Pierre
				Message(6,"Bonjour，　Mademoiselle.","Pecky　has　paid　us　a　visit.","","");
				Message(6,"He　too　is　a　gentlemonster.","That　is　why　he　agreed　to　help　us.","","");
//			}
//			else
//			{
//			}
		}
		if (ch[2524] && !ch[2526])
		{
			if (ch[206] < 2)
			{
				//Pierre
				Message(6,"Bonjour，　Mademoiselle.","","","");
				Message(6,"I　wish　I　could　help　pay　for　the","repairs　to　the　village，　but...","","");
				//Parin
				Message(0,"I　thought　you　were　rich.　You　sure","have　a　lot　of　expensive　furniture.","","");
				//Pierre
				Message(6,"I　do　enjoy　luxurious　things...","","","");
				Message(6,"But　being　a　gentlemonster　is　a　state","of　mind.　Not　all　gentlemonsters　","are　rich　monsters.","");
				//Parin
				Message(0,"Sounds　like　an　excuse　to　me!","You　sure　that's　right?","","");
				//Pierre
				Message(6,"It　is　indeed.","","","");
			}
			else
			{
				Message(6,"I　wish　I　could　help　pay　for　the","repairs　to　the　village，　but...","","");
			}
		}
		if (ch[2527])
		{
			//Pierre
			Message(6,"Bonjour，　Mademoiselle.","Going　out?","","");
			Message(6,"Pimento　Mountain　has　many","dangerously　steep　slopes.","","");
			Message(6,"Please　take　care.","","","");
		}
	}
	if (ch[1542] && !ch[1505])
	{
		if (ch[206] < 2)
		{
			//Pierre
			Message(6,"Bonjour.","This　world　contains　an　enormous","crevasse　known　as　Great　Fang.","");
			Message(6,"Rumor　has　it　that　this　place","connects　to　other　worlds.","","");
			//Parin
			Message(0,"Is　it　connected　to　my","world，　too?","","");
			//Pierre
			Message(6,"That　I　cannot　say，　Mademoiselle.","","","");
			Message(6,"No　one　who　has　entered","Great　Fang　has　ever　returned.","","");
		}
		else
		{
			//Pierre
			Message(6,"This　world　contains　an　enormous","crevasse　known　as　Great　Fang.","","");
			Message(6,"Rumor　has　it　that　this　place","connects　to　other　worlds.","","");
		}
	}
	if (ch[507] && !ch[1542])
	{
		if (ch[3201]) // This line potentially messes up the following bubble by mixing it with the above one, haven't tested
		{
			if (ch[206] < 2)
			{
				//Pierre
				Message(6,"Bonjour!　Do　you　have　time　for","a　story　about　our　past?","","");
				Message(6,"The　monsters　fought　a　great　battle","with　a　dragon　50　years　ago.","","");
				Message(6,"We　built　a　fortress","for　the　fight.","","");
				//Parin
				Message(0,"Wow，　sounds　kind　of　cool.","You　all　don't　seem　like","the　fighting　type.","");
				//Pierre
				Message(6,"A　certain　monster　and　a　drill","wielding　human　that　found　his","way　to　our　world　led　us.","");
				//Parin
				Message(0,"The　original　owner　of　this　drill，　right?","Who　was　the　monster?","","");
				//Pierre
				Message(6,"He　should　still　be　around　here.","He　also　built　this　village.","","");
				//Parin
				Message(0,"Really?　Nobody　told　me　that.","","","");
				//Pierre
				Message(6,"We　monsters　tend　to　be","a　bit　forgetful　at　times.","","");
				Message(6,"Someday，　I'll　tell　you　how","I　fought　in　that　great　battle.","It's　quite　a　thrilling　story.","");
			}
			else
			{
				//Pierre
				Message(6,"Someday，　I'll　tell　you　how","I　fought　in　that　great　battle.","It's　quite　a　thrilling　story.","");
			}
		}
		else
		{
			if (ch[2622])
			{
				//Pierre
				Message(6,"Bonjour!","","","");
				Message(6,"I'm　exhausted.　But　I　cannot","find　anything　to　sit　on.","","");
			}
			else
			{
				//Parin
				Message(0,"What　are　you　doing　here?","","","");

				//Pierre
				Message(6,"Bonjour!","","","");
				Message(6,"I'm　exhausted.　But　I　cannot","find　anything　to　sit　on.","","");

				//Parin
				Message(0,"There's　a　chair　right　there.","","","");

				//Pierre
				Message(6,"..............","","","");

				//Parin
				Message(0,"Why　are　you　ignoring　me?!","","","");
			}
		}
	}
	if (ch[2300] && !ch[507])
	{
		//Pierre
		Message(6,"I　hear　the　Phantom　Prince","has　four　servants.","","");
		Message(6,"Please　take　care，","Mademoiselle.","","");
	}
	if (!ch[2300])
	{
		if (ch[206] < 2)
		{
			//Pierre
			Message(6,"Bonjour，　my","pretty　Mademoiselle.","","");
			Message(6,"How　could　Puku　get　kidnapped","by　Phantoms?　He's　always　so　careful...","","");
			Message(6,"I　hope　he's　all　right...","","","");
		}
		else
		{
			//Pierre
			Message(6,"How　could　Puku　get　kidnapped","by　Phantoms?　He's　always　so　careful...","","");
			Message(6,"I　hope　he's　all　right...","","","");
		}
	}

	ch[400] = -1;
	return 0;
}
#EndScript

// Rocko (Iwao)Rocko (Iwao)
#Script:000384
int main()
{
	int a;
	int b;
	int c;
	c = 0;
	int kagu;
	int kaguage;
	int kagudame;
	int check;
	kagu = 0;
	kaguage = ch[294];
	ch[294] = 0;

	ch[400] = 7;

	if (ch[2007])
	{
		kagudame = 1;
	}


	// Chucky・鼻眼鏡クエスト中
	KaguTest(20010,0);
	if (ch[2030] && ch[420] == 401)
	{
		//Rocko (Iwao)
		Message(7,"There's　a　chill　coming","from　Chucky's　house.","","");
		Message(7,"I　wonder　what's　wrong.","","","");
		ch[400] = -1;
		
		ch[420] = ch[2035];
		KaguTest(20052,2);
		ch[2035] = ch[420];
		
		return 0;
	}

	// ファラオチェック
	KaguTest(20010,0);
	KaguTest(20001,52);
	if (ch[3963] || ch[3962] || ch[3965])
	{
		// かぶりものだめ
		ch[430] = 0;
		kagudame = 1;
	}
	if (ch[430] && ch[420] == 401 && !ch[3964] && !kaguage && !kagudame)
	{
		// ファラオ持ってる
		//Parin
		Message(0,"Ah，　this　would","perfectly　match　you　Rocko!","","");

		//Rocko (Iwao)
		Message(7,"What　would?","","","");

		//Parin
		Message(0,"I　have　a　surprise　for　you.","Close　your　eyes.","","");

		//Rocko (Iwao)
		Message(7,"OK...","","","");

		Black(0,100,15);
		Wait(15);
		KaguTest(20002,52);
		ch[3964] = 1;
		ch[2032] = 1;
		LoadMap(401);
		ch[400] = 107;
		KaguTest(20039,7);
		Black(0,0,15);
		Wait(15);
		//Rocko (Iwao)
		Message(7,"..............","","","");
		ch[400] = 7;
		Message(7,"M-my　head　feels　so","heavy　all　of　a　sudden.","","");

		//Parin
		Message(0,"Perfect!","It　looks　great　on　you，　Rocko!","","");

		//Rocko (Iwao)
		Message(7,"B-but，　don't　these　kinds　of","artifacts　carry...　a-ancient　curses?","","");

		//Parin
		Message(0,"Don't　worry!","It'll　grow　on　you!","","");

		//Rocko (Iwao)
		Message(7,"Ugh...","G-grow...on...me...?","","");
		ch[400] = -1;

		return 0;
	}
	if (ch[2032])
	{
		// ファラオ中
		if (ch[2032] == 1)
		{
			//Parin
			Message(0,"Rocko?　You　OK?","","","");

			//Rocko (Iwao)
			Message(7,"...Mwahaa...Pooowwweerr...","","","");
			Message(7,"..............","","","");

			//Parin
			Message(0,"Rocko?","","","");

			//Rocko (Iwao)
			Message(7,"SILENCE，　human!　Your","immortal　pharaoh　speaks!","","");
			Message(7,"The　gods　themselves　have","delivered　me　to　the　throne!","","");

			//Parin
			Message(0,"Wow，　you　really　are　cursed!","I　have　to　find　a　way　to","return　you　to　normal...","");
			ch[2032] = 2;
		}
		else
		{
			//Rocko (Iwao)
			Message(7,"Here...is　our　promised　land...","","","");
		}
		ch[400] = -1;
		return 0;
	}


	KaguTest(20010,0);


	// 家具あげた数チェック
	KaguTest(10204,3);
	kagu = ch[420];
	KaguTest(10204,4);

	// 家具持ってたら
	KaguTest(20001,58);
	if (ch[430] && !kaguage && !kagudame)
	{
		//Parin
		Message(0,"I　found　this　Low　Table.","It's　yours，　right　Rocko?","","");
		//Rocko (Iwao)
		Message(7,"How　did　you　know?","","","");
		//Parin
		Message(0,"Just　seems　like　your","style，　that's　all.","","");
		
		ch[50] = 1;
		
		if (ch[50] == 1)
		{
			Mes("You　gave　Rocko　the　|Low　Table.|");
			ch[2636] = 1;
			KaguTest(20002,58);
			KaguTest(10203,58);
			ch[3959] = 58;
			
			Wait(75);

//			if (kagu == 0)
//			{
//				// 初回ムービー
//				PlayMovie("iwao_k.txt",0);
//			}

			Wait(15);
			SetWaku(1);
			Mouse(0);

			Black(0,100,0);

			ch[421] = -378;
			ch[422] = 35;
			ch[400] = 107;

			ch[424] = ch[421];
			ch[425] = ch[422];

			KaguTest2(30015,0,"QQ3Alpha");

			ch[420] = -1;

//			ch[420] = 9;
//			ch[421] = 1;
//			ch[422] = 5;

			ch[422] = ch[425];

			WaitC(15);
			KaguTest(30069,1920);
			
			WaitC(200);

			kagu++;
			if (ch[1753] < 1)
			{
				ch[1753] = 1;
			}

			WaitC(30);
			Black(0,100,15);
			WaitC(15);
			Black(0,100,0);
	
			ch[3979] = 6;
			ch[420] = 22;

		}
		else
		{
			Message(0,"I'll　bring　it　to　you　later.","","","");
			ch[400] = -1;
			return 0;
		}

	}
	KaguTest(20001,64);
	if (ch[430] && !kaguage && !kagudame)
	{
		//Rocko (Iwao)
		Message(7,"Sigh...","","","");
		//Parin
		Message(0,"What's　wrong?","","","");
		//Rocko (Iwao)
		Message(7,"I　used　to　keep　my　rock　and","pebble　snacks　in　a　beautiful","Cedar　Chest...　but　it　was　stolen...","");
		//Parin
		Message(0,"A　Cedar　Chest　like　this　one?","","","");
		//Rocko (Iwao)
		Message(7,"What?!","You've　found　it?　Great!","","");
		Message(7,"T-thank　you!","","","");

		{
			Mes("You　gave　Rocko　the　|Cedar　Chest.|");
			ch[2636] = 1;
			KaguTest(20002,64);
			KaguTest(10203,64);
			ch[3959] = 64;

//			if (kagu == 0)
//			{
//				// 初回ムービー
//				PlayMovie("iwao_k.txt",0);
//			}

			Black(0,100,15);
			Wait(15);
			SetWaku(1);
			Mouse(0);
			
			LoadMap(401);
			Black(0,100,0);
			Wait(10);
			CharPos(0,-892,-498,25);
			ch[420] = -1337;
			ch[421] = -437;
			ch[422] = 35;
			ch[400] = 107;
			KaguTest(30070,0);
			KaguTest(30070,7);
			ch[420] = -1100;
			ch[421] = -580;
			ch[422] = 150;

			ch[424] = ch[421];
			ch[425] = ch[422];

			ch[422] = ch[422] + 370;
			KaguTest(30019,8);
			KaguTest2(30015,0,"QQ3");
			KaguTest2(30015,0,"QQ3Alpha");
			KaguTest(30118,0);
			ch[420] = -1;

//			ch[420] = 9;
//			ch[421] = 1;
//			ch[422] = 5;
//			KaguTest(12003,07);

//			Message(6,"やる気が沸いてきたでがんす！","","","");

//			WaitC(75);

			ch[421] = ch[424];
			ch[422] = ch[425];

		}

	int map;
	string str;

	ch[400] = 7;

	KaguTest(11000,0);
	story = ch[420];
	KaguTest(20010,0);
	map = ch[420];

	ch[207]++;
	
	if (ch[1538])
	{
		ch[420] = ch[1792];
		KaguTest(20043,520093696);

			// Rocko (Iwao)の家具は全部そろっている

	{

		{
			//Rocko (Iwao)

	{

			}

	{

			if (ch[207] < 2)

				//Rocko (Iwao)
				Message(7,"I'm　making　such　a　mess...","But　at　least　I　can　relax　at　home.","","");

				//Parin
				Message(0,"I'm　glad　you're　having　fun，","but you're　kind　of　in　the　way.","","");
			}
			else
			{
				//Rocko (Iwao)
				Message(7,"Poco　said　it　was　neat，","so　I　came　to　have　a　look.","","");
				Message(7,"This　place　is　so　strange!","It's　a-amazing!","","");
			}
		}
	}
	if (ch[2300] && !ch[1542])
	{
		//Rocko (Iwao)
		Message(7,"The　Phantoms　first　appeared","in　this　world　3　years　ago.","","");
		Message(7,"We　aren't　sure　where　they","came　from　or　what　they　want.","","");
		Message(7,"I　hear　their　base　is　in　the　","northern　mountains.　Be　careful.","","");
	}
	if (!ch[2300])
	{
		//Rocko (Iwao)
		Message(7,"Puku　and　Pino　came　here","after　losing　their　family.","","");
		Message(7,"They're　always","i-inseparable...","","");
	}

	ch[400] = -1;
	return 0;
}
#EndScript

// Chucky
#Script:000385
int main()
{
	int a;
	int b;
	int c;
	c = 0;
	int kagu;
	int kaguage;
	int kagudame;
	int check;
	kagu = 0;
	kaguage = ch[294];
	ch[294] = 0;

	ch[400] = 11;

	if (ch[2007])
	{
		kagudame = 1;
	}
	// スポンサーイベント中？
	if (ch[2523] && !ch[2527])
	{
		// 家具はあげられない
		Message(11,"Liar　liar　pants　on　fire!","","","");
		Message(0,"???","","","");
		ch[400] = -1;
		return 0;
	}
	if (ch[2526] && !ch[2523])
	{
		// スポンサーイベント発動
		ch[400] = 111;
		//Chucky
		Message(11,"..............","","","");
		//Parin
		Message(0,"Why　the　","weird　pose?","","");

		ch[422] = 5;
		KaguTest(12003,11);
		Black(0,0,15);
		Wait(15);
		
//			Message(11,"なんだかやる気が沸いてきたよ","","","");

//			WaitC(75);
		ch[420] = ch[423];
		ch[421] = ch[424];
		ch[422] = ch[425];
		KaguTest(30072,1);
		WaitC(15);
		KaguTest(30069,1920);
		
		WaitC(200);

		kagu++;
		if (ch[1752] < 1)
		{
			ch[1752] = 1;
		}

		WaitC(30);
		Black(0,100,15);
		WaitC(15);
		Black(0,100,0);

		ch[3979] = 18;
		ch[420] = 22;
		KaguTest(12002,11);
		KaguTest(30019,0);
		KaguTest(30072,0);
		KaguTest(99999,1);
		ch[298] = 1;
		ch[400] = -1;

		return 0;
	}

	if (kaguage && !kagudame)
	{
		SetWaku(0);
		Mouse(1);
		KaguTest(30059,0);

		Black(0,0,15);
		Wait(15);
	
		ch[400] = 11;

		if (ch[3959] == 67)
		{
			//Chucky
			Message(11,"Thanks.","Rain　won't　get　me　down　now!","","");
			ch[400] = -1;
			return 0;
		}
		if (ch[3959] == 70)
		{
			//Chucky
			Message(11,"I　can't　live　without　it!","","","");
			ch[400] = -1;
			return 0;
		}
		if (ch[3959] == 72)
		{
			//Chucky
			Message(11,"Now　I'll　see　good　dreams!","","","");
			ch[400] = -1;
			return 0;
		}

		if (kagu < 5)
		{
			//Chucky
			Message(11,"Thank　you，　Parin!","","","");
			ch[400] = -1;
			return 0;
		}
		if (kagu > 4)
		{
			//Chucky
			Message(11,"Yay!　I　got　all　my　stuff　back!","Parin，　you're　the　best!","","");
			ch[400] = -1;
			return 0;
		}
	}
	
	int story;
	int map;
	string str;

	ch[400] = 11;

	KaguTest(11000,0);
	story = ch[420];
	KaguTest(20010,0);
	map = ch[420];
	ch[211]++;

	if (map == 401 && ch[2327] && !ch[2323])
	{
		// サッカー誘う
		Message(0,"Hey，　what　are　you　doing?","","","");
		Message(11,"Nothing...why?","","","");
		Message(0,"I'm　recruiting　a　team.","","","");
		Message(11,"Are　we　gonna　play　a　game?","","","");
		Message(0,"I　don't　know　what　game　yet，","but　it'll　be　fun!　","","");
		Message(11,"Yay!　I　love　games!","I'll　meet　you　when　you're","ready　to　start　playing!","");

		Message(11,"Is　there　anyone　else　on","our　team　yet?　Huh?","","");
		
		if (!ch[2322])
		{
			Message(0,"I　haven't　picked　anyone　yet.","","","");
			Message(11,"Poco　always　looks　so","bored.　Maybe　he　could","play　with　us　too!","");
			Message(0,"Good　idea.","I'll　ask　Poco.","","");
		}
		else
		{
			Message(0,"Poco.","","","");
			Message(11,"Poco，　huh?","This　sounds　like　fun!","","");
		}
		
		ch[2323] = 1;
		ch[400] = -1;
		return 0;
	}

	if (ch[1538])
	{
		ch[420] = ch[1792];
		KaguTest(20043,2031616);
		if (ch[420] == 2031616)
		{
			// Chuckyの家具は全部そろっている
			if (ch[211] < 2)
			{
				//Chucky
				Message(11,"Wow　Parin，　Monster　Village","looks　even　better　than　before!","","");
				Message(11,"It'll　be　better　than　the","human　town　too　huh?","","");
				//Parin
				Message(0,"Everybody's　trying　their　best!","","","");
				//Chucky
				Message(11,"And　so　am　I!","Did　you　see　me，　Parin?","","");
				//Parin
				Message(0,"Yes，　you've　done","very　well，　Chucky.","","");
				//Chucky
				Message(11,"Yay!　Even","Parin　noticed　me!　","","");
			}
			else
			{
				//Chucky
				Message(11,"Wow　Parin，　Monster　Village","looks　even　better　than　before!","","");
				Message(11,"It'll　be　better　than　the","human　town　too　huh?","","");
			}
		}
		else
		{
			//Chucky
			Message(11,"It's　great　that　everybody","became　friends...　but...","","");
			Message(11,"...It's　funny，","I　dunno　why　things","don't　feel　right...","");
		}
	}
	if (ch[1571] && !ch[1538])
	{
		//Chucky
		Message(11,"That　was　scary　Parin!","Was　that　an...　earthquake?","","");
		Message(11,"I　thought　my　house　was","gonna　fall　down　again!","","");
	}
	if (ch[1513] && !ch[1571])
	{
		//Chucky
		Message(11,"Did　you　find　Pino，　Parin?","","","");
		Message(11,"I　miss　Pino!","She　should　come　back!","","");
	}
	if (ch[1505] && !ch[1513])
	{
		if (ch[2638])
		{
			//Chucky
			Message(11,"Thanks　for　getting　back","my　stuff　Parin!","","");
			Message(11,"I'm　gonna　try　my　best","and　rebuild　the　village!","","");
		}
		else
		{
			Message(11,"Parin's　a　meanie　liar!","","","");
			Message(11,"You　told　me　to　stand　like　that","and　my　neck　hurts!","","");
		}
	}
	if (ch[2300] && !ch[1505])
	{
		//Chucky
		Message(11,"Everyone　says　it's","dangerous　outside.","","");
		Message(11,"Buy　lots　of　Cookies　and","Chocolates　in　town!","Just　in　case!","");
	}
	if (!ch[2300])
	{
		//Chucky
		Message(11,"When　I　grow　up，　I'll　fight　all　those","meanie　Phantoms　myself!","","");
	}

	int chch;
	chch = 0;
	KaguTest(20001,23);
	if (ch[430])
	{
		chch = 1;
	}
	KaguTest(20001,24);
	if (ch[430])
	{
		chch = 1;
	}
	KaguTest(20001,26);
	if (ch[430])
	{
		chch = 1;
	}
	KaguTest(20001,28);
	if (ch[430])
	{
		chch = 1;
	}
	KaguTest(20001,55);
	if (ch[430])
	{
		chch = 1;
	}

//	if (ch[507] && !chch)
//	{
//		Message(11,"このツボを持っていくといいよ","","","");
//		SelStart(50);
//		SelText("ツボを受け取る",1);
//		SelText("ツボを受け取らない",2);
//		SelEnd();

//		{

//			ch[2543] = 1;

//		else
//		{
//			Message(0,"遠慮しておくわ。","","","");
//			Message(11,"残念だよ。","","","");
//		}
//	}
	ch[400] = -1;
	return 0;
}

// Black Bean
#Script:00386
int main()
{
	int a;
	a = 0;
	ch[400] = 25;
	
	// 倒したことがある？
//	KaguTest(20001,48);

	if (ch[2075])
	{
		//Black Bean
		Message(25,"Back　again，　are　you?","What　can　I　do　for　you?","","");
		
		SelStart(50);
		SelText("Who　are　you?",5);
		SelText("Let's　fight!!",1);
		SelText("Give　me　a　present!",2);
		
		if (ch[3960])
		{
			SelText("Defeat　Tokaron.",4);
		}

		SelText("I　don't　need　anything.",3);
		SelEnd();
		
		if (ch[50] == 1)
		{
			Message(25,"All　right　then.","No　holding　back　though.","","");
		}
		if (ch[50] == 2)
		{
			Message(25,"Bold　one，　aren't　you?","","","");
			Message(25,"You'll　regret　it.","","","");
		}
		if (ch[50] == 4)
		{
			//Black Bean
			Message(25,"Come　on!","","","");
			Message(25,"You　got　spunk.","I'll　take　care　of　that.","","");
		}
		if (ch[50] != 1 && ch[50] != 2 && ch[50] != 4)
		{
			if (ch[50] == 5)
			{
				Message(25,"Ugh...　my　head...","","","");
				Message(0,"Are　you　ok?","","","");
				Message(25,"Where...　am　I?","W-who　am　I?","","");
			}
			else
			{
				Message(25,"I　see...","Nothing　today　eh?","","");
				Message(25,"How　about　a　fight?","Got　nothing　but　time　on　my　hands.","","");
				Message(25,"It's　been　a","recent　habit　of　mine.","","");
			}
		}
		else
		{
			CharPos(58,0,0,0);
			CharPos(25,-200000,0,0);
			MMV("boss09.mmv");
		}
	
		ch[400] = -1;
		return 0;
	}
	
	//Black Bean
	Message(25,"Welcome.","You've　come　quite　far.","","");
	Message(25,"It's　been　so　boring　lately.","Let's　'play'　together.","","");
	
	SelStart(50);
	SelText("Who　are　you?",1);
	SelText("It's　play　time!",2);
	SelEnd();
	
	if (ch[50] == 1)
	{
		Message(25,"Ugh...　my　head...","","","");
		Message(0,"Are　you　ok?","","","");
		Message(25,"Where...　am　I?","W-who　am　I?","","");
		ch[400] = -1;
		return 0;
	}
	if (ch[50] != 2)
	{
		ch[420] = 2009;
		ch[429] = 1;
		KaguTest(30036,25);
		return 0;
	}
	
	CharPos(58,0,0,0);
	CharPos(25,-200000,0,0);
	ch[2075] = 1;
	ch[400] = -1;
	MMV("boss09.mmv");
	return 0;
}
#EndScript

	BGM(0);
}

// 00388:町の人・Pamela (Plane)おばさん
#Script:00388
int main()
{
	ch[400] = 13;
	ch[213]++;
	
	int qnuke;
	qnuke = 0;

	if (ch[2007] && !ch[2018])
	{
		// クエスト中
		ch[400] = 13;
		if (ch[2002])
		{
			// のぞきクエスト
			ch[420] = ch[2006];
			KaguTest(20043,2);
			if (!ch[420])
			{
				ch[420] = ch[2006];
				KaguTest(20052,2);
				ch[2006] = ch[420];

				//Pamela (Plane)
				Message(13,"My　goodness，　Parin.","Where　are　you　going","in　such　a　hurry?","");

				//Parin
				Message(0,"Have　you　seen　Cylinder?","","","");

				//Pamela (Plane)
				Message(13,"No，　I'm　sorry.","","","");
				Message(13,"This　morning，　that　darn　Puchi","was　barking　and　barking.","","");
				Message(13,"I'm　so　terribly　sleepy...","","","");
				Message(13,"I'll　finish　shopping","and　relax　with","some　nice　cake　and　tea.","");
			}
			else
			{
				//Pamela (Plane)
				Message(13,"This　morning，　that　darn　Puchi","was　barking　and　barking.","","");
				Message(13,"I'm　so　terribly　sleepy...","","","");
			}
			
			if (ch[2003] == 2 && ch[2006] == 15)
			{
				// Fan以外の全員から話を聞いた
				ch[2003] = 3;
			}
		}
		if (ch[2010])
		{
			qnuke = 1;
		}
		if (ch[2020])
		{
			// プラチナメダルクエスト中
			qnuke = 1;
		}
		
		if (!qnuke)
		{
			ch[400] = -1;
			return 0;
		}
	}


	// 謎の物体持っているかチェック
	KaguTest(20001,35);
	if (ch[430])
	{
		// 謎の物体持っている
		int ccc;
		int i;
		int j;
		int k;
		j = 0;
		k = -1;
		ccc = rand() % ch[430];
		for (i = 0;i < 32;i)
		{
			if (ch[2334 + i])
			{
				// カウント
				j = j + 1;
				k = i;
			}
			if (j == ccc + 1)
			{
				// オーバーした。こいつだ。
				break;
			}
			i++;
		}
		if (i == 32)
		{
			i = k;
		}
		if (i != -1)
		{
			ch[2334 + i] = ch[2334 + i] - 1;
		}
		else
		{
			i = 0;
		}
		
		Message(13,"Why Parin!","Is　that　a　Mystery　Bag　you　have　there?","","");
		Message(13,"I　just　love　Mystery　Bags!","","","");
		Message(13,"Here，　I'll　open　it　for　you!","","","");
		Message(0,"..............","","","");
		if (ch[2367 + i] != 17)
		{
			Message(13,"Look　at　that!","Such　a　nice　thing　was","hidden　inside!","");
		}
		else
		{
			if (!ch[2019])
			{
				// わらしべクエスト開始
				Message(13,"Look!","It's　a...　Oh.","","");
				//Parin
				Message(0,"What　is　it?","","","");

				//Pamela (Plane)
				Message(13,"What　a　shame.","This　one　is　empty　Parin.","","");

				//Parin
				Message(0,"Hey，　behind　your　back!","","","");

				//Pamela (Plane)
				Message(13,"Oh，　you　caught　me!","","","");
				Message(13,"A　sharp　little　one，","aren't　we!　Here　you　are.","","");

//				ch[2007] = 1;
//				ch[2018] = 1;
				
//				KaguTest(20010,0);
//				if (ch[420] == 12)
//				{
//					Event(656);
//				}
			}
			else
			{
				// わらしべクエストはもう終わっている
				// クッキー入手
				Message(13,"Look!","Such　a　nice　thing　was","hidden　inside!","");
				for (i = 0;i < 32;i)
				{
					if (ch[2367 + i] == 4)
					{
						break;
					}
					i++;
				}
			}
		}
		if (ch[2367 + i] == 0)
		{
			ch[2367 + i] = 4;
		}
		
		// アイテムオーバーチェック
		int iov;
		int item;
		iov = 0;
		KaguTest(20001,ch[2367 + i]);
		if (ch[430] == 3)
		{
			iov = 1;
		}
		
		GetItem(ch[2367 + i]);
		switch(ch[2367 + i])
		{
		case 4:
			Mes("You　got　a　|Cookie.|");
			break;
		case 5:
			Mes("You　got　a　|Chocolate.|");
			break;
		case 20:
			Mes("You　got　a　|Shortcake.|");
			break;
		case 19:
			Mes("You　got　some　|Power　Oil.|");
			break;
		case 22:
			Mes("You　got　some　|Energy　Oil.|");
			break;
		case 52:
			Mes("You　got　a　|Pharaoh　Hat.|");
			break;
		case 39:
			Mes("You　got　a　|Sombrero.|");
			break;
		case 44:
			Mes("You　got　a　|Headband.|");
			break;
		case 47:
			Mes("You　got　a　|Magic　Hood.|");
			break;
		case 40:
			Mes("You　got　some　|Cat　Ears.|");
			break;
		case 17:
			Mes("You　got　a　|Diamond.|");
			break;
		case 43:
			Mes("You　got　a　|Helmet.|");
			break;
		}
		KaguTest(20022,ch[2367 + i]);
		Wait(60);
		ch[420] = 1;
		KaguTest(20006,35);
		ch[213] = 0;
		
		if (iov)
		{
			// オーバーしている
			Mes("You　can't　hold　any　more.");
			Wait(60);
			Message(0,"Aww，　I　can't　hold　any　more.","","","");
			Message(13,"Too　bad...","","","");
			Message(13,"Well，　how　about　I","pay　you　￥100　for　it?","","");
			SetGP(GetGP() + 100);
			SE(893);
			Message(13,"Such　a　bargain!","Thank　you　Parin.","","");
		}
		ch[400] = -1;
		
		return 0;
	}

//	if (ch[2018])
	if (ch[2501] != 6)
	{
		// わらしべクエストチェック
		KaguTest(20001,17);
		if (ch[430] && !ch[2007])
		{
			// ダイヤモンド持っている
			//Pamela (Plane)
			Message(13,"Parin.","Can　I　speak　with　you?","","");

			//Parin
			Message(0,"Sure.","","","");

			//Pamela (Plane)

			Message(13,"Your　special　prize!","","","");

			KaguTest(20022,18);

			GetItem(18);
			Wait(60);

			if (ch[420] == 12)

			}
			return 0;

		else

			KaguTest(20001,32);
			if (ch[430])
			{
				// 金貨と壁紙を交換
				//Pamela (Plane)

				KaguTest(10006,0);
				KaguTest(10007,1);

//				Wait(10);

				ch[2007] = 0;

				KaguTest2(30003,1,"@atariyotsu");

			}

	}

//	if (ch[2529])
//	{
//		//Pamela (Plane)
//		Message(13,"あらあら、Parinちゃん。","ウワサで聞いたわよ","","");
//		Message(13,"いくら退屈でも","イタズラはほどほどにね","","");

            // In JP she says Hyberbolic-san instead of "your grandpa"
            // ハイパボリックさんは若い頃、坑道で行方不明になったことがあるそうよ
			Message(13,"As　a　young　man，　your　","grandpa　once　got　lost","in　the　mines，　I　hear.","");

			//Pamela (Plane)

			//Parin
			Message(0,"Wow.　I　never　knew.","","","");
		}
		else
		{
			//Pamela (Plane)
			Message(13,"As　a　young　man，　your　","grandpa　once　got　lost","in　the　mines，　I　hear.","");
			Message(13,"Everyone　was　so　upset.","They　searched　for　him　everywhere!","","");

	{
		if (ch[213] < 2)
		{
			//Pamela (Plane)
			Message(13,"Parin，　I　see　you've　decided","to　be　a　good　girl，　have　you?","","");
			//Parin
			Message(0,"But　it　wasn't　me!","","","");

			Message(0,"I　wish　I　knew　who　it　really　was.","","","");
		}
		else
		{
			//Pamela (Plane)
			Message(13,"Parin，　I　see　you've　decided","to　be　a　good　girl，　have　you?","","");
			Message(13,"If　only　you　had　someone　to　play　with，","you　wouldn't　do　such　things.","","");
		}

			Message(13,"So　you're　the　little　girl","living　with　our　mayor　now?","","");

			Message(13,"Our guard dog，Puchi，certainly has","been barking up a storm today.","","");
			Message(13,"I wonder what's the matter?","","","");

		else
		{
			Message(13,"Puchi　is　certainly　riled　up.","","","");
			Message(13,"He's　been　barking　all　day.","","","");
		}
		
		ch[2549] = 1;
		
		if (ch[2547] && ch[2548] && ch[2550] && ch[2551])
		{
			// 全員と conversation済み
//			Message(0,"誰も相手してくれないのね。","","","");
//			Message(0,"どこかに面白いことないかしら。","","","");
//			Message(0,"路地裏にでも入ってみようかな。","","","");
			ch[2553] = 1;
		}
		
		ch[400] = -1;
		return 0;
	}
	
	

	ch[400] = -1;
}

int main()
{
	ch[400] = 15;
	ch[215]++;

	{
		// クエスト中
		if (ch[2002])
		{
			// のぞきクエスト中
			// いないはず（念のため）
			qnuke = 1;
		}
		if (ch[2010])
		{
			// ビラ貼りクエスト中
			qnuke = 1;
		}
		if (ch[2020])
		{
			// プラチナメダルクエスト中
			qnuke = 1;
		}
		
		if (!qnuke)
		{
			ch[400] = -1;
			return 0;
		}
	}

		}
		
		ch[400] = -1;
		return 0;
	}

	// ドリルパーツショップ
	// シナリオ進行に応じて出すものを変える
	int mg;
	string str;
	string txt;
	int a;
	int b;
	int waribiki;
	int tute;
	int taikyu;
	int kyouka;
	taikyu = 0;
	kyouka = 0;
	a = 0;
	ch[420] = 0;
	ch[421] = 0;
	ch[422] = 0;
	ch[423] = 0;
	ch[424] = 0;
	ch[425] = 0;
	ch[426] = 0;
	ch[427] = 0;
	ch[428] = 0;
	ch[429] = 0;
	ch[430] = 0;
	
	// 標準
	if (!ch[1780])
	{
		ch[420] = 1;	// 立ちコンボ
		a++;
	}
	if (!ch[1785])
	{
		ch[425] = 1;	// 地面回転
		a++;
	}
	if (ch[1542])
	{
		if (!ch[1783] && ch[1780])
		{
			ch[423] = 1;	// ＰＭキック
			a++;
		}
		if (!ch[1784])
		{
			ch[424] = 1;	// 回転下月
			a++;
		}
	}
	if (ch[2527])
	{
		if (!ch[1782] && ch[1783])
		{
			ch[422] = 1;	// ダッシュコンボ
			a++;
		}
		if (!ch[1786] && ch[1785])
		{
			ch[426] = 1;	// 回転２
			a++;
		}
	}
	
	if (ch[2068] && !ch[420] && !ch[1780])
	{
		// 前転斬り
		ch[420] = 1;
		a++;
	}
	if (ch[2069] && !ch[423] && !ch[1783] && ch[1780])
	{
		// ＰＭキック
		ch[423] = 1;
		a++;
	}
	if (ch[2070] && !ch[422] && !ch[1782] && ch[1783])
	{
		// ドラフレ
		ch[422] = 1;
		a++;
	}
	if (ch[2071] && !ch[424] && !ch[1784])
	{
		// 回転下月
		ch[424] = 1;
		a++;
	}
	if (ch[2072] && !ch[425] && !ch[1785])
	{
		// Ｄトルネード
		ch[425] = 1;
		a++;
	}
	if (ch[2073] && !ch[426] && !ch[1786] && ch[1785])
	{
		// 回転乱舞
		ch[426] = 1;
		a++;
	}
	KaguTest(20001,22);
	if (ch[430] < 3)
	{
		taikyu = 1;
		a++;
	}
	KaguTest(20001,19);
	if (ch[430] < 3)
	{
		kyouka = 1;
		a++;
	}
	
	// 売りものがない
	if (a == 0)
	{
		Message(15,"...Oops!　I　seem　to　be","fresh　out　of　parts!　","","");
		Message(15,"Check　back　with　me　later.","I'll　get　some　more　in.","","");
		ch[400] = -1;
		return 0;
	}

	ch[3976] = 100;
	// Motoroマジック適応
	if (ch[3975] == 0)
	{
		ch[3975] = 100;
	}
	waribiki = (100 - ch[3975]) / 2;
	waribiki = 100 - waribiki;
	if (ch[2640])
	{
		waribiki = waribiki - 25;
	}
	// しりんだーは割引してはいけない
	waribiki = 100;
	ch[3976] = (ch[3976] * waribiki) / 100;
	ShopStart();
	if (ch[420])
	{
		ShopItem(1);		// Alpha
	}
	if (ch[425])
	{
		ShopItem(10);		// Storm
	}
	if (ch[423])
	{
		ShopItem(6);		// Beta
	}
	if (ch[424])
	{
		ShopItem(9);		// Wind
	}
	if (ch[426])
	{
		ShopItem(11);		// cyclo
	}
	if (ch[422])
	{
		ShopItem(7);		// master
	}
	if (taikyu)
	{
		ShopItem(22);		// Energy Oil
	}
	if (kyouka)
	{
		ShopItem(19);		// Power Oil
	}


	ch[50] = ShopEnd2();

	b = 0;

	int aiteru;
	int i;
	aiteru = 0;

	if (ch[50] > 0 && ch[50] != 22 && ch[50] != 19)
	{
		// ゲットだぜ
		SE(893);
		Wait(15);
		KaguTest(30020,0);
		ch[2649] = ch[420];
		ch[2650] = ch[421];
		ch[2651] = ch[422];
		KaguTest(30020,15);
		ch[2652] = ch[420];
		ch[2653] = ch[421];
		ch[2654] = ch[422];
		KaguTest(20010,0);
		ch[2656] = ch[420];

		Black(0,100,15);
		Wait(15);
		ch[2655] = ch[50];
		LoadMap(227);
		ch[50] = ch[2655];
		CharPos(0,-150,150,0);
		Camera(0,0,-1000,370);
//		KaguTest(30059,0);
		Wait(10);
//		KaguTest(20025,-30);
		ch[420] = 1000;
		ch[421] = -1000;
		KaguTest(30070,0);
		Wait(15);
		KaguTest(30032,-100);
		KaguTest(30033,65);
		Wait(10);
		Camera(-1,0,0,0);
		Black(0,0,15);
		Wait(15);
	}
	Camera(-1,0,0,0);
	if (ch[50] == 22)
	{
		SE(893);
		KaguTest(20034,ch[50]);
		GetItem(22);
	}
	if (ch[50] == 19)
	{
		SE(893);
		KaguTest(20034,ch[50]);
		GetItem(19);
	}

	if (ch[50] == 1)
	{
		// 立ちコンボ
		ch[1780] = 1;
		ch[2130] = 1;
		KaguTest(20034,ch[50]);
		b = 1;
		
		KaguTest(10006,0);
		KaguTest(10007,0);
		KaguTest2(10008,0,"First，　hit　C　for　Guard　Dash.");
		KaguTest(10010,10);
		Message(0,"","","","");
		KaguTest(10011,10);
		
		KaguTest(20027,43);
		Wait2(15);
		
		KaguTest(10006,0);
		KaguTest(10007,0);
		KaguTest2(10008,0,"Circle　your　character　with　the　cursor　then　hit　Z　to　attack.");
		KaguTest(10010,10);
		Message(0,"","","","");
		KaguTest(10011,10);
		KaguTest(20027,23);
		Wait2(60);

		txt = "You　learned　the　|Forward　Slash.|";
		tute = 1;
	}
	if (ch[50] == 9)
	{
		ch[1784] = 1;
		ch[2135] = 1;
		KaguTest(20034,ch[50]);
		b = 1;

		KaguTest(10006,0);
		KaguTest(10007,0);
		KaguTest2(10008,0,"First，　hit　X　to　jump.");
		KaguTest(10010,10);
		Message(0,"","","","");
		KaguTest(10011,10);

		KaguTest(30031,40);
		Wait2(15);
		KaguTest(30066,1);
		
		KaguTest(10006,0);
		KaguTest(10007,0);
		KaguTest2(10008,0,"While　in　the　air　circle　your　character　with　the　cursor，　then　hit　Z.");
		KaguTest(10010,10);
		Message(0,"","","","");
		KaguTest(10011,10);
		KaguTest(30066,0);

		KaguTest(20027,40);
		KaguTest(20028,0);
		Wait2(45);
		txt = "You　learned　the　|Downward　Lunge.|";
		tute = 6;
	}
	if (ch[50] == 6)
	{
		ch[1783] = 1;
		ch[2132] = 1;
		KaguTest(20034,ch[50]);
		b = 1;
		
		KaguTest(10006,0);
		KaguTest(10007,0);
		KaguTest2(10008,0,"First，　hit　C　for　Guard　Dash.");
		KaguTest(10010,10);
		Message(0,"","","","");
		KaguTest(10011,10);
		
		KaguTest(20027,43);
		Wait2(15);

		KaguTest(10006,0);
		KaguTest(10007,0);
		KaguTest2(10008,0,"Circle　your　character　with　the　cursor　then　hit　Z　to　attack.");
		KaguTest(10010,10);
		Message(0,"","","","");
		KaguTest(10011,10);

		KaguTest(20027,22);
		Wait2(60);

		txt = "You　learned　the　|Pretty　Missile.|";
		tute = 3;
	}
	if (ch[50] == 10)
	{
		ch[1785] = 1;
		ch[2136] = 1;
		KaguTest(20034,ch[50]);
		b = 1;

		KaguTest(10006,0);
		KaguTest(10007,0);
		KaguTest2(10008,0,"Circle　your　character　with　the　cursor，　then　hit　Z　to　attack.");
		KaguTest(10010,10);
		Message(0,"","","","");
		KaguTest(10011,10);

		KaguTest(20027,16);
		Wait2(60);
		txt = "You　learned　the　|Drill　Tornado.|";
		tute = 7;
	}
	if (ch[50] == 7)
	{
		ch[1782] = 1;
		ch[2133] = 1;
		KaguTest(20034,ch[50]);
		b = 1;

		KaguTest(10006,0);
		KaguTest(10007,0);
		KaguTest2(10008,0,"First，　hit　C　for　Guard　Dash.");
		KaguTest(10010,10);
		Message(0,"","","","");
		KaguTest(10011,10);

		KaguTest(20027,43);
		Wait2(15);

		KaguTest(10006,0);
		KaguTest(10007,0);
		KaguTest2(10008,0,"Circle　your　character　with　the　cursor　then　hit　Z　to　attack.");
		KaguTest(10010,10);
		Message(0,"","","","");
		KaguTest(10011,10);

		KaguTest(20027,25);
		Wait2(75);

		txt = "You　learned　the　|Dragon　Flame.|";
		tute = 4;
	}
	if (ch[50] == 11)
	{
		ch[1786] = 1;
		ch[2137] = 1;
		KaguTest(20034,ch[50]);
		b = 1;

		KaguTest(10006,0);
		KaguTest(10007,0);
		KaguTest2(10008,0,"First　perform　a　Drill　Tornado.");
		KaguTest(10010,10);
		Message(0,"","","","");
		KaguTest(10011,10);

		KaguTest(20027,16);
		Wait2(45);

		KaguTest(10006,0);
		KaguTest(10007,0);
		KaguTest2(10008,0,"When　it　is　about　to　end，　attack　again.");
		KaguTest(10010,10);
		Message(0,"","","","");
		KaguTest(10011,10);

		KaguTest(20027,20);
		Wait2(60);
		txt = "You　learned　the　|Spinning　Dance.|";
		tute = 8;
	}

	if (b == 1)
	{
		KaguTest(20023,0);
		Wait(15);
		Mes(txt);
		SE(955);
		Wait(50);

		KaguTest(20024,0);

		// チュートリアル表示
		if (tute > 0)
		{
			KaguTest(10006,0);
			KaguTest(10007,7);

			switch(tute)
			{
			case 1:
				KaguTest2(10009,0,"dparts01.bmp");
				break;
			case 2:
				KaguTest2(10009,0,"dparts02.bmp");
				break;
			case 3:
				KaguTest2(10009,0,"dparts03.bmp");
				break;
			case 4:
				KaguTest2(10009,0,"dparts04.bmp");
				break;
			case 5:
				KaguTest2(10009,0,"dparts05.bmp");
				break;
			case 6:
				KaguTest2(10009,0,"dparts06.bmp");
				break;
			case 7:
				KaguTest2(10009,0,"dparts07.bmp");
				break;
			case 8:
				KaguTest2(10009,0,"dparts08.bmp");
				break;
			case 9:
				KaguTest2(10009,0,"dparts09.bmp");
				break;
			case 10:
				KaguTest2(10009,0,"dparts10.bmp");
				break;
			}
			ch[423] = 180;
			ch[424] = 42;
			ch[425] = 460;
			ch[426] = 438;
			ch[427] = 0;
			ch[428] = 0;
			ch[429] = 320;
			ch[430] = 452;
			ch[431] = 512;
			KaguTest(10010,10);
			Wait(10);
			Message(0,"","","","");
			ch[420] = 0;
			KaguTest(10011,10);
			Wait(10);
		}

		Black(0,100,15);
		Wait(15);
		LoadMap(ch[2656]);
		CharPos(0,ch[2649],ch[2650],ch[2651]);
		Wait(15);
		CharPos(15,ch[2652],ch[2653],ch[2654]);
		Look(0,15);
		Look(15,0);
		KaguTest(30059,0);
		ch[400] = 15;
		Black(0,0,15);
		Wait(15);
	}

	ch[400] = -1;
	Camera(-1,0,0,0);
//	BGM(5);
	KaguTest(30032,0);
	KaguTest(30033,100);
	return 0;

//	if (a < 2)
//	{
//		// 妖精の粉売る
//		ch[430] = 1;
//	}

	ch[400] = -1;
}
#EndScript

// 00388:町の人・Hyperbolicじじぃ
#Script:00390
int main()
{
	int meda;
	int medama;
	int ukky;
	int night;
	int odango;
	int dou;
	int gin;
	int kin;
	int tmp;
	string text;
	string text2;
	int nukeru;
	int ismeda;
	int qnuke;
	qnuke = 0;
	nukeru = 0;
	ismeda = 0;
	
	ch[400] = 20;
	
	ch[220]++;

	KaguTest(20001,79);
	meda = ch[430];
	KaguTest(20001,56);
	ukky = ch[430];
	KaguTest(20001,57);
	night = ch[430];
	KaguTest(20001,61);
	odango = ch[430];
	KaguTest(20001,77);
	dou = ch[430];
	KaguTest(20001,76);
	gin = ch[430];
	kin = meda;
	if (kin || gin || dou)
	{
		ismeda = 1;
	}

	if (ch[2007] && !ch[2018])
	{
		// クエスト中
		ch[400] = 20;
		if (ch[2002])
		{
			// のぞきクエスト
			ch[420] = ch[2006];
			KaguTest(20043,1);
			if (ch[420])
			{
				//Hyperbolic
				Message(20,"Cylinder?","Nope，　haven't　seen　him.","","");
			}
			else
			{
				//Parin
				Message(0,"Hey　Grandpa!","Have　you　seen　Cylinder?","","");
				//Hyperbolic
				Message(20,"Cylinder?","Nope，　haven't　seen　him.","","");
				//Parin
				Message(0,"That's　funny...","","","");
				Message(0,"You're　standing　here","all　day，　so　I　thought","you'd　have　seen　him.","");
				
				ch[420] = ch[2006];
				KaguTest(20052,1);
				ch[2006] = ch[420];
			}
			
			if (ch[2003] == 2 && ch[2006] == 15)
			{
				// Fan以外の全員から話を聞いた
				ch[2003] = 3;
			}
		}
		if (ch[2010])
		{
			// ビラ貼りクエスト中
			qnuke = 1;
		}

		if (ch[2020])
		{
			// プラチナメダルクエスト中
			KaguTest(20001,54);
			if (ch[430])
			{
				// プラチナメダル発見した
				//Parin
				Message(0,"Look　Grandpa!","I　found　a　new　medal!","","");

				//Hyperbolic
				Message(20,"Well　now　lookie　here.","This　is　quite　extraordinary!","","");
				Message(20,"Some　collectors","specialize　in　these，　you　know.","","");

				//Parin
				Message(0,"Wow，　really?","","","");

				//Hyperbolic
				Message(20,"Good　job　finding　it.","Here's　your　reward.","","");

				//システム
				SE(853);
				KaguTest(10006,0);
				KaguTest(10007,1);
				KaguTest2(10008,0,"Got　Wallpaper　#2:　|Evening　Stroll.|");
				KaguTest2(10008,2,"You can use the desk in Parin's house");
				KaguTest2(10008,3,"to change a desktop wallpaper.");
				KaguTest2(10009,0,"kb002s.bmp");
				KaguTest(10010,10);
//				Wait(10);
				Message(0,"","","","");
				KaguTest(10011,10);

				GetItem(2);

				//Hyperbolic
				Message(20,"This　kind　of　medal","isn't　easy　to　find.","","");
				Message(20,"To　find　more，　search　","every　nook　and　cranny.","","");
				
				ch[2020] = 0;
				ch[2021] = 1;
				ch[2007] = 0;
				
				ch[420] = 58;
				KaguTest2(30003,1,"@atariyotsu");
				
			}
			else
			{
				// プラチナメダル発見してない
				Message(20,"Well　now，　have　you　found","any　rare　medals　for　me?","","");
				Message(0,"Grandpa，　come　on!","Tell　me　where　they're　hidden!","","");
				Message(20,"Ho　ho，　Parin.　Telling","you　wouldn't　be　any　fun!","","");
				Message(20,"You're　not　giving　up，　are　you　?","","","");
				
				SelStart(50);
				SelText("Give　up",1);
				SelText("No　way!",2);
				SelEnd();
				
				if (ch[50] == 1)
				{
					Message(0,"I'm　getting　tired.","I　think　I'll　give　up.","","");
					ch[2020] = 0;
					ch[2007] = 0;
					ch[2022] = 1;

					ch[420] = 58;
					KaguTest2(30003,1,"@atariyotsu");
				}
				else
				{
					Message(0,"I'm　not　giving　up!","I'll　find　them!","","");
				}
			}
		}
		
		if (!qnuke)
		{
			ch[400] = -1;
			return 0;
		}
	}
	
//	if (ch[2018])
	if (ch[2501] != 6)
	{
		// わらしべクエスト中
		KaguTest(20001,30);
		if (ch[430])
		{
			//Hyperbolic
			Message(20,"Ohh!　My　sweet　tooth","is　acting　up　again.","","");

			//Parin
			Message(0,"Then　take　a　look　at　this.","","","");

			//Hyperbolic
			Message(20,"Oho!　Is　this　one　of　Fan's","new　creations?","","");
			Message(20,"Well，　I'll　trade　you","my　lunch　for　it!","","");

			//Parin
			Message(0,"Ok　grandpa!","Here　you　go.","","");

			//Hyperbolic
			Message(20,"Well，　what　a　nice","granddaughter　I　have.","","");

			//システム
			Mes("You　got　a　|Rump　Steak.|");
			KaguTest(20022,31);
			KaguTest(20002,30);
			GetItem(31);
			Wait(60);
			ch[400] = -1;
			return 0;
		}
	}

	// プラチナメダルクエスト発動チェック
	if (!ch[2007] && (ch[2023] + ch[2024] + ch[2025]) > 2 && !ch[2021] && !ch[2022] && ch[2501] != 6)
	{
		// 発動
		//Hyperbolic
		Message(20,"Well，　look　at　all","these　medals　you've　found...","","");
		Message(20,"But　don't　think　you're","a　real　collector　just　yet...","","");
		Message(20,"There's　still　one，　very　rare","medal　that　you　haven't　seen...","","");

		//Parin
		Message(0,"What　kind　of　medal?","","","");

		//Hyperbolic
		Message(20,"Ho　ho，　curious?","I've　hidden　one　of　them","somewhere　in　town，　my　dear.","");
		Message(20,"Your　questions　will　be","answered，　if　you　find　it!","","");

		//Parin
		Message(0,"OK!　I'll　go　look.","","","");

		ch[2007] = 1;
		ch[2020] = 1;
		
		ch[400] = -1;

		KaguTest(20010,0);
		if (ch[420] == 12)
		{
			PostScr(1287);
		}
		ch[400] = -1;
		return 0;
	}

	if (ismeda && !ch[3958])
	{
		// じじぃ発動
		// 発動してなければ必ずここに来るべし
		//Hyperbolic
		Message(20,"You　know，　child...","","","");
		Message(20,"I　am　a　serious　medal","collector　now.","","");
		Message(20,"...Maybe　I　told　you　already.","","","");
		//Parin
		Message(0,"No　you　didn't!","","","");
		//Hyperbolic
		Message(20,"My　my，　today　you","have a rare looking medal.","","");
		Message(20,"How　about　you　give","it　to　old　grandpa?","","");
		Message(20,"In　exchange　for　a　present!","","","");
		ch[3958] = 1;
		nukeru = 1;
	}
	else
	{
		if (ch[1571] && !ch[1538])
		{
			if (ch[220] < 2)
			{
				//Hyperbolic
				Message(20,"Oh，　that　earthquake","really　shook　me　up...　","","");
				Message(20,"I　hope　the　town　isn't","damaged　too　much.","","");
				if (ismeda)
				{
					Message(20,"And　by　the　way，","nice　looking　medal　there.","","");
					Message(20,"How　about　you　give","it　to　old　grandpa?","","");
					//Parin
					Message(0,"One　track　mind，　I　see.","","","");
				}
			}
			else
			{
				if (ismeda)
				{
					//Hyperbolic
					Message(20,"My，　you　have　a","nice　looking　medal　there.","","");
					Message(20,"How　about　you　give","it　to　old　grandpa?","","");

			}
		}
		if (ch[1513] && !ch[1571])
		{
			if (ch[220] < 2)
			{
				//Hyperbolic
				Message(20,"Ho　ho，　child.","You　must　be　bored　here?","","");

				Message(20,"He　is　in　my　thoughts　always.","Too　bad　it's　impossible　to　meet　him.","","");
				if (ismeda)
				{
					Message(20,"And　by　the　way，","nice　looking　medal　there.","","");
					Message(20,"How　about　you　give","it　to　old　grandpa?","","");

			else

				{
					//Hyperbolic

					Message(20,"We　need　to　find　you　a　little","friend　now，　don't　we?","","");
				}

		}
		if (ch[1505] && !ch[1513])
		{
			if (!ch[2527])
			{
				if (ch[220] < 2)
				{
					//Hyperbolic
					Message(20,"Long　ago，　at　the　mountain，","there　was　a　big　explosion.","","");
					Message(20,"The　trees　and　plants　were　all","completely　destroyed.","","");
					//Parin
					Message(0,"How　did　that　happen?","","","");
					//Hyperbolic

					{
						Message(20,"And　by　the　way，","nice　looking　medal　there.","","");
						Message(20,"How　about　you　give","it　to　old　grandpa?","","");
					}

				else

					{
						//Hyperbolic
						Message(20,"My，　you　have　a","nice　looking　medal　there.","","");
						Message(20,"How　about　you　give","it　to　old　grandpa?","","");
					}

			else
			{
				if (ch[220] < 2)

					//Hyperbolic

					//Parin

					//Hyperbolic
					Message(20,"Ah，　well　ok　then...","","","");
					if (ismeda)
					{
						Message(20,"And　by　the　way，","nice　looking　medal　there.","","");
						Message(20,"How　about　you　give","it　to　old　grandpa?","","");
					}
				}
				else
				{
					if (ismeda)
					{
						//Hyperbolic
						Message(20,"My，　you　have　a","nice　looking　medal　there.","","");
						Message(20,"How　about　you　give","it　to　old　grandpa?","","");
					}
					else
					{
						//Hyperbolic
						Message(20,"Word　in　town　is　that","you've　been　quite　the","mischievious　one　lately.","");
						//Parin
						Message(0,"It　wasn't　me!","","","");
					}
				}
			}
		}
		if (ch[1542] && !ch[1505])
		{
			if (ch[220] < 2)
			{
				//Hyperbolic
				Message(20,"Ho　ho，　and　I　got　a　letter","from　your　parents.","","");
				//Parin
				Message(0,"What　did　they　say?","","","");
				//Hyperbolic
				Message(20,"Seems　they've　found　a　new　ruin...","","","");
				Message(20,"If　they　find　something　neat，","they'll　send　it　to　you.","","");
				//Parin
				Message(0,"Last　year，　my　parents　sent　me","a　voodoo　doll　for　my　birthday.","","");
				//Hyperbolic
				Message(20,"You　have　some　strange　parents...","","","");
				if (ismeda)
				{
					Message(20,"And　by　the　way，","nice　looking　medal　there.","","");
					Message(20,"How　about　you　give","it　to　old　grandpa?","","");
				}
			}
			else
			{
				if (ismeda)
				{
					//Hyperbolic
					Message(20,"My，　you　have　a","nice　looking　medal　there.","","");
					Message(20,"How　about　you　give","it　to　old　grandpa?","","");
				}
				else
				{
					//Hyperbolic
					Message(20,"Your　parents　have","found　a　new　ruin，　I　see.","","");
					Message(20,"If　they　find　something　neat，","they'll　send　it　to　you.","","");
				}
			}
		}
		if (ch[507] && !ch[1542])
		{
			if (ch[220] < 2)
			{
				//Parin
				Message(0,"When　you　were　a　little　boy，","you　grew　up　here，　right　Grandpa?","","");
				Message(0,"Did　you　ever　notice...","anything...　unusual?","","");
				//Hyperbolic
				Message(20,"Unusual...?","","","");
				Message(20,"..............","","","");
				Message(20,"Ho　ho!　It's　been　so　long","that　I've　forgotten!","","");
				//Parin
				Message(0,"Jeez，　why　ask...","","","");
				if (ismeda)
				{
					//Hyperbolic
					Message(20,"Oh，　and　by　the　way，","nice　looking　medal　there.","","");
					Message(20,"How　about　you　give","it　to　old　grandpa?","","");
				}
			}
			else
			{
				if (ismeda)
				{
					//Hyperbolic
					Message(20,"My，　you　have　a","nice　looking　medal　there.","","");
					Message(20,"How　about　you　give","it　to　old　grandpa?","","");
				}
				else
				{
					//Hyperbolic
					Message(20,"Ho　ho!　I've　forgotton　all","about　life　in　the　past...","","");
				}
			}
		}
		if (ch[2330] && !ch[507])
		{
			if (ch[220] < 2)
			{
				//Hyperbolic
				Message(20,"All　these　new　fangled　machines","make　the　mines　much　busier.","","");
				Message(20,"I'd　love　to　make　my","town　just　a　little　bigger.","","");
				//Parin
				Message(0,"Then　I　could　make","more　friends...","","");
				//Hyperbolic
				Message(20,"Oh，　you　could，　my　child!","","","");
				if (ismeda)
				{
					Message(20,"And　by　the　way，","nice　looking　medal　there.","","");
					Message(20,"How　about　you　give","it　to　old　grandpa?","","");
				}
			}
			else
			{
				if (ismeda)
				{
					Message(20,"My，　you　have　a","nice　looking　medal　there.","","");
					Message(20,"How　about　you　give","it　to　old　grandpa?","","");
				}
				else
				{
					//Hyperbolic
					Message(20,"If　more　people　move　here","maybe　you　could","make　some　little　friends...","");
				}
			}
		}
		if (ch[1545] && !ch[2330])
		{
			if (ismeda)
			{
				//Hyperbolic
				Message(20,"My，　you　have　a","nice　looking　medal　there.","","");
				Message(20,"How　about　you　give","it　to　old　grandpa?","","");
			}

				//Parin
				Message(0,"I'm　fine　Grandpa.","","","");
			}
		}
		nukeru = 1;
	}
	if (ch[2300] && !ch[1545])
	{
		if (ch[220] < 2)
		{
//			ch[400] = 220;
//			ch[420] = 4;
//			ch[421] = 1;
//			ch[422] = 5;
//			KaguTest(12003,20);

//			ch[400] = 20;

			//Parin
			Message(0,"I　don't　want　to　work　in","some　dark　old　mine.","","");

			//Parin

	}
	if (ch[508] && !ch[2300])
	{
		if (ch[220] < 2)
		{
			//Hyperbolic
			Message(20,"Parin，　you're　always","out　and　about.","","");

		{

	}
	if (!ch[2552])
	{
		//OP前
		if (ch[220] < 2)
		{
			Message(20,"Ho　ho.　I'm　so　","forgetful　lately.","","");
			Message(0,"A　mayor　shouldn't　be","so　absent-minded!","","");
		}
		//Hyperbolic

		if (ch[220] < 2)
		{
			Message(0,"That's　Grandpa!","","","");
		}
		
		ch[2547] = 1;
		
		if (ch[2548] && ch[2549] && ch[2550] && ch[2551])
		{
			// 全員と conversation済み
//			Message(0,"誰も相手してくれないのね。","","","");
//			Message(0,"どこかに面白いことないかしら。","","","");
//			Message(0,"路地裏にでも入ってみようかな。","","","");

		}

		return 0;
	}

	if (!ch[3958])
	{
		ch[400] = -1;
		return 0;
	}

	if (!ismeda)
	{
		// メダル持ってなければ戻る
		ch[400] = -1;
		return 0;
	}

	// メダルチェック
	if (dou)
	{
		if (ch[2023] < dou)
		{
			ch[2023] = dou;
		}
	}
	if (gin)
	{
		if (ch[2024] < gin)
		{
			ch[2024] = gin;
		}
	}
	if (kin)
	{
		if (ch[2025] < kin)
		{
			ch[2025] = kin;
		}
	}

	SelStart(50);
	SelText("Give　him　a　Gold　Medal",1);
	SelText("Give　him　a　Silver　Medal",2);
	SelText("Give　him　a　Bronze　Medal",3);
	SelText("Don't　give　him　anything",4);
	SelEnd();
	
	if (ch[50] == 1)
	{
		if (ukky && night && odango)
		{
			if (kin <= 0)
			{
				Message(20,"Oh，　no Gold Medals","for me today，　Parin?","","");
				Message(20,"Such a shame now...","","","");

				ch[400] = -1;
				return 0;
			}

			Message(20,"Well，　you've　cleaned　me　out!","Take　some　money　instead.","","");
			int kane;
			if (ch[2064] && ch[2065] && ch[2066])
			{
				kane = kin * 100;
			}
			else
			{
				kane = kin * 5000;
			}
			SE(893);
			text = "You　got　￥"+kane+".";
			Mes(text);
			Wait(60);
			SetGP(GetGP() + kane);
			KaguTest(20002,79);
			ch[400] = -1;
			return 0;
		}

		int odane;
		int nigne;
		int ukkne;
		int bunpai;
		int bunpain;
		int takai;
		takai = 0;
		bunpai = 0;
		odane = 19;
		nigne = 7;
		ukkne = 4;
		bunpain = 0;
		
		if (ch[2064])
		{
			// 既におだんご交換済み
			bunpai = odane - 1;
			odane = 1;
		}
		else
		{
			bunpain++;
		}
		if (ch[2065])
		{
			bunpai = bunpai + nigne - 1;
			nigne = 1;
		}
		else
		{
			bunpain++;
		}
		if (ch[2066])
		{
			bunpai = bunpai + ukkne - 1;
			ukkne = 1;
		}
		else
		{
			bunpain++;
		}
		
		if (bunpain < 3)
		{
			if (!ch[2064])
			{
				odane = odane + (bunpai / bunpain);
			}
			if (!ch[2065])
			{
				nigne = nigne + (bunpai / bunpain);
			}
			if (!ch[2066])
			{
				ukkne = ukkne + (bunpai / bunpain);
			}
		}
		int a;
		a = odane + nigne + ukkne;
		if (a < 30)
		{
			if (ukkne != 1)
			{
				ukkne = 30 - odane - nigne;
			}
			else
			{
				if (nigne != 1)
				{
					nigne = 30 - odane - ukkne;
				}
				else
				{
					if (odane != 1)
					{
						odane = 30 - nigne - ukkne;
					}
				}
			}
		}
		
		if (ukky && night && !odango)
		{
			odane = 30 - ukkne - nigne;
			takai = 1;
		}
		if (!ukky && night && odango)
		{
			ukkne = 30 - odane - nigne;
			takai = 1;
		}
		if (ukky && !night && odango)
		{
			nigne = 30 - ukkne - odane;
			takai = 1;
		}
		if (takai && ch[2064] && ch[2065] && ch[2066])
		{
			takai = 2;
		}

		if (meda > 0)
		{
			// 交換可能
			text = "You　have　" + kin + "　Gold　Medals.";
			Message(20,text,"Very　nice，　very　nice.","","");
			Message(20,"Well，　take　a　close　look","at　my　selection　here...","What　would　you　like?","");
			if (takai == 2)
			{
				Message(20,"This　is　the　last　one，","so　you'll　need　many　medals...","Try　to　save　up　now!","");
			}
			SelStart(50);

			string txt;
			txt = "Monkey　Hat　s100（"+ukkne+"　medals）";
			if (!ukky)
			{
				SelText(txt,1);
			}
			txt = "Nightcap　s100（"+nigne+"　medals）";
			if (!night)
			{
				SelText(txt,2);
			}
			txt = "Hair　Buns　s100（"+odane+"　medals）";
			if (!odango)
			{
				SelText(txt,3);
			}
			SelText("Don't　trade",4);
			SelEnd();
			a = 0;
			switch(ch[50])
			{
			case 1: // おサルの帽子
				if (ukkne > kin)
				{
					a = 1;
				}
				break;
			case 2: // ナイトキャップ
				if (nigne > kin)
				{
					a = 1;
				}
				break;
			case 3: // おだんご
				if (odane > kin)
				{
					a = 1;
				}
				break;
			}
			if (a)
			{
				ch[50] = 0;
			}
			
			switch(ch[50])
			{
			case 1:	// お猿の帽子
				KaguTest(20022,56);
				GetItem(56);
				Mes("You　got　the　|Monkey　Hat.|");
				ch[420] = ukkne;
				KaguTest(20006,79);
				Wait(40);

				ukky = 1;
				ch[50] = 5;
				break;
			case 2:	// ナイトキャップ
				KaguTest(20022,57);
				GetItem(57);
				Mes("You　got　the　|Nightcap.|");
				ch[420] = nigne;
				KaguTest(20006,79);
				Wait(40);

				night = 1;
				ch[50] = 5;
				break;
			case 3:	// おだんご
				KaguTest(20022,61);
				GetItem(61);
				Mes("You　got　the　|Hair　Buns.|");
				ch[420] = odane;
				KaguTest(20006,79);
				Wait(40);

				odango = 1;
				ch[50] = 5;
				break;
			case 0: // メダル足りない
				Message(20,"That's　not　enough　medals...","","","");
				break;
			default:
				ch[50] = 0;
				Message(20,"Ah，　well...","","","");
				Message(20,"Let　me　know　if　you","change　your　mind!","","");
				ch[400] = -1;
				return 0;
				break;
			}
			if (ch[50] == 5 && odango && night && ukky)
			{
				Message(20,"Oh....!","","","");
				Message(0,"What　is　it?","","","");
				Message(20,"Thanks　to　you，　I　now　own","a　total　of　100　medals!","","");
				Message(20,"Ho　ho，　now　I　can　go　to","my　grave　a　happy　man.","","");

				KaguTest(20001,87);
				if (ch[455] == 1 && !ch[430])
				{
					// 銅の勲章くれる
					Message(20,"Here　is　your　reward.","","","");
					GetItem(87);
					Mes("You　got　a　|Bronze　Award.|");
					KaguTest(20022,87);
					Wait(60);
                    KaguTest(99022,3);
					if(ch[440])
					{
						Message(20,"I thought this might happen...","","","");
						Message(20,"So I put new clothes","in your Dresser.","","");
						Message(0,"Hey!!","You can't just open that!!","","");
					}
				}
				KaguTest(20001,88);
				if (ch[455] == 0 && !ch[430])
				{
					// 銀の勲章くれる
					Message(20,"Here　is　your　reward.","","","");
					GetItem(88);
					Mes("You　got　a　|Silver　Award.|");
					KaguTest(20022,88);
					Wait(60);
					KaguTest(99022,2);
					if(ch[440])
					{
						Message(20,"I thought this might happen...","","","");
						Message(20,"So I put new clothes","in your Dresser.","","");
						Message(0,"Hey!!","You can't just open that!!","","");
					}
				}
				KaguTest(20001,89);
				if (ch[455] == 2 && !ch[3961] && !ch[430])
				{
					// 金の勲章くれる
					Message(20,"Here　is　your　reward.","","","");
					GetItem(89);
					Mes("You　got　a　|Gold　Award.|");
					KaguTest(20022,89);
					Wait(60);
					KaguTest(99022,0);
					if(ch[440])
					{
						Message(20,"I thought this might happen...","","","");
						Message(20,"So I put new clothes","in your Dresser.","","");
						Message(0,"Hey!!","You can't just open that!!","","");
					}
				}
				KaguTest(20001,90);
				if (ch[455] == 2 && ch[3961]==1 && !ch[430])
				{
					// 白金の勲章くれる
					Message(20,"Here　is　your　reward.","","","");
					GetItem(90);
					Mes("You　got　a　|Platinum　Award.|");
					KaguTest(20022,90);
					Wait(60);
					KaguTest(99022,4);
					if(ch[440])
					{
						Message(20,"I thought this might happen...","","","");
						Message(20,"So I put new clothes","in your Dresser.","","");
						Message(0,"Hey!!","You can't just open that!!","","");
					}
				}
				KaguTest(20001,91);
				if (ch[455] == 2 && ch[3961]==2 && !ch[430])
				{
					// 白金の勲章くれる
					Message(20,"Here　is　your　reward.","","","");
					GetItem(91);
					Mes("You　got　a　|Uranium　Award.|");
					KaguTest(20022,91);
					Wait(60);
					KaguTest(99022,1);
					if(ch[440])
					{
						Message(20,"I thought this might happen...","","","");
						Message(20,"So I put new clothes","in your Dresser.","","");
						Message(0,"Hey!!","You can't just open that!!","","");
					}
				}
			}
		}
		else
		{
			Message(20,"Don't　even　have　one","Gold　Medal?","","");
			Message(20,"That's　too　bad.","","","");
		}
		ch[400] = -1;	
		return 0;
	}
	
	if (ch[50] == 2)
	{
		if (gin <= 0)
		{
			Message(20,"Don't　even　have　one","Silver　Medal?","","");
			Message(20,"That's　too　bad.","","","");
			ch[400] = -1;
			return 0;
		}
		
		text = "You　have　" + gin + "　medals.";
		text2 = "So　that　comes　to　￥"+(gin*1000)+".";
		Message(20,"How　about　￥1，000　for　each　Silver　Medal?",text,text2,"");
		text2 = "So that comes to ￥" + (gin * 1000) + ".";
		SelStart(50);
		SelText(text2,1);
		SelText("Never　mind",2);
		SelEnd();
		
		if (ch[50] == 1)
		{
			Message(20,"We got a deal!","","","");
			int kane;
			SE(893);
			kane = gin * 1000;
			text = "You　got　￥"+kane+".";
			Mes(text);
			Wait(60);
			SetGP(GetGP() + kane);
			KaguTest(20002,76);
			ch[400] = -1;
			return 0;
		}
		
		Message(20,"Well，　that's　too　bad.","","","");
		ch[400] = -1;
		return 0;
	}

	if (ch[50] == 3)
	{
		if (dou <= 0)
		{
			Message(20,"Don't　even　have　one","Bronze　Medal?","","");
			Message(20,"That's　too　bad.","","","");
			ch[400] = -1;
			return 0;
		}
		
		text = "You　have　" + dou + "　medals.";
		text2 = "So　that　comes　to　￥" + (dou * 100) + ".";
		Message(20,"I'll　give　you　￥100　for　each　Bronze　Medal.",text,text2,"");
		text2 = "Trade　them　for　￥"+(dou*100)+".";
		SelStart(50);
		SelText(text2,1);
		SelText("Never　mind",2);
		SelEnd();
		
		if (ch[50] == 1)
		{
			Message(20,"We got a deal!","","","");
			int kane;
			kane = dou * 100;
			SE(893);
			text = "You　got　￥"+kane+".";
			Mes(text);
			Wait(60);
			SetGP(GetGP() + kane);
			KaguTest(20002,77);
			ch[400] = -1;
			return 0;
		}
		
		Message(20,"Well，　that's　too　bad.","","","");
		ch[400] = -1;
		return 0;
	}
	
//	if (ch[50] == 5)
//	{
//		Message(20,"そ、そ、そ、","それは！！！","","");
//		Message(0,"どうしたの？","","","");
//		Message(20,"プ、プ、プ、","プラチナメダルじゃないか！","","");
//		Message(20,"長年メダルを集めてきたのじゃが","プラチナメダルを見るのは","初めてじゃわい","");
//		Message(0,"へ～","そんなに珍しいメダルなんだ","","");
//		Message(20,"わしが手にするには","あまりにも勿体ないわい","","");
//		Message(20,"世界にはわしよりもさらに","メダルマニアな男が五万といるらしい","","");
//		Message(20,"そのメダルをあげるのなら","そういう男達にあげると良いじゃろう","","");
//		Message(0,"わかったわ。","もしそんな変な人を見かけたら","その人にあげることにするわ","");
//		ch[400] = -1;
//		ch[2115] = 1;
//	}

	Message(20,"That's　too　bad.","","","");

	ch[400] = -1;	
	return 0;


	// 居場所で話す内容が変わる
	KaguTest(20014,20);
	// 今いる場所（家具テストでチェックした内容）
	switch(ch[430])
	{
	case 2:	// 炭鉱前
		Message(20,"Where　do　I　live　again...?","","","");
		break;
	case 3: // 研究所前
		Message(20,"This　blue　building　is　my　lab，","filled　with　my　life's　work.","","");
		Message(0,"What　kind　of　research?","","","");
		Message(20,"Oh，　I　uh...　well...","...what　kind　was　it　again?","","");
		break;
	case 4: // 研究所前小広場
	case 5: // 町見下ろし場
	case 6: // 道具屋前
	case 11: // 家具屋前
		Message(20,"This　town...　has　changed...","","","");
		Message(20,"Once　such　a　natural　place，　now","it's　all　stone　and　metal.　Even　this","old　man　can　see　time　marching　on...","");
		break;
	case 7: // 道具屋入り口
	case 8: // 道具屋右端
	case 9:	// 道具屋店主前
	case 10: // 道具屋棚前
		Message(20,"And　these　newfangled　shops...","","","");
		Message(20,"Who　on　earth　buys　these　","silly　Gas　Masks?","","");
		break;
	case 12: // 家具屋入り口前
	case 13: // 家具屋店主前
	case 14: // 家具屋家具前
		Message(20,"Mmm　hmm!　I　can't　resist","the　smell　of　this　bakery...","","");
		Message(20,"But　those　prices　are","simply　unbelievable.","","");
		break;
	case 15: // 広場
		Message(20,"This　town　certainly　has　grown...","","","");
		break;
	case 16: // 大家の部屋
	case 19: // 駅前
		Message(20,"I'm　getting　old　now...","Can't　find　my　way　around.","","");
		Message(20,"Don't　even　know　where　I　am　now...","But　it's　kind　of　fun!","","");
		break;
	case 17: // 大家の部屋階段横
	case 18: // 大家の部屋階段下
	case 21: // テラスへの階段下
	case 22: // テラスへの階段上
	case 23: // Parin部屋階段上
	case 29: // Parin部屋前～階段上
		Message(20,"Oh，　these　blasted　stairs...","getting　old　are　we?","","");
		break;
	case 24: // Parin部屋
	case 26: // Parin部屋入り口
		Message(20,"What　are　you　doing　in　my　house?","","","");
		Message(0,"This　is　my　house，　too!","","","");
		break;
	case 25: // テラス
	case 28: // Parin部屋前
	case 27: // テラス渡り廊下
		Message(20,"I　can　see，　I　can　see!","","","");
		Message(0,"Were　you　blind　before?","","","");
		Message(20,"Tomorrow　will　be　sunny!","I　can　see　it　in　the　sky!","","");
		break;
	}

	ch[400] = -1;
}
#EndScript

// 307:トカロン倒した
#Script:00432
int main()
{
//	White(0,0,0);
//	White(0,100,30);
//	Blur(1,100,30);
//	Wait(60);

	// ボスラッシュ中？
	if (ch[2092])
	{
		// トカロン第二戦へ
		Black(0,100,10);
		Wait(10);
		Blur(0,0,0);
		TekiStop(1);
		KaguTest(100000,0);
		LoadMapB(308);
		Wait(5);
		
		SetSavePos2(6,0,150,0);
		ch[1095] = 6;
		// ムービー救援
		CharPos(0,0,-300,0);
	// モンスター_MONSHITO取得して配置
		KaguTest(20020,0);
		CharPos(ch[425],0,900,0000);
		KaguTest(30028,ch[425]);

		Wait(5);
		Walk(0,5,1);
		KaguTest(30057,0);

		Black(0,0,30);
		Wait(30);
		MMV("boss08.mmv");
		TekiStop(0);
		MapEvent(1);

		return 0;
	}

	Black(0,100,0);
	KaguTest(40002,0);

	// Debug
	if (ch[3982] == 1)
	{
		// 純粋ボスラッシュ中
		LoadMapB(308);

		CharPos(0,-300,-300,2000);
		// モンスター_MONSHITO取得して配置
		KaguTest(20020,0);
		CharPos(ch[425]+1,300,300,0000);
		KaguTest(30028,ch[425]+1);
		Black(0,0,30);
		Wait(30);
		SetSavePos2(207,0,0,0);	// 死んだら手巣とマップに戻れ
//		BGM(7);

		return 0;
	}
	if (ch[3982] == 2)
	{
		// シナリオボスラッシュ中
//		PlayMovie("lasbo2.txt",1);
		Wait(10);
		
		LoadMapB(308);

		CharPos(0,-300,-300,2000);
		// モンスター_MONSHITO取得して配置
		KaguTest(20020,0);
		CharPos(ch[425]+1,300,300,0000);
		KaguTest(30028,ch[425]+1);
		Black(0,0,30);
		Wait(30);
		SetSavePos2(207,0,0,0);	// 死んだら手巣とマップに戻れ
//		BGM(7);

		return 0;
	}
	//Debug ends here

//	Lock();	
//	PlayMovie("lasbo2.txt",ch[1541]);
	KaguTest(20065,-38);
	Mouse(0);
	PlayMovie("GF_2a.txt",ch[1572]);
	KaguTest(100000,0);
	PlayMovie2("GF_2b.txt",ch[1572]);
	Mouse(1);
	KaguTest(20066,0);
	ch[1572] = 1;
	ch[1541] = 1;
	ResetFade();
	White(0,100,0);
	
	// トカロンのテクスチャを戻す（念のため）
	KaguTest(60001,0);

	CharPos(0,0,-300,0);
	LoadMap(308);
	CharPos(0,0,-300,0);
// モンスター_MONSHITO取得して配置
	KaguTest(20020,0);
	CharPos(ch[425],0,900,0000);
	KaguTest(30028,ch[425]);
	Wait(5);
	Walk(0,5,1);
	KaguTest(30057,0);
	
//	SetSavePos2(306, 1992 , 434 , 1505);

//	SetSavePos2(312, -675 , 0 , 0);

	TekiStop(1);
	White(0,0,30);
	Wait(30);
	TekiStop(0);
	MMV("boss08.mmv");
//	Unlock();
}
#EndScript

// 308:トカロン倒した
#Script:00433
int main()
{
	// ボスラッシュ中？
	if (ch[2092])
	{
		// Black Bean戦へ
		ch[2103] = 1;
		KaguTest(40002,0);
		
		Blur(0,0,0);
		TekiStop(1);
		ch[2497] = 1;
		KaguTest(100000,0);
		LoadMapB(308);
		Wait(5);
		
		SetSavePos2(6,0,150,0);
		ch[1095] = 6;
		// ムービー救援
		CharPos(0,0,-600,0);
		CharPos(58,0,0,0);
		CharPos(25,-200000,0,0);

		Wait(5);
		Walk(0,1,1);
		KaguTest(30057,0);

		White(0,0,30);
		Wait(30);
		MMV("boss09.mmv");
		TekiStop(0);
		MapEvent(1);

		return 0;
	}

	int f;
	int tobu;
//	White(0,0,0);
//	White(0,100,30);
	Wait(30);
	KaguTest(40002,0);

	// Debug
	if (ch[3982] == 1)
	{
		// 純粋ボスラッシュ中
//		ch[1790] = 3;
//		ch[1791] = 100;
		KaguTest(20051,0);
		Scop(0);
		Scop(1);
		
		Black(0,100,30);
		Wait(30);
		ch[2497] = 1;
		LoadMapB(308);
		MapEvent(1);
		Wait(3);
		
//		BGM(7);

		KaguTest(20020,0);
		CharPos(0,0,-500,0);
		
		Black(0,0,15);
		Wait(15);
		
		SetSavePos2(207,0,0,0);	// 死んだら手巣とマップに戻れ
		MapEvent(1);
//		BGM(7);
		
		return 0;
	}
	if (ch[3982] == 2)
	{
		// シナリオボスラッシュ中
//		ch[1790] = 3;
//		ch[1791] = 100;
		KaguTest(20051,0);
		Scop(0);
		Scop(1);
		
		ch[1538]=1;
//		PlayMovie("end1.txt",1);
		ch[1538]=0;
		Wait(10);

		ch[2497] = 1;
		LoadMapB(308);
		Black(0,100,30);
		Wait(30);
		MapEvent(1);
		Wait(3);
		
//		BGM(7);

		KaguTest(20020,0);
		CharPos(0,0,-300,0);
		
		Black(0,0,15);
		Wait(15);
		
		SetSavePos2(207,0,0,0);	// 死んだら手巣とマップに戻れ
		MapEvent(1);
//		BGM(7);
		
		return 0;
	}
	if (ch[3982] == 3)
	{
		// ステージテスト中
		TekiStop(1);

		Black(0,0,15);
		KaguTest(10500,120);
			
		if (ch[2270] < 1)
		{
			ch[2270]=1;
		}
			
		Wait(90);

		Message(0,"","","","");

		KaguTest(10011,5);
		KaguTest(99999,0);
		return 0;
	}
	//Debug ends here
	TekiStop(1);
	
	// マップとParin消す
//	BGM(0);
	KaguTest(30087,0);
	CharPos(0,-200000,0,0);

//	White(0,0,15);
//	KaguTest(10500,120);
//		
//	if (ch[2270] < 1)
//	{
//		ch[2270]=1;
//	}
//		
//	Wait(90);
//
//	Message(0,"","","","");
//
//	White(0,100,30);
//	Wait(30);
//	KaguTest(10011,5);
//	Wait(5);

//	PlayMovie("end1.txt",0);
	KaguTest(99993,0);	// クリアフラグチェック
	if (ch[420] || ch[421] || ch[422] || ch[425])
	{
		tobu = 1;
	}
	else
	{
		tobu = 0;
	}
	ch[1538] = 1;
//	PlayMovie("GF_3.txt",tobu);
	Mouse(0);
	int movi;
	KaguTest(20065,-40);
	movi = PlayMovie("GF_3a.txt",tobu);
	KaguTest(100000,0);
	if (movi)
	{
		movi = PlayMovie2("GF_3b.txt",tobu);
		KaguTest(100000,0);
	}
//	if (movi || ch[1792] != 522133279)
	{
		movi = PlayMovie2("GF_3c.txt",tobu);
		KaguTest(100000,0);
	}
	Mouse(1);
//	ch[1538]=0;
	ResetFade();
	Black(0,100,0);
	Blur(2,0,1);
	
	KaguTest(10100,0);
	ch[298] = 1;
//	KaguTest(99999,0);
//	KaguTest(99990,0);
//	KaguTest(99998,0);
	ch[1538]=1;
	ch[1759] = 0;
	ch[1760] = 0;
	
	// 家具持ってたら捨てる
	KaguTest(10205,0);

	if (ch[1792] == 522133279)
	{
		Mouse(0);
		ch[3600] = 1;
		ch[2036] = 1;
		PlayMovie("EP_1.txt",tobu);
		ch[2036] = 0;
		ch[3600] = 0;
		ch[2288] = 0;
		ch[2289] = 0;
		ch[2290] = 0;
		ch[2291] = 0;
		LoadMapB(401);
		Mouse(1);
//		ch[2791] = 0;
		Black(0,100,0);
		Wait(5);
//		Black(0,0,15);
		Walk(0,5,1);
		KaguTest(30057,0);
		ch[3952] = 1;
	}
	else
	{
		ch[3952] = 1;
		PlayMovie("EP_1b.txt",0);
		LoadMapB(401);
		CharPos(0,173,-220,50);
		Black(0,100,0);
		Wait(5);
//		Black(0,0,15);
		Walk(0,-5,1);
		KaguTest(30057,0);
	}
	KaguTest(20066,0);
	Black(0,0,15);
	Wait(15);
	return 0;
	
	LoadMapB(998);
	Wait(10);
//	Mes("ＥＤ兼スタッフロール予定。");
//	Wait(60);
	
	switch(ch[455])
	{
	case 0:
		f = 1;
		break;
	case 1:
		f = 0;
		break;
	case 2:
		f = 2;
		break;
	}
	KaguTest(99993,0);
	if (!ch[420 + f])
	{
		SE(564);
		Mes("A　new　outfit　has　been　unlocked.");
		Wait(60);
		Mes("Use　your　Dresser　to　change　outfits.");
		Wait(60);
	}
	KaguTest(99994,0);

	
	Black(0,100,30);
	Wait(30);
	TekiStop(0);
	// エンディングに続かせる
	Reset();
}
#EndScript

// Debugムービー
#Script:00699
int main()
{
	int a;
	int b;
	int x;
	int y;
	int z;
	int c;
	int d;

	int flag2501;

	GetCharPos(0,x,y,z);
	KaguTest(20010,0);
	b = ch[420];

	SelStart(50);
	KaguTest(70004,0);
	if (ch[420])
	{
		SelText("Repeat　play　mode　OFF",97);
		SelText("Repeat　play　mode　ON★",96);

	else

	SelText("Tokaron's　Revival...",33);
	SelText("Fight　with　Puku",34);
	SelText("Puku's　Mistake",35);
	SelText("Reunited　With　Pino",36);
	SelText("Battling　Tokaron",37);
	SelText("The　Final　Battle",38);
	SelText("Aftermath",39);

	//SelText("Logo",120);
	//SelText("Staff Roll(B)",98);
	//	SelText("一括再生",99);
	SelEnd();
	
	a = ch[50];
	
	if (a == 97)
	{
		KaguTest(70003,0);
		return 0;
	}
	if (a == 96)
	{
		KaguTest(70003,1);
		return 0;
	}
	
	if (a == -1)
	{
		MapEvent(1);
		return 0;
	}
	// フラグ全部リセット
	c = a;
	d = a+1;
	if (c == 99)
	{
		c = 1;
//		d = 43;
	}
	d = 43;
	int movi;
	int renzoku;
	KaguTest(70004,0);
	renzoku = ch[420];
	if (!ch[420])
	{
		d = c + 1;
	}
	movi = 1;
	Mouse(0);
	KaguTest(20066,-1);
	for (a = c;a < d;a++)
	{
		flag = ch[3961];
		flag2501 = ch[2501];
		KaguTest(20029,0);
		ch[3961] = flag;
//		ch[2501] = flag2501;
		KaguTest(20070,flag2501);

		ch[506] = 1;
		KaguTest(100000,0);

			ch[2328] = 1;

			KaguTest(10006,0);
			KaguTest(10007,7);

	Mouse(1);
	KaguTest(20066,0);

	KaguTest(100000,0);

// 家具所持チェック＆販売家具変更チェック
#Script:00697
int main()
{
	// 家具変更時期
	// フラグ１６００に状態保存
	//  1 ボス１撃破
	//  2 Doug (Moguren)破壊（高級家具ゲットチャンス）
	//  3 ボス２撃破
	//  4 モグ兄弟撃破
	//  5 偽Parin撃破
	int c[30];
	int d;
	int e;
	int kingyo;
	
	// 家具チェック
	KaguTest(20005,0);
	
//	ch[1700] = 0;
//	ch[1701] = 0;
//	ch[1702] = 0;
//	ch[1703] = 0;
//	ch[1704] = 0;
//	ch[1705] = 0;
//	ch[1706] = 0;
//	ch[1707] = 0;
//	ch[1708] = 0;
//	ch[1709] = 0;
	// 状態チェック
	if (ch[1600]==0 || (ch[1600]==5 && !ch[1513]))
	{
		ch[1600]=6;
		// 家具変更（初期化）
		c[0] = 0; //50:石像
		c[1] = 0; //51:秘伝の書   
		c[2] = 52; //52:柱
		c[3] = 53; //53:立て札     
		c[4] = 54; //54:ポスト
		c[5] = 55; //55:くずかご   
		c[6] = 56; //56:ポール     
		c[7] = 0; //57:鉢植え
		c[8] = 58; //58:ちゃぶ台   
		c[9] = 0; //59:こたつ     
		c[10] = 60; //60:テーブル   
		c[11] = 61; //61:木の椅子
		c[12] =	0; //62:肘掛椅子
		c[13] = 0; //63:ソファー
		c[14] = 0; //64:桐の箪笥
		c[15] = 65; //65:洋服箪笥
		c[16] = 0; //66:高級本棚
		c[17] = 67; //67:傘たて
		c[18] = 0; //68:下駄箱
		c[19] = 69; //69:帽子掛け
		c[20] = 70; //70:あひる
		c[21] = 0; //71:車の模型
		c[22] = 0; //72:くまさん
		c[23] = 0; //73:蓄音機
		c[24] = 0; //74:ラジカセ
		c[25] = 0; //75:コンポ
		c[26] = 76; //76:ゴミ袋
		c[27] = 0; //77:ベッド
		c[28] = 0; //78:金魚鉢
		c[29] = 0; //79:金魚鉢☆
		
		e = 0;
//		while(1)
		{
			d = rand() % 30;
			if (c[d])
			{
				ch[1700 + e] = c[d];
				c[d] = 0;
				e++;
				if (e == 10) break;
			}
		}
	}
	if (ch[1600]!=1 && ch[507] && !ch[1502])
	{
		ch[1600]=1;
		// 家具変更
		c[0] = 0; //50:石像
		c[1] = 0; //51:秘伝の書   
		c[2] = 0; //52:柱
		c[3] = 0; //53:立て札     
		c[4] = 54; //54:ポスト
		c[5] = 0; //55:くずかご   
		c[6] = 56; //56:ポール     
		c[7] = 57; //57:鉢植え
		c[8] = 0; //58:ちゃぶ台   
		c[9] = 59; //59:こたつ     
		c[10] = 60; //60:テーブル   
		c[11] = 61; //61:木の椅子
		c[12] =	62; //62:肘掛椅子
		c[13] = 63; //63:ソファー
		c[14] = 64; //64:桐の箪笥
		c[15] = 65; //65:洋服箪笥
		c[16] = 66; //66:高級本棚
		c[17] = 0; //67:傘たて
		c[18] = 68; //68:下駄箱
		c[19] = 69; //69:帽子掛け
		c[20] = 70; //70:あひる
		c[21] = 0; //71:車の模型
		c[22] = 72; //72:くまさん
		c[23] = 73; //73:蓄音機
		c[24] = 0; //74:ラジカセ
		c[25] = 0; //75:コンポ
		c[26] = 76; //76:ゴミ袋
		c[27] = 77; //77:ベッド
		c[28] = 0; //78:金魚鉢
		c[29] = 0; //79:金魚鉢☆

		e = 0;
//		while(1)
		{
			d = rand() % 30;
			if (c[d])
			{
				ch[1700 + e] = c[d];
				c[d] = 0;
				e++;
				if (e == 10) break;
			}
		}
	}
	if (ch[1600]!=2 && ch[1502] && !ch[1505])
	{
		ch[1600]=2;
		// 家具変更
		c[0] = 0; //50:石像
		c[1] = 0; //51:秘伝の書   
		c[2] = 52; //52:柱
		c[3] = 53; //53:立て札     
		c[4] = 54; //54:ポスト
		c[5] = 0; //55:くずかご   
		c[6] = 56; //56:ポール     
		c[7] = 0; //57:鉢植え
		c[8] = 58; //58:ちゃぶ台   
		c[9] = 59; //59:こたつ     
		c[10] = 60; //60:テーブル   
		c[11] = 0; //61:木の椅子
		c[12] =	0; //62:肘掛椅子
		c[13] = 0; //63:ソファー
		c[14] = 64; //64:桐の箪笥
		c[15] = 0; //65:洋服箪笥
		c[16] = 0; //66:高級本棚
		c[17] = 67; //67:傘たて
		c[18] = 68; //68:下駄箱
		c[19] = 0; //69:帽子掛け
		c[20] = 70; //70:あひる
		c[21] = 0; //71:車の模型
		c[22] = 72; //72:くまさん
		c[23] = 0; //73:蓄音機
		c[24] = 0; //74:ラジカセ
		c[25] = 0; //75:コンポ
		c[26] = 76; //76:ゴミ袋
		c[27] = 0; //77:ベッド
		c[28] = 0; //78:金魚鉢
		c[29] = 0; //79:金魚鉢☆

		e = 0;
//		while(1)
		{
			d = rand() % 30;
			if (c[d])
			{
				ch[1700 + e] = c[d];
				c[d] = 0;
				e++;
				if (e == 10) break;
			}
		}
	}
	if (ch[1600]!=3 && ch[1505] && !ch[1510])
	{
		ch[1600]=3;
		// 家具変更
		c[0] = 0; //50:石像
		c[1] = 0; //51:秘伝の書   
		c[2] = 0; //52:柱
		c[3] = 0; //53:立て札     
		c[4] = 54; //54:ポスト
		c[5] = 55; //55:くずかご   
		c[6] = 0; //56:ポール     
		c[7] = 57; //57:鉢植え
		c[8] = 58; //58:ちゃぶ台   
		c[9] = 0; //59:こたつ     
		c[10] = 60; //60:テーブル   
		c[11] = 61; //61:木の椅子
		c[12] =	62; //62:肘掛椅子
		c[13] = 0; //63:ソファー
		c[14] = 0; //64:桐の箪笥
		c[15] = 65; //65:洋服箪笥
		c[16] = 0; //66:高級本棚
		c[17] = 67; //67:傘たて
		c[18] = 68; //68:下駄箱
		c[19] = 69; //69:帽子掛け
		c[20] = 0; //70:あひる
		c[21] = 71; //71:車の模型
		c[22] = 0; //72:くまさん
		c[23] = 0; //73:蓄音機
		c[24] = 0; //74:ラジカセ
		c[25] = 0; //75:コンポ
		c[26] = 76; //76:ゴミ袋
		c[27] = 0; //77:ベッド
		c[28] = 78; //78:金魚鉢（金魚なし）
		c[29] = 0; //79:金魚鉢☆（金魚あり）
		
		e = 0;
//		while(1)
		{
			d = rand() % 30;
			if (c[d])
			{
				ch[1700 + e] = c[d];
				c[d] = 0;
				e++;
				if (e == 10) break;
			}
		}
	}
	if (ch[1600]!=4 && ch[1510] && !ch[1513])
	{
		ch[1600]=4;
		// 家具変更
		c[0] = 0; //50:石像
		c[1] = 0; //51:秘伝の書   
		c[2] = 52; //52:柱
		c[3] = 53; //53:立て札     
		c[4] = 0; //54:ポスト
		c[5] = 0; //55:くずかご   
		c[6] = 56; //56:ポール     
		c[7] = 0; //57:鉢植え
		c[8] = 0; //58:ちゃぶ台   
		c[9] = 59; //59:こたつ     
		c[10] = 0; //60:テーブル   
		c[11] = 0; //61:木の椅子
		c[12] =	0; //62:肘掛椅子
		c[13] = 63; //63:ソファー
		c[14] = 64; //64:桐の箪笥
		c[15] = 0; //65:洋服箪笥
		c[16] = 66; //66:高級本棚
		c[17] = 67; //67:傘たて
		c[18] = 0; //68:下駄箱
		c[19] = 69; //69:帽子掛け
		c[20] = 70; //70:あひる
		c[21] = 71; //71:車の模型
		c[22] = 72; //72:くまさん
		c[23] = 73; //73:蓄音機
		c[24] = 0; //74:ラジカセ
		c[25] = 0; //75:コンポ
		c[26] = 76; //76:ゴミ袋
		c[27] = 0; //77:ベッド
		c[28] = 0; //78:金魚鉢（金魚なし）
		c[29] = 0; //79:金魚鉢☆（金魚あり）
		
		e = 0;
//		while(1)
		{
			d = rand() % 30;
			if (c[d])
			{
				ch[1700 + e] = c[d];
				c[d] = 0;
				e++;
				if (e == 10) break;
			}
		}
	}
	if (ch[1600]!=5 && ch[1513])
	{
		ch[1600]=5;
		// 家具変更
		c[0] = 0; //50:石像
		c[1] = 0; //51:秘伝の書   
		c[2] = 52; //52:柱
		c[3] = 53; //53:立て札     
		c[4] = 54; //54:ポスト
		c[5] = 55; //55:くずかご   
		c[6] = 56; //56:ポール     
		c[7] = 57; //57:鉢植え
		c[8] = 58; //58:ちゃぶ台   
		c[9] = 59; //59:こたつ     
		c[10] = 60; //60:テーブル   
		c[11] = 61; //61:木の椅子
		c[12] =	62; //62:肘掛椅子
		c[13] = 63; //63:ソファー
		c[14] = 64; //64:桐の箪笥
		c[15] = 65; //65:洋服箪笥
		c[16] = 66; //66:高級本棚
		c[17] = 67; //67:傘たて
		c[18] = 68; //68:下駄箱
		c[19] = 69; //69:帽子掛け
		c[20] = 70; //70:あひる
		c[21] = 71; //71:車の模型
		c[22] = 72; //72:くまさん
		c[23] = 73; //73:蓄音機
		c[24] = 0; //74:ラジカセ
		c[25] = 0; //75:コンポ
		c[26] = 76; //76:ゴミ袋
		c[27] = 0; //77:ベッド
		c[28] = 0; //78:金魚鉢（金魚なし）
		c[29] = 0; //79:金魚鉢☆（金魚あり）
		
		e = 0;
//		while(1)
		{
			d = rand() % 30;
			if (c[d])
			{
				ch[1700 + e] = c[d];
				c[d] = 0;
				e++;
				if (e == 10) break;
			}
		}
	}

	if (ch[1756])
	{
		for (d = 0;d < 10;d++)
		{
			if (ch[1700 + d] == 78)
			{
				ch[1700 + d] = 0;
			}
		}
	}
}
#EndScript

/////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
// 強制カメラ用追加スクリプト

// 301:中央レバーオン
#Script:00700
int main()
{
	SaveCamera();
	TekiStop(1);
	Camera(Door2C(4) , -150 , -500 , 400 );
	CrossFade();
	Wait(20);

	Event(115);

	Wait(30);
	Camera(Door2C(3) , -150 , -500 , 400 );
	CrossFade();
	Wait(20);

	Event(102);

	Wait(30);
	RestoreCamera();
	Camera(-1,0,0,0);
	CrossFade();
	Wait(20);
	TekiStop(0);
		
	return 0;
}
#EndScript

// 301:中央レバーオフ
#Script:00701
int main()
{
	TekiStop(1);

	SaveCamera();
	Camera(Door2C(3) , -150 , -500 , 400 );
	CrossFade();
	Wait(20);

	Event(101);

	Wait(30);
	Camera(Door2C(4) , -150 , -500 , 400 );
	CrossFade();
	Wait(20);

	Event(114);

	Wait(30);
	RestoreCamera();
	Camera(-1,0,0,0);
	CrossFade();
	Wait(20);
	
	TekiStop(0);

	return 0;
}
#EndScript

// 301:左レバー
#Script:00702
int main()
{
	int x;
	int y;
	int z;
	int bt15;
	int ln;
	
	ln = Lift2C(60);
	
	GetCharPos(0,x,y,z);
	bt15 = Getbt15(ln);

	if (!bt15)
	{

		TekiStop(1);
		Wait(5);
		Lock();
		SaveCamera();
		Camera(ln , x - 700 , y - 400 , z + 550 );
		CrossFade();
		Unlock();
		Wait(20);

		Event(103);

		Wait(60);
		Lock();
		RestoreCamera();
		Camera(-1,0,0,0);
		CrossFade();
		Unlock();
		Wait(20);
		
		TekiStop(0);
//	else
//	{
//		Event(103);
//	}

	}
	return 0;
}
#EndScript

// 301:右レバー
#Script:00703
int main()
{
	int x;
	int y;
	int z;
	int bt15;
	int ln;
	
	ln = Lift2C(61);
	
	GetCharPos(0,x,y,z);
	bt15 = Getbt15(ln);

	if (!bt15)
	{

		TekiStop(1);
		
		Wait(5);
		Lock();
		SaveCamera();
		Camera(ln , x + 700 , y - 400 , z + 550 );
		CrossFade();
		Unlock();
		Wait(20);

		Event(104);

		Wait(60);
		Lock();
		RestoreCamera();
		Camera(-1,0,0,0);
		CrossFade();
		Unlock();
		Wait(20);

		TekiStop(0);
				
//	else
//	{
//		Event(104);
//	}
	return 0;

	}
}
#EndScript

// 301:火を消すと扉が開く
#Script:00704
int main()
{
	ch[3605] = 1;
	Wait(15);
	SE(950);
	Camera(Door2C(15),-150,-2730,490);
	CrossFade();
	Wait(20);
	Event(301);
	Wait(35);
	Camera(-1,0,0,0);
	CrossFade();
	Wait(15);
}
#EndScript

// 302:レバー引くとリフト動く
#Script:00705
int main()
{
	if (!Getbt15(Lift2C(7)))
	{
		SaveCamera();
		TekiStop(1);
		Wait(15);
		Camera(Lift2C(7),250,-935,400);
		CrossFade();
		Wait(20);
		Event(112);
		Wait(60);
		Camera(-1,0,0,0);
		RestoreCamera();
		CrossFade();
		Wait(15);
		TekiStop(0);
	}
}
#EndScript

// 302:２つ目柵明けスイッチ
#Script:00706
int main()
{
	Wait(5);

	SE(950);
	
	Lock();
		SaveCamera();
	Camera(0,975,-525,450);
	CrossFade();
	Unlock();
	Wait(20);

	Event(102);

	Wait(30);
	Lock();
		RestoreCamera();
	Camera(-1,0,0,0);
	CrossFade();
	Unlock();
	Wait(15);

	return 0;
}
#EndScript

// 304:敵倒したらリフト動く＆爆弾投げ軍団参上
#Script:00707
int main()
{
	Wait(15);
	TekiStop(1);
	SE(950);
	
	SaveCamera();
	ch[420] = 950;
	ch[421] = 1680;
	ch[422] = 801;
	ch[423] = 1641;
	ch[424] = 448;
	ch[425] = 320;
	KaguTest(30019,1);
	CrossFade();
	Wait(30);

	// 爆弾野郎沸く
	ch[420] = 100000;
	ch[427] = 0;
	KaguTest(30015,2);
	Wait(60);
	
	// リフトも動く
	SE(891);
	ch[361] = 1;
	Wait(30);

	RestoreCamera();
	KaguTest(30019,0);
	CrossFade();
	Wait(15);
	
	TekiStop(0);
}
#EndScript

	Message(0,"Something　is　written　here.","","","");
	Message(0,"|Hot　things　must　be　cooled　down.","Yours，　M.|","","");
}
#EndScript
