// もぐら叩き終了
#Script:01151
int main()
{
	int go;
	int best;
	int syokai;
	string str;
	go = 0;
	best = 0;
	syokai = 0;

	// ホイッスル
	SE(548);
	ch[3982] = 0;
	Wait(60);
	Black(0,100,30);
	Wait(30);
	ch[2144] = 0;
	ch[2497] = 0;
	LoadMap(23);
	KaguTest2(10010,0,"minigm");
	CharPos(0,0,-150,0);
	Camera(4,345,775,370);
	Look(0,4);
	Look(4,0);
	Look(2,0);
	Look(1,0);
	CrossFade();
	Wait(15);
	Camera(-1,0,0,0);
	Black(0,0,30);
	Wait(30);
	
	ch[2061] = 0;
	
	int gonum;
	if (ch[455] == 1)
	{
		// ビギナー
		gonum = 40;
	}
	if (ch[455] == 0)
	{
		// ノーマル
		gonum = 50;
	}
	if (ch[455] == 2)
	{
		// ハード以上
		gonum = 60;
	}

	if (ch[2313] < gonum)
	{
		// 過去に合格していない
		go = 1;
	}
	if (ch[2145] > ch[2313] - 1 && ch[2313] > 0)
	{
		// 自己ベスト
		best = 1;
	}
	if (ch[2313] == 0)
	{
		syokai = 1;
	}
	if (ch[2145] > ch[2313] - 1)
	{
		ch[2313] = ch[2145] + 1;
	}
	
	ch[400] = 4;
	
	if (!ch[2526])
	{
		if (ch[2145] >= gonum)
		{
			// イベントミニゲーム時
			ch[400] = 4;
			ch[2290] = 1;

			//Parin
			Message(0,"Not　bad，　huh?","","","");
			//Pecky (Peke)
			Message(4,"Heh，　you　really　surprised","me　there　kid.","","");
			Message(4,"I　haven't　had　that","much　fun　in　a　while.","","");
			//Parin
			Message(0,"So　you'll　sponsor","the　rebuilding?","","");
			//Pecky (Peke)
			Message(4,"Ah，　what　the　heck.","","","");
			Message(4,"I'll　get　over　to　that","Monster　Village　now　and","let　everyone　know.","");
			
			ch[400] = 104;

			ch[2526] = 1;

			KaguTest(30005,0);
			Camera(4,ch[421],ch[422],ch[423]);
			KaguTest(30062,0);
			ch[420] = 4;
			KaguTest(30063,0);
			ch[400] = 104;
			ch[424] = 0;
			ch[425] = -1875;
			ch[420] = 1;
			ch[426] = 12;
			KaguTest(30060,4);
			Walk2(4,ch[421] * 2,ch[422] * 2,ch[423] / 2);
			Wait((ch[423] / 2) - 15);
			Camera(-1,0,0,0);
			ch[420] = 3;
			KaguTest(30064,4);
			Wait(15);
			CharPos(4,-200000,0,0);
			KaguTest(30063,-1);
		}
		else
		{
			//Pecky (Peke)
			ch[400] = 4;
			Message(4,"Disappointing...","","","");
			Message(4,"I　am　not　entertained.","Not　entertained　at　all!","","");
		}

		ch[400] = -1;
		return 0;
	}

	if (ch[2145] >= gonum && go)
	{
		// 初合格
		str = "You　whacked　" + ch[2145] + "　moles.";
		ch[400] = 4;
		Message(4,"Congratulations，　kid.　You　pass.",str,"","");
		ch[400] = -1;
		return 0;
	}
	if (go && best)
	{
		// 合格ならず。しかし、自己ベスト
		str = "You　whacked　" + ch[2145] + "　moles.";
		ch[400] = 4;
		Message(4,"A　bit　better　than　last　time.","But　still　not　good　enough.","","");
		Message(4,str,"","","");
		Message(0,"Are　you　even　trying?","","","");
		ch[400] = -1;
		return 0;
	}
	if (go)
	{
		// 合格ならず。しかも、自己ベストでもない
		str = "You　whacked　" + ch[2145] + "　moles.";
		ch[400] = 4;
		Message(4,"So　sad...",str,"","");
		Message(0,"I　guess　I　should　practice.","","","");
		ch[400] = -1;
		return 0;
	}
	if (best)
	{
		// 既に合格済み。自己ベスト
		if(ch[2145] > 99)
		{
			// 鬼だべ
			Message(0,"Yay!","I　beat　my　old　record!","","");
			ch[400] = 4;
			Message(4,"Superlative.","I　was　moved，　kid.","","");
			str = "You　whacked　" + ch[2145] + "　moles.";
			Message(4,str,"Heh，　you　really　gave","him　a　run　for　his　money.","");
			if (!ch[2314])
			{
				Message(4,"You're　the　only　one　that","scored this　high.　And　I'm","duly　impressed，　kid.","");
				Message(4,"Take　this　Gold　Medal.","You've　earned　it.","","");
				Mes("You　got　a　|Gold　Medal.|");
				ch[2290] = 2;
				KaguTest(20022,79);
				GetItem(79);
				Wait(90);
				
				if (ch[2145] > 99 && !ch[2642])
				{
//					Message(4,"さらに、１００回以上叩いてるから","今度から商品を割引してあげるんダナ","","");
					ch[2642] = 1;
				}
				
				Message(0,"Thanks.","","","");
				ch[400] = -1;
				ch[2314] = 1;
			}
			else
			{
				Message(4,"You're　the　only　one　that","ever　scored　this　high.","You've　got　something，　kid.","");
				Message(4,"This　time，　a　Silver　Medal.","","","");
				KaguTest(20022,76);
				GetItem(76);
				Wait(90);
				if (ch[2145] > 99 && !ch[2642])
				{
//					Message(4,"さらに、１００回以上叩いてるから","今度から商品を割引してあげるんダナ","","");
					ch[2642] = 1;
				}
				Message(0,"Thanks.","","","");
				ch[400] = -1;
			}
			return 0;
		}
		Message(0,"Yay!","I　beat　my　old　record!","","");
		ch[400] = 4;
		str = "You　whacked　" + ch[2145] + "　moles.";
		Message(4,"Superlative.",str,"","");
		Message(4,"Those　lousy　Phantoms　won't　be","a　match　for　ya，　right?","","");
		Message(0,"Them?　No　problem!","","","");
		ch[400] = -1;

		return 0;
	}

	// 合格済み。自己ベストではない
	if(ch[2145] > 99)
	{
		// 鬼だべ
		ch[400] = 4;
		Message(4,"Superlative.","I　was　moved，　kid.","","");
		str = "You　whacked　" + ch[2145] + "　moles.";
		Message(4,str,"Heh，　you　really　gave","him　a　run　for　his　money.","");
		if (!ch[2314])
		{
			Message(4,"You're　the　only　one　that","this　high.　And　I'm","duly　impressed，　kid.","");
			Message(4,"Take　this　Gold　Medal.","You've　earned　it.","","");
			Mes("You　got　a　|Gold　Medal.|");
			ch[2290] = 2;
			KaguTest(20022,79);
			GetItem(79);
			Wait(90);
			if (ch[2145] > 99 && !ch[2642])
			{
//				Message(4,"さらに、１００回以上叩いてるから","今度から商品を割引してあげるんダナ","","");
				ch[2642] = 1;
			}
			Message(0,"Thanks.","","","");
			ch[400] = -1;
			ch[2314] = 1;
		}
		else
		{
			Message(4,"You're　the　only　one　that","ever　scored　this　high.","You've　got　something，　kid.","");
			Message(4,"Heck，　you're　usually　even","better.　Scary　actually.","","");
			Message(4,"This　time，　a　Bronze　Medal.","","","");
			KaguTest(20022,77);
			GetItem(77);
			Wait(90);
			if (ch[2145] > 99 && !ch[2642])
			{
//				Message(4,"さらに、１００回以上叩いてるから","今度から商品を割引してあげるんダナ","","");
				ch[2642] = 1;
			}
			Message(0,"Thanks.","","","");
			ch[400] = -1;
		}
		return 0;
	}

	// 鬼じゃない
	str = "" + ch[2145] + "　moles.";
	ch[400] = 4;
	Message(4,"Next　time，　get　them　even　quicker!",str,"","");
	Message(4,"Not　your　day　today，　eh?","","","");
	Message(0,"I'll　show　you　next　time!","","","");
	ch[400] = -1;
	return 0;
}
#EndScript

// Doc
#Script:01152
int main()
{
	int mg;
	string str;
	int map;
	int nukeru;
	nukeru = 0;
	mg = 0;

	ch[400] = 14;
	
	KaguTest(20010,0);
	map = ch[420];

	if (map == 607)
	{
		// エレベータ解説
		//Puku

		ch[420] = -1;
		KaguTest(12002,14);
		KaguTest(12002,17);
		KaguTest(30038,14);
		KaguTest(30038,17);
		ch[420] = 100;
		KaguTest(30103,14);
		Look(17,0);
		Message(17,"Parin!","","","");
		//Parin
		ch[420] = 89;
		ch[421] = 130;
		ch[422] = 600;
		ch[423] = 18;
		KaguTest(30065,0);
		Look(0,17);
		Message(0,"How　does　it　look?","","","");
		Message(0,"If　this　doesn't　get　fixed，","I　can't　get　up　there!","","");
		ch[400] = 14;
		//Doc
		Look(14,0);
		Message(14,"Got　it　running.","","","");
		Look(0,14);
		Look(17,14);
		Message(14,"But　this...　doesn't","look　like　an　accident.","","");
		//Parin
		Message(0,"That's　right.","I　saw　someone　break　it.","","");
		//Doc

		SaveCamera();
		ch[302] = 2;

		ch[421] = -694;
		KaguTest(30070,0);
		KaguTest(30070,14);
		KaguTest(30070,17);

		// 上にいる
		Wait(15);
		KaguTest(60003,1);
		Wait(15);
		ch[421] = -323;
		ch[422] = 395;
		ch[423] = 6450;

		Wait(15);

		Look(14,17);
		Look(0,14);

		//Doc
		Message(14,"It　was　nothing.","","","");
		Message(14,"Back　to　the　lab!","","","");
		ch[400] = -1;

		KaguTest(30005,0);
		Camera(14,ch[421],ch[422],ch[423]);
		KaguTest(30062,0);
		ch[420] = 14;
		KaguTest(30063,0);
		ch[400] = 114;
		ch[424] = 45;
		ch[425] = 1450;
		ch[420] = 1;
		ch[426] = 12;
		KaguTest(30060,14);
		Walk2(14,ch[421]*2,ch[422]*2,ch[423]/2);
		Wait((ch[423] / 2) - 15);
		Camera(-1,0,0,0);
		ch[420] = 3;
		KaguTest(30064,14);
		Wait(15);
		CharPos(14,-200000,0,0);
		KaguTest(30063,-1);

		ch[2533] = 1;
		ch[420] = 22;
		KaguTest(12002,17);
		KaguTest(12002,14);

		return 0;
	}
	if (ch[2531] && !ch[2555])
	{
		// Docイベント続き：Doc、修理に向かえ
		ch[400] = 114;
		//Parin
		Message(0,"Take　these　Sweaty　Parts.　Please!!","","","");
		ch[400] = 14;
		Wait(10);
		//Doc
		Message(14,"Oh　perfect，　perfect!!","","","");
		Message(14,"I can repair my sick","computers with these!","","");
		ch[400] = 114;
		ch[420] = 1000;
		ch[421] = -635;
		KaguTest(30070,14);
		Black(0,100,15);
		Wait(15);
		SE(512);
		Wait(30);
		KaguTest(20002,29);
		ch[2532] = 0;
		Scop(0);
		Scop(1);
		Black(0,0,15);
		ch[2555] = 1;
		Wait(15);

						Message(14,"I　expect　you　to　dodge","at　least　80　lasers　again.","","");
					}
					if (!ch[2312] && ch[2311] < 81)
					{
						// まだ
						Message(14,"If　you　can，　try","dodging　at　least","80　lasers.","");
					}

					// 飛ぶ
					Message(14,"Ok，　here　we　go.","Right　this　way　please.","","");
					mg = 1;
				}
				else 
				{
//					if (ch[50] != 2 && ch[50] != 1)
					{
						str = "Your　best　result　is　" + (ch[2311] - 1) + "　lasers　dodged.";
						Message(14,"Looking　at　your　previous　samples，",str,"","");
						Message(14,"Don't　be　shy.　Give　me　a　hand!","","","");
					}
				}

			}

		}
	}
	
	ch[400] = -1;
	
	if (ch[1538])
	{
		return 0;
	}

	if (mg)
	{
		// ミニゲームする
		ch[420] = -450;
		ch[421] = 1985;
		ch[422] = 666;
		ch[423] = 0;
		ch[424] = 535;
		ch[425] = 65;
		KaguTest(30019,1);
		CrossFade();
		Wait(10);
		Event(231);
		SE(476);
		Wait(60);
		ch[424] = 0;
		ch[425] = 0;
		ch[426] = 12;
		KaguTest(30060,0);
		Walk(ch[421],ch[422],ch[423]);
		Wait(ch[423]);
		ch[2145] = 0;
		Black(0,100,15);
		Wait(15);
		KaguTest(30019,0);
		ch[2144] = 1;
		ch[2497] = 1;
		LoadMap(22);
		CharPos(0,0,0,-93);
		Camera(14,-550,900,370);
		Look(0,14);
		Look(14,0);
		KaguTest(12000,58);
		KaguTest(12001,58);
		KaguTest(12000,59);
		KaguTest(12001,59);
		CrossFade();
		Wait(15);
		Black(0,0,15);
		
		ch[400] = 14;
		if (ch[2311] < 21)
		{
			// 合格して無いとき
			Message(14,"Now，　for　the　experiment!","","","");
			Message(14,"Your　task　is　to　dodge","all　of　the　lasers　that","come　at　you.","");
			Message(14,"Touching　even　one　laser","ends　the　experiment.","","");
			Message(14,"For　every　laser　that　leaves","the　field，　your　score　increases.","","");
			Message(14,"The　target　sample　for","this　first　trial　is...","20　lasers.","");
		}
		else
		{
			Message(14,"Now，　for　the　experiment!","","","");
			Message(14,"Your　task　is　to　dodge","all　of　the　lasers　that","come　at　you.","");
			Message(14,"Touching　even　one　laser","ends　the　experiment.","","");
			Message(14,"For　every　laser　that　leaves","the　field，　your　score　increases.","","");
			Message(14,"Dodge　as　many　as　possible，","and　I'll　analyze　the　results.","","");
		}
		Message(14,"Oh，　and　good　luck.","","","");
		Wait(15);
		Camera(0,0,-1000,620);
		CrossFade();
		Wait(30);
		ch[3982] = 4;
		ch[400] = -1;
		// テクスチャ読み込んでおく
		KaguTest2(10009,0,"minigm.iti");
		Wait(90);
		BGM(10);
		ch[2061] = 1;
	}
	
	return 0;
}
#EndScript

// なわとび終了
#Script:01153
int main()
{
	int go;
	int best;
	int syokai;
	string str;
	go = 0;
	best = 0;
	syokai = 0;

	// ホイッスル
	SE(548);
	ch[3982] = 0;
	Wait(60);
	Black(0,100,30);
	Wait(30);
	ch[2144] = 0;
	ch[2497] = 0;
	LoadMap(22);
	KaguTest2(10010,0,"minigm");
	CharPos(0,340,-360,0);
	Camera(14,-550,900,370);
	Look(0,14);
	Look(14,0);
	CrossFade();
	Wait(15);
	Camera(-1,0,0,0);
	Black(0,0,30);
	Wait(30);
	
	ch[2061] = 0;

	if (ch[2311] < 21)
	{
		// 過去に合格していない
		go = 1;
	}
	if (ch[2145] > ch[2311] - 1 && ch[2311] > 0)
	{
		// 自己ベスト
		best = 1;
	}
	if (ch[2311] == 0)
	{
		syokai = 1;
	}
	if (ch[2145] > ch[2311] - 1)
	{
		ch[2311] = ch[2145] + 1;
	}
	
	if (!ch[2534] && ch[2145] > 19)
	{
		// 合格
		ch[400] = 14;
		ch[2289] = 1;
		//Parin
		Message(0,"Whew，　what　a　workout!","","","");
		//Doc
		Message(14,"Yes　yes!","An　excellent　sample!","","");
		Message(14,"For　now，　we　can　end","this　experiment.","","");
		//Parin
		Message(0,"Then　please　fix　the　Pimento","Mountain　elevator!","","");
		//Doc
		Message(14,"Elevator?","","","");
		Message(14,"Yes　of　course!　I　can't","just　leave　it　broken　now!","","");
		Message(14,"See　you　there.","","","");

		KaguTest(30005,0);
		Camera(14,ch[421],ch[422],ch[423]);
		KaguTest(30062,0);
		ch[420] = 14;
		KaguTest(30063,0);
		ch[400] = 114;
		ch[424] = 0;
		ch[425] = -740;
		ch[420] = 1;
		ch[426] = 12;
		KaguTest(30060,14);
		Walk2(14,ch[421]*2,ch[422]*2,ch[423]/2);
		Wait(ch[423]/2);
		KaguTest(30061,0);
		ch[424] = 0;
		ch[425] = -1300;
		ch[426] = 12;
		KaguTest(30060,14);
		Walk2(14,ch[421]*2,ch[422]*2,ch[423]/2);
		Wait((ch[423] / 2) - 15);
		Camera(-1,0,0,0);
		ch[420] = 3;
		KaguTest(30064,14);
		Wait(15);
		CharPos(14,-200000,0,0);
		KaguTest(30063,-1);

		ch[2534] = 1;
		ch[400] = -1;
		return 0;
	}
	if (!ch[2534] && ch[2145] < 20)
	{
		ch[400] = 14;
		//Doc
		Message(14,"You　can't　fail　so　soon!","I　need　more　data!","","");
		Message(14,"We　have　to　start　over...","","","");
		//Parin
		Message(0,"But　I'm　in　a　hurry!","","","");
		ch[400] = -1;
		return 0;
	}
	
	if (ch[2145] > 19 && go)
	{
		// 初合格
		//str = "" + ch[2145] + "本避けているかも";
		str = "You dodged " + ch[2145] + "  lasers.";
		ch[400] = 14;
		Message(14,"We've　achieved　our　goal!",str,"","");
		ch[400] = -1;
		return 0;
	}
	if (go && best)
	{
		// 合格ならず。しかし、自己ベスト
		//str = "" + ch[2145] + "本しか避けれていないかも";
		str = "You only dodged " + ch[2145] + "  lasers.";
		ch[400] = 14;
		Message(14,"You've　broken　your　record.","Unfortunately...",str,"");
		Message(14,"Let's　achieve　our　target","sample　next　time.","","");
		ch[400] = -1;
		return 0;
	}
	if (go)
	{
		// 合格ならず。しかも、自己ベストでもない
		if (ch[2145] > 0)
		{
			//str = "" + ch[2145] + "本しか避けれていないかも";
			str = "You only dodged " + ch[2145] + "  lasers.";
		}
		else
		{
			//str = "１本も避けれていないかも";
			str = "You didn't even dodge one laser.";
		}
		ch[400] = 14;
		Message(14,"Too　bad.",str,"","");
		Message(14,"You　didn't　reach","the　target　sample.","","");
		Message(0,"It's　pretty　tough.","","","");
		ch[400] = -1;
		return 0;
	}
	if (best)
	{
		// 既に合格済み。自己ベスト
		if(ch[2145] > 79)
		{
			// 鬼だべ
			Message(0,"Yay!","I　broke　my　record!","","");
			ch[400] = 14;
			Message(14,"Extraordinary!","You're　a　natural!","","");
			//str = "" + ch[2145] + "本避けているかも";
			str = "You dodged " + ch[2145] + "lasers.";
			Message(14,str,"","","");
			if (!ch[2312])
			{
				//JP line is ここまで避けられる人を他に見たことがないかも
                Message(14,"I've never seen someone so evasive before!","I got great results.","","");
                // JP line is 実験に貢献してくれた証としてこの金のメダルをあげよう, PSP TL has the "valuable specimen" which is in-character so I included it here
				Message(14,"Such a valuable specimen","deserves this Gold Medal.","","");
				Mes("You　got　a　|Gold　Medal.|");
				ch[2289] = 2;
				KaguTest(20022,79);
				GetItem(79);
				Wait(90);
				
				if (ch[2145] > 199 && !ch[2641])
				{
//					Message(14,"さらに実験数値が２００を超えたので","今度から商品を割引してあげよう","","");
					ch[2641] = 1;
				}
				Message(0,"Thanks.","","","");
				ch[400] = -1;
				ch[2312] = 1;
			}
			else
			{
				Message(14,"You're　the　only　one　able","to　avoid　this　many　lasers.","","");
				Message(14,"Take　this　Silver　Medal.","","","");
				KaguTest(20022,76);
				GetItem(76);
				Wait(90);
				if (ch[2145] > 199 && !ch[2641])
				{
//					Message(14,"さらに実験数値が２００を超えたので","今度から商品を割引してあげよう","","");
					ch[2641] = 1;
				}
				Message(0,"Thanks.","","","");
				ch[400] = -1;
			}
			return 0;
		}
		Message(0,"Yay!","I　broke　my　record!","","");
		ch[400] = 14;
		//str = "" + ch[2145] + "本避けているかも";
		str = "You dodged " + ch[2145] + "  lasers.";
		Message(14,"Extraordinary!",str,"","");
		Message(14,"Try　to　avoid　80　lasers　next　time.","","","");
		Message(0,"No　problem!","","","");

		ch[400] = -1;

		return 0;
	}

	// 合格済み。自己ベストではない
	if(ch[2145] > 79)
	{
		// 鬼だべ
		ch[400] = 14;
		Message(14,"Extraordinary!","You're　a　natural!","","");
		//str = "" + ch[2145] + "本避けているかも";
		str = "You dodged " + ch[2145] + "  lasers.";
		Message(14,str,"","","");
		if (!ch[2312])
		{
			//JP line is ここまで避けられる人を他に見たことがないかも
			Message(14,"You're　the　first　to　give　me","such　amazing　results!","","");
			Message(14,"Your　help　is　invaluable.","Please　take　this　Bronze　Medal.","","");
			Mes("You　got　a　|Bronze　Medal.|");
			ch[2289] = 2;
			KaguTest(20022,79);
			GetItem(79);
			Wait(90);
			
			if (ch[2145] > 199 && !ch[2641])
			{
//				Message(14,"さらに実験数値が２００を超えたので","今度から商品を割引してあげよう","","");
				ch[2641] = 1;
			}
			Message(0,"Thanks.","","","");
			ch[400] = -1;
			ch[2312] = 1;
		}
		else
		{
			Message(14,"You're the only one able","to avoid this many lasers.","","");
			Message(0,"Your past record is","better， however. You should work harder next time.","","");
			Message(14,"Take this Bronze Medal.","","","");
			KaguTest(20022,77);
			GetItem(77);
			Wait(90);
			Message(0,"Thanks.","","","");
			ch[400] = -1;
		}
		return 0;
	}

	// 鬼じゃない
	if (ch[2145] > 0)
	{
		//str = "" + ch[2145] + "本避けたかも";
		str = "You dodged " + ch[2145] + "  lasers.";
	}
	else
	{
		//str = "１本も避けれていないかも";
		str = "You didn't even dodge one laser.";
	}
	ch[400] = 14;
	Message(14,"This　time，　you　dodged　",str,"","");
	Message(0,"Not　so　hot　this　time...","","","");
	Message(14,"I　hope　you'll　help　with","future　experiments.","","");
	ch[400] = -1;
	return 0;
}
#EndScript

// 岩壊しオバケ
#Script:01154
int main()
{
	int mg;
	string str;
	int nukeru;
	int nukeru2;
	int map;
	nukeru = 0;
	mg = 0;

	KaguTest(20010,0);
	map = ch[420];
	ch[400] = 4;
	if (ch[2526] && !ch[2527])
	{
		//Pecky (Peke)
		Message(4,"Hey，　I'm　having　Doug　and　his　brother","help　with　rebuilding　the　village.","","");
		Message(4,"I　just　called　them，　so","they　should　arrive　soon.","","");
		nukeru = 1;
	}
	if (ch[2524] && !ch[2525])
	{
		// Pecky (Peke)にスポンサーを依頼
		ch[2525] = 1;
		ch[400] = 4;
		
		KaguTest(20008,0);
		ch[2039] = ch[430];
		
		if (ch[2528])
		{
			Message(4,"What　do　you　want?","","","");
		}
		else
		{
			//Pecky (Peke)
			Message(4,"Something　you　want?","","","");
		}
		ch[2528] = 1;
		Message(0,"Actually...","","","");
		Black(0,100,15);
		Wait(30);
		Black(0,0,15);
		//Pecky (Peke)
		Message(4,"Me?　Sponsor　the　Monster","Village　construction?","","");
		Message(4,"Ok，　I　don't　mind.","","","");
		//Parin
		Message(0,"Well　that　was　easy.","","","");
		
		if (ch[3957])
		{
			// Popon中
			//Pecky (Peke)
			Message(4,"Can　hardly　say　|no|　to","such　a　cute　little　girl.","","");

			//Parin

			//Pecky (Peke)
			Message(4,"This　time，　let's　play","a　little　game，　shall　we?","","");

			//Parin
			Message(0,"A　game?","I　wonder...","","");
			ch[2554] = 1;
		}
		else
		{
			//Pecky (Peke)
			Message(4,"You've　got　the　drill　kid.","You're　the　boss.","","");
			Message(4,"Just　one　catch...","","","");
			//Parin
			Message(0,"What?","","","");
			//Pecky (Peke)
			Message(4,"Lately，　I've　been","extremely　bored.","","");
			Message(4,"I　want　you　to","make me laugh.","","");
			//Parin
			Message(0,"Make　you　laugh?","...How?","","");
			ch[400] = -1;
			return 0;
		}
	}

	ch[2528] = 1;
	if (ch[2525] && !ch[2554])
	{
		ch[400] = 4;
		KaguTest(20008,0);
		nukeru = 1;

		if (ch[430] == ch[2039])
		{
			// 初めて会ったときと同じ顔
			//Pecky (Peke)
			Message(4,"Hurry　up!","","","");
			Message(4,"Hurry　up　and　make　me","laugh　kid!","","");
			ch[400] = -1;
			return 0;
		}
		// お面系でなければすべて素顔扱い
		switch(ch[430])
		{
		case 37:
		case 41:
		case 43:
		case 44:
		case 45:
		case 46:
		case 47:
		case 57:
		case 61:
		case 62:
			ch[430] = 0;
		}

		if ((ch[2039] != 42 && ch[430] == 42) || ((ch[2039] == 42 || ch[2039] == 56) && ch[430] == 0) || (ch[2039] != 56 && ch[430] == 56))
		{
			// 正解。
			ch[2554] = 1;
			if ((ch[2039] == 42 && ch[430] != 56) || (ch[2039] == 56 && ch[430] != 42))
			{
				// 素顔
				//Pecky (Peke)
				Message(4,"...............","","","");
				Message(4,"Ha...","","","");

				//Parin
				Message(0,"?　?　?","","","");

				//Pecky (Peke)
				Message(4,"Hahahahaaaa!","That　mask　is　hilarious!","","");

				//Parin
				Message(0,"...Mask?","","","");
				Message(0,"This　is　my　real　face!!","","","");

				//Pecky (Peke)
				Message(4,"Oh...　really?","","","");

				//Parin
                //JP line is いたいけなレディに何てこと言うのよ。お金持ちの風上にもおけないわ
				Message(0,"How　dare　you　say　something　so　","rude　to　adorable　little　me!","","");
				Message(0,"...But　you　are　laughing.","So　I　win，　right?","","");
			}
			else
			{
				// ガスマスク｜おさるの帽子
				//Pecky (Peke)
				Message(4,"...............","","","");
				Message(4,"Ha...","","","");
				Message(4,"Hahahahaaaa!","Your　face　is　hilarious!","","");

				//Parin
				Message(0,"Yay!　You　laughed!","","","");

				//Pecky (Peke)
				Message(4,"Wow　kid.　You　really　gave","me　a　good　laugh　there.","","");

				//Parin
				Message(0,"So　I　win，　right?","","","");
			}
			//Pecky (Peke)
			Message(4,"That's　right　kid.","Hah，　what　a　day　eh?","","");

			//Parin
			Message(0,"Now，　keep　your　promise","and　sponsor　the　village.","","");

			//Pecky (Peke)
			Message(4,"Uh，　no...","","","");

			//Parin
			Message(0,"What!?","","","");

			//Pecky (Peke)
			Message(4,"Changed　my　mind.","","","");
			Message(4,"This　time，　let's　play","a　little　game，　shall　we?","","");

			//Parin
			Message(0,"A　game?","","","");

			//Pecky (Peke)
			Message(4,"If　you　do　well，　I'll","sponsor　the　village.","","");
			Message(4,"Just...　get　out　of　here　if","you're　not　interested.","","");

			//Parin
			Message(0,"You're　twisted，　know　that?","","","");

			//Pecky (Peke)
			Message(4,"So...　make　a　choice.","","","");
		}
		if (!ch[2554])
		{
			if (ch[430] == 40 || ch[430] == 43 || ch[430] == 44 || ch[430] == 46 || ch[430] == 47 || ch[430] == 48 || ch[430] == 56 || ch[430] == 57 || ch[430] == 62 || ch[430] == 21 )
			{
				// 不正解。微妙
				//Pecky (Peke)
				Message(4,"...............","","","");
				Message(4,"Ha...","","","");
				//Parin
				Message(0,"You　laughed!　I　saw　you!","","","");
				//Pecky (Peke)
				Message(4,"N-no　I　didn't!","","","");
				ch[400] = -1;
				return 0;
			}
			if (ch[430] != 42)
			{
				// 不正解。だめだめ
				Message(4,"Try　harder　kid.","Come　again.","","");
				ch[400] = -1;
				return 0;
			}
		}
		
	}

	if (ch[2554] && !ch[2526])
	{
		// ミニゲームするか聞く
		if (ch[2554] == 1)
		{
			ch[2554] = 2;
		}
		else
		{
			//Pecky (Peke)
			Message(4,"If　you　do　well，　I'll","sponsor　the　village.","","");
			Message(4,"Just...　get　out　of　here　if","you're　not　interested.","","");
		}
		
		SelStart(50);
		SelText("Let's　see　this　game.",1);
		SelText("I　don't　feel　like　it.",2);
		SelEnd();
		
		if (ch[50] == 1)
		{
			mg = 1;
		}
		else
		{
			Message(4,"If　you're　up　to　it，","just　drop　by，　kid.","","");
			ch[400] = -1;
			return 0;
		}
		nukeru = 1;
	}

	if (ch[2497])
	{
		return 0;
	}

	ch[400] = 4;
	ch[204]++;
	if (!nukeru)
	{
		if (ch[1538])
		{
			//Pecky (Peke)
			Message(4,"Monster　Village　is","coming　along　well，　eh?","","");
			Message(4,"Soon　I　won't　be","needed as sponsor...","It's　a　little　sad...","");
			ch[400] = -1;
			return 0;
		}
		if (ch[1571] && !ch[1538])
		{
			//Pecky (Peke)
			Message(4,"That　was　a　big　quake　eh?","","","");
			Message(4,"I　need　to　check　if","my　collections　are　safe.","","");
		}
		if (ch[1513] && !ch[1571])
		{
			if (ch[204] < 2)
			{
				//Pecky (Peke)
				Message(4,"A　human　hero　once　asked　me","to　pay　for　drill　modifications.","","");
				//Parin
				Message(0,"What　was　this　hero　like?","","","");
				//Pecky (Peke)
				Message(4,"But　when　he　got　my　bill　for","the　work，　he　pretended","he　knew　nothing　about　it...","");
				//Parin
				Message(0,"That's　not　nice!","","","");
			}
			else
			{
				//Pecky (Peke)
				Message(4,"A　human　hero　once　asked　me","to　pay　for　drill　modifications.","","");
				Message(4,"But　when　he　got　my　bill　for","the　work，　he　pretended","he　knew　nothing　about　it...","");
			}
		}
		if (ch[1505] && !ch[1513])
		{
			if (!ch[2524])
			{
				//Pecky (Peke)
				Message(4,"I'm　extremely　bored...","","","");
				Message(4,"If　you　hear　about　anything","fun，　let　me　know　kid.","","");
			}
			else
			{
				//Pecky (Peke)
				Message(4,"Since　I'm　sponsoring　you，","I　have　to　cancel　my　","mountain　summer　home.","");
				Message(4,"I'm　very　rich，　true.","But　I　watch　what　I　spend.","","");
			}
		}
		if (!ch[1505])
		{
			//Pecky (Peke)
			Message(4,"Something　you　want?","","","");
			Message(4,"I'm　Pecky.　I　own　this　mansion.","And　I'm　filthy　rich.","","");
			Message(4,"Lately，　it　has　been　extremely","boring.　Nothing　to　do，　eh?","","");
		}
	}
	
	if (ch[2527] && map == 23 && !ch[1538])
	{
		// もぐら叩きしたことがある
		if (ch[2313] < 61)
		{
			// なわとび不合格
			if (ch[2313] == 1)
			{
				str = "You　didn't　whack　any　moles　last　time.";
			}
			else
			{
				str = "Your　top　score　is　" + (ch[2313] - 1) + "　moles　whacked.";
			}
				
			Message(4,"How　about　some　Whack-A-Mole?",str,"","");

			SelStart(50);
			SelText("Let's　play!",1);
			SelText("I'm　kind　of　busy　now...",2);
			SelEnd();
				
			if (ch[50] == 1)
			{
				// 飛ぶ
				Message(4,"Ready　to　go?","","","");
				mg = 1;
			}
			else
			{
				Message(4,str,"","","");
				Message(4,"Come　by　again　and","entertain　me，　ok　kid?","","");
			}
		}
		else
		{
			// もぐら叩き合格済み
			ch[400] = 4;
			Message(4,"How　about　some　Whack-A-Mole?",str,"","");

			SelStart(50);
			SelText("Let's　play!",1);
			SelText("I'm　kind　of　busy　now...",2);
			SelEnd();
			
			if (ch[50] == 1)
			{
				// ミニゲーム
				str = "Your　top　score　is　" + (ch[2313] - 1) + "　moles　whacked.";
				if (!ch[2314])
				{
					// 過去ベストが１００叩き以上
					if (ch[2313] > 100)
					{
						Message(4,str,"Let's　see　you　whack　100　again.","","");
					}
					else
					{
						Message(4,str,"Try　to　whack　100　this　time.","","");
					}
				}
				else
				{
					Message(4,str,"Try　to　beat　your　record，　kid.","","");
				}
					// 飛ぶ
				mg = 1;
			}
			else 
			{
				if (ch[50] != 2 && ch[50] != 1)
				{
					str = "Your　top　score　is　" + (ch[2313] - 1) + "　moles　whacked.";
					Message(4,"You've　whacked　",str,"","");
					Message(4,"Come　by　again，　eh?","","","");
				}
			}

		}
	}
	
	ch[400] = -1;
	
	if (ch[1538])
	{
		return 0;
	}
	
	if (mg)
	{
		// ミニゲームする
		ch[2145] = 0;

		Camera(4,-37,850,370);
		CrossFade();
		Wait(10);

		ch[424] = 100;
		ch[425] = -300;
		ch[426] = 12;
		KaguTest(30060,0);
		ch[400] = 104;
		Walk(ch[421],ch[422],ch[423]);
		Wait(ch[423]);
		KaguTest(30061,0);
		KaguTest(30062,0);
		Look(0,4);
		ch[420] = 4;
		KaguTest(30063,0);
		ch[424] = 0;
		ch[425] = -1075;
		ch[426] = 12;
		KaguTest(30060,4);
		if (ch[423] < 2)
		{
			ch[423] = 2;
		}
		Walk2(4,ch[421]*2,ch[422]*2,ch[423]/2);
		Wait(ch[423]/2);
		KaguTest(30061,4);
		ch[424] = 450;
		ch[425] = -900;
		ch[426] = 12;
		KaguTest(30060,4);
		if (ch[423] < 2)
		{
			ch[423] = 2;
		}
		Walk2(4,ch[421]*2,ch[422]*2,ch[423]/2);
		Wait(ch[423]/2);
		KaguTest(30061,4);
		ch[424] = 675;
		ch[425] = -825;
		ch[426] = 12;
		KaguTest(30060,4);
		Camera(0,-1575,-250,1300);
		if (ch[423] < 2)
		{
			ch[423] = 2;
		}
		Walk2(4,ch[421]*2,ch[422]*2,ch[423]/2);
		Wait(ch[423]/2);
		Look(4,0);
		Wait(10);
		Event(231);
		SE(474);
		SE(475);
		Wait(45);
		
//		Black(0,100,15);
//		Wait(15);
		ch[2144] = 1800;
		ch[2497] = 1;
//		Camera(-1,0,0,0);
//		LoadMap(23);
		Event(232);
		CharPos(4,675,-825,75);
//		CharPos(58,-150,450,0);
//		CharPos(59,150,450,0);
		
		CharPos(0,0,-300,0);
		Camera(4,-825,-50,370);
		CrossFade();
		KaguTest(30063,-1);
		Look(0,4);
		Look(58,0);
		Look(59,0);
		Look(4,0);
		KaguTest(12000,58);
		KaguTest(12000,59);
		KaguTest(12001,58);
		KaguTest(12001,59);
		CrossFade();
		Wait(15);
		Black(0,0,15);
		Wait(15);

		ch[400] = 4;
		int gonum;
		string gotxt;
		if (ch[455] == 1)
		{
			// ビギナー
			gonum = 40;
		}
		if (ch[455] == 0)
		{
			// ノーマル
			gonum = 50;
		}
		if (ch[455] == 2)
		{
			// ハード以上
			gonum = 60;
		}
		gotxt = ""+"You　need　to　whack　"+gonum+"　or　more　moles";
		
		if (ch[2313] < gonum + 1)
		{
			// 合格してない時
			Message(4,"Here　are　the　rules，　kid.","","","");
			Message(4,"Whack　as　many　moles","as　you　can　in　one　minute.","","");
			Message(4,gotxt,"to　pass，　ok　kid?","","");
		}
		else
		{
			// 合格している時
			Message(4,"Whack　as　many　moles","as　you　can　in　one　minute.","","");
		}
		Message(4,"Ready?　Get　to　whacking!","","","");
		Wait(10);
//		Camera(0,0,-900,370);
		Camera(-1,0,0,0);
		CrossFade();
//		KaguTest(12000,58);
//		KaguTest(12000,59);
//		KaguTest(12001,58);
//		KaguTest(12001,59);
		Wait(15);
		ch[3982] = 4;
		ch[400] = -1;
		
		// テクスチャ読み込んでおく
		KaguTest2(10009,0,"minigm.iti");
		
		Wait(90);
		Camera(-1,0,0,0);
		CrossFade();
		BGM(10);
		ch[2061] = 1;
	}
	
	return 0;
}
#EndScript

// 岩壊し終了
#Script:01155
int main()
{
	if (ch[2316])
	{
		ch[2316] = 0;
		PostScr(1156);
		return 0;
	}

	int go;
	int best;
	int syokai;
	string str;
	go = 0;
	best = 0;
	syokai = 0;

	// ホイッスル
	SE(548);
	ch[3982] = 0;
	Wait(60);
	Black(0,100,30);
	Wait(30);
	ch[2144] = 0;
	ch[2497] = 0;
	LoadMap(21);
	KaguTest2(10010,0,"minigm");
	CharPos(0,0,600,-150);
	Camera(2,1050,600,220);
	Look(0,2);
	Look(2,0);
	Look(1,0);
	CrossFade();
	Wait(15);
	Camera(-1,0,0,0);
	Black(0,0,30);
	Wait(30);
	
	ch[2061] = 0;

	if (ch[2143] < 27)
	{
		// 過去に合格していない
		go = 1;
	}
	if (ch[2145] > ch[2143] - 1 && ch[2143] > 0)
	{
		// 自己ベスト
		best = 1;
	}
	if (ch[2145] > ch[2143] - 1)
	{
		ch[2143] = ch[2145] + 1;
	}
	
	if (ch[2145] > 25 && go)
	{
		// 初合格
		str = "" + ch[2145] + "　to　" + (50 - ch[2145]) + "，　your　win.";
		ch[400] = 2;
		ch[2288] = 1;
		Message(2,"Congratulations!",str,"","");
		
		if (!ch[2509])
		{
			//Doug (Moguren)
			Message(2,"What　a　showdown!","","","");
			Message(2,"As　I　promised　little　lady，","I'll　crush　that　stone.","","");
			//Parin
			Message(0,"Hey...　if　I　can　beat　you，","then　why　go　to　you　for　help?","","");
			//Doug (Moguren)
			Message(2,"You're　fast，　little　lady.","But　I'm　more　powerful，　ya　hear?","","");
			Message(2,"I'm　leavin'　right　now.","Meet　you　at　the　cave.","","");
			// 岩を壊しに行く
			KaguTest(30005,0);
			Camera(2,ch[421],ch[422],ch[423]);
			KaguTest(30062,0);
			ch[420] = 2;
			KaguTest(30063,0); // ParinはDoug (Moguren)をみつめる
			ch[400] = 102;
			ch[424] = 700;
			ch[425] = 600;
			ch[420] = 1;
			ch[426] = 12;
			KaguTest(30060,2);
			Walk2(2,ch[421]*2,ch[422]*2,ch[423]/2);
			Wait(ch[423]/2);
			KaguTest(30061,0);
			ch[424] = 1750;
			ch[425] = 600;
			ch[420] = 1;
			ch[426] = 12;
			KaguTest(30060,2);
			if (ch[423] - 15 < 1)
			{
				ch[423] = 1;
			}
			Walk2(2,ch[421]*2,ch[422]*2,ch[423] / 2);
			Wait((ch[423] / 2) - 15);
			ch[420] = 3;
			KaguTest(30064,2);
			Wait(25);
			Camera(-1,0,0,0);
			CharPos(2,-200000,0,0);
			KaguTest(30063,-1,);	
			ch[400] = -1;
			ch[2509] = 1;
			return 0;
		}
		ch[400] = -1;
		return 0;
	}
	if (!ch[2509] && go)
	{
		if (ch[2145] == 25)
		{
			// 同点だべ
			str = "" + ch[2145] + "　to　" + (50 - ch[2145]) + "，　a　tie.";
			//Doug (Moguren)
			Message(2,str,"","","");
			Message(2,"A　draw?　You　didn't","really　beat　me　did　ya!","","");
			Message(2,"Better　try　again.","","","");
		}
		else
		{
			str = "" + ch[2145] + "　to　" + (50 - ch[2145]) + "，　my　win.";
			//Doug (Moguren)
			Message(2,str,"","","");
			Message(2,"If　you　want　to　rival　me，","you've　got　to　work　harder.","","");
			Message(2,"Better　try　again.","","","");
		}
		ch[400] = -1;
		return 0;
	}
	
	if (go && best)
	{
		// 合格ならず。しかし、自己ベスト
		if(ch[2145] == 25)
		{
			str = "" + ch[2145] + "　to　" + (50 - ch[2145]) + "，　a　tie.";
		}
		else
		{
			str = "" + ch[2145] + "　to　" + (50 - ch[2145]) + "，　my　win.";
		}
		ch[400] = 2;
		
		Message(2,"Better　than　before，","but　not　good　enough.","","");
		Message(2,str,"","","");
		Message(0,"You　should　practice.","","","");
		ch[400] = -1;
		return 0;
	}
	if (go)
	{
		// 合格ならず。しかも、自己ベストでもない
		if(ch[2145] == 25)
		{
			str = "" + ch[2145] + "　to　" + (50 - ch[2145]) + "，　a　tie.";
		}
		else
		{
			str = "" + ch[2145] + "　to　" + (50 - ch[2145]) + "，　my　win.";
		}
		ch[400] = 2;
		Message(2,"Too　bad.",str,"","");
		if (syokai)
		{
			Message(2,"The　first　time'll　get　ya!","","","");
		}
		else
		{
			Message(2,"What?　Worse　than　before?","","","");
		}
		Message(0,"I　guess　I　need　practice...","","","");
		ch[400] = -1;
		return 0;
	}
	if (best)
	{
		// 既に合格済み。自己ベスト
		if(ch[2145] > 34)
		{
			// 鬼だべ
			Message(0,"Yay!","I　broke　my　record!","","");
			ch[400] = 2;
			Message(2,"Wasn't　that　something!","Sure　you　aren't　a　mole?","","");
			str = "" + ch[2145] + "　to　" + (50 - ch[2145]) + "，　you　beat　me　good!";
			Message(2,str,"You're　inhuman，　little　lady!","","");
			ch[400] = -1;
			ch[2146] = 1;
			return 0;
		}
		Message(0,"Yay!","I　broke　my　record!","","");
		ch[400] = 2;
		str = "" + ch[2145] + "　to　" + (50 - ch[2145]) + "，　your　win.";
		Message(2,"Wasn't　that　something!",str,"","");
		Message(2,"At　this　rate，　you'll　smash","those　Phantoms!","","");
		Message(0,"Leave　it　to　me!","","","");
		ch[400] = -1;

		return 0;
	}

	// 合格済み。自己ベストではない
	if(ch[2145] > 34)
	{
		// 鬼だべ
		ch[400] = 2;
		Message(2,"Wasn't　that　something!","Sure　you　aren't　a　mole?","","");
		str = "" + ch[2145] + "　to　" + (50 - ch[2145]) + "，　you　beat　me　good!";
		Message(2,str,"You're　inhuman，　little　lady!","","");
		ch[2146] = 1;
		return 0;
	}

	// 鬼じゃない
	if (ch[2145] > 24)
	{
		if (ch[2145] == 25)
		{
			str = "This　time　it　was　" + ch[2145] + "　to　" + (50 - ch[2145]) + "，　a　tie.";
		}
		else
		{
			str = "This　time　it　was　" + ch[2145] + "　to　" + (50 - ch[2145]) + "，　your　win.";
		}
	}
	else
	{
		str = "This　time　it　was　" + ch[2145] + "　to　" + (50 - ch[2145]) + "，　my　win.";
	}
	ch[400] = 2;
	Message(2,str,"","","");
	Message(2,"Ain't　the　best　results...","","","");
	Message(0,"I'll　do　better　next　time.","","","");
	ch[400] = -1;
	return 0;
}
#EndScript

// 岩壊し終了
#Script:01156
int main()
{

	int go;
	int best;
	int syokai;
	string str;
	go = 0;
	best = 0;
	syokai = 0;

	// ホイッスル
	SE(548);
	ch[3982] = 0;
	Wait(60);
	Black(0,100,30);
	Wait(30);
	ch[2144] = 0;
	ch[2497] = 0;
	LoadMap(21);
	KaguTest2(10010,0,"minigm");
	CharPos(0,0,600,0);
	Camera(1,1050,600,220);
	Look(0,1);
	Look(2,0);
	Look(1,0);
	CrossFade();
	Wait(15);
	Camera(-1,0,0,0);
	Black(0,0,30);
	Wait(30);
	
	ch[2061] = 0;

	if (ch[2315] < 27)
	{
		// 過去に合格していない
		go = 1;
	}
	if (ch[2145] > ch[2315] - 1 && ch[2315] > 0)
	{
		// 自己ベスト
		best = 1;
	}
	if (ch[2315] == 0)
	{
		syokai = 1;
	}
	if (ch[2145] > ch[2315] - 1)
	{
		ch[2315] = ch[2145] + 1;
	}
	
	if (ch[2145] > 25 && go)
	{
		// 初合格
		//str = "" + ch[2145] + "：" + (50 - ch[2145]) + "であんたの勝ちだ";
		str = "The score was " + ch[2145] + " to " + (50 - ch[2145]) + "， your win.";
		ch[400] = 1;
		Look(0,1);
//		Message(2,"おめでとうだべ。合格だべ。",str,"","");
		Message(1,"I　see　how　my　brother　was　beaten...",str,"","");
		Message(1,"Take　this　Gold　Medal","in　honor　of　your　victory.","","");
		Mes("You　got　a　|Gold　Medal.|");
		ch[2288] = 2;
		KaguTest(20022,79);
		GetItem(79);
		Wait(90);
		Message(0,"Thanks.","","","");
		ch[400] = -1;
		return 0;
	}
	if (go && best)
	{
		// 合格ならず。しかし、自己ベスト
		if (ch[2145] == 25)
		{
			//str = "" + ch[2145] + "：" + (50 - ch[2145]) + "で同点だべ";
			str = "The score was " + ch[2145] + " to " + (50 - ch[2145]) + "， a tie.";
		}
		else
		{
			//str = "" + ch[2145] + "：" + (50 - ch[2145]) + "で兄さんの勝ちだべ";
			str = "The score was " + ch[2145] + " to " + (50 - ch[2145]) + "， my brother's win.";
		}
		Look(0,1);
		ch[400] = 1;
		Message(1,"Ha，　you　tried　your　best，","but　last　time　was　better.","","");
		Look(0,2);
		ch[400] = 2;
		Message(2,str,"","","");
		Message(0,"Get　some　practice.","","","");
		ch[400] = -1;
		return 0;
	}
	if (go)
	{
		// 合格ならず。しかも、自己ベストでもない
		if (ch[2145] == 25)
		{
			//str = "" + ch[2145] + "：" + (50 - ch[2145]) + "で同点だべ";
			str = "The score was " + ch[2145] + " to " + (50 - ch[2145]) + "， a tie.";
		}
		else
		{
			//str = "" + ch[2145] + "：" + (50 - ch[2145]) + "でオイラの勝ちだべ";
			str = "The score was " + ch[2145] + " to " + (50 - ch[2145]) + "， my win.";
		}
		ch[400] = 1;
		Message(1,"Not　cool...",str,"","");
		ch[400] = 2;
		Look(0,2);
		Message(2,"My　brother　Digby　is　a","tough　one!","","");
		Message(0,"I　guess　I　need　practice...","","","");
		ch[400] = -1;
		return 0;
	}
	if (best)
	{
		// 既に合格済み。自己ベスト
		if(ch[2145] > 34)
		{
			// 鬼だべ
			Message(0,"Yay!","I　broke　my　record!","","");
			ch[400] = 1;
			Message(1,"Too　cool.","You're　a　drilling　demon.","","");
			Look(0,2);
			//str = "" + ch[2145] + "：" + (50 - ch[2145]) + "で兄さんに圧勝なんて";
			str = "The score was " + ch[2145] + " to " + (50 - ch[2145]) + "， you beat my brother good!";
			Message(2,str,"I　can't　believe　you're　human.","","");
			Look(0,1);
			ch[400] = 1;
			if (!ch[2640])
			{
				Message(1,"I've　never　been　beaten","so　badly　in　my　life.","","");
//				Message(1,"今度から商品を割引してあげよう","","","");
				ch[400] = 2;
				Look(0,2);
				Message(2,"Here，　take　this　Silver　Medal.","","","");
				KaguTest(20022,76);
				GetItem(76);
				Wait(90);
				Message(0,"Thanks.","","","");
				ch[400] = -1;
				ch[2640] = 1;
			}
			else
			{
				Message(1,"I've　never　been　beaten","so　badly　in　my　life.","","");
//				Message(1,"よし、商品をさらに割引してあげよう","","","");
				ch[400] = 2;
				Look(0,2);
				Message(2,"Here，　take　this　Silver　Medal.","","","");
				KaguTest(20022,76);
				GetItem(76);
				Wait(90);
				Message(0,"Thanks.","","","");
				ch[400] = -1;
			}
			return 0;
		}
		Message(0,"Yay!","I　broke　my　record!","","");
		ch[400] = 2;
		//str = "" + ch[2145] + "：" + (50 - ch[2145]) + "であんたの勝ちだべ";
		str = "The score was " + ch[2145] + " to " + (50 - ch[2145]) + "， your win.";
		Message(2,"Simply　amazing!",str,"","");
		ch[400] = 1;
		Look(0,1);
		Message(2,"Here，　take　this　Bronze　Medal.","","","");
		KaguTest(20022,77);
		GetItem(77);
		Wait(90);
		Message(0,"Thanks.","","","");
		ch[400] = -1;

		return 0;
	}

	// 合格済み。自己ベストではない
	if(ch[2145] > 34)
	{
		// 鬼だべ
		ch[400] = 1;
		Message(1,"Too　cool.","You're　a　drilling　demon.","","");
		Look(0,2);
		//str = "" + ch[2145] + "：" + (50 - ch[2145]) + "で兄さんに圧勝なんて";
		str = "The score was " + ch[2145] + " to " + (50 - ch[2145]) + "， you beat my brother good!";
		Message(2,str,"I　can't　believe　you're　human.","","");
		Look(0,1);
		ch[400] = 1;
		if (!ch[2640])
		{
			Message(1,"I've　never　been　beaten","so　badly　in　my　life.","","");
//			Message(1,"今度から商品を割引してあげよう","","","");
			ch[400] = 2;
			Look(0,2);
			Message(2,"Here，　take　this　Silver　Medal.","","","");
			KaguTest(20022,76);
			GetItem(76);
			Wait(90);
			Message(0,"Thanks.","","","");
			ch[400] = -1;
			ch[2640] = 1;
		}
		else
		{
			Message(1,"I've　never　been　beaten","so　badly　in　my　life.","","");
//			Message(1,"よし、商品をさらに割引してあげよう","","","");
			ch[400] = 2;
			Look(0,2);
			Message(2,"Here，　take　this　Bronze　Medal.","","","");
			KaguTest(20022,77);
			GetItem(77);
			Wait(90);
			Message(0,"Thanks.","","","");
			ch[400] = -1;
		}
		return 0;
	}

	// 鬼じゃない
	if (ch[2145] > 24)
	{
		if (ch[2145] == 25)
		{
			//str = "今回は" + ch[2145] + "：" + (50 - ch[2145]) + "で同点だべ";
			str = "This time it was " + ch[2145] + " to " + (50 - ch[2145]) + "， a tie.";
		}
		else
		{
			//str = "今回は" + ch[2145] + "：" + (50 - ch[2145]) + "であんたの勝ちだべ";
			str = "This time it was " + ch[2145] + " to " + (50 - ch[2145]) + "， your win.";
		}
	}
	else
	{
		//str = "今回は" + ch[2145] + "：" + (50 - ch[2145]) + "でオイラの勝ちだったべ";
		str = "This time it was " + ch[2145] + " to " + (50 - ch[2145]) + "， my win.";
	}
	ch[400] = 1;
	Message(1,str,"","","");
	ch[400] = 2;
	Look(0,2);
	Message(2,"Ain't　the　best　results...","","","");
	Message(0,"I'll　do　better　next　time.","","","");
	ch[400] = -1;
	return 0;
}
#EndScript

// サッカー終了
#Script:01157
int main()
{

	int go;
	int best;
	int syokai;
	string str;
	go = 0;
	best = 0;
	syokai = 0;

	// ホイッスル
	SE(548);
	ch[3982] = 0;
	Wait(60);
	Black(0,100,30);
	Wait(30);
	ch[2144] = 0;
	ch[2497] = 0;
	LoadMap(24);
	KaguTest2(10010,0,"minigm");
	CharPos(0,0,0,0);
	Camera(19,0,-510,370);
	Look(0,19);
	Look(19,0);
	CrossFade();
	Wait(30);
	Camera(-1,0,0,0);
	Black(0,0,30);
	Wait(30);

	ch[2061] = 0;
	
	if (ch[2318] - ch[2321] <= 0)
	{
		// 過去に合格していない
		go = 1;
	}
	if (ch[2145] - ch[2325] > ch[2318] - ch[2321])
	{
		// 自己ベスト
		best = 1;
	}
	if (ch[2324] == 0)
	{
		syokai = 1;
		ch[2324] = 1;
	}
	int chchch;
	chchch = 0;
	if (ch[2145] - ch[2325] > ch[2318] - ch[2321])
	{
		chchch = 1;
	}
	if (ch[2318] == 0 && ch[2321] == 0)
	{
		chchch = 1;
	}
	if (chchch)
	{
		ch[2318] = ch[2145];
		ch[2321] = ch[2325];
	}
	
	if (ch[2145] - ch[2325] > 0 && go)
	{
		// 初合格
		//str = "" + ch[2145] + "：" + ch[2325] + "で君たちの勝利だ";
		str = "The score was " + ch[2145] + " to " + ch[2325] + ".";
		ch[400] = 19;
		ch[2291] = 1;
		Look(0,19);
		Message(19,"Not　bad　at　all.",str,"Your　team　wins.","");
		Message(19,"Take　this　Gold　Medal　in　honor　of","defeating　the　Motoro　Astrals.","","");
		Mes("You　got　a　|Gold　Medal.|");
		ch[2291] = 2;
		KaguTest(20022,79);
		GetItem(79);
		Wait(90);
		Message(0,"Thanks.","","","");
		ch[400] = -1;
		return 0;
	}
	if (go && best)
	{
		// 合格ならず。しかし、自己ベスト
		Look(0,19);
		ch[400] = 19;
		if (ch[2145] == ch[2325])
		{
			//str = "" + ch[2145] + "：" + ch[2325] + "で同点だ";
			str = "The score was " + ch[2145] + " to " + ch[2325] + "， a tie.";
			Message(19,"I　held　back，　but　you　did","well　for　a　novice.","","");
			Message(19,str,"","","");
			Message(0,"I'll　beat　you　next　time.","","","");
		}
		else
		{
			//str = "" + ch[2145] + "：" + ch[2325] + "で私たちの勝利だ";
			str = "The score was " + ch[2145] + " to " + ch[2325] + ".";
			Message(19,"Not　bad，　but　still","not　good　enough.","","");
			Message(19,str,"Our team wins.","","");
			Message(0,"I　guess　I　need　practice...","","","");
		}
		ch[400] = -1;
		return 0;
	}
	if (go)
	{
		// 合格ならず。しかも、自己ベストでもない
		Look(0,19);
		ch[400] = 19;
		if (ch[2145] == ch[2325])
		{
			//str = "" + ch[2145] + "：" + ch[2325] + "で同点だ";
			str = "The score was " + ch[2145] + " to " + ch[2325] + ".";
			Message(19,"Not　bad　at　all　child.",str,"","");
			Message(0,"I'll　beat　you　next　time.","","","");
		}
		else
		{
			//str = "" + ch[2145] + "：" + ch[2325] + "で私たちの勝利だ";
			str = "The score was " + ch[2145] + " to " + ch[2325] + ".";
            // "Our team wins" wasn't in the JP PSP, but in the EN PSP version. JP is just 残念だったな
            // The original English line is just 'Unfortunate', but that sounds like a sentence fragment so I rewrote it
			Message(19,"That's too bad...",str,"Our team wins.","");
			Message(0,"The　next　world　champions","make　tough　competition，　huh?","","");
		}
		ch[400] = -1;
		return 0;
	}
	if (best)
	{
		// 既に合格済み。自己ベスト
		if(ch[2145] - ch[2325] > ch[2325])
		{
			// 鬼だべ
			ch[400] = 19;
			//str = "" + ch[2145] + "：" + ch[2325] + "で圧勝するとは……";
			str = "The score was " + ch[2145] + " to " + ch[2325] + ",you crushed us...";
            // JP line is 凄いな。世界を目指すモトロ・アストラルズに
            Message(19,"Quite impressive.","The Motoro Astrals are aiming to be the world champions.",str,"");
            //JP line is 世界を目指しているわりに弱すぎるんじゃない？
			Message(0,"Aren't you guys a bit weak","to be aiming that high?","","");
			Message(19,"Ugh...","Y-you　are　incredibly　skilled.","","");
			if (!ch[2326])
			{
				Message(19,"Your　team　is　the　first　to","have　beaten　us　so　soundly.","","");
//				if (ch[3975] > 50)
//				{
//					Message(19,"よし、全ての店舗で","商品が割引になるように","してあげよう","");
//					ch[3975] -= 10;
//				}
				Message(19,"You　have　earned　a　Silver　Medal.","","","");
				KaguTest(20022,76);
				GetItem(76);
				Wait(90);
				Message(0,"Thanks.","","","");
				ch[400] = -1;
				ch[2326] = 1;
			}
			else
			{
				Message(19,"Your　team　is　the　first　to","have　beaten　us　so　soundly.","","");
//				if (ch[3975] > 50)
//				{
//					Message(19,"よし、全ての店舗で","商品がさらに割引になるように","してあげよう","");
//					ch[3975] -= 10;
//				}
				Message(19,"You　have　earned　a　Silver　Medal.","","","");
				KaguTest(20022,76);
				GetItem(76);
				Wait(90);
				Message(0,"Thanks.","","","");
				ch[400] = -1;
			}
			return 0;
		}
		Message(0,"Yay!","We　won!","","");
		ch[400] = 19;
		//str = "" + ch[2145] + "：" + ch[2325] + "で君たちの勝利だ";
		str = "The score was " + ch[2145] + " to " + ch[2325] + ".";
		Message(19,"Quite impressive.",str,"Your team wins.","");
		Message(19,"You　have　earned　a　Silver　Medal.","","","");
		KaguTest(20022,77);
		GetItem(77);
		Wait(90);
		Message(0,"Thanks.","","","");
		ch[400] = -1;

		return 0;
	}

	// 合格済み。自己ベストではない
	if(ch[2145] - ch[2325] > ch[2325])
	{
		// 鬼だべ
		ch[400] = 19;
		//str = "" + ch[2145] + "：" + ch[2325] + "で圧勝するとは……";
		str = "The score was " + ch[2145] + " to " + ch[2325] + ",you crushed us...";
        // JP line is 凄いな。世界を目指すモトロ・アストラルズに
        Message(19,"Quite impressive.","The Motoro Astrals are aiming to be the world champions.",str,"");
        //JP line is 世界を目指しているわりに弱すぎるんじゃない？
		Message(0,"Aren't you guys a bit weak","to be aiming that high?","","");
		Message(19,"Ugh...","Y-you　are　incredibly　skilled.","","");
		if (!ch[2326])
		{
			Message(19,"Your　team　is　the　first　to","have　beaten　us　so　soundly.","","");
//             Dummied out bonus of getting store discounts as an additional reward
//			if (ch[3975] > 50)
//			{
//				Message(19,"よし、全ての店舗で","商品が割引になるように","してあげよう","");
//				ch[3975] -= 10;
//			}
			Message(19,"You　have　earned　a　Silver　Medal.","","","");
			KaguTest(20022,76);
			GetItem(76);
			Wait(90);
			Message(0,"Thanks.","","","");
			ch[400] = -1;
			ch[2326] = 1;
		}
		else
		{
			Message(19,"Your　team　is　the　first　to","have　beaten　us　so　soundly.","","");
			
//			if (ch[3975] > 50)
//			{
//				Message(19,"よし、全ての店舗で","商品がさらに割引になるように","してあげよう","");
//				ch[3975] -= 10;
//			}
			Message(19,"You　have　earned　a　Silver　Medal.","","","");
			KaguTest(20022,76);
			GetItem(76);
			Wait(90);
			Message(0,"Thanks.","","","");
			ch[400] = -1;
		}
		return 0;
	}

	// 鬼じゃない
	//str = "今回は" + ch[2145] + "：" + ch[2325] + "で";
	str = "This time it was " + ch[2145] + " to " + ch[2325] + ".";
	ch[400] = 19;
	if (ch[2145] - ch[2325] > 0)
	{
		Message(19,str,"Your　team　wins.","","");
		Message(0,"We'll　do　even　better　next　time.","","","");
	}
	else
	{
		if (ch[2145] - ch[2325] == 0)
		{
			Message(19,str,"It　appears　to　be　a　tie.","","");
			Message(0,"We'll　win　next　time.","","","");
		}
		else
		{
			Message(19,str,"It's　our　win.","","");
			Message(19,"Not　your　best　effort，　I　assume.","","","");
			Message(0,"We'll　do　better　next　time.","","","");
		}
	}
	ch[400] = -1;
	return 0;
}

// 0111:がーどだっしゅちゅー
#Script:01158
int main()
{
	TekiStop(1);

	Message(0,"Something　is　written　here.","","","");

	//説明１
	// チュートリアル表示
	KaguTest(10006,0);
	KaguTest(10007,7);
	KaguTest2(10009,0,"tute_06.bmp");
	ch[423] = 180;
	ch[424] = 42;
	ch[425] = 460;
	ch[426] = 438;
	ch[427] = 0;
	ch[428] = 0;
	ch[429] = 320;
	ch[430] = 452;
	ch[431] = 512;

	KaguTest(10010,10);
	Wait(10);
	Message(0,"","","","");

	KaguTest(10011,10);
	Wait(10);

	{
		ch[2149] = 1;

		ch[421] = 5850;
		ch[423] = 7;

		KaguTest(30020,0);
		ch[421] += 1000;
		KaguTest(30070,0);
		Wait(10);

		KaguTest(10006,1);
		KaguTest(10007,0);
		KaguTest2(10008,0,"Use　the　cursor　along　with　C　for　Guard　Dash.");
		KaguTest2(10008,1,"For　the　mouse，double　click　the　left　button　to　execute!!");
		KaguTest(10010,10);
		Message(0,"","","","");
		KaguTest(10011,10);

		KaguTest(20027,43);
		Wait2(15);

		ch[421] -= 1000;
		KaguTest(30070,0);
		Wait(10);

		Wait(10);
			// ガードダッシュ
		KaguTest(20027,43);
		Wait2(15);
			// ガードダッシュ
		KaguTest(20027,43);
		Wait2(15);
			// 方向変換
		KaguTest(30020,0);
		ch[421] += 1000;
		Wait2(15);
		KaguTest(30070,0);

		Wait2(15);

// 111:初めての雑魚
#Script:01159
int main()
{
	// 初めての雑魚倒した
	int x;
	int y;
	int z;
	int ln;
	SaveCamera();
	KaguTest(30005,0);
	x = ch[421];
	y = ch[422];
	z = ch[423];
	if (!ch[301])
	{
		// 次の雑魚だ
		Wait(30);
		ch[301] = 1;

		ch[420] = 100000;
		ch[427] = 7;
		KaguTest(30015,51);
		ch[420] = -173;
		ch[421] = 3781;
		ch[422] = 815;
		ch[423] = -697;
		ch[424] = 5194;
		ch[425] = 215;
		KaguTest(30019,1);
		CrossFade();
		Wait(45);
		ch[420] = 100000;
		KaguTest(30015,52);
		ch[420] = -688;
		ch[421] = 3925;
		ch[422] = 647;
		ch[423] = 496;
		ch[424] = 5348;
		ch[425] = 215;
		KaguTest(30019,1);
		CrossFade();
		Wait(45);
		KaguTest(30019,0);
		RestoreCamera();
		CrossFade();
		Wait(15)
		return 0;
	}
	if (!ch[302])
	{
		// そのまた次の雑魚だ
		Wait(30);
		ch[302] = 1;

		ch[420] = 100000;
		ch[427] = 7;
		KaguTest(30015,53);
		ch[420] = -150;
		ch[421] = 3533;
		ch[422] = 805;
		ch[423] = -150;
		ch[424] = 4979;
		ch[425] = 220;
		KaguTest(30019,1);
		CrossFade();
		Wait(75);
		
		if (!ch[2153])
		{
			ch[420] = -858;
			ch[421] = 5386;
			ch[422] = 600;
			ch[423] = 666;
			ch[424] = 5830;
			ch[425] = 145;
			KaguTest(30019,1);
			CrossFade();
			ch[420] = ch[423];
			ch[421] = ch[424];
			KaguTest(30070,0);
			Wait(75);
			KaguTest(30019,0);
			RestoreCamera();
			CrossFade();

			// 壁との距離を取る
			ch[420] = 675;
			ch[421] = 5850;
			ch[422] = 150;
			KaguTest(30112,0);
			if (ch[423] > 750)
			{
				Message(0,"I　bet　I　could","break　that　wall.","","");
			}
			else
			{
				Message(0,"This　wall　looks　weak.","","","");
			}
			ch[2153] = 1;
		}
		else
		{
			KaguTest(30019,0);
			RestoreCamera();
			CrossFade();
		}
		return 0;
	}
	if (!ch[303])
	{
		// 全部倒した
		ch[303] = 1;
	}
}
#EndScript

// 111:浮かせ攻撃実践
#Script:01160
int main()
{
	// 浮かせ攻撃の雑魚倒した
	// 次の扉開く
	int x;
	int y;
	int z;
	int ln;
	
	Wait(30);
	
	SE(950);
	
	TekiStop(1);
	SaveCamera();
	
	ln = Door2C(2);
	GetCharPos(ln,x,y,z);
	
	Camera(ln,x - 1200,y,z + 400);
	CrossFade();
	Wait(30);
	Event(202);
	Wait(50);
	
	Camera(-1,0,0,0);
	RestoreCamera();
	CrossFade();
	Wait(15);
	ch[3601] = 1;
	ch[201] = 1;
	TekiStop(0);
}
#EndScript

// 111:レバー引いたら扉開く
#Script:01161
int main()
{
	// ガードダッシュの先のレバー引いた
	// 次の扉開く
	int x;
	int y;
	int z;
	int ln;
	
	Wait(30);
	
	SE(950);
	
	TekiStop(1);
	SaveCamera();
	
	ln = Door2C(3);
	GetCharPos(ln,x,y,z);
	
	Camera(ln,x,y - 1200,z + 400);
	ch[421] = x;
	ch[422] = y - 1200;
	ch[423] = z + 400;
	KaguTest(30010,0);
	CrossFade();
	Wait(30);
	Event(203);
	Wait(50);
	
	Camera(-1,0,0,0);
	RestoreCamera();
	CrossFade();
	Wait(15);
	ch[202] = 1;
	TekiStop(0);
}
#EndScript

// 113:レバー引いたらリフト動く

int main()
{

	int bt15;

	int y;
	int z;

	{

	CrossFade();
	Wait(30);
	Event(353);
	TekiStop(1);
	Wait(60);

	{

		ch[2304] = 1;

	Wait(15);
	TekiStop(0);

}

// 0113:レバー引いたら扉開く
#Script:01164
int main()
{

	int x;
	int y;
	int z;
	
	TekiStop(1);
	ln = Door2C(1);
	GetCharPos(ln,x,y,z);
	SaveCamera();
	ch[420] = 100000;
	ch[427] = 2+4;
	KaguTest(30015,1);
	Walk2(58,0,-8,180);
	ch[429] = 0;
	KaguTest(30039,0);
	Walk2(59,0,-8,180);
	ch[429] = 0;
	KaguTest(30039,0);
	Walk2(60,0,-8,180);
	ch[429] = 0;
	KaguTest(30039,0);
	Walk2(61,0,-8,180);
	ch[429] = 0;
	KaguTest(30039,0);
	ch[420] = 2700;
	ch[421] = 0;
	KaguTest(30070,58);
	KaguTest(30070,59);
	KaguTest(30070,60);
	KaguTest(30070,61);

	Wait(30);
	SE(950);
	Camera(ln,3681,-1435,900);
	CrossFade();
	Wait(30);
	Event(357);
	Wait(90);
	Camera(-1,0,0,0);
	RestoreCamera();
	CrossFade();
	Wait(15);
	ch[264] = 1;
	TekiStop(0);
}

// 114 -> 113
#Script:01167
int main()
{
	if (ch[2497])
	{
		KaguTest(40002,0);
		
		MapEvent(0);
		Walk(0,-8,11);
		Wait(11);
		Event(110);
		Walk(0,-5,15);
		Wait(15);
		KaguTest(10600,ch[1107]-2260);
		MMV(StageMMV(ch[420]));
		MapEvent(1);
	}
	else
	{
		TekiStop(1);
		
		WaitD(0);
		ch[50] = 0;
		string st1,st2;
		SelStart(50);
		st1 = "Leave　"+StageName(ch[1107]-2260);
		st2 = "Don't　leave　"+StageName(ch[1107]-2260);
		SelText(st1,1);
		SelText(st2,2);
		SelEnd();
		
		if (ch[50] == 1)
		{
			MapEvent(0);
			Walk(0,-8,30);
			Black(0,100,30);
			Wait(30);
			
			KaguTest(10100,0);
			KaguTest(99999,0);
			TekiStop(0);
			MapEvent(1);
		}
		else
		{
			MapEvent(0);
			KaguTest(30058,0);
			while(ch[420])
			{
				Walk(ch[421],ch[422],ch[423]);
				Wait(ch[423]);
				KaguTest(30058,0);
			}
			Walk(0,8,20);
			Wait(20);
			MapEvent(1);
			TekiStop(0);
		}
	}
}
#EndScript

int main()

}

// 113裏：火をつけると扉開く
#Script:01169
int main()
{
	int ln;
	int x;
	int y;
	int z;
	
	Wait(15);

	SE(950);
	Wait(15);
	TekiStop(1);
	ln = Door2C(1);
	GetCharPos(ln,x,y,z);
	SaveCamera();

	Camera(ln,-228,-300,570);
	CrossFade();
	Wait(20);
	
	Event(202);
	Wait(45);
	Camera(-1,0,0,0);
	RestoreCamera();
	CrossFade();
	Wait(15);
	
	ch[260] = 1;

	TekiStop(0);
	
	return 0;
}
#EndScript

// 113裏：レバー引くとリフト動く
#Script:01171
int main()
{
	int ln;
	int x;
	int y;
	int z;
	int bt15;
	
	ln = Lift2C(1);
	GetCharPos(ln,x,y,z);
	bt15 = Getbt15(ln);
	
	if (!bt15)
	{
		// 動く
		TekiStop(1);
		Wait(15);
		SaveCamera();
		
		Camera(ln,x - 500,y - 500,1800);
		CrossFade();
		Wait(15);
		Event(206);
		Wait(30);
		Camera(-1,0,0,0);
		RestoreCamera();
		CrossFade();
		Wait(15);
		
		TekiStop(0);
	}
}

// 112裏：あたりに触れると敵が他マップからやってくる
#Script:01174
int main()
{
	TekiStop(1);

	int c1;
	int c2;
	ch[420] = 15;
	ch[429] = 1;
	KaguTest(30036,0);
	Wait(30);
	ch[420] = 150;
	ch[421] = 77;
	ch[422] = 132;
	ch[423] = 150;
	ch[424] = -682;
	ch[425] = 0;
	KaguTest(30093,12);
	KaguTest(30019,14);
	CrossFade();
	Wait(15);
	
	CharPos(0,150,900,0);
	
	ch[420] = 100000;
	ch[427] = 7;
	KaguTest(30015,2);
	KaguTest(30025,2);
	c1 = ch[420];
	c2 = c1 + 1;
	Look(0,c1);
	ch[420] = 2;
	KaguTest(12005,c1);
	KaguTest(12005,c2);
	ch[420] = 3;
	KaguTest(30064,c1);
	KaguTest(30064,c2);
	Walk2(c1,0,5,150);
	ch[429] = 1;
	KaguTest(30039,0);
	Walk2(c2,0,5,110);
	ch[429] = 0;
	KaguTest(30039,0);
	Wait(30);

	ch[420] = 150;
	ch[421] = 977;
	ch[422] = 132;
	ch[423] = 150;
	ch[424] = 300;
	ch[425] = 0;
	KaguTest(30093,190);

	ch[420] = 13;
	ch[429] = 1;
	KaguTest(30036,c2);
	Wait(30);
	ch[429] = 1;
	KaguTest(30036,c1);
	Wait(60);
	ch[420] = 15;
	ch[429] = 1;
	KaguTest(30036,c2);
	Look(c2,0);
	Wait(60);
	ch[420] = 8;
	ch[429] = 1;
	KaguTest(30036,c1); // はてな
	Wait(60);
	ch[420] = 150;
	ch[421] = 1950;
	ch[422] = 370;
	ch[423] = 150;
	ch[424] = 900;
	ch[425] = 70;
	KaguTest(30093,15);
	Look(c1,0);
	Wait(30);
	ch[421] = 15;
	ch[422] = 1;
	KaguTest(30037,c1);
	ch[420] = 15;
	ch[429] = 1;
	KaguTest(30036,c1);
	Wait(45);
	
	KaguTest(30019,0);
	CrossFade();

	TekiStop(0);

	ch[420] = 3;
	KaguTest(12005,c1);
	KaguTest(12005,c2);
	ch[420] = 1;
	ch[421] = 1;
	ch[422] = 1;
	KaguTest(30090,c1);
	KaguTest(30090,c2);
}
#EndScript

		CrossFade();

		ch[427] = 2;

		CrossFade();

// 111裏：二つレバー引いたら宝箱出現
#Script:01178
int main()
{
	if (ch[301] && ch[302])
	{
		// 二つレバー引いている
		int ln;
		SaveCamera();
		Wait(15);
		TekiStop(1);
		SE(950);
		ch[420] = 150;
		ch[421] = 2400;
		ch[422] = 250;
		ch[423] = 150;
		ch[424] = 1200;
		ch[425] = -150;
		KaguTest(30019,1);
		CrossFade();
		Wait(30);

		if (ch[2801])
		{
			ln = Takara2C(2833);
		}
		else
		{
			ln = Takara2C(2401);
		}
		SE(566);
		CharPos(ln,150,1200,-150);
		KaguTest(30018,ln);
		Wait(60);
		
		KaguTest(30019,0);
		RestoreCamera();
		CrossFade();
		Wait(15);
		
		ch[304] = 1;
		
		TekiStop(0);
	}
}
#EndScript

// 111裏：敵に見つかったら敵発生＆砲台回るようになる
#Script:01179
int main()
{
	int pt;
	
	KaguTest(30025,4);
	Camera(ch[420],526,5470,425);
	CrossFade();
	Wait(45);
	TekiStop(1);
	ch[420] = 100;
	ch[421] = 100;
	ch[422] = 100;
	KaguTest(30046,15);

	ch[420] = 100000;
	ch[427] = 7;
	KaguTest(30015,1);
	KaguTest(30015,2);
	ch[420] = 684;
	ch[421] = 6229;
	ch[422] = 684;
	ch[423] = -586;
	ch[424] = 4968;
	ch[425] = 145;
//	ch[420] = 1065;
//	ch[421] = 6295;
//	ch[422] = 865;
	KaguTest(30093,15);
	Camera(-1,0,0,0);
	KaguTest(30019,14);
	Wait(15);
	KaguTest(30025,1);
	ch[421] = ch[420];
	ch[420] = 2;
	KaguTest(12005,ch[421]);
	KaguTest(12004,ch[421]);
	pt = ch[420];
	ch[420] = -1;
	KaguTest(12002,ch[421]);
	ch[420] = 1;
	KaguTest(30097,ch[421]);
	Walk2(ch[421],8,0,75);
	ch[429] = 0;
	KaguTest(30039,0);
	ch[420] = 0;
	KaguTest(30103,ch[421]);
	Wait(30);
	Look(0,ch[421]);
	ch[420] = 2;
	KaguTest(30064,ch[421]);
	Wait(45);
	Look(ch[421],0);
	Wait(15);
	ch[420] = 3;
	KaguTest(12005,ch[421]);
	ch[420] = pt;
	KaguTest(12002,ch[421]);
	ch[420] = 0;
	KaguTest(30097,ch[421]);

	ch[420] = 150;
	ch[421] = 6250;
	ch[422] = 150;
	ch[423] = 150;
	ch[424] = 6250;
	ch[425] = 150;
	KaguTest(30094,20);
	ch[420] = -385;
	ch[421] = 6229;
	ch[422] = 684;
//	ch[420] = -765;
//	ch[421] = 6295;
//	ch[422] = 865;
	ch[423] = 886;
	ch[424] = 4968;
	ch[425] = 145;
	KaguTest(30093,20);
	KaguTest(30019,15);
	CrossFade();
	Wait(30);
	KaguTest(30025,2);
	ch[421] = ch[420];
	ch[420] = 2;
	KaguTest(12005,ch[421]);
	KaguTest(12004,ch[421]);
	pt = ch[420];
	ch[420] = -1;
	KaguTest(12002,ch[421]);
	ch[420] = 1;
	KaguTest(30097,ch[421]);
	Walk2(ch[421],-8,0,75);
	ch[429] = 0;
	KaguTest(30039,0);
	ch[420] = 0;
	KaguTest(30103,ch[421]);
	Wait(30);
	Look(0,ch[421]);
	Wait(10);
	ch[420] = 2;
	KaguTest(30064,ch[421]);
	Wait(35);
	Look(ch[421],0);
	Wait(15);
	ch[420] = 3;
	KaguTest(12005,ch[421]);
	ch[420] = pt;
	KaguTest(12002,ch[421]);
	ch[420] = 0;
	KaguTest(30097,ch[421]);

	KaguTest(30019,0);
	Wait(15);
	CrossFade();
	TekiStop(0);

	ch[420] = 1;
	KaguTest(30096,0);
}
#EndScript

	ch[3966] = 600;
}

// Pocoつぼ置く
#Script:01186
int main()
{
	KaguTest(20056,0);
	if (ch[420])
	{
		// 魔法のツボ扱い
		PostScr(1308);
		return 0;
	}

	Wait(30);
	
	ch[421] = 0;
	if (ch[1538])
	{
		// エンディング中はだめ
	}
	if (!ch[3974])
	{
		KaguTest(30076,1);
		if (!ch[420])
		{
			// 置けなかった
	//		GetItem(23);
			KaguTest2(20002,0,"I　can't　use　this　here.");
		}
	}
	else
	{
		// 召喚中
		KaguTest2(20002,0,"I　can't　use　this　now.");
	}
	Wait(30);
}
#EndScript

// 召還つぼわった
#Script:01190
int main()
{
	ch[3956] = 1;
//	ch[3956] = ch[1791] / 100;
//	if (ch[1791] < 100)
//	{
//		// 失敗
//		ch[449] = 0;
//			// エフェクト＆エモ
//		ch[420] = ch[3968];
//		ch[421] = ch[3969];
//		ch[422] = ch[3970];
//		ch[423] = 1011;
//		ch[424] = 0;
//		ch[425] = 0;
//		ch[426] = 0;
//		ch[427] = 100;
//		ch[428] = 0;
//		KaguTest(30045,rand() % 10);
//		KaguTest(30045,rand() % 10);
//		KaguTest(30045,rand() % 10);
//		KaguTest(30045,rand() % 10);
//		KaguTest(30045,rand() % 10);
//		KaguTest(30045,rand() % 10);
//		KaguTest(30045,rand() % 10);
//		KaguTest(30045,rand() % 10);
//		KaguTest(30045,rand() % 10);
//		KaguTest(30045,rand() % 10);
///		ch[420] = 4;	//（仮）エモもやもや
//		KaguTest(30036,0);
//		return 0;
//	}
//	else
	{
		// 成功
//		KaguTest(20058,0);
		// エフェクトもだそう
		ch[420] = ch[3968];
		ch[421] = ch[3969];
		ch[422] = ch[3970];
		ch[423] = 744;
		ch[424] = 0;
		ch[425] = 0;
		ch[426] = 0;
		ch[427] = 100;
		ch[428] = 0;
		KaguTest(30045,0);
		KaguTest(20002,34);
		GetItem(34);
		KaguTest(20002,23);
		KaguTest(20002,24);
		KaguTest(20002,26);
		KaguTest(20002,28);
		KaguTest(20002,55);
	}
	
	if (ch[449] == 1)
	{
		// Pocoツボ
		PostScr(1182);
		ch[449] = 0;
		return 0;
	}
	if (ch[449] == 2)
	{
		// Rocko (Iwao)ツボ
		PostScr(1183);
		ch[449] = 0;
		return 0;
	}
	if (ch[449] == 3)
	{
		// Chuckyツボ
		PostScr(1184);
		ch[449] = 0;
		return 0;
	}
	if (ch[449] == 4)
	{
		// Pierreツボ
		PostScr(1185);
		ch[449] = 0;
		return 0;
	}
	if (ch[449] == 5)
	{
		// Black Beanツボ
		PostScr(1202);
		ch[449] = 0;
		return 0;
	}
}
#EndScript

// ドリル引き抜く
#Script:01191
int main()
{
	if (!ch[2300])
	{
		//ドリルまだ
		MapEvent(0);
		Black(0,100,10);
		Wait(10);
		
		ch[2302] = 1;
		Mouse(0);
		PlayMovie("nuketa.txt",0);
		Black(0,100,0);
		Wait(5);
//		Black(0,0,15);
		Walk(0,5,1);
		KaguTest(30057,0);
		Mouse(1);
		ch[2300] = 1;
		ch[1791] = -100;
		KaguTest(20051,0);
		LoadMap(401);
		Black(0,100,0);
		Black(0,0,30);
//		CharPos(0,0,47,38);
//		CharPos(19,-24,236,38);
//		Scop2(19,1,"O_043.it3");
		ch[2302] = 0;
		ch[435] = 0;
		MapEvent(1);
	}
}
#EndScript

// 兄たま発見イベント
#Script:01194
int main()
{
	ch[400] = 17;
	ch[2317] = 1;
	
	//  conversation
	//Parin
	Message(0,"There　you　are!　You're　safe!","","","");
	//Puku
	Message(17,"Glad　you're　OK，　Parin.","","","");
	Message(17,"I　returned　as　the　village","was　being　attacked.","","");
	Message(17,"Pino，　Poco　and　I　escaped，","but　we　got　separated.","","");
	//Parin
	Message(0,"I　see.","","","");
	//Puku
	Message(17,"Parin，　can　you","look　for　them?","","");
	Message(17,"This　place　is　so　unfamiliar，　and","I'm　not　good　with　humans...","","");

	//⇒まだ誰も見つけていない場合
	
	if (!ch[2328] && !ch[2329])
	{
		// まだ誰もみつけていない
		//Parin
		Message(0,"I'll look for them，　Puku.","","","");
		//Puku
		Message(17,"Thank　you.","I'll　be　back　at　the　village.","","");
	}
	if (ch[2328] && !ch[2329])
	{
		// Pocoだけみつけている
		//Parin
		Message(0,"I　just　found　Poco.","","","");
		Message(0,"Pino　is　still　gone.","","","");
		//Puku
		Message(17,"Please　find　her.","I'll　be　back　at　the　village.","","");
		//Parin
		Message(0,"Ok，　I'll　look　for　her.","","","");
	}
	if (!ch[2328] && ch[2329])
	{
		// Pinoだけみつけている
		//Parin
		Message(0,"I　just　found　Pino.","","","");
		Message(0,"Poco　is　still　gone.","","","");
		//Puku
		Message(17,"Please　find　him.","I'll　be　back　at　the　village.","","");
		//Parin
		Message(0,"Ok，　I'll　look　for　him.","","","");
	}
	if (ch[2328] && ch[2329])
	{
		// 両方ともみつけている
		//Parin
		Message(0,"I　found　both　of　them.","They're　at　the　village.","","");
		//Puku
		Message(17,"Really?　Great.","I'll　go　back　too.","","");
		//Parin
		Message(0,"OK.","","","");
	}
	
	// Parin避ける
	ch[424] = 4050;
	ch[425] = 1600;
	ch[426] = 7;
	KaguTest(30061,0);
	KaguTest(30060,0);
	Walk(ch[421],ch[422],ch[423]);
	ch[429] = 0;
	KaguTest(30039,0);
	Wait(ch[423]);

	// 兄たま逃亡
	ch[420] = 17;
	KaguTest(30063,0); // Parinは兄たまをみつめる
	ch[400] = 117;
	ch[424] = 3820;
	ch[425] = 1525;
	ch[420] = 1;
	ch[426] = 12;
	KaguTest(30061,0);
	KaguTest(30060,17);
	Walk2(17,ch[421]*2,ch[422]*2,ch[423]/2);
	ch[429] = 0;
	KaguTest(30039,0);
	Wait(ch[423]/2);
	KaguTest(30061,0);
	ch[424] = 2720;
	ch[425] = 1050;
	ch[420] = 1;
	ch[426] = 12;
	KaguTest(30060,17);
	if (ch[423] - 15 < 1)
	{
		ch[423] = 1;
	}
	Walk2(17,ch[421]*2,ch[422]*2,ch[423] / 2);
	ch[429] = 0;
	KaguTest(30039,0);
	Wait((ch[423] / 2) - 15);
	ch[420] = 3;
	KaguTest(30064,17);
	Wait(15);
	CharPos(17,-200000,0,0);
	KaguTest(30063,-1,);	
	ch[400] = -1;
}
#EndScript

// Poco発見イベント
#Script:01195
int main()
{
	ch[400] = 16;
	ch[2328] = 1;
	
	//  conversation
	//Parin
	Message(0,"Poco，　you're　safe!","","","");
	Message(0,"But，　what　are　you　doing?","","","");
	//Poco
	Message(16,"I　know　humans　can't　see　me，","but　I　still　wanted　to　hide...","","");
	//Parin
	Message(0,"Pretty　shy　for　a　dancer.","","","");
	//Poco
	Message(16,"It's　hard　to　ignore　my","monster　hiding　instincts.","","");
	Message(16,"Anyway，　what　about　the　village?","","","");
	//Parin
	Message(0,"The　Phantoms　destroyed　it.","","","");
	//Poco
	Message(16,"Oh　no...","","","");
	Message(16,"I　guess　I'll　go　back","and　have　a　look...","","");
	
	// Parin避ける
	ch[424] = 1863;
	ch[425] = 1173;
	ch[426] = 7;
	KaguTest(30061,0);
	KaguTest(30060,0);
	Walk(ch[421],ch[422],ch[423]);
	ch[429] = 0;
	KaguTest(30039,0);
	Wait(ch[423]);
	
	// Poco立ち去る
	ch[400] = 116;
	KaguTest(30005,0);
	KaguTest(30062,0);
	ch[420] = 16;
	KaguTest(30063,0);
	ch[400] = 116;
	ch[424] = 1600;
	ch[425] = 1150;
	ch[420] = 1;
	ch[426] = 12;
	KaguTest(30061,0);
	KaguTest(30060,16);
	Walk2(16,ch[421],ch[422],ch[423]);
	ch[429] = 0;
	KaguTest(30039,0);
	Wait(ch[423]);
	KaguTest(30061,0);
	ch[424] = 735;
	ch[425] = 1150;
	ch[426] = 12;
	KaguTest(30060,16);
	Walk2(16,ch[421],ch[422],ch[423]);
	ch[429] = 0;
	KaguTest(30039,0);
	Wait(ch[423]-15);
	ch[420] = 3;
	KaguTest(30064,16);
	Wait(15);
	CharPos(16,-200000,0,0);
	KaguTest(30063,-1);
	ch[400] = -1;
}
#EndScript

// Pino発見イベント
#Script:01196
int main()
{
	ch[400] = 18;
	ch[2329] = 1;
	
	//  conversation
	//Pino
	Message(18,"Parin!","","","");
	//Parin
	Message(0,"Pino，　there　you　are.","","","");
	//Pino
	Message(18,"Everyone...　the　village...","","","");
	Message(18,"You　just　saved　Puku...","and　now　this...","","");
	//Parin
	Message(0,"Don't　worry.","","","");
	Message(0,"Those　Phantoms　aren't","in　the　village　anymore.","","");
	//Pino
	Message(18,"...Really?","Ok，　I'm　going　home.","","");
	Message(18,"Puku　and　Poco　also　escaped.","Maybe　they're　back　already...","","");
	
	// Parin避ける
	ch[424] = 50;
	ch[425] = -17;
	ch[426] = 7;
	KaguTest(30061,0);
	KaguTest(30060,0);
	Walk(ch[421],ch[422],ch[423]);
	ch[429] = 0;
	KaguTest(30039,0);
	Wait(ch[423]);

	// Pino立ち去る
	ch[400] = 118;
	KaguTest(30005,0);
	KaguTest(30062,0);
	ch[420] = 18;
	KaguTest(30063,0);
	ch[400] = 118;
	ch[424] = -125;
	ch[425] = 0;
	ch[420] = 1;
	ch[426] = 12;
	KaguTest(30061,0);
	KaguTest(30060,18);
	Walk2(18,ch[421],ch[422],ch[423]);
	ch[429] = 0;
	KaguTest(30039,0);
	Wait(ch[423]);
	KaguTest(30061,0);
	ch[424] = -500;
	ch[425] = 0;
	ch[426] = 12;
	KaguTest(30061,0);
	KaguTest(30060,18);
	Walk2(18,ch[421],ch[422],ch[423]);
	ch[429] = 0;
	KaguTest(30039,0);
	Wait(ch[423]-15);
	ch[420] = 3;
	KaguTest(30064,18);
	Wait(15);
	CharPos(18,-200000,0,0);
	KaguTest(30063,-1);
	ch[400] = -1;
}
#EndScript

// 闇の霧発生
#Script:01200
int main()
{
	KaguTest(99986,0);
	KaguTest2(30014,0,"@ClearORoot");
	KaguTest2(30014,3,"poboss");
	KaguTest2(30014,3,"poura1");
	KaguTest2(30014,3,"poura2");
	KaguTest2(30014,3,"yama1");
	KaguTest2(30014,3,"yama2");
	KaguTest2(30014,3,"yamaboss");
	KaguTest2(30014,3,"yamaura1");
	KaguTest2(30014,3,"yamaura2");
	KaguTest2(30014,3,"mori1");
	KaguTest2(30014,3,"mori2");
	KaguTest2(30014,3,"funsui");
	KaguTest2(30014,3,"moriboss");
	KaguTest2(30014,3,"moriura1");
	KaguTest2(30014,3,"moriura2");
	KaguTest2(30014,3,"spin1");
	KaguTest2(30014,3,"spin2");
	KaguTest2(30014,3,"spinboss");
	KaguTest2(30014,3,"spinura1");
	KaguTest2(30014,3,"spinura2");
	KaguTest2(30014,3,"egg1");
	KaguTest2(30014,3,"egg2");
	KaguTest2(30014,3,"eggboss");
	KaguTest2(30014,3,"eggura1");
	KaguTest2(30014,3,"eggura2");
	KaguTest2(30014,3,"great");
	KaguTest2(30014,3,"hakai");
	KaguTest2(30014,3,"ie2");
	KaguTest2(30014,3,"ie3");
	KaguTest2(30014,3,"ie4");
	KaguTest2(30014,3,"ie4_1");
	KaguTest2(30014,3,"ie4_2");
	KaguTest2(30014,3,"ie4_3");

	// 遷移計算呼び出し
	ch[420] = -3300;
	ch[421] = 1750;
	ch[422] = 0;
	ch[423] = 0;
	KaguTest(99988,0);
	ch[420] = -3300;
	ch[421] = -1750;
	ch[423] = 0;
	KaguTest(99988,1);
	ch[420] = 3300;
	ch[421] = 1750;
	ch[423] = 0;
	KaguTest(99988,2);
	ch[420] = 3300;
	ch[421] = -1750;
	ch[423] = 0;
	KaguTest(99988,3);
	KaguTest(99983,4);
//	KaguTest(99987,4);

	// カメラ位置
	KaguTest(99984,0);
	KaguTest(30033,200);
	Wait(30);
	ch[298] = 1;
	Black(0,0,15);
	SE(387);
	Wait(15);
	
	WaitC(165);
	
	ch[2522] = 1;

	Black(0,100,15);
	WaitC(15);
	Black(0,100,0);
	KaguTest(99984,-1);
	KaguTest(30033,100);
	KaguTest(99998,0);
	KaguTest(30033,100);
	LoadMapB(115);
	CharPos(0,0,300,0);
	ch[1107] = 2286;
	KaguTest(40003,111);
//	Mouse(0);
	PlayMovie("isk_1_3.txt",0);
//	Mouse(1);
//	KaguTest(20066,0);

//	Black(0,0,15);
//	Wait(15);

//	Black(0,0,15);

//	PostScr(1209);

	// オバケHome崩壊ムービー
//	KaguTest(10011,10);
//	Wait(10);
//	KaguTest(20025,0);
	SetWaku(1);
	PostScr(1210);

	return 0;
}

// Black Beanつぼ置く
#Script:01201
int main()
{
	KaguTest(20056,0);
	if (ch[420])
	{
		// 魔法のツボ扱い
		PostScr(1308);
		return 0;
	}

	Wait(30);
	KaguTest(20010,0);
	ch[421] = ch[420];
	if (ch[420] != 308 || !ch[2497])
	{
		ch[421] = 0;
		if (!ch[3974])
		{
			KaguTest(30076,5);
		}
		else
		{
			// 召喚中
			KaguTest2(20002,0,"You　can't　use　that　now.");
		}
	}
	if (!ch[420] || (ch[421] == 308 && ch[2497]) )
	{
		// 置けなかった
//		GetItem(55);
		Mes("You　can't　use　this　here.");
	}
	Wait(30);
}
#EndScript

// Black Bean呼び出す
#Script:01202
int main()
{
	ch[3974] = 25;
	ch[3966] = 180;
}
#EndScript

}
#EndScript

// 602裏：レバー引くとリフト動く
#Script:01204
int main()
{
	int bt15;
	int ln;
	
	ln = Lift2C(4);
	
	bt15 = Getbt15(ln);
	
	if (!bt15)
	{
		TekiStop(1);
		
		Wait(5);
		
		Black(0,100,10);
		Wait(10);
		
		SaveCamera();
		ch[420] = -1950;
		ch[421] = 7900;
		ch[422] = 1500;
		ch[423] = -2100;
		ch[424] = 11600;
		ch[425] = 170;
		KaguTest(30019,1);
		
		TekiStop(0);
		CrossFade();
		Wait(15);
		Black(0,0,10);
		Event(502);
		Wait(150);
		KaguTest(30019,0);
		RestoreCamera();
		TekiStop(1);
		CrossFade();
		Wait(15);
		TekiStop(0);
	}

}
#EndScript

//ゴールマップ行き↑方向 前半
#Script:01207
int main()
{

	MapEvent(0);

	Walk(0,8,11);

	Wait(11);

	{
		KaguTest(20010,0);
		if (ch[420] == 610)
		{
			ch[1000 + (ch[1096] * 2)] = 0;
			ch[1001 + (ch[1096] * 2)] = 0;
		}
	}
	Event(120);
}

// 115 -> クリア
#Script:01209
int main()
{
	KaguTest(40002,0);

	// クリア
	int a;
	a = ch[2286];
	
	TekiStop(1);
	MapEvent(0);
		// 評価表示
	KaguTest(10500,120);

	if (ch[2286] < 1)
	{
		ch[2286]=1;
	}
	
	Wait(90);
	
	Message(0,"","","","");

	// ミニフィールドへ戻る
	if (ch[512])
	{
		KaguTest(10011,1);
		Wait(1);
//		KaguTest(20025,0);

		if (!a)
		{
			ch[429] = 1;
			ch[397] = 1;
		}
		
		PostScr(1192);

//		Black(0,100,15);
//		Wait(15);
	}
	else
	{
		// オバケHome崩壊前
		KaguTest(10011,10);
		Wait(10);
		KaguTest(20025,0);
		PostScr(1210);
	}
}
#EndScript

// 105:ボスサップ倒した
#Script:01217
int main()
{
	Wait(60);
	
	// ボスラッシュ中？
	if (ch[2092])
	{
		// Mosby戦へ
		ch[2094] = 1;
		KaguTest(40002,0);
		
		Blur(0,0,0);
		TekiStop(1);
		KaguTest(100000,0);
		LoadMapB(505);
		Wait(5);
		Event(600);
		
		SetSavePos2(6,0,150,0);
		ch[1095] = 6;
		// ムービー救援
		KaguTest(20020,0);
		CharPos(40,-200000,0,0);
		CharPos(ch[425],0,0,300);
		CharPos(0,0,-1600,0);
		KaguTest(12011,ch[425]);
		ch[420] = 2;
		KaguTest(12012,ch[425]);

		Wait(5);
		Walk(0,1,1);
		KaguTest(30057,0);

		White(0,0,30);
		Wait(30);
		MMV("boss02.mmv");
		TekiStop(0);
		MapEvent(1);

		return 0;
	}

	KaguTest(20041,0);
	ch[421] = 0;
	KaguTest(30034,100);
	BGM(39);
	if (ch[507])
	{
		ch[423] = 0;
		ch[424] = 0;
		ch[425] = -80;
		KaguTest(30084,0);
		CrossFade();
		White(0,0,30);
		Wait(30);
	}
	else
	{
		ch[423] = 0;
		ch[424] = 0;
		ch[425] = 400;
		KaguTest(30081,0);
		KaguTest(30019,9);
		White(0,0,30);
		Wait(30);
		Wait(183);
		KaguTest(30019,0);
		KaguTest(30082,1887);
		CrossFade();
	}
}
#EndScript

// 206:Lassi (Roger)倒した
#Script:01219
int main()
{
	Wait(60);

	// ボスラッシュ中？
	if (ch[2092])
	{
		// Cream戦へ
		ch[2096] = 1;
		KaguTest(40002,0);
		
		Blur(0,0,0);
		TekiStop(1);
		KaguTest(100000,0);
		LoadMapB(606);
		Wait(5);
		Event(160);
		ch[300] = 1;
		
		SetSavePos2(6,0,150,0);
		ch[1095] = 6;
		// ムービー救援
		CharPos(0,0,2000,1050);

		KaguTest(20020,0);
//		CharPos(ch[425],0,-300,20);
		CharPos(ch[425],0,2300,1065);
		KaguTest(30028,ch[425]);
		
		Scop2(ch[425],1,"scop.it3");
		ch[300] = 1;

		KaguTest2(30013,50001,"fall_atari_ue");

		Look(ch[425],0);
		Look(0,ch[425]);

		Wait(5);
		Walk(0,1,1);
		KaguTest(30057,0);

		White(0,0,30);
		Wait(30);
		MMV("boss04.mmv");
		TekiStop(0);
		MapEvent(1);
		LiftEnable(0);

		return 0;
	}


	BGM(39);

	if (ch[1505])
	{
		KaguTest(30083,0);
		if (ch[455] != 1)
		{
			CharPos(ch[420],0,ch[422],ch[423]);
		}
		ch[421] = 0;
		KaguTest(30034,100);
		ch[423] = 0;
		ch[424] = 0;
		ch[425] = -120;
		KaguTest(30084,0);
		CrossFade();
		White(0,0,30);
		Wait(30);
	}
	else
	{
		KaguTest(30083,0);
		if (ch[455] != 1)
		{
			CharPos(ch[420],0,ch[422],ch[423]);
		}
		ch[421] = 0;
		KaguTest(30034,100);
		KaguTest(20041,0);
		ch[423] = 0;
		ch[424] = 0;
		ch[425] = 356;
		KaguTest(30081,0);
		KaguTest(30019,9);
		White(0,0,30);
		Wait(30);
		Wait(183);
		KaguTest(30019,0);
		KaguTest(30082,1887);
		CrossFade();
	}
}
#EndScript

int main()
{

		KaguTest2(30014,0,"@magicbelt2");

		ch[300] = 1;

		ch[1095] = 6;

//		CharPos(ch[425],0,-300,20);

		Look(ch[425],0);
		Look(0,ch[425]);

		Wait(30);

		return 0;
	}

	BGM(39);

	{

		ch[424] = 2775;
		ch[425] = 980;
		KaguTest(30084,0);
		CrossFade();
		White(0,0,30);

	else

		ch[423] = 0;
		ch[424] = 2775;
		ch[425] = 1460;

		Wait(183);

	}
}

// 306:王子戦開始
#Script:01224
int main()
{
	Wait(60);
	CharPos(58,-200000,0,0);
	CharPos(59,-200000,0,0);

	// ボスラッシュ中？
	if (ch[2092])
	{
		// 王子戦へ
		ch[2098] = 1;
		KaguTest(40002,0);
		
		Blur(0,0,0);
		TekiStop(1);
		KaguTest(100000,0);
		LoadMapB(306);
		ch[1096] = ch[1096] - 1;
		Wait(5);
		
		SetSavePos2(6,0,150,0);
		ch[1095] = 6;
		// ムービー救援
		KaguTest2(30014,0,"@tokaron");
		KaguTest2(30014,0,"@monyo");
		KaguTest2(30014,0,"@magicbelt1");
		KaguTest2(30014,0,"@magicbelt2");
		CharPos(12,-200000,0,0);
		CharPos(78,0,675,0);
		CharPos(0,0,-300,0);

		Event(160);
		LiftEnable(0);
		ch[300] = 1;
		ch[301] = 1;

		Wait(5);
		Walk(0,1,1);
		KaguTest(30057,0);

		White(0,0,30);
		Wait(30);
		MMV("boss06.mmv");
		TekiStop(0);
		MapEvent(1);

		return 0;
	}

//	White(0,0,30);
//	Wait(30);
	if (!ch[1571])
	{
		Mouse(0);
		KaguTest(20065,31);
		PlayMovie("kdo_3_3.txt",ch[2539]);
		Mouse(1);
	//	BGM(31);	// 仮
		CharPos(12,-200000,0,0);
		CharPos(78,0,675,0);
		ch[2539] = 1;
		SetSavePos2(306,-3150,-3375,-1125);
	}
	else
	{
		LoadMapB(306);
		KaguTest2(30014,0,"@tokaron");
		KaguTest2(30014,0,"@monyo");
		KaguTest2(30014,0,"@magicbelt1");
		KaguTest2(30014,0,"@magicbelt2");
		SetSavePos2(306,-3150,-3375,-1125);
		CharPos(12,-200000,0,0);
		CharPos(78,0,675,0);
		CharPos(0,0,-300,0);
		BGM(31);
	}

	Event(160);
	LiftEnable(0);
	ch[300] = 1;
	ch[301] = 1;
	Black(0,0,15);
	Wait(15);
//	Mes("王子戦闘予定");
//	Wait(60);
//	White(0,100,15);
//	Wait(15);
//	Event(106);
	MMV("boss06.mmv");
}
#EndScript

	ch[423] = -673;

	ch[427] = 0;

// 012:PinoイベントからＯＰへ
#Script:01232
int main()
{
	ch[442] = 1;
	Message(0,"..............","","","");
	Message(0,"It's　so　boring　here...","I　wish　there　were　kids　around...","","");
	
	ch[420] = 679;
	KaguTest(30128,-1);
	Wait(30);
	ch[420] = 679;
	KaguTest(30128,-1);
	
	ch[420] = 2300;
	ch[421] = 1086;
	KaguTest(30070,0);
	Message(0,"What's　that?","","","");
//	ch[420] = 679;
//	KaguTest(30128,-1);

	Black(0,100,30);
	Wait(15);
//	ch[420] = 679;
//	KaguTest(30100,-1);
	Wait(15);

	ch[2552] = 1;
	ch[508] = 0;
	Mouse(0);
//	KaguTest(20065,0);
	KaguTest(20065,-5);
	PlayMovie("open1_2.txt",0);
	Black(0,0,15);
//	Wait(15);

	LoadMapB(998);
	CharPos(0,-200000,0,0);
	SetWaku(1);
	BGM(0);
//	KaguTest(20065,0);
	PlayAVI("op.avi",0);

//	Mouse(1);
	Black(0,100,0);
	ch[508] = 0;
	PostScr(28);
	return 0;
}
#EndScript

// 607:エレベーター下から乗る
#Script:01233
int main()
{
	if (ch[300] == 2)
	{
		return 0;
	}
	
	ch[300] = 1;
	MapEvent(0);

	int x;
	int y;
	int z;
	int count;
	GetCharPos(0,x,y,z);

	count = 0;
	if (x > 100 || x < -100)
	{
		ch[424] = 0;
		ch[425] = -96;
		ch[426] = 36;
		KaguTest(30061,0);
		KaguTest(30060,0);
		while(ch[420])
		{
			Walk(ch[421],ch[422],ch[423]);
			Wait(ch[423]);
			KaguTest(30060,0);
			count++;
			
			if (count > 10)
			{
				// 最終手段・瞬間移動
				CharPos(0,ch[424],ch[425],ch[426]);
			}
		}

	}

	ch[424] = 0;
	ch[425] = -630;
	ch[426] = 12;
	KaguTest(30061,0);
	KaguTest(30060,0);
	count = 0;
	while(ch[420])
	{
		Walk(ch[421],ch[422],ch[423]);
		Wait(ch[423]);
		KaguTest(30060,0);

		count++;
		
		if (count > 10)
		{
			// 最終手段・瞬間移動
			CharPos(0,ch[424],ch[425],ch[426]);
		}
	}

	Event(153);
//	SE(390);
	ch[402] = 1;
	ch[420] = 0;
	ch[421] = -800;
	KaguTest(30070,0);
	KaguTest2(30017,1,"@p_null");
	Wait(240);
	ch[402] = 0;
	Wait(10);
	Event(155);
	KaguTest2(30017,0,"");
	Walk(0,-8,24);
	Wait(24);
	MapEvent(1);
}
#EndScript

// 607:エレベーター上から乗る
#Script:01234
int main()
{
	if (ch[300] == 2)
	{
		return 0;
	}

	ch[300] = 0;
	MapEvent(0);

	int count;

	ch[420] = 0;
	ch[421] = 800;
	KaguTest(30088,60);
	if (ch[422])
	{
		// カメラ強制移動
		Camera(0,0,360,5825);
		CrossFade();
	}

	ch[424] = 0;
	ch[425] = -630;
	ch[426] = 12;
	KaguTest(30061,0);
	KaguTest(30060,0);
	count = 0;
	while(ch[420])
	{
		Walk(ch[421],ch[422],ch[423]);
		Wait(ch[423]);
		KaguTest(30060,0);

		count++;
		
		if (count > 10)
		{
			// 最終手段・瞬間移動
			CharPos(0,ch[424],ch[425],ch[426]);
		}
	}
	Camera(-1,0,0,0);

	Event(154);
//	SE(390);
	ch[402] = 1;
	ch[420] = 0;
	ch[421] = 800;
	KaguTest(30070,0);
	KaguTest2(30017,1,"@p_null");
	Wait(240);
	ch[402] = 0;
	Wait(10);
	Event(156);
	KaguTest2(30017,0,"");
	Walk(0,8,32);
	Wait(32);
	MapEvent(1);
}
#EndScript

// 401:スポンサーイベント終了後山１にいけるようになる

int main()
{

	KaguTest2(30014,0,"@ClearORoot");
	KaguTest2(30014,2,"yama1");
	
	// 遷移計算呼び出し
	ch[422] = 75;
	ch[420] = -2575;
	ch[421] = -525;
	ch[423] = 90;
	KaguTest(99988,0);
	KaguTest(99987,1);
	
	ch[3203] = 1;

	// カメラ位置
	KaguTest(99996,16);
	KaguTest(30033,70);
	KaguTest(30032,-2500);
	Wait(30);
	Black(0,0,15);
	Wait(150);
	
	ch[2527] = 1;
	// オバケHomeに戻る＆ conversation続き
	Black(0,100,15);
	Wait(15);
	KaguTest(99998,0);
	KaguTest(30033,100);
	KaguTest(30032,0);
	LoadMap(401);
	Wait(15);
	CharPos(0,-50,600,0);
	Wait(5);
	Black(0,100,0);
	Black(0,0,30);
	MapEvent(1);

//	ch[294] = 1;
}
#EndScript

// 310:鍵穴連動関連
#Script:01238
int main()
{
	int kagi = 0;
	int mx;
	int my;

	SaveCamera();
	// カメラ位置
	if (ch[304] == 1)
	{
		// 右上
		ch[420] = 1180;
		ch[421] = 652;
		ch[422] = 350;
		ch[423] = 1870;
		ch[424] = 827;
		ch[425] = 107;
		mx = 1850;
		my = 825;
	}
	if (ch[304] == 2)
	{
		// 右下
		ch[420] = 1250;
		ch[421] = -571;
		ch[422] = 177;
		ch[423] = 1866;
		ch[424] = -812;
		ch[425] = 57;
		mx = 1850;
		my = -825;
	}
	if (ch[304] == 3)
	{
		// 左下
		ch[420] = 675;
		ch[421] = -710;
		ch[422] = 429;
		ch[423] = 205;
		ch[424] = -813;
		ch[425] = -42;
		mx = 250;
		my = -825;
	}
	if (ch[304] == 4)
	{
		// 左上
		ch[420] = 745;
		ch[421] = 640;
		ch[422] = 52;
		ch[423] = 205;
		ch[424] = 845;
		ch[425] = 182;
		mx = 250;
		my = 825;
	}
	// カメラアングル以外共通
//	KaguTest(30093,15);
	KaguTest(30019,1);
	CrossFade();
	Wait2(2);
	ch[420] = mx;
	ch[421] = my;
	KaguTest(30070,0);

	if (ch[300])
	{
		kagi++;
	}
	if (ch[301])
	{
		kagi++;
	}
	if (ch[302])
	{
		kagi++;
	}
	if (ch[303])
	{
		kagi++;
	}
	
	Event(514);
	ch[420] = 90;
	KaguTest(30126,388);

	ch[420] = mx;
	ch[421] = my;
	Wait2(10);
	KaguTest(30070,0);
	Wait2(10);
	KaguTest(30070,0);
	Wait2(10);
	KaguTest(30070,0);
	Wait2(10);
	if (ch[304] == 1)
	{
		// 右上
		ch[420] = 1057;
		ch[421] = 1548;
		ch[422] = 1021;
		ch[423] = 1051;
		ch[424] = 8;
		ch[425] = 107;
	}
	if (ch[304] == 2)
	{
		// 右下
		ch[420] = 1162;
		ch[421] = -1209;
		ch[422] = 457;
		ch[423] = 1051;
		ch[424] = 8;
		ch[425] = 107;
	}
	if (ch[304] == 3)
	{
		// 左下
		ch[420] = 935;
		ch[421] = -1047;
		ch[422] = 1155;
		ch[423] = 1051;
		ch[424] = 8;
		ch[425] = 107;
	}
	if (ch[304] == 4)
	{
		// 左上
		ch[420] = 670;
		ch[421] = 1322;
		ch[422] = 651;
		ch[423] = 1051;
		ch[424] = 8;
		ch[425] = 107;
	}
	KaguTest(30093,48);
	ch[420] = ch[423];
	ch[421] = ch[424];
	ch[422] = ch[425];
	KaguTest(30094,48);
	KaguTest(30019,15);
	Wait2(60);

	if (kagi == 1)
	{
		// 鍵一つ目
		KaguTest(30089,2);
	}
	if (kagi == 2)
	{
		// 鍵二つ目
		KaguTest(30089,4);
	}
	if (kagi == 3)
	{
		// 鍵三つ目
		KaguTest(30089,7);
	}
	if (kagi == 4)
	{
		// 鍵四つ目
		KaguTest(30089,9);
		Event(517);
	}
	Wait2(30);
	if (kagi == 4)
	{
		Event(527);
		Wait2(15);
		Event(504);
//		KaguTest(30019,9);
//		PostScr(1239);
	}
	else
	{
		KaguTest(30019,0);
		RestoreCamera();
		CrossFade();
		Wait2(15);
	}
}
#EndScript

// 502:あたりに触れると円盤発動
#Script:01241
int main()
{
	int c;
	int pt;
	
	ch[420] = 100000;
	ch[427] = 7;
	KaguTest(30015,1);
	KaguTest(30025,1);
	c = ch[420];
	ch[420] = 2;
	KaguTest(12005,c);
	KaguTest(12004,c);
	KaguTest(12011,c);
	ch[420] = 2;
	KaguTest(12012,c);
	pt = ch[420];
	ch[420] = -1;
	KaguTest(12002,c);
	SaveCamera();
	ch[420] = 650;
	ch[421] = 8079;
	ch[422] = 70;
	ch[423] = 650;
	ch[424] = 9050;
	ch[425] = -150;
	KaguTest(30019,1);
	CrossFade();
	Wait(25);

	Walk2(c,-19,0,33);
	ch[420] = 1;
	ch[421] = 1;
	ch[422] = 5;
	KaguTest(12003,c);
	Wait(45);
	
	KaguTest(30019,0);
	RestoreCamera();
	CrossFade();
	Wait(15);
	ch[420] = pt;
	KaguTest(12002,c);
	KaguTest(30090,c);

	ch[420] = 3;
	KaguTest(12005,c);
//	ch[420] = 0;
//	KaguTest(12012,c);
}
#EndScript

// 502:宝箱開けると敵に見つかる
#Script:01242
int main()
{
	int c;
	int pt;
	
	TekiStop(1);
	Wait(45);
	
	KaguTest(30025,2);
	c = ch[420];
	ch[427] = 7;
	ch[420] = 100000;
	KaguTest(30015,2);
	KaguTest(12004,c);
	pt = ch[420];
	KaguTest(12000,c);
	KaguTest(12000,c+1);

	ch[420] = -1350;
	ch[421] = 13283;
	ch[422] = 239;
	ch[423] = -1350;
	ch[424] = 11350;
	ch[425] = 0;
	KaguTest(30093,15);
	KaguTest(30019,14);
	CrossFade();

	ch[424] = -1375;
	ch[425] = 11250;
	ch[426] = 12;
	KaguTest(30061,0);
	KaguTest(30060,c);
	ch[423] = ch[423] * 2;
	Walk2(c,ch[421]/2,ch[422]/2,ch[423]);
	ch[429] = 0;
	KaguTest(30039,0);
	Walk2(c+1,ch[421]/2,ch[422]/2,ch[423]);
	KaguTest(30039,0);
	Wait(ch[423]);
	Look(c,0);
	Look(c+1,0);
	ch[420] = pt;
	KaguTest(12002,c);
	KaguTest(12002,c+1);
	ch[420] = 3;
	KaguTest(12005,c);
	KaguTest(12005,c+1);

	TekiStop(0);
	Wait(30);
	KaguTest(30019,0);

}
#EndScript

// ステージJunk発生（出現高さ補正＋４０）（コンティニュー時には出さない）
// ch[420]発生させたい掘削ポイント
// ch[421]Junk数
#Script:01243
int main()
{
	int grnum;
	int i;
	
	// コンティニュー時には出さない
	if(ch[1097])
	{
		return 0;
	}
	
	grnum = ch[421];
	KaguTest(60004,ch[420]);
	ch[422] = ch[422] + 40;
	ch[423] = 0;
	
//	for (i = 0;i < grnum;i++)
//	{
//		KaguTest(40004,0);
//	}
}
