// 112:初スライム
#Script:01244
int main()
{
	ch[2120] = 1;
	int x;
	int y;
	int z;
	GetCharPos(58,x,y,z);
	KaguTest(30122,58);
	if (x < -20000 || ch[420])
	{
		// Phantom死んでる
		return 0;
	}
	
	TekiStop(1);
	Look(0,58);
//	Camera(0,-150,50,370);
	Camera(58,-150,1450,370);
	Wait(45);
	Camera(0,-150,50,370);
	Wait(10);
	Message(0,"That's　a　phantom，　huh?","","","");
//	ch[420] = 15;
//	ch[421] = 60;
//	KaguTest(30053,58);
//	Wait(30);
	Camera(-1,0,0,0);
	TekiStop(0);
}
#EndScript

// 112:初鎧スライム
#Script:01245
int main()
{
	int keihou;
	keihou = 0;
	ch[301] = 1;
	TekiStop(1);
	int ln;
	int i;
	ln = Door2C(2);
	Camera(ln,350,4075,300);
	Walk(0,8,10);
	CrossFade();
	Wait(30);
	
	for (i = 0;i < 4;i++)
	{
		if (keihou < 2)
		{
			SE(519);
			keihou++;
		}
		if (i == 2)
		{
			Look(0,ln);
		}
		ch[420] = 100;
		ch[421] = 50;
		ch[422] = 50;
		KaguTest(30046,15);
		Wait(10);
		if (i == 3)
		{
			ln = Door2C(1);
			Look(0,59);
			Camera(59,-575,3735,305);
			CrossFade();
			Walk2(59,-10,0,60);
			ch[420] = 15;
			ch[429] = 1;
			KaguTest(30036,59);
		}
		Wait(5);
		ch[420] = 100;
		ch[421] = 100;
		ch[422] = 100;
		KaguTest(30046,15);
		Wait(10);
		if (i == 0)
		{
			// エモ出し
			// きょろきょろ
			ch[420] = 15;
			ch[428] = 0;
			ch[429] = 1;
			KaguTest(30036,0);
			KaguTest(30019,12);
		}
		if (i == 1)
		{
			KaguTest(30019,0);
			Event(301);
		}
		Wait(5);
	}
	Event(302);
	Wait(40);
	Look(59,0);
	Look(0,59);
	Wait(10);
	Camera(-1,0,0,0);
	CrossFade();
	Wait(10);
	ch[420] = 1;
	ch[421] = 1;
	ch[422] = 1;
	KaguTest(30090,59);
	
	TekiStop(0);
	

	return 0;
}
#EndScript

// 112:鎧スライム倒したら扉開く
#Script:01246
int main()
{
	ch[302] = 1;
	TekiStop(1);
	Wait(10);
	SE(950);
	SaveCamera();
//	Camera(Door2C(2),350,4075,300);
//	CrossFade();
//	Wait(20);
	Event(303);
//	Wait(45);
	Camera(Door2C(1),-575,3735,285);
	CrossFade();
	Wait(20);
	Event(304);
	Wait(60);
	Camera(-1,0,0,0);
	RestoreCamera();
	CrossFade();
	TekiStop(0);
}
#EndScript

// 103:敵倒してしまった場合
#Script:01247
int main()
{
	ch[300] = 1;
	ch[420] = 100000;
	ch[427] = 7;
	KaguTest(30015,2);
	KaguTest(30015,3);
}
#EndScript

// 104裏：火が全部点いていれば扉開ける
#Script:01250
int main()
{
	int ln;
	
	if (!ch[304] && (ch[300] || ch[301]))
	{
		ch[304] = 1;
		ch[420] = 100000;
		ch[427] = 3;
		KaguTest(30015,3);
	}
	if (!ch[305] && (ch[301] || ch[302]))
	{
		ch[305] = 1;
		ch[420] = 100000;
		ch[427] = 3;
		KaguTest(30015,4);
	}
	if (!ch[306] && (ch[302] || ch[303]))
	{
		ch[306] = 1;
		ch[420] = 100000;
		ch[427] = 3;
		KaguTest(30015,5);
	}
	if (!ch[307] && (ch[303] || ch[300]))
	{
		ch[307] = 1;
		ch[420] = 100000;
		ch[427] = 3;
		KaguTest(30015,2);
	}
	
	if (!ch[300] || !ch[301] || !ch[302] || !ch[303])
	{
		return 0;
	}

	SaveCamera();
	
	TekiStop(1);
	ln = Door2C(2);
	Wait(20);
	Camera(ln,-150,-2310,-263);
	CrossFade();
	Wait(30);
	Event(209);
	Wait(45);
	Camera(-1,0,0,0);
	RestoreCamera();
	CrossFade();
	Wait(15);
		
	TekiStop(0);
}
#EndScript

//		Wait(1);

	KaguTest(30072,0);

	ch[421] = -2081;

	ch[423] = -240;
	ch[424] = -2082;

// 113裏：あたりに触れたら敵がとげ鉄球転がしてくる
#Script:01253
int main()
{
	int c1;
	
	ch[300] = 1;

	TekiStop(1);
	SaveCamera();
	KaguTest(30025,1);
	c1 = ch[420];

	ch[420] = 2;
	KaguTest(12005,c1);
	
	Look(0,c1);
	ch[420] = 15;
	ch[429] = 1;
	KaguTest(30036,0);
	Wait(30);

	ch[420] = -1600;
	ch[421] = 1200;
	ch[422] = 740;
	ch[423] = -2756;
	ch[424] = 1200;
	ch[425] = 700;
	KaguTest(30093,30);
	KaguTest(30019,14);
	Wait(30);

	// カメラ設定
	ch[420] = -1600;
	ch[421] = 1200;
	ch[422] = 740;
	ch[423] = -2756;
	ch[424] = 1425;
	ch[425] = 700;
	KaguTest(30093,14);

	// 一つ目とげとげ出すへ
	KaguTest(30061,0);
	ch[424] = -2700;
	ch[425] = 1425;
	ch[426] = 12;
	KaguTest(30060,c1);
	Walk2(c1,ch[421],ch[422],ch[423] + 5);
	Wait(2);
	ch[421] = 11;
	ch[422] = 1;
	KaguTest(30037,c1);
	Wait(17);
		// カメラ設定
		ch[420] = -1600;
		ch[421] = 1200;
		ch[422] = 740;
		ch[423] = -2756;
		ch[424] = 875;
		ch[425] = 700;
		KaguTest(30093,70);
	// 二つ目へ
	KaguTest(30061,0);
	ch[424] = -2700;
	ch[425] = 1315;
	ch[426] = 12;
	KaguTest(30060,c1);
	Walk2(c1,ch[421],ch[422],ch[423]);
	Wait(2);
	ch[420] = 100000;
	ch[427] = 1;
	KaguTest(30015,2);
	ch[420] = 0;
	KaguTest(30095,c1);
	ch[421] = 11;
	ch[422] = 1;
	KaguTest(30037,c1);
	Wait(12);
	// 三つ目へ
	KaguTest(30061,0);
	ch[424] = -2700;
	ch[425] = 1205;
	ch[426] = 12;
	KaguTest(30060,c1);
	Walk2(c1,ch[421],ch[422],ch[423]);
	Wait(2);
	ch[420] = 100000;
	ch[427] = 1;
	KaguTest(30015,3);
	ch[420] = 0;
	KaguTest(30095,c1);
	ch[421] = 11;
	ch[422] = 1;
	KaguTest(30037,c1);
	Wait(12);
	// 四つ目へ
	KaguTest(30061,0);
	ch[424] = -2700;
	ch[425] = 1095;
	ch[426] = 12;
	KaguTest(30060,c1);
	Walk2(c1,ch[421],ch[422],ch[423]);
	Wait(2);
	ch[420] = 100000;
	ch[427] = 1;
	KaguTest(30015,4);
	ch[420] = 0;
	KaguTest(30095,c1);
	ch[421] = 11;
	ch[422] = 1;
	KaguTest(30037,c1);
	Wait(12);
	// 五つ目へ
	KaguTest(30061,0);
	ch[424] = -2700;
	ch[425] = 985;
	ch[426] = 12;
	KaguTest(30060,c1);
	Walk2(c1,ch[421],ch[422],ch[423]);
	Wait(2);
	ch[420] = 100000;
	ch[427] = 1;
	KaguTest(30015,5);
	ch[420] = 0;
	KaguTest(30095,c1);
	ch[421] = 11;
	ch[422] = 1;
	KaguTest(30037,c1);
	Wait(12);
	// 遠ざかる
	KaguTest(30061,0);
	ch[424] = -2700;
	ch[425] = 875;
	ch[426] = 12;
	KaguTest(30060,c1);
	Walk2(c1,ch[421],ch[422],ch[423]);
	Wait(2);
	ch[420] = 100000;
	ch[427] = 1;
	KaguTest(30015,6);
	ch[420] = 1;
	KaguTest(30095,c1);
	ch[421] = 15;
	ch[422] = 1;
	KaguTest(30037,c1);
	Wait(12);
	Look(c1,0);
	Wait(5);
	// ハートマーク
	ch[420] = 13;
	ch[429] = 1;
	KaguTest(30036,c1);
	Wait(45);
	
	// 逃げる
	KaguTest(30061,0);
	ch[424] = -2700;
	ch[425] = 450;
	ch[426] = 12;
	KaguTest(30060,c1);
	Walk2(c1,ch[421],ch[422],ch[423] + 10);
	ch[427] = ch[423];
	// カメラ設定
	ch[420] = -1600;
	ch[421] = 1200;
	ch[422] = 1040;
	ch[423] = -2756;
	ch[424] = 450;
	ch[425] = 700;
	KaguTest(30093,ch[427]);
	Wait(ch[427] + 10);
	Look(c1,0);
	Wait(30);
	
	ch[420] = 400;
	ch[421] = 1200;
	ch[422] = 965;
	ch[423] = -2700;
	ch[424] = 1200;
	ch[425] = 600;
	KaguTest(30019,1);
	CrossFade();
	Wait(30);
	TekiStop(0);
	Wait(30);
	KaguTest(30019,0);
	RestoreCamera();
	CrossFade();
	Wait(15);
	ch[420] = 3;
	KaguTest(12005,c1);
	ch[420] = 8;
	ch[421] = 100;
	KaguTest(30092,c1);
}
#EndScript

// 104:敵運んでくる
#Script:01255
int main()
{
	int tmp1;
	int tmp2;
	// Parin少し前に進みながら敵が運ばれてくる
	KaguTest(30061,0);
	ch[424] = 150;
	ch[425] = -2300;
	ch[426] = 12;
	KaguTest(30060,0);
	Walk(ch[421],ch[422],ch[423]);
	tmp1 = ch[423];
	ch[420] = 150;
	ch[421] = -2700;
	ch[422] = 950;
	ch[423] = 150;
	ch[424] = -1554;
	ch[425] = -430;
	KaguTest(30093,60);
	KaguTest(30019,14);

	tmp2 = 60;	
	if (tmp1 < tmp2)
	{
		Wait(tmp1);
		ch[420] = 150;
		ch[421] = -1000;
		KaguTest(30070,0);
		tmp2 = tmp2 - tmp1;
		tmp1 = 0;
	}
	else
	{
		tmp1 = tmp1 - tmp2;
	}
	Wait(tmp2);
	// こうもり発生
	ch[420] = 100000;
	ch[421] = 7;
	KaguTest(30015,78);
	
	int pt[4];
	int c;
	KaguTest(30025,78);
	c = ch[420];
	int i;
	for (i = 0;i < 4;i++)
	{
		ch[420] = 2;
		KaguTest(12005,c + i);
//		pt[i] = ch[420];
//		KaguTest(12000,c + i);
	}
	
	tmp2 = 150 - tmp1;
	Wait(tmp1);
	ch[420] = 150;
	ch[421] = -1000;
	KaguTest(30070,0);
	// カメラ移動
	ch[420] = 475;
	ch[421] = -3300;
	ch[422] = 375;
	ch[423] = 150;
	ch[424] = -1550;
	ch[425] = -50;
	KaguTest(30093,0);
	ch[420] = 150;
	ch[421] = -1850;
	ch[422] = 20;
	ch[423] = 150;
	ch[424] = -1850;
	ch[425] = 20;
	KaguTest(30094,tmp2-30);
	KaguTest(30019,14);
	KaguTest(30025,78);
	ch[421] = ch[420];
	ch[420] = -1;
	KaguTest(30098,ch[421] + 1);
	KaguTest(30098,ch[421] + 3);
	Wait(tmp2 + 30);
	KaguTest(30019,0);
	CrossFade();
	Wait(15);
	KaguTest(30025,78);
	ch[421] = ch[420];
	ch[420] = 0;
	KaguTest(30098,ch[421] + 1);
	KaguTest(30098,ch[421] + 3);

	for (i = 0;i < 4;i++)
	{
		ch[420] = 3;
		KaguTest(12005,c + i);
//		ch[420] = pt[i];
//		KaguTest(12002,c + i);
	}
}
#EndScript

// 507:ファイア台座教える
#Script:01259
int main()
{
	int x;
	int y;
	int z;
	int ax;
	int ay;
	int az;
	
	KaguTest(30005,0);
	x = ch[421];
	y = ch[422];
	z = ch[423];
	KaguTest(30068,0);
	ax = ch[423];
	ay = ch[424];
	az = ch[425];

	Message(0,"How　do　you　open　this?","","","");
	ch[420] = 40;
	ch[421] = 496;
	ch[422] = 236;
	ch[423] = -200;
	ch[424] = 1050;
	ch[425] = 0;
	KaguTest(30093,15);
	ch[420] = -200;
	ch[421] = 1050;
	ch[422] = 0;
	KaguTest(30094,15);
	KaguTest(30019,15);
	CrossFade();
	ch[420] = -200;
	ch[421] = 1050;
	KaguTest(30070,0);
	ch[420] = 0;
	ch[421] = 1;
	ch[422] = 5;
	KaguTest(12003,0);
	Wait(5);
	ch[420] = 2;
	ch[421] = 1;
	ch[422] = 5;
	KaguTest(12003,0);
	Wait(45);

	ch[420] = -40;
	ch[421] = 496;
	ch[422] = 236;
	ch[423] = 200;
	ch[424] = 1050;
	ch[425] = 0;
	KaguTest(30093,30);
	ch[420] = 200;
	ch[421] = 1050;
	ch[422] = 0;
	KaguTest(30094,30);
	KaguTest(30019,15);
	ch[420] = 200;
	ch[421] = 1050;
	KaguTest(30070,0);
	ch[420] = 0;
	ch[421] = 1;
	ch[422] = 5;
	KaguTest(12003,0);
	Wait(7);
	ch[420] = 2;
	ch[421] = 1;
	ch[422] = 5;
	KaguTest(12003,0);
	Wait(45);
	
	ch[420] = x;
	ch[421] = y;
	ch[422] = z;
	ch[423] = ax;
	ch[424] = ay;
	ch[425] = az;
	KaguTest(30093,15);
	ch[420] = ax;
	ch[421] = ay;
	ch[422] = az;
	KaguTest(30094,15);
	KaguTest(30019,15);
	CrossFade();
	Wait(15);
	KaguTest(30019,0);
	Message(0,"Strange　torches...","","","");
}
#EndScript

// 507:ファイア台座チェック
#Script:01260
int main()
{
	int a;
	int b;
	KaguTest(20031,0);
	KaguTest(20030,ch[421]);
	a = ch[420];
	KaguTest(20031,1);
	KaguTest(20030,ch[421]);
	b = ch[420];
	
	if (a && b)
	{
		// 両方とも火がついている
		Wait(15);
		SE(950);
		Camera(Door2C(1),0,50,565);
		CrossFade();
		Wait(25);
		Event(303);
		Wait(45);
		Camera(-1,0,0,0);
		CrossFade();
		Wait(15);
		ch[300] = 1;
		ch[420] = 0;
		ch[421] = 1225;
		KaguTest(30011,0);
		ch[2076] = 1;
	}
}
#EndScript

// 504:あたりに触れると角が現れる
#Script:01262
int main()
{
	int c;
	int pt1;
	int pt2;
	int x;
	int y;
	int z;
	
	// 出現
	ch[420] = 100000;
	ch[427] = 6;
	KaguTest(30015,1);
	KaguTest(30025,1);
	c = ch[420];
	// PT取得
	KaguTest(12004,c);
	pt1 = ch[420];
	KaguTest(12004,c+1);
	pt2 = ch[420];
	// ちゃんと同期が取れるようにＮＰＣモードに変更
	KaguTest(12000,c);
	KaguTest(12000,c+1);
	// 重力なし、壁なし
	ch[420] = 0;
	KaguTest(30041,c);
	KaguTest(30041,c+1);
	ch[420] = 1;
	KaguTest(30097,c);
	KaguTest(30097,c+1);
	// カメラを向ける
	ch[420] = -161;
	ch[421] = 2206;
	ch[422] = 109;
	ch[423] = -1094;
	ch[424] = 2742;
	ch[425] = 296;
	KaguTest(30093,30);
	ch[420] = -1094;
	ch[421] = 2742;
	ch[422] = 296;
	KaguTest(30094,30);
	KaguTest(30019,15);
	Wait(45);
	// とび下りてくる
	Walk2(c,60,0,15);
	Wait(3);
	ch[422] = 1;
	ch[421] = 15;
	KaguTest(30037,c);	// ジャンプ
	ch[420] = 1;
	KaguTest(30041,c);
	Wait(7);

	Walk2(c+1,12,0,15);
	Wait(3);
	ch[422] = 1;
	ch[421] = 15;
	KaguTest(30037,c+1);	// ジャンプ
	ch[420] = 1;
	KaguTest(30041,c+1);
		// カメラ
	ch[420] = -66;
	ch[421] = 2151;
	ch[422] = 449;
	ch[423] = -1093;
	ch[424] = 2741;
	ch[425] = 45;
	KaguTest(30093,15);
	KaguTest(30019,14);
	Wait(30);
	KaguTest(30019,0);
	CrossFade();
	Wait(15);
	// PT設定
	ch[420] = pt1;
	KaguTest(12002,c);
	ch[420] = pt2;
	KaguTest(12002,c+1);
	// ちゃんと同期が取れるようにＮＰＣモードに変更
	ch[420] = 3;
	KaguTest(12005,c);
	KaguTest(12005,c+1);
	// 壁抜けオフ
	ch[420] = 0;
	KaguTest(30097,c);
	KaguTest(30097,c+1);
}
#EndScript

// 504:円盤倒したらスライム出てくる
#Script:01263
int main()
{
	int c;
	int x;
	int y;
	int z;
	KaguTest(30025,3);
	c = ch[420];
	GetCharPos(0,x,y,z);
	CharPos(c,-x - 100000,y + 500,z + 150);
	CharPos(c+1,-x - 100000 + 433,y - 250,z + 150);
	CharPos(c+2,-x - 100000 - 433,y - 250,z + 150);
	ch[420] = 100000;
	ch[427] = 0;
	KaguTest(30015,3);
}
#EndScript

// 503裏：あたりに触れると間抜け魚人出てくる
#Script:01264
int main()
{
	int c;
	int pt1;
	int pt2;

	// あたり消す
	ch[420] = 350;
	KaguTest2(30003,2,"Box01");

	TekiStop(1);

	// 敵準備
	ch[420] = 100000;
	ch[427] = 7;
	KaguTest(30015,1);
	KaguTest(30025,1);
	c = ch[420];
	KaguTest(12004,c);
	pt1 = ch[420];
	KaguTest(12004,c+1);
	pt2 = ch[420];
	KaguTest(12000,c);
	KaguTest(12000,c+1);
	ch[420] = 1;
	KaguTest(30097,c);
	KaguTest(30097,c+1);
	ch[420] = 450;
	ch[421] = 8550;
	KaguTest(30070,c);
	
	// プレイヤー動かす
	ch[424] = 1019;
	ch[425] = 8364;
	ch[426] = 12;
	KaguTest(30061,0);
	KaguTest(30060,0);
	Walk(ch[421],ch[422],30);
	
	// カメラも動く
	ch[420] = 1310;
	ch[421] = 9336;
	ch[422] = 399;
	ch[423] = 1019;
	ch[424] = 8364;
	ch[425] = -4;
	KaguTest(30093,30);
	KaguTest(30019,14);
	
	Wait(30);
	
	// 一匹目飛び掛る
	Walk2(c,21,0,25);
	ch[429] = 1;
	KaguTest(30039,0);
	Wait(5);
	ch[420] = 24;
	ch[421] = 1;
	ch[422] = 5;
	KaguTest(12003,c);
	Wait(3);
	ch[421] = 30;
	ch[422] = 1;
	KaguTest(30037,c);
	Wait(45);
	ch[420] = 2010;
	ch[429] = 1;
	KaguTest(30036,c);
	ch[420] = 2009;
	ch[429] = 1;
	KaguTest(30036,0);
	Wait(40);
	ch[420] = 4;
	ch[429] = 1;
	KaguTest(30036,c);
	Wait(30);
	Walk2(c,0,5,45);
	ch[429] = 0;
	KaguTest(30039,0);

	ch[420] = 1276;
	ch[421] = 9046;
	ch[422] = 179;
	ch[423] = 994;
	ch[424] = 8362;
	ch[425] = 46;
	KaguTest(30093,45);

	Wait(15);
	
	// 二匹目突撃
	ch[420] = 100000;
	ch[427] = 7;
	KaguTest(30015,2);
	ch[420] = 450;
	ch[421] = 8550;
	KaguTest(30070,c+1);
	Walk2(c+1,21,0,25);
	ch[429] = 1;
	KaguTest(30039,0);
	Wait(5);
	ch[420] = 24;
	ch[421] = 1;
	ch[422] = 5;
	KaguTest(12003,c+1);
	Wait(3);
	ch[421] = 30;
	ch[422] = 1;
	KaguTest(30037,c+1);
	Wait(15);
	// ヒット！
	ch[420] = 93;
	ch[421] = 1;
	ch[422] = 5;
	KaguTest(12003,c);
	Wait(5);
	GetCharPos(c,ch[420],ch[421],ch[422]);
	ch[422] = ch[422] + 100;
	ch[423] = 1637;
	ch[424] = 1;
	ch[425] = 0;
	ch[426] = 0;
	ch[427] = 100;
	ch[428] = 0;
	KaguTest(30045,0);
	Wait(25);
	ch[420] = 2010;
	ch[429] = 1;
	KaguTest(30036,c+1);
	Wait(30);
	// もめる
//	ch[420] = 0;
//	ch[421] = 1;
//	ch[422] = 5;
//	KaguTest(12003,c);
	ch[420] = 2;
	ch[421] = 1;
	ch[422] = 5;
	KaguTest(12003,c+1);
	Look(c,c+1);
//	Wait(5);
//	ch[420] = 2;
//	ch[421] = 1;
//	ch[422] = 5;
//	KaguTest(12003,c);
//	Wait(20);
	ch[420] = 9;	// 怒り
	ch[429] = 1;
	KaguTest(30036,c);
	Wait(60);
	
//	if (0)
//	{
//		ch[420] = 11;	// ピンチ
//		KaguTest(30036,c+1);
//		Walk2(c+1,0,-3,60);

//		ch[421] = 9144;
//		ch[422] = 398;
//		ch[423] = 991;

//		ch[425] = -3;

//
//		Wait(60);
//		ch[420] = 12;	// ひらめき
//		KaguTest(30036,c+1);
//		Wait(45);
//		ch[420] = 8;	// はてな
//		KaguTest(30036,c);
//		Wait(45);
//		ch[420] = 15;	// ！
//		KaguTest(30036,c+1);
//		ch[420] = 6;
//		ch[421] = 1;
//		ch[422] = 5;
//		KaguTest(12003,c+1);
//		
//		ch[420] = 980;
//		ch[421] = 9433;

//		ch[423] = 988;

//		KaguTest(30036,c);
//		Wait(20);
//	}
//	else
//	{
//		Wait(30);

//		KaguTest(30036,c);
//		Wait(60);
//	}

	Look(c,0);
	Look(c+1,0);
	Wait(10);
//	ch[420] = 6;
//	ch[421] = 1;
//	ch[422] = 5;
//	KaguTest(12003,c);

//	ch[420] = 1150;
//	ch[421] = 10007;

//	ch[423] = 1035;
//	ch[424] = 8751;
//	ch[425] = 21;
//	KaguTest(30093,20);

//	Wait(30);
//	ch[420] = 15;	// ！
//	KaguTest(30036,0);
//	Wait(30);
	// 矛先はプレイヤーに
	
	// 後始末
	KaguTest(30019,0);
	ch[420] = 3;
	KaguTest(12005,c);
	KaguTest(12005,c+1);
	ch[420] = pt1;
	KaguTest(12002,c);
	ch[420] = pt2;
	KaguTest(12002,c+1);
	ch[420] = 0;
	KaguTest(30097,c);
	KaguTest(30097,c+1);
	TekiStop(0);
}

// 205:玉転がさずにわたった
#Script:01269
int main()
{
	ch[420] = 9999;
	KaguTest2(30003,2,"tekiatari1");
	
	KaguTest2(30016,0,"4545L");
	
	Wait(30);
	
	SaveCamera();
	
	ch[420] = 1859;
	ch[421] = 1546;
	ch[422] = 50;
	ch[423] = 1680;
	ch[424] = 3671;
	ch[425] = -304;
	KaguTest(30019,1);
	CrossFade();
	Wait(45);
	
	Ksk(1);	// 揺れはここでリセットされるはず
	KaguTest(60004,1);
	ch[423] = 0;
	KaguTest(40004,0);
	KaguTest(40004,0);
	KaguTest(40004,0);
	KaguTest(40004,0);
	KaguTest(40004,0);
	KaguTest(40004,0);
	KaguTest(40004,0);
	KaguTest(40004,0);
	KaguTest(40004,0);
	Wait(45);
	
	KaguTest(30019,0);
	RestoreCamera();
	CrossFade();
	Wait(15);
}
#EndScript

// 205裏：301:309:305:211:火飾台点ける
#Script:01270
int main()
{
	KaguTest(20010,0);
	if (ch[420] == 305)
	{
		KaguTest(20031,0);
		ch[420] = 0;
		KaguTest(20045,ch[421]);
		KaguTest(20045,ch[421]+1);
		KaguTest(20045,ch[421]+2);
		return 0;
	}
	if (ch[420] == 301)
	{
		KaguTest(20031,0);
		ch[420] = 0;
		KaguTest(20045,ch[421]);
		return 0;
	}
	if (ch[420] == 211)
	{
		KaguTest(20031,0);
		ch[420] = 2;
		KaguTest(20045,ch[421]);
		return 0;
	}
	
	// それ以外
	KaguTest(20031,0);
	ch[420] = 0;
	KaguTest(20045,ch[421]);
}
#EndScript

// 205裏：火飾台消すと敵沸く
#Script:01271
int main()
{
	ch[251] = 1;
	int keihou;
	keihou = 0;
	TekiStop(1);
	Wait(15);
	Camera(0,-1680,-3290,-435);
	CrossFade();
	
	int i;
	
	for(i = 0;i < 4;i++)
	{
		if (keihou < 2)
		{
			keihou++;
			SE(519);
		}
		ch[420] = 100;
		ch[421] = 50;
		ch[422] = 50;
		KaguTest(30046,15);
		Wait(15);
		ch[420] = 100;
		ch[421] = 100;
		ch[422] = 100;
		KaguTest(30046,15);
		Wait(10);
		if (i == 0)
		{
			// エモ出し
			// きょろきょろ
			ch[420] = 15;
			ch[428] = 0;
			ch[429] = 1;
			KaguTest(30036,0);
			KaguTest(30019,12);
		}
		if (i == 1)
		{
			KaguTest(30019,0);
		}
		if (i == 2)
		{
			ch[420] = 100000;
			ch[427] = 1;
			KaguTest(30015,2);
			Look(0,59);
			int c;
			KaguTest(30025,2);
			c = ch[420];
			KaguTest(12011,c);
			KaguTest(12011,c+1);
			ch[420] = 2;
			KaguTest(12012,c);
			KaguTest(12012,c+1);
		}
		Wait(5);
	}
	Camera(-1,0,0,0);
	CrossFade();
	TekiStop(0);
}
#EndScript

// 202裏：宝箱開けると敵が水の中から現れる
#Script:01272
int main()
{
	SaveCamera();
	ch[301] = 1;
	
	Wait(60);
	
	ch[420] = 2273;
	ch[421] = 6925;
	ch[422] = 506;
	ch[423] = 1270;
	ch[424] = 6688;
	ch[425] = -242;
	KaguTest(30019,1);
	CrossFade();
	Wait(10);
	ch[420] = 100000;
	ch[427] = 7;
	KaguTest(30015,1);
	KaguTest(30025,1);
	int c;
	c = ch[420];
	ch[420] = 2;
	KaguTest(12005,c);
	KaguTest(12005,c+1);
	KaguTest(12005,c+2);
	Wait(5);
	Walk2(c,10,0,20);
	ch[429] = 0;
	KaguTest(30039,0);
	Walk2(c+1,3,-7,20);
	KaguTest(30039,0);
	Walk2(c+2,3,7,20);
	KaguTest(30039,0);
	ch[421] = 60;
	ch[422] = 1;
	KaguTest(30037,c);
	KaguTest(30037,c+1);
	KaguTest(30037,c+2);
	KaguTest(20047,0);
	Look(0,c);
	ch[420] = 15;
	ch[429] = 1;
	KaguTest(30036,0);
	ch[420] = 1425;
	ch[421] = 6770;
	ch[422] = -35;
	ch[423] = 171;
	ch[424] = 0;
	ch[425] = 0;
	ch[426] = 0;
	ch[427] = 100;
	ch[428] = 0;
	KaguTest(30045,0);
	ch[421] = 6675;
	KaguTest(30045,0);
	ch[421] = 6862;
	KaguTest(30045,0);
	Wait(20);
	Look(c,0);
	Look(c+1,0);
	Look(c+2,0);
	Wait(20);

	KaguTest(30019,0);
	RestoreCamera();
	CrossFade();
	Wait(15);
	ch[420] = 3;
	KaguTest(12005,c);
	KaguTest(12005,c+1);
	KaguTest(12005,c+2);
	ch[420] = 1;
	ch[421] = 1;
	ch[422] = 1;
	KaguTest(30090,c);
	KaguTest(30090,c+1);
	KaguTest(30090,c+2);
}
#EndScript

// 604:あたりに触れるとスライム振ってくる
#Script:01275
int main()
{
	SaveCamera();
	ch[420] = 2891;
	ch[421] = 4250;
	ch[422] = 110;
	ch[423] = 3246;
	ch[424] = 5721;
	ch[425] = 846;
	KaguTest(30093,30);
	KaguTest(30019,14);
	
	ch[420] = 100000;
	ch[427] = 6;
	KaguTest(30015,1);
	KaguTest(30025,1);
	int c;
	c = ch[420];
	ch[420] = 0;
	KaguTest(30041,c);
	KaguTest(30041,c+1);
	KaguTest(30041,c+2);
	int pt1;
	int pt2;
	int pt3;
	KaguTest(12004,c);
	pt1 = ch[420];
	KaguTest(12004,c+1);
	pt2 = ch[420];
	KaguTest(12004,c+2);
	pt3 = ch[420];
	KaguTest(12000,c);
	KaguTest(12000,c+1);
	KaguTest(12000,c+2);
	ch[420] = 1;
	KaguTest(30097,c);
	KaguTest(30097,c+1);
	KaguTest(30097,c+2);
	
	Wait(30);

	Walk2(c,-8,-20,30);
	ch[429] = 0;
	KaguTest(30039,0);
	Wait(2);
	ch[421] = 20;
	ch[422] = 1;
	KaguTest(30037,c);
	ch[420] = 1;
	KaguTest(30041,c);
	Wait(13);
	Walk2(c+1,-8,-20,30);
	ch[429] = 0;
	KaguTest(30039,0);
	Wait(2);
	ch[421] = 20;
	ch[422] = 1;
	KaguTest(30037,c+1);
	ch[420] = 1;
	KaguTest(30041,c+1);
	Wait(13);
	Walk2(c+2,-8,-20,30);
	ch[429] = 0;
	KaguTest(30039,0);
	Wait(2);
	ch[421] = 20;
	ch[422] = 1;
	KaguTest(30037,c+2);
	ch[420] = 1;
	KaguTest(30041,c+2);
	Wait(13);
	
	KaguTest(30019,0);
	Look(c,0);
	Look(c+1,0);
	Look(c+2,0);
	RestoreCamera();
	CrossFade();
	Wait(15);
	ch[420] = pt1;
	KaguTest(12002,c);
	ch[420] = pt2;
	KaguTest(12002,c+1);
	ch[420] = pt3;
	KaguTest(12002,c+2);
	ch[420] = 3;
	KaguTest(12005,c);
	KaguTest(12005,c+1);
	KaguTest(12005,c+2);
	ch[420] = 0;
	KaguTest(30097,c);
	KaguTest(30097,c+1);
	KaguTest(30097,c+2);
}
#EndScript

// 605:レバー引くとリフト動く＆敵がリフトに乗ってやってくる
#Script:01276
int main()
{
	ch[301] = 1;

	// 敵沸く
	int c;
	ch[420] = 100000;
	ch[427] = 7;
	KaguTest(30015,1);
	KaguTest(30025,1);
	c = ch[420];
	int pt1;
	int pt2;
	int pt3;
	int pt4;
	KaguTest(12004,c);
	pt1 = ch[420];
	KaguTest(12004,c+1);
	pt2 = ch[420];
	KaguTest(12004,c+2);
	pt3 = ch[420];
	KaguTest(12004,c+3);
	pt4 = ch[420];
	KaguTest(12000,c);
	KaguTest(12000,c+1);
	KaguTest(12000,c+2);
	KaguTest(12000,c+3);

	// リフト動く
	Wait(15);
	SE(950);
	
	SaveCamera();

	ch[420] = -804;
	ch[421] = 459;
	ch[422] = 1875;
	ch[423] = 255;
	ch[424] = 27;
	ch[425] = 1420;
	KaguTest(30093,15);
	KaguTest(30019,14);
	CrossFade();
	Wait(15);
	
	ch[420] = 1;
	ch[421] = 0;
	KaguTest(30110,32);
	c = ch[420];
	ch[420] = 0;
	KaguTest2(30023,c,"");
	ch[420] = c;
	ch[421] = 1;
	KaguTest(20062,0);
	ch[421] = 2;
	KaguTest(20044,ch[422]);
	ch[420] = 1;
	KaguTest2(30023,c,"@RopewayRoot1");

	// 敵やってくる
	Wait(45);

//	ch[420] = 1290;
//	ch[421] = 973;
//	ch[422] = 1875;
//	ch[423] = 2991;
//	ch[424] = 279;
//	ch[425] = 1420;
	ch[420] = 1577;
	ch[421] = 697;
	ch[422] = 1823;
	ch[423] = 2704;
	ch[424] = 330;
	ch[425] = 1420;
	KaguTest(30093,20);
	Wait(20);
//	ch[420] = -1264;
//	ch[421] = 360;
//	ch[422] = 1840;
//	ch[423] = 1068;
//	ch[424] = 273;
//	ch[425] = 1420;
	ch[420] = -319;
	ch[421] = 404;
	ch[422] = 1703;
	ch[423] = 897;
	ch[424] = 325;
	ch[425] = 1420;
	KaguTest(30093,170);
	Wait(140);
	KaguTest(30025,1);
	c = ch[420];
	Look(c,0);
	Look(c+1,0);
	Look(c+2,0);
	Look(c+3,0);
	Wait(30);
	Look(c,0);
	Look(c+1,0);
	Look(c+2,0);
	Look(c+3,0);

	ch[420] = 3;
	KaguTest(12005,c);
	KaguTest(12005,c+1);
	KaguTest(12005,c+2);
	KaguTest(12005,c+3);
	ch[420] = pt1;
	KaguTest(12002,c);
	ch[420] = pt2;
	KaguTest(12002,c+1);
	ch[420] = pt3;
	KaguTest(12002,c+2);
	ch[420] = pt4;
	KaguTest(12002,c+3);
	
	KaguTest(30019,0);
	RestoreCamera();
	CrossFade();

	// ついでに魚人設定しておく
	ch[420] = 100000;
	ch[427] = 7;
	KaguTest(30015,2);
	ch[420] = 15;
	KaguTest(30042,403);
}
#EndScript

// 605:魚人設定
#Script:01277
int main()
{
	int c;

	ch[420] = 8;
	KaguTest2(30023,c,"@lift4root");
	KaguTest2(30023,c+1,"@lift3root");
	ch[420] = c;
	ch[421] = 9;
	KaguTest(20044,4100);
	ch[420] = c+1;
	KaguTest(20044,4100);
	ch[420] = c;
	ch[421] = 10;
	KaguTest(20044,1);
	ch[420] = c+1;
	KaguTest(20044,1);
	ch[420] = -1;
	KaguTest(30051,c);
	KaguTest(30051,c+1);
}
#EndScript

// 605:敵に見つかるとすごいの出てくる
#Script:01278
int main()
{
	ch[302] = 1;
	SaveCamera();
	
	ch[420] = 100000;
	ch[427] = 7;
	KaguTest(30015,3);
	KaguTest(30025,3);
	int c;
	c = ch[420];
	int pt1;
	int pt2;
	KaguTest(12004,c);
	pt1 = ch[420];
	KaguTest(12004,c+1);
	pt2 = ch[420];
	KaguTest(12000,c);

	// 一匹目	
	ch[420] = 5605;
	ch[421] = -1079;
	ch[422] = 3130;
	ch[423] = 4297;
	ch[424] = -560;
	ch[425] = 2495;
	KaguTest(30093,30);
	KaguTest(30019,14);
	
	Walk2(c,12,-17,30);
	ch[429] = 0;
	KaguTest(30039,0);
	Wait(30);

	ch[420] = 4945;
	ch[421] = 471;
	ch[422] = 3046;
	ch[423] = 5233;
	ch[424] = -454;
	ch[425] = 2720;
	KaguTest(30093,45);
	
	Walk2(c,22,-2,20);
	ch[429] = 0;
	KaguTest(30039,0);
	Wait(20);
	Look(0,c);
	Walk2(c,16,15,30);
	ch[429] = 0;
	KaguTest(30039,0);
	Wait(15);
	ch[420] = 15;
	ch[429] = 1;
	KaguTest(30036,0);
	Wait(15);
	Look(c,0);
	Look(0,c);
	ch[420] = 100000;
	ch[427] = 7;
	KaguTest(30015,4);
	Look(c+1,0);
	KaguTest(12000,c+1);
	Wait(45);
	
	// ２匹目
	ch[420] = 4483;
	ch[421] = -449;
	ch[422] = 2999;
	ch[423] = 4788;
	ch[424] = 702;
	ch[425] = 3070;
	KaguTest(30093,30);
	Wait(45);
	ch[420] = 5528;
	ch[421] = -1100;
	ch[422] = 3281;
	ch[423] = 4748;
	ch[424] = 356;
	ch[425] = 2695;
	KaguTest(30093,45);
	
	Walk2(c+1,3,-20,15);
	ch[429] = 0;
	KaguTest(30039,0);
	Wait(2);
	ch[421] = 30;
	ch[422] = 1;
	KaguTest(30037,c+1);
	Wait(30);
	Look(0,c+1);
	Look(c+1,0);
	Wait(45);
	
	KaguTest(30019,0);
	RestoreCamera();
	CrossFade();
	Wait(15);
	
	ch[420] = 3;
	KaguTest(12005,c);
	KaguTest(12005,c+1);
	ch[420] = pt1;
	KaguTest(12002,c);
	ch[420] = pt2;
	KaguTest(12002,c+1);
	ch[420] = 1;
	ch[421] = 1;
	ch[422] = 1;
	KaguTest(30090,c-1);
	KaguTest(30090,c-2);
	ch[420] = 100;
	ch[421] = 100;
	ch[422] = 100;
	KaguTest(30046,0);
}

	ch[421] = -969;
	ch[422] = 3305;
	ch[423] = 4815;
	ch[424] = 630;
	ch[425] = 2770;
	KaguTest(30019,1);
	CrossFade();
	Wait(30);
	Event(405);
	Wait(45);
	KaguTest(30019,0);
	RestoreCamera();
	CrossFade();
}

// Lassi (Roger) conversation
#Script:01280
int main()
{
	ch[400] = 58;
	ch[258]++;
	if (ch[1538])
	{
		// エピローグ
		//Lassi (Roger)
		if (ch[258] < 2)
		{
			//Lassi (Roger)
			Message(58,"A　good　thing　we　knew　the","location　of　that　dimensional　door.","","");
			Message(58,"Hmph!　We　could　have","been　wandering　in　that","Great　Fang　for　decades!","");
			Message(58,"Be　grateful!","","","");
			Message(58,"...But　you　defeated","Tokaron　just　in　time　to","save　our　skins.","");
		}
		else
		{
			//Lassi (Roger)
			Message(58,"A　good　thing　we　knew　the","location　of　that　dimensional　door.","","");
			Message(58,"Hmph!　We　could　have","been　wandering　in　that","Great　Fang　for　decades!","");
		}
		ch[400] = -1;
		return 0;
	}

	if (ch[1571] && !ch[1538])
	{
		//Lassi (Roger)
		Message(58,"The　Prince　and　I?","We　make　a　cute　couple，　you　say?","","");
		Message(58,"Oh　Mosby!","You　DO　know　your　stuff!","","");
	}	
	if (ch[1513] && !ch[1571])
	{
		if (ch[258] < 2)
		{
			//Lassi (Roger)
			Message(58,"He's　telling　the　world　I'm","beautiful，　a　work　of　art!","","");
			Message(58,"Mosby，　Mosby!","You're　making　me　blush!","Of　course，　you're　right!","");

			//Parin
			Message(0,"..............","","","");

			//Lassi (Roger)
			Message(58,"...What?","","","");
		}
		else
		{
			//Lassi (Roger)
			Message(58,"He's　telling　the　world　I'm","beautiful，　a　work　of　art!","","");
		}
	}
	if (!ch[1513])
	{
		Message(58,"I　can　speak　Mosby's","language，　you　know.","","");
		Message(58,"If　you　need　a　translation，","just　come　on　by.","","");
	}

	ch[400] = -1;
}
#EndScript

int main()
{

	ch[260]++;

	{
		// エピローグ
		//Cream

		{
			Message(60,"Puku　used　my　lost　picture","of　the　Prince　to　disguise　himself.","","");
			Message(60,"But　the　real　Prince　has","gotta　be　around　somewhere!","","");

			Message(60,"But　the　real　Prince　has","gotta　be　around　somewhere!","","");
		}

			Message(0,"I　see...","","","");
			
			if (!ch[2112])
			{
				//Cream
				Message(60,"..............","","","");
				Message(60,"That　wall....","","","");
				//Parin
				Message(0,"Hm?","","","");

//				// 10/20 17:30テキスト
//				//Cream
//				Message(60,"………………","","","");
//				Message(60,"王子…一体どうして……","","","");
//				Message(60,"まるで王子じゃないみたいだったわ","","","");
//
//				Message(60,"それはそうと、そこの壁……","","","");

				SaveCamera();
				ch[420] = -366;
				ch[421] = 1293;
				ch[422] = 790;
				ch[423] = 1185;
				ch[424] = 1286;
				ch[425] = 671;
				KaguTest(30093,30);
				KaguTest(30019,14);
				Wait(80);
				KaguTest(30019,0);
				RestoreCamera();
				CrossFade();
				Wait(15);

//				// 10/20 17:30テキスト

//				Message(60,"ちょー強い力を感じるわ。","何かあるのかな……","","");

//				10/20 15:00テキスト

			}
		}

		}

// Boboー conversation
#Script:01283
int main()
{
	if (ch[1538])
	{
		// エピローグ
		ch[400] = 58;
		//Boboー
		Message(58,"Work　work　work!","I　love　it!","","");
		Message(58,"Give　me　more　work!","It　feels　great!","","");
		ch[400] = -1;
		return 0;
	}
	ch[400] = 58;
	if (ch[1571] && !ch[1538])
	{
		//Boboー
		Message(58,"That　cat　monster's　medicine","fixed　me　right　up，　heh!","","");
		Message(58,"I'll　be　ready　to　fight　again!","","","");
	}
	if (ch[1513] && !ch[1571])
	{
		//Boboー
		Message(58,"The　Prince's　armband...","","","");
		Message(58,"...Proves　that　he's","the　king's　rightful　heir!","","");
		Message(58,"...The　Prince　is　a　master","of　many　weapons...","","");
		Message(58,"Do　you　stand　a　chance?","","","");
	}
	if (ch[1505] && !ch[1513])
	{
		//Boboー
		Message(58,"Aaah，　nice　breeze...","","","");
		Message(58,"I　can't　believe...","","","");
		Message(58,"It's　all　that...THING'S","fault　that　we're　on　the","ropes　like　this.","");
	}
	if (!ch[1505])
	{
		//Boboー
		Message(58,"I　gave　it　all　I　had","at　our　title　match...","","");
		Message(58,"I'm　training　for　our　rematch!","I'll　have　my　revenge!","","");

		// 雷のパーツヒント

		Message(58,"I　don't　know，　but　there","may　be　something　there.","","");
	}
	ch[400] = -1;
}

// 012:街中クエスト中は外に出れない
#Script:01288
int main()
{
	MapEvent(0);
	if (ch[2002])
	{
		// のぞきクエスト中
		//Parin
		Message(0,"First，　I　have　to　find　Cylinder.","","","");
	}
	if (ch[2010])
	{
		// ビラ貼りクエスト中
		if (ch[2012] && ch[2013] && ch[2014])
		{
			Message(0,"I　better　tell　Disk　that","I've　put　up　all　his　ads.","","");
		}
		else
		{
			Message(0,"I'm　not　done　putting　up　all　the","ads　for　the　discount　shop.","","");
		}
	}
	if (ch[2018])
	{
		// わらしべクエスト途中（限りなく実行する可能性の高い予定）
		Message(0,"I　sense　I　still　have","something　to　do.","","");
	}
	if (ch[2020])
	{
		KaguTest(20001,54);
		if (ch[430])
		{
			Message(0,"I　have　to　give　that","medal　I　found　to　Grandpa.","","");
		}
		else
		{
			Message(0,"Grandpa's　medal.　I　still","have　to　find　it.","","");
		}
	}
	
	Walk(0,-8,15);
	Wait(15);
	
	MapEvent(1);
}
#EndScript

// 012:あたりに触れるとCylinderが奥からやってくる
#Script:01289
int main()
{
	// Cylinder自由に動けるようにする
	ch[420] = 350;
	KaguTest2(30003,2,"Box01");
	
	KaguTest(12000,15);
	CharPos(15,3913,2140,-500);
	
		// Cylinderあらわれる
	Walk2(15,1,-7,60);
	ch[429] = 0;
	KaguTest(30039,0);
	Wait(60);
		// Parinは！
	ch[420] = 15;
	ch[429] = 1;
	KaguTest(30036,0);
		// Cylinderはなおも歩く	
	Walk2(15,-4,-6,30)
	ch[429] = 0;
	KaguTest(30039,0);
	Wait(30);
	Walk2(15,-7,-3,45);
	ch[429] = 0;
	KaguTest(30039,0);
	
	//Parin
	Message(0,"Cylinder!","","","");

	//Cylinder
	ch[400] = 15;
	Look(15,0);
	Message(15,"Oh　ho，　it's　Parin.","","","");
	Look(15,0);
    // JP line is カンゲキだなぁ。もしかして俺の帰りを待っていてくれたのかい？
	Message(15,"And　how　sweet　of　you，","waiting　patiently　for","me　to　come　home!","");
	Look(15,0);

	//Parin
	Message(0,"You're　dreaming.","","","");
	Message(0,"It　was　you　spying　on　","me.　Wasn't　it?","","");
	Message(0,"I'm　turning　you　in!!","","","");

	//Cylinder
	Message(15,"M-me?　Looking　at　you?","","","");
	Message(15,"W-what　are　you　talking","about?　I've　been　in　the","mines　all　day!","");

	//Parin
	Message(0,"Then　how　do　you　explain","THIS　lying　by　my　house?","","");
	
	//システム
	Mes("You　hand　Cylinder　the　hat.");
	Wait(60);
	KaguTest(20002,12);

	//Cylinder
	Message(15,"T-this　is　my　favorite　hat","that　Puchi　took　from　me!","","");

	//Parin
	Message(0,"Puchi?　The　dog?","","","");

	//Cylinder
	Message(15,"This　morning，　he　was　chasing","me　and　he　stole　my　hat.","","");
	Message(15,"I　have　another　hat，","but　this　one　fits　me","better，　I　think.","");

	//Parin
	Message(0,"...Is　that　all?","","","");

	//Cylinder
	Message(15,"Thanks　for　giving　it　back.","Here，　take　this.","","");

	//システム
	SE(853);
	KaguTest(10006,0);
	KaguTest(10007,1);
	KaguTest2(10008,0,"Got　Wallpaper　#4:　|Everyone’s　Story.|");
	KaguTest2(10008,2,"You can use the desk in Parin's house");
	KaguTest2(10008,3,"to change a desktop wallpaper.");
	KaguTest2(10009,0,"kb004s.bmp");
	KaguTest(10010,10);
	Wait(10);
	Message(0,"","","","");
	KaguTest(10011,10);

	GetItem(2);

	//Parin
	Message(0,"Then...　why　was　Puchi","chasing　you?","","");

	//Cylinder
	Message(15,"Lately，　cakes　have　been","disappearing，　so　he　was","standing　guard　at　Fan's　shop.","");
	Message(15,"Heh，　he　must　have","thought　I　was　the　culprit.","","");

	//Parin
	Message(0,"Were　you...　spying　on","Fan　instead?","","");

	//Cylinder
	Message(15,"Haha!　Of　course　not!","...Well，　goodbye!","","");
	
	Walk2(15,-25,-6,60);
	ch[429] = 0;
	KaguTest(30039,0);
	ch[420] = 15;
	KaguTest(30063,0);
	Wait(45);
	KaguTest(30063,-1);
	//Parin
	Message(0,"Something　still　doesn't","seem　right　here.","","");
	ch[400] = -1;
	
	ch[420] = 60;
	KaguTest(12002,15);
	ch[3987] = 0;
	ch[3990] = 15;
	ch[3991] = 15;
	ch[3992] = 0;
	
	// クエスト終わり・クエスト終了
	ch[2002] = 0;
	ch[2003] = 0;
	ch[2004] = 1;
	ch[2006] = 0;
	ch[2007] = 0;
	ch[2008] = 0;
	ch[2009] = 0;

	ch[420] = 58;
	KaguTest2(30003,1,"@atariyotsu");
}
#EndScript

// 012:ビラ貼り１
#Script:01290
int main()
{
	ch[2012] = 1;
	
	//Parin
	Message(0,"An　ad　could　go　here.","There　we　go...","","");
	
	ch[420] = 1;
	KaguTest(20006,8);

	Black(0,100,15);
	Wait(15);
	LoadMapB(12);
	Black(0,0,15);
	Wait(15);
	
	if (ch[2012] && ch[2013] && ch[2014])
	{
		Message(0,"There.　","That's　all　of　the　ads.","Let's　go　tell　Disk.","");
	}
}
#EndScript

// 004:バイトクエスト、ミニゲーム
#Script:01295
int main()
{
	// クエスト開始
	ch[2006] = 0;
	ch[2007] = 1;
	ch[2008] = 0;
	ch[2009] = 0;
	
	string text;
	string order;
	string answer;
	
	int kyaku;
	int seikai;
	kyaku = 0;
	seikai = 0;

	KaguTest(12000,3);
	// 客	
	// ・Pamela (Plane)
	// ・Cylinder
	// ・Poco
	// ・Disk
	// ・プチ
	// ・Hyperbolic
	
	// Pamela (Plane)やってくる
	kyaku++;
	KaguTest(12000,13);
	CharPos(13,0,-450,0);
	Look(0,13);
	Look(3,13);
	Walk2(13,0,7,110);
	ch[420] = 0;
	ch[421] = 0;
	KaguTest(30070,13);
	Wait(110);
	Message(0,"Can　I　help　you?","","","");
		// 注文処理
	switch( rand() % 3)
	{
	case 0:
		order = "icecream";
		answer = "icecream";
		break;
	case 1:
		order = "crepe";
		answer = "crepe";
		break;
	case 2:
		order = "coffee";
		answer = "coffee";
		break;
	}
	Message(13,"Let　me　have　a　", order+"，　please?","","");
	text = Type(300);
	
	if (strcmp(text,answer) == 0 || strcmp(text,order) == 0)
	{
		seikai++;
		Message(0,""+order+"，　coming　up!","","","");
		Wait(15);
		SE(950);
		Wait(15);
		ch[420] = 13;
		ch[429] = 1;
		KaguTest(30036,13);
	}
	else
	{
		if (strcmp(text,"Blank") == 0)
		{
			Message(0,"..............","","","");
			ch[420] = 8;
			ch[429] = 1;
			KaguTest(30036,0);
			Wait(30);
			ch[420] = 9;
			ch[429] = 1;
			KaguTest(30036,13);
			Wait(30);
			ch[420] = 4;
			ch[429] = 1;
			KaguTest(30036,3);
			Wait(30);
		}
		else
		{
			Message(0,""+text+"，　coming　up!","","","");
			ch[420] = 4;
			ch[429] = 1;
			KaguTest(30036,3);
			Wait(30);
			ch[420] = 9;
			ch[429] = 1;
			KaguTest(30036,13);
			Wait(30);
			Message(13,"Just　a　minute!","I　ordered　"+order+"!!","","");
		}
		Message(13,"Never　mind!","I'll　come　back　when","you're　not　working!","");
		ch[420] = 9;
		ch[429] = 1;
		KaguTest(30036,13);
	}
	Walk2(13,0,-7,110);
	ch[420] = 0;
	ch[421] = -450;
	KaguTest(30070,13);
	Message(0,"Thanks，　come　again!","","","");
	KaguTest(20053,0);
	Wait(ch[420]);
	CharPos(13,-200000,0,0);
	ch[420] = 60;
	KaguTest(12002,13);



	// Cylinderやってくる
	kyaku++;
	KaguTest(12000,15);
	CharPos(15,0,-450,0);
	Look(0,15);
	Look(3,15);
	Walk2(15,0,7,110);
	ch[420] = 0;
	ch[421] = 0;
	KaguTest(30070,15);
	Wait(110);
	Message(0,"Can　I　help　you?","","","");
		// 注文処理
	switch( rand() % 3)
	{
	case 0:
		order = "cake";
		answer = "cake";
		break;
	case 1:
		order = "crepe";
		answer = "crepe";
		break;
	case 2:
		order = "cocoa";
		answer = "cocoa";
		break;
	}
	Message(15,"Let　me　have　a　",""+order+"...","","");
	text = Type(300);
	
	if (strcmp(text,answer) == 0)
	{
		seikai++;
		Message(0,""+order+"，　coming　up!","","","");
		Wait(15);
		SE(950);
		Wait(15);
		ch[420] = 13;

			Wait(30);
			ch[420] = 9;
			ch[429] = 1;
			KaguTest(30036,15);

			Wait(30);
		}
		else
		{
			Message(0,""+text+"，　coming　up!","","","");
			ch[420] = 4;
			ch[429] = 1;
			KaguTest(30036,3);
			Wait(30);
			ch[420] = 9;
			ch[429] = 1;
			KaguTest(30036,15);
			Wait(30);
			Message(15,"Wait　a　minute!","I　ordered　"+order+"!!","","");
		}
		Message(15,"Everyone　makes　mistakes.","Just　forget　about　it　today.","","");
		ch[420] = 9;

	ch[420] = 0;
	ch[421] = -450;
	KaguTest(30070,15);
	Message(0,"Thanks，　come　again!","","","");
	KaguTest(20053,0);
	Wait(ch[420]);
	CharPos(15,-200000,0,0);
	ch[420] = 60;
	KaguTest(12002,15);



	// Pocoやってくる
//	kyaku++;
	KaguTest(12000,16);
	CharPos(16,0,-450,0);
	Look(0,16);
	Look(3,16);
	Walk2(16,0,7,110);
	ch[420] = 0;
	ch[421] = 0;
	KaguTest(30070,16);
	Wait(110);
	Message(0,"Can　I　help　you?","","","");

	Wait(30);

	switch( rand() % 3)
	{
	case 0:
		order = "shortcake";
		answer = "shortcake";
		break;
	case 1:
		order = "ramen";
		answer = "ramen";
		break;
	case 2:

		answer = "chococake";

	{

	}
	else
	{

		{
			Message(0,"..............","","","");

//			KaguTest(30036,3);
//			Wait(30);
		}
		else
		{
			Message(0,""+text+"， coming　up!","","","");
			ch[420] = 8;
			ch[429] = 1;
			KaguTest(30036,3);
			Wait(30);
//			ch[420] = 4;
//			KaguTest(30036,3);
//			Wait(30);

			Wait(30);
			Message(16,"Hold　it!","I　orderd "+order+"!!","","");
		}
		Message(16,"Forget　it.","Don't　you　train　your　staff?","","");
		ch[420] = 9;
		ch[429] = 1;
		KaguTest(30036,16);
	}
	Walk2(16,0,-7,110);
	ch[420] = 0;
	ch[421] = -450;
	KaguTest(30070,16);
	Message(0,"Thanks，　come　again!","","","");
	ch[420] = 8;
	ch[429] = 1;
	KaguTest(30036,3);

	KaguTest(20053,0);
	Wait(ch[420]);
	CharPos(16,-200000,0,0);
	ch[420] = 23;
	KaguTest(12002,16);



	// Hyperbolicやってくる
	kyaku++;
	KaguTest(12000,20);
	CharPos(20,0,-450,0);
	Look(0,20);
	Look(3,20);
	Walk2(20,0,7,110);
	ch[420] = 0;
	ch[421] = 0;
	KaguTest(30070,20);
	Wait(110);
	Message(0,"Can　I　help　you?","","","");
		// 注文処理
	switch( rand() % 3)
	{
	case 0:
		order = "chococake";
		answer = "chococake";
		break;
	case 1:
		order = "applepie";
		answer = "applepie";
		break;
	case 2:
		order = "potato";
		answer = "potato";
		break;
	}
	Message(20,"I'd　like　a　", order+"...","","");
	text = Type(300);
	
	if (strcmp(text,answer) == 0)
	{
		seikai++;
		Message(0,order+"， coming　up!","","","");
		Wait(15);
		SE(950);
		Wait(15);
		ch[420] = 13;
		ch[429] = 1;
		KaguTest(30036,20);
	}
	else
	{
		if (strcmp(text,"Blank") == 0)
		{
			Message(0,"..............","","","");
			ch[420] = 8;
			ch[429] = 1;
			KaguTest(30036,0);
			Wait(30);
			ch[420] = 9;
			ch[429] = 1;
			KaguTest(30036,20);
			Wait(30);
			ch[420] = 4;
			ch[429] = 1;
			KaguTest(30036,3);
			Wait(30);
		}
		else
		{
			Message(0,text+"， coming　up!","","","");
			ch[420] = 4;
			ch[429] = 1;
			KaguTest(30036,3);
			Wait(30);
			ch[420] = 9;
			ch[429] = 1;
			KaguTest(30036,20);
			Wait(30);
			Message(20,"Hold　it　hold　it!","I　orderd　"+order+"!!","","");
		}
		Message(20,"My　own　granddaughter...","such　a　shame...","","");
		ch[420] = 9;
		ch[429] = 1;
		KaguTest(30036,20);
	}
	Walk2(20,0,-7,110);
	ch[420] = 0;
	ch[421] = -450;
	KaguTest(30070,20);
	Message(0,"Thanks，　come　again!","","","");
	KaguTest(20053,0);
	Wait(ch[420]);
	CharPos(20,-200000,0,0);
	ch[420] = 60;
	KaguTest(12002,20);


	// 終了
	Black(0,100,15);
	Wait(15);
	ch[2015] = 0;
	
	// ＮＰＣを戻す
	ch[420] = 60;
	KaguTest(12002,13);
	KaguTest(12002,15);
	ch[420] = 23;
	KaguTest(12002,16);
	ch[420] = 22;
	KaguTest(12002,3);
	
	LoadMap(4);
	CharPos(0,0,190,0);
	Look(0,3);
	Black(0,0,15);
	Wait(15);

	if (seikai > kyaku * 0.75)
	{
		// 合格
		//Fan
		Message(3,"That's　enough　for　today.","","","");

		//Parin
		Message(0,"Whew，　I'm　exhausted...","","","");

		//Fan
		Message(3,"Heehee.　That's　the　working　life!","","","");
		Message(3,"You　did　a　good　job　so　I'll　","forget　what　you　owe　me.","","");

		//Parin
		Message(0,"But　it　wasn't...","","","");

		//Fan
		Message(3,"And　here　is　a　little　bonus.","","","");

		//システム
		SE(853);
		KaguTest(10006,0);
		KaguTest(10007,1);
		KaguTest2(10008,0,"Got　Wallpaper　#5:　|Really Boring Class|");
		KaguTest2(10008,2,"You can use the desk in Parin's house");
		KaguTest2(10008,3,"to change a desktop wallpaper.");
		KaguTest2(10009,0,"kb008s.bmp");
		KaguTest(10010,10);
		Wait(10);
		Message(0,"","","","");
		KaguTest(10011,10);

		GetItem(2);

		//Fan
		Message(3,"And　no　more　eating　cakes","without　paying，　you　hear?","","");

		//Parin
		Message(0,"...I　told　you，　it　wasn't　me!","","","");

		ch[2016] = 1;
	}
	else
	{
		// 不合格
		//Fan
		Message(3,"Parin...","","","");

		//Parin
		Message(0,"What?","","","");

		//Fan
		Message(3,"This　isn't　working...","","","");
		Message(3,"You　can't　pay　off　your　debt","working　like　this!","","");

		//Parin
		Message(0,"Ugh...","","","");
		
		ch[2017] = 1;
	}
	ch[2007] = 0;
	ch[2015] = 0;
}
#EndScript

// 0401:Poco・アフロモード解除
#Script:01304
int main()
{
	//Poco
	ch[423] = 14028;
	KaguTest2(30024,16,"@Dummy05");
	GetCharPos(16,ch[420],ch[421],ch[422]);
	ch[423] = 8805;
	ch[424] = 0;
	ch[425] = 0;
	ch[426] = 0;
	ch[427] = 100;
	ch[428] = 0;
	KaguTest(30045,0);
	Wait2(20);

	Message(16,"H-hot!","Hot　hot　hot　hot!","","");
	
	//※アフロが燃え上がってPocoの頭からはずれる。
	ch[421] = 15;
	ch[422] = 1;
	KaguTest(30037,16);
	Wait(20);
	ch[421] = 15;
	ch[422] = 1;
	KaguTest(30037,16);
	Wait(20);
	ch[421] = 15;
	ch[422] = 1;
	KaguTest(30037,16);
	Wait(20);
	ch[421] = 15;
	ch[422] = 1;
	KaguTest(30037,16);
	
	ch[3962] = 0;
	Black(0,100,15);
	Wait(15);
	LoadMap(401);
	ch[400] = 116;
	KaguTest(20039,16);
	Look(0,16);
	Look(16,0);
	ch[400] = 16;
	Black(0,0,15);
	Wait(15);

	//Poco
	Message(16,"Whew...","We　got　it　off.","","");

	//Parin
	Message(0,"Good...","","","");

	//Poco
	Message(16,"It　was　so　hot　and　itchy...","I　thought　I　was　gonna　faint!","","");
	Message(16,"Maybe　it　was　cursed?","","","");

	//Parin
	Message(0,"A　cursed　Afro?","","","");

	//Poco
	Message(16,"When　you　save　a　monster　from　a","curse，　he　has　to　reward　you.","","");
	Message(16,"So，　take　this.","","","");

	if (ch[2027])
	{
		// 既に壁紙を手に入れてある
		// ケーキをあげる
		KaguTest(20001,20);
		Mes("You　got　a　|Shortcake.|");
		KaguTest(20022,20);
		GetItem(20);
		Wait(60);
		if (ch[430] == 3)
		{
			// オーバーしている
			Mes("You　can't　hold　any　more.");
			Wait(60);
		}
	}
	else
	{
		//システム
		SE(853);
		KaguTest(10006,0);
		KaguTest(10007,1);
		KaguTest2(10008,0,"Got　Wallpaper　#5:　|Nap　Time.|");
		KaguTest2(10008,2,"You can use the desk in Parin's house");
		KaguTest2(10008,3,"to change a desktop wallpaper.");
		KaguTest2(10009,0,"kb005s.bmp");
		KaguTest(10010,10);
		Wait(10);
		Message(0,"","","","");
		KaguTest(10011,10);

		GetItem(2);
		ch[2027] = 1;
	}
	ch[2026] = 0;

	//Poco
	Message(16,"There　are　tons","of　cursed　items　out　there.","","");
	Message(16,"Someone　had　to　have","made　them.　So　uncool.","","");
	ch[400] = -1;
}
#EndScript

// 0401:Rocko (Iwao)・ファラオモード解除
#Script:01305
int main()
{
	//Rocko (Iwao)
	Message(7,"...Mwahahaha...","","","");
	Message(7,"Haaaa!!","","","");

	ch[3964] = 0;
	White(0,100,15);
	Wait(15);
	LoadMap(401);
	Look(0,7);
	Look(7,0);
	ch[400] = 7;
	KaguTest(20039,7);
	White(0,0,15);
	Wait(15);

	//Rocko (Iwao)
	Message(7,"W-where　is...　here?","","","");

	//Parin
	Message(0,"Whew，　finally　awake.","","","");

	//Rocko (Iwao)
	Message(7,"I　had　a　dream.","I　was　an　assassinated　king","in　a　faraway　land.","");

	//Parin
	Message(0,"Sounds　like　a　nightmare.","","","");

	//Rocko (Iwao)
	Message(7,"And　you　woke　me　from　it.","T-thank　you　Parin!","","");
	Message(7,"Please，　take　this.","","","");

	if (ch[2033])
	{
		// 既に壁紙を手に入れてある
		// ケーキをあげる
		KaguTest(20001,20);
		Mes("You　got　a　|Shortcake.|");
		KaguTest(20022,20);
		GetItem(20);
		Wait(60);
		if (ch[430] == 3)
		{
			// オーバーしている
			Mes("You　can't　hold　any　more.");
			Wait(60);
		}
	}
	else
	{
		//システム
		SE(853);
		KaguTest(10006,0);
		KaguTest(10007,1);
		KaguTest2(10008,0,"Got　Wallpaper　#6:　|Devices　and　Gear.|");
		KaguTest2(10008,2,"You can use the desk in Parin's house");
		KaguTest2(10008,3,"to change a desktop wallpaper.");
		KaguTest2(10009,0,"kb006s.bmp");
		KaguTest(10010,10);
		Wait(10);
		Message(0,"","","","");
		KaguTest(10011,10);

		GetItem(2);
		ch[2033] = 1;
	}
	ch[2032] = 0;
	ch[400] = -1;
}
#EndScript

// Use magic pots
#Script:01308
int main()
{
	// Check if it can be used at this location
	KaguTest(20056,1);
	if (!ch[420])
	{
		// Not usable
		KaguTest2(20002,0,"You　can't　use　that　here.");
		return 0;
	}

	// Check if there are any characters nearby
	int b;
	int tubo;
	int tubo2;

	tubo = 34;
	tubo2 = 6;
	KaguTest(20001,23);
	if (ch[430])
	{
		b = 16;
		tubo = 23;
		tubo2 = 1;
	}
	KaguTest(20001,24);
	if (ch[430])
	{
		b = 7;
		tubo = 24;
		tubo2 = 2;
	}
	KaguTest(20001,26);
	if (ch[430])
	{
		b = 11;
		tubo = 26;
		tubo2 = 3;
	}
	KaguTest(20001,28);
	if (ch[430])
	{
		b = 6;
		tubo = 28;
		tubo2 = 4;
	}
	KaguTest(20001,55);
	if (ch[430])
	{
		b = 25;
		tubo = 55;
		tubo2 = 5;
	}
	
	KaguTest(20055,b);

	int chara;
	chara = ch[420];
	ch[421] = 1;
	KaguTest(30076,0)
	if (chara == 25 && !ch[2285])
	{
		// No.
		chara = 0;
	}
	if (chara && ch[420])
	{
		// There was a character nearby.
		KaguTest(20057,0);
		Wait(30);
		ch[421] = 0;
		KaguTest(30076,tubo2);

		// Eliminate all pressure points
		KaguTest(20002,23);
		KaguTest(20002,24);
		KaguTest(20002,26);
		KaguTest(20002,28);
		KaguTest(20002,55);
		KaguTest(20002,34);
		
		switch(chara)
		{
		case 16:
			// Poco sucking out
			//Poco
			ch[420] = 0;
			KaguTest(30111,16);
			Wait(100);
			ch[420] = 1;
			KaguTest(30111,0);
			GetItem(23);
			KaguTest(20022,23);
			Mes("You　got　a　|Blue　Urn.|");
			Wait(60);
			Message(16,"Woah，　I　suddenly　feel　dizzy.","I've　been　working　too　hard.","","");
			break;
		case 11:
			// Chucky吸出し
			//Chucky
			ch[420] = 0;
			KaguTest(30111,11);
			Wait(100);
			ch[420] = 1;
			KaguTest(30111,0);
			GetItem(26);
			KaguTest(20022,26);
			Mes("You　got　a　|Green　Urn.|");
			Wait(60);
			Message(11,"Is　this　an","|out　of　body　experience|?","","");
			break;
		case 7:
			// Rocko (Iwao)吸出し
			//Rocko (Iwao)
			ch[420] = 0;
			KaguTest(30111,7);
			Wait(100);
			ch[420] = 1;
			KaguTest(30111,0);
			GetItem(24);
			KaguTest(20022,24);
			Mes("You　got　a　|Yellow　Urn.|");
			Wait(60);
			Message(7,"I　feel　chipper!　Refreshed　even!","","","");
			break;
		case 6:
			// Pierre吸出し
			//Pierre
			ch[420] = 0;
			KaguTest(30111,6);
			Wait(100);
			ch[420] = 1;
			KaguTest(30111,0);
			GetItem(28);
			KaguTest(20022,28);
			Mes("You　got　a　|Purple　Urn.|");
			Wait(60);
			Message(6,"Oh，　I　suddenly","feel　quite　refreshed.","","");
			Message(6,"Tonight　I'll　sleep　well.","Thank　you，　Mademoiselle.","","");
			break;
		case 25:
			// Black Bean吸出し
			//Black Bean
			ch[420] = 0;
			KaguTest(30111,25);
			Wait(100);
			ch[420] = 1;
			KaguTest(30111,0);
			GetItem(55);
			KaguTest(20022,55);
			Mes("You　got　a　|Black　Urn.|");
			Wait(60);
			//Black Bean
			Message(25,"Hmm...?","I　feel　a　little　lightheaded.","","");
			Message(25,"I'll　have　to　train　more.","","","");
			break;
		default:
			// それ以外
			//Parin
			GetItem(tubo);
			Wait(30);
			Message(0,"Nothing's　happening.","Doc　said　this　Urn　only","works　for　certain　monsters.","");
			KaguTest2(20003,61,"mt_put.it3");
			Wait(30);
			ch[420] = 1;
			KaguTest(30111,0);
			Wait(30);
			break;
		}
	}
	else
	{
		// There is no character
		// ここではNot usableメッセージを出す
//		GetItem(tubo);
		KaguTest2(20002,0,"You　can't　use　that　here.");
	}
}
#EndScript

// 109裏：門番 conversation
#Script:01312
int main()
{
	ch[400] = 58;
	ch[258]++;

	KaguTest(12004,58);
	if (ch[420] != 98)
	{
		// ルーチン変更
		KaguTest(12000,58);
		ch[420] = 98;
		KaguTest(12002,58);
		ch[420] = 58;
		ch[421] = 15;
		KaguTest(20044,42);
	}

	{
		ch[302] = 1;
		// マップによって変える
		int map;
		KaguTest(20010,0);
		map = ch[420];
		
		if (map == 109)
		{

			}
			else

				}
				else
				{
					if (ch[258] < 3)
					{
						//番人

						Message(58,"If　you　want　to　pass，　you","must　show　me　your　power!","","");
					}
					else
					{
						//番人
						Message(58,"If　you　want　to　pass，　you","must　show　me　your　power!","","");
						Message(58,"...You　do　not　understand?","","","");
						Message(58,"All　right　then.","You　may　buy　a　hint　for　￥1，000.","","");

						SelText("Pay　￥1，000",1);
						SelText("Don't　pay",2);
						SelEnd();
						
						if (ch[50] == 1)
						{
							if (GetGP() < 1000)
							{
								// 足りない
								Mes("You　don't　have　enough.");
							}
							else
							{
								SetGP(GetGP() - 1000);
								SE(893);
								//番人
								Message(58,"Sure　you're　up　to　this?","","","");
								Message(58,"Special　moves!　That's　it!","Just　show　me　one　of　them.","","");

			}
		}
		if (map == 114)
		{
			// 遺跡裏２
			string kotae;
			kotae = "CHILL";
			switch(ch[2078])
			{
			case 0:
				kotae = "CHILL";
				break;
			case 1:
				kotae = "DRILL";
				break;
			case 2:
				kotae = "STILL";
				break;
			case 3:
				kotae = "SPILL";
				break;
			case 4:
				kotae = "SKILL";
				break;
			}
			
			if (ch[2040])
			{
				//番人
				Message(58,"You　may　pass.","","","");
			}
			else
			{
				// 初番人
				if (ch[258] < 2 || ch[300])
				{
					Message(58,"If　you　want　the　door　to　open，","speak　the　password.","","");
				}
				else
				{
					if (ch[258] < 3)
					{
						//番人
						Message(58,"Something　wrong?","Again...","","");
						Message(58,"If　you　want　the　door　to　open，","speak　the　password.","","");
					}
					else
					{
						//番人
						Message(58,"If　you　want　the　door　to　open，","speak　the　password.","","");
						Message(58,"...You　do　not　understand?","","","");
						Message(58,"All　right　then.","You　may　buy　a　hint　for　￥1，000.","","");

						SelStart(50);
						SelText("Pay　￥1，000",1);
						SelText("Don't　pay",2);
						SelEnd();
						
						if (ch[50] == 1)
						{
							if (GetGP() < 1000)
							{
								// 足りない
								Mes("You　don't　have　enough.");
								ch[400] = -1;
								return 0;
							}
							else
							{
								SetGP(GetGP() - 1000);
								SE(893);
								//番人
								Message(58,"Thank　you.","","","");
								Message(58,"Listen　to　my　brother","and　you　will　understand.","","");
								Message(58,"Just　remember　that　the","password　will　change.","","");
								Message(58,"The　current　password　is:",kotae+".","","");
								ch[400] = -1;
								ch[300] = 1;
								return 0;
							}
						}
						else
						{
							//番人
							Message(58,"If　you　want　the　door　to　open，","speak　the　password.","","");
						}
					}
				}
				string type;
				type = Type(600);
				if (strcmp(type,kotae) == 0)
				{
					SE(950);
					//番人
					Message(58,type+"……","Correct!","","");
					Message(58,"You　may　pass.","","","");

					SaveCamera();
										
					Event(302);
					Wait(30);
					Camera(-1,0,0,0);
					RestoreCamera();
					CrossFade();
					ch[2040] = 1;
					CharPos(59,-200000,0,0);
					CharPos(60,-200000,0,0);
					CharPos(61,-200000,0,0);
					CharPos(62,-200000,0,0);
					CharPos(63,-200000,0,0);
					CharPos(64,-200000,0,0);
				}
				else
				{
					if (strcmp(type,"Blank") == 0)
					{
						//番人
						Message(58,"Try　again.","","","");
					}
					else
					{
						//番人
						Message(58,type+"……","Incorrect.","","");
						Message(58,"Try　again.","","","");
					}
				}
			}

						//番人
						Message(58,"You　need　practice.","","","");
						Message(58,"If　you　fight　with　style，　your","battles　will　be　more　fun.","","");
						break;
					}
					// 敵を出す
					// いなかったら出現
					// 死んでたら復活
					KaguTest(30025,1);
					KaguTest(30122,ch[420]);
					if (ch[420])
					{
						// 復活
						KaguTest(30021,1);
						
						ch[420] = 0;
						ch[421] = 450;
						ch[422] = 150;
						KaguTest(30123,1);
						KaguTest(30025,1);
						ch[421] = ch[420];
						ch[420] = 30;
						KaguTest(30120,ch[421]);
						ch[400] = -1;
						ch[301] = 0;
						return 0;
					}
					// 出現
					int x;
					int y;
					int z;
					KaguTest(30025,1);
					GetCharPos(ch[420],x,y,z);
					if (x > -20000)
					{
						ch[400] = -1;
						return 0;
					}
					ch[420] = 100000;
					ch[427] = 0;
					KaguTest(30015,1);
					ch[420] = 58;
					ch[421] = 2;
					KaguTest(20044,4);
					ch[420] = 0;
					ch[421] = 450;
					ch[422] = 150;
					KaguTest(30123,1);
					KaguTest(30025,1);
					ch[421] = ch[420];
					ch[420] = 30;
					KaguTest(30120,ch[421]);
					ch[301] = 0;
				}
				else
				{
					//番人
					Message(58,"You　may　pass.","","","");
				}
				ch[400] = -1;
				return 0;
			}
			if (ch[258] < 2)
			{
				//番人
				Message(58,"Dazzle　me　with　your","martial　skill.","","");
				// 敵を出す
				SaveCamera();
				ch[420] = -714;
				ch[421] = -337;
				ch[422] = 370;
				ch[423] = 4;
				ch[424] = 426;
				ch[425] = 70;
				KaguTest(30019,1);
				CrossFade();
				Wait(15);
				ch[420] = 100000;
				ch[427] = 0;
				KaguTest(30015,1);
				Wait(45);
				KaguTest(30019,0);
				RestoreCamera();
				CrossFade();
				KaguTest(30025,1);
				ch[421] = ch[420];
				ch[420] = 30;
				KaguTest(30120,ch[421]);
				ch[301] = 0;
			}
			else
			{
				if (ch[258] < 3)
				{
					//番人
					Message(58,"Dazzle　me　with　your","martial　skill.","","");
					Message(58,"If　you　wish　to　pass，","solve　my　riddle.","","");
				}
				else
				{
					//番人
					Message(58,"Dazzle　me　with　your","martial　skill.","","");
					Message(58,"...You　do　not　understand?","","","");
					Message(58,"All　right　then.","You　may　buy　a　hint　for　￥1，000.","","");

					SelStart(50);
					SelText("Pay　￥1，000",1);
					SelText("Don't　pay",2);
					SelEnd();
					
					if (ch[50] == 1)
					{
						if (GetGP() < 1000)
						{
							// 足りない
							Mes("You　don't　have　enough.");
						}
						else
						{
							SetGP(GetGP() - 1000);
							SE(893);
							//番人
							Message(58,"Thank　you.","","","");
							Message(58,"To　impress　me，","do　something　more　unusual.","Try　using　a　little　style.","");
							Message(58,"Something　|special.|","","","");
						}
					}
					else
					{
						//番人
						Message(58,"Dazzle　me　with　your","martial　skill.","","");
					}
				}
				// ボール死んでたら復活させる
				KaguTest(30025,1);
				KaguTest(30122,ch[420]);
				if (ch[420])
				{
					// 復活
					KaguTest(30021,1);
					ch[420] = 0;
					ch[421] = 450;
					ch[422] = 150;
					KaguTest(30123,1);
					KaguTest(30025,1);
					ch[421] = ch[420];
					ch[420] = 30;
					KaguTest(30120,ch[421]);
					ch[400] = -1;
					ch[301] = 0;
					return 0;
				}
			}
			ch[420] = 58;
			ch[421] = 2;
			KaguTest(20044,4);
		}
		if (map == 310)
		{
			if (ch[2051])
			{
				// クリア済み
				//番人
				Message(58,"You　may　pass.","","","");
				ch[400] = -1;
				return 0;
			}
			
			if (ch[258] < 2 || ch[200])
			{
				//番人
				Message(58,"One　of　my　brothers　differs","from　the　rest　of　us.","","");
				Message(58,"Where　does　he　reside?","","","");
			}
			else
			{
				if (ch[258] < 3)
				{
					//番人
					Message(58,"One　of　my　brothers　differs","from　the　rest　of　us.","","");
					Message(58,"If you wish to pass,","tell me where he is.","","");
				}
				else
				{
					//番人
					Message(58,"One　of　my　brothers　differs","from　the　rest　of　us.","","");
					Message(58,"Where　does　he　reside?","","","");
					Message(58,"...You　do　not　understand?","","","");
					Message(58,"All　right　then.","You　may　buy　a　hint　for　￥1，000.","","");
					Message(58,"Or，　if　you　desire，　pay","￥5，000，　and　I　shall","open　the　door.","");

					SelStart(50);
					SelText("Pay　￥1，000",1);
					SelText("Pay　￥5，000",3);
					SelText("Don't　pay",2);
					SelEnd();
					
					if (ch[50] == 1)
					{
						if (GetGP() < 1000)
						{
							// 足りない
							Mes("You　don't　have　enough.");
						}
						else
						{
							SetGP(GetGP() - 1000);
							SE(893);

							//番人
							Message(58,"Thank　you.","","","");
							Message(58,"One　of　my　brothers　speaks","in　a...　unique　style.","","");
							Message(58,"Simply　tell　me","where　he　is.","","");
							Message(58,"Here's　a　hint:　|Spinach　Cavern.|","","","");

//							ch[200] = 1;
							ch[400] = -1;
							return 0;
						}
					}
					if (ch[50] == 3)
					{
						if (GetGP() < 5000)
						{
							// 足りない
							Mes("You　don't　have　enough.");
						}
						else
						{
							SetGP(GetGP() - 5000);
							SE(893);
							//番人
							Message(58,"Thank　you.","","","");
							Event(302);
							ch[2051] = 1;
							Wait(30);
							//番人
							Message(58,"You　may　pass.","","","");

							ch[400] = -1;
							return 0;
						}
					}
					if (ch[50] != 1 && ch[50] != 3)
					{
						//番人
						Message(58,"One　of　my　brothers　differs","from　the　rest　of　us.","","");
						Message(58,"Where　does　he　reside?","","","");
					}
				}
			}
			string type;
			type = Type(600);
			if (strcmp(txt,"ShadowGrotto") == 0 || strcmp(txt,"shadowgrotto") == 0 || strcmp(txt,"SHADOWGROTTO") == 0)
			{
				SE(950);
				//番人
				Message(58,"....That　is　correct.","You　may　pass.","","");
				Event(302);
				ch[2051] = 1;
				ch[400] = -1;
				return 0;
			}
			if (strcmp(type,"Blank") == 0)
			{
				//番人
				Message(58,"You　do　not　understand?","I　can　provide　nothing　else.","","");
				Message(58,"Come　back　another　time.","","","");
				ch[400] = -1;
				return 0;
			}
			Message(58,"....I'm　afraid　that's　incorrect.","","","");
			if (ch[2048])
			{
				Message(58,"Meet　with　my　brothers","once　more.","","");
				Message(58,"The　answer　should　be　obvious.","","","");
			}
			else
			{
				//番人
				Message(58,"....Hmm.　It　appears","you　haven't　met","him　yet.","");
				Message(58,"If　you　meet　him，　you'll　understand.","","","");
			}
		}
		if (map == 311)
		{
			if (ch[2052])
			{
				//番人
				Message(58,"You　may　pass.","","","");
				ch[400] = -1;
				return 0;
			}
			if (ch[258] < 2)
			{
				//番人
				Message(58,"If　you　want　to　pass，　show","me　your　favorite　repast.","","");
			}
			else
			{
				if (ch[258] < 3)
				{
					//番人
					Message(58,"Something　wrong?","Again...","","");
					Message(58,"If　you　want　to　pass，　show","me　your　favorite　repast.","","");
				}
				else
				{
					//番人
					Message(58,"If　you　want　to　pass，　show","me　your　favorite　repast.","","");
					Message(58,"...You　do　not　understand?","","","");
					Message(58,"All　right　then.","You　may　buy　a　hint　for　￥1，000.","","");

					SelStart(50);
					SelText("Pay　￥1，000",1);
					SelText("Don't　pay",2);
					SelEnd();
					
					if (ch[50] == 1)
					{
						if (GetGP() < 1000)
						{
							// 足りない
							Mes("You　don't　have　enough.");
						}
						else
						{
							SetGP(GetGP() - 1000);
							SE(893);

							//番人
							Message(58,"Thank　you.","","","");
							Message(58,"Please　eat　your　favorite","food　in　front　of　me.","","");
							Message(58,"I　shouldn't　have　to　tell　you","it　contains　|strawberries.|","","");
						}
					}
					else
					{
						//番人
						Message(58,"If　you　want　to　pass，　show","me　your　favorite　repast.","","");
					}
				}
			}
			ch[420] = 58;
			ch[421] = 2;
			KaguTest(20044,5);
		}

	}

	ch[400] = -1;
}

// 109裏：門番正解
#Script:01313
int main()
{
	// 正解した
	SaveCamera();

	Camera(58,0,1035,320);
	CrossFade();
	SE(950);
	Message(58,"You　are　worthy.","You　may　pass.","","");
	Event(302);
	ch[2041] = 1;
	Wait(30);
	
	Camera(-1,0,0,0);
	RestoreCamera();
	CrossFade();
}
#EndScript

// 114裏：番人１～６
#Script:01314
int main()
{
	int x;
	x = ch[400];
	
	KaguTest(12004,x);
	if (ch[420] != 98)
	{
		// ルーチン変更
		KaguTest(12000,x);
		ch[420] = 98;
		KaguTest(12002,x);
		ch[420] = x;
		ch[421] = 15;
		KaguTest(20044,42);
	}
	
	if (ch[2040])
	{
		// クリア済み
		Message(58,"You　may　pass.","","","");
	}
	else
	{
		string kotae;
		if (x == 59)
		{
			// 番人１　　４番目文字
			kotae = "L";
			switch(ch[2078])
			{
			case 0:
				kotae = "L";
				break;
			case 1:
				kotae = "L";
				break;
			case 2:
				kotae = "L";
				break;
			case 3:
				kotae = "L";
				break;
			case 4:
				kotae = "L";
				break;
			}
			Message(59,"The　password　is　"+kotae+".","The　next　part　is　to　my　front.","","");
		}
		if (x == 60)
		{
			// 番人２　　１番目文字
			kotae = "C";
			switch(ch[2078])
			{
			case 0:
				kotae = "C";
				break;
			case 1:
				kotae = "D";
				break;
			case 2:
				kotae = "S";
				break;
			case 3:
				kotae = "S";
				break;
			case 4:
				kotae = "S";
				break;
			}
			Message(60,"The　password　is　"+kotae+".","The　next　part　is　to　my　front.","","");
		}
		if (x == 61)
		{
			// 番人３　　３番目文字
			kotae = "I";
			switch(ch[2078])
			{
			case 0:
				kotae = "I";
				break;
			case 1:
				kotae = "I";
				break;
			case 2:
				kotae = "I";
				break;
			case 3:
				kotae = "I";
				break;
			case 4:
				kotae = "I";
				break;
			}
			Message(61,"The　password　is　"+kotae+".","The　next　part　is　two　spaces　over.","","");
		}
		if (x == 62)
		{
			// 番人４　　５番目文字
			kotae = "L";
			switch(ch[2078])
			{
			case 0:
				kotae = "L";
				break;
			case 1:
				kotae = "L";
				break;
			case 2:
				kotae = "L";
				break;
			case 3:
				kotae = "L";
				break;
			case 4:
				kotae = "L";
				break;
			}
			Message(62,"The　password　is　"+kotae+".","The　first　part　is　to　my　front　and　side.","","");
		}
		if (x == 63)
		{
			// 番人５　　２番目文字
			kotae = "H";
			switch(ch[2078])
			{
			case 0:
				kotae = "H";
				break;
			case 1:
				kotae = "R";
				break;
			case 2:
				kotae = "T";
				break;
			case 3:
				kotae = "P";
				break;
			case 4:
				kotae = "K";
				break;
			}
			Message(63,"The　password　is　"+kotae+".","The　next　part　is　to　the　forward　left.","","");
		}
		if (x == 64)
		{
			// 番人１
			Message(64,"Thinking　up　passwords　is　tricky.","","","");
		}
	}
	
	ch[400] = -1;
}
#EndScript

{

		Wait(25);

			Message(0,"And　it　was　getting　good　too...","","","");

			//番人
			Message(58,"I　will　open　the　door.","Please...　Go.","","");

			//Rocko (Iwao)
			Message(7,"?　?　?","","","");
			Message(7,"I-I'm　all　tired　out.","I'll　be　going　home　now.","","");
		}
		if (ch[301] == 6)
		{
			//Pierre
			Message(6,"?　?　?","","","");
			Message(6,"What?　No　matter.","It's　time　for　my　midday　snack.","I　shall　return　home.","");
		}

		ch[420] = 3;
		KaguTest(30064,ch[301]);
		Wait(15);
		CharPos(ch[301],-200000,0,0);

		ch[420] = pt;
		KaguTest(12002,ch[301]);
		ch[2045] = 1;
		
		Camera(-1,0,0,0);
		
		ch[400] = -1;
	}

	// Black Beanはあり得ない
}
#EndScript

// 210裏：番人設定

	KaguTest(12002,58);

	KaguTest(20044,42);
	ch[420] = 58;
	ch[421] = 2;
	KaguTest(20044,2);
}

// 608裏：門番正解
#Script:01317
int main()
{
	// 正解した
	SaveCamera();

	Camera(58,125,-125,370);
	CrossFade();
	SE(950);
	Message(58,"You　are　worthy.","You　may　pass.","","");
	Event(302);
	ch[2049] = 1;
	Wait(30);
	
	Camera(-1,0,0,0);
	RestoreCamera();
	CrossFade();
}
#EndScript

// 607裏：門番正解
#Script:01318
int main()
{
	// 正解した
	int a;
	if (ch[2050] && ch[302] != 42 && ch[302] != 38)
	{
		// No.
		return 0;
	}
	a = 0;
	if (ch[2050])
	{
		// 既に扉あいてる
		a = 1;
	}
	
	SaveCamera();

	WaitD(0);
	Camera(58,0,-205,370);
	CrossFade();
	SE(950);
	if (ch[302] == 42 || ch[302] == 38)
	{
		// 爆死させた
		if (ch[2050])
		{
			//番人
			Message(58,"Beautiful!　","Float　like　a　butterfly!","Sting　like　a　bee!","");
		}
		else
		{
			//番人
			Message(58,"Oooh!!","","","");
			Message(58,"Excellent.　What　we'd　expect","from　the　heir　of　the　drill.","","");
			Message(58,"I　shall　open　the　door.","Take　care.","","");
		}
		ch[2050] = 2;
	}
	else
	{
		// 必殺技で倒した
		//番人
		Message(58,"Hmm...　you　would　benefit","from　further　training.","","");
		Message(58,"A　true　heir　of　the　drill","would　be　more　skilled.","","");
		Message(58,"No　matter.　I　will　open　the　door.","","","");
		ch[2050] = 1;
	}
	if (!a)
	{
		Event(302);
		Wait(30);
	}
	
	Camera(-1,0,0,0);
	RestoreCamera();
	CrossFade();
}
#EndScript

// 603裏：レバー引いたら扉開く
#Script:01323
int main()
{
	SaveCamera();
	TekiStop(1);
	Wait(15);
	SE(950);
	Black(0,100,15);
	Blur(5,0,15);
	Wait(15);
	Camera(Door2C(1),-800,-3215,250);
	CrossFade();
	
		// 敵準備
	ch[420] = 100000;
	ch[427] = 7;
	KaguTest(30015,1);
	KaguTest(30025,1);
	int c;
	c = ch[420];
	int pt1;
	int pt2;
	int pt3;
	KaguTest(12004,c);
	pt1 = ch[420];
	KaguTest(12004,c+1);
	pt2 = ch[420];
	KaguTest(12004,c+2);
	pt3 = ch[420];
	KaguTest(12000,c);
	KaguTest(12000,c+1);
	ch[420] = 2;
	KaguTest(12005,c+2);
	ch[420] = 2;
	KaguTest(30064,c);
	KaguTest(30064,c+1);
	KaguTest(30064,c+2);
	
	TekiStop(0);
	Wait(15);
	Black(0,0,15);
	Wait(30);

	Event(300);
	
	Wait(30);

	// 敵が凍った敵を運んでくる
	Walk2(c,0,8,100);
	ch[429] = 1;
	KaguTest(30039,0);
	Walk2(c+1,0,8,100);
	ch[429] = 1;
	KaguTest(30039,0);
	Walk2(c+2,0,8,100);
	ch[429] = 1;
	KaguTest(30039,0);
	ch[420] = 0;
	ch[421] = 1;
	ch[422] = 5;
	KaguTest(12003,c);
	KaguTest(12003,c+1);
	ch[420] = 2;
	KaguTest(12003,c+2);
	ch[420] = 0;
	KaguTest(30113,c+2);
	Wait(120);
		// 凍った敵を下ろす
	ch[420] = 2011;
	ch[429] = 1;
	KaguTest(30036,c+1);
	ch[420] = 1;
	KaguTest(30041,c+2);
	Wait(15);
	Walk2(c,5,0,15);
	KaguTest(30039,0);
	Walk2(c+1,-5,0,15);
	KaguTest(30039,0);
	Wait(15);
	ch[420] = 2010;
	ch[429] = 1;
	KaguTest(30036,c);
		// パターン戻す
	ch[420] = 1;
	KaguTest(30113,c+2);
	ch[420] = 0;
	KaguTest(30041,c+2);
	ch[420] = 3;
	KaguTest(12005,c);
	KaguTest(12005,c+1);
	KaguTest(12005,c+2);
	ch[420] = pt1;
	KaguTest(12002,c);
	ch[420] = pt2;
	KaguTest(12002,c+1);
	ch[420] = pt3;
	KaguTest(12002,c+2);
	Wait(45);

	Black(0,100,15);
	Wait(15);
	TekiStop(1);
	Camera(-1,0,0,0);
	RestoreCamera();
	CrossFade();
	Wait(15);
	Black(0,0,15);
	Blur(5,120,15);
	Wait(15);
	
	TekiStop(0);
}
#EndScript

// 602裏：あたりに触れるとガンマンが出てくる
#Script:01324
int main()
{
	int x;
	int y;
	int z;

	ch[420] = 15;
	ch[429] = 1;
	KaguTest(30036,0);

	TekiStop(1);
	ch[420] = 100000;
	ch[427] = 7;
	KaguTest(30015,1);

	ch[420] = -2615;
	ch[421] = 7230;
	ch[422] = 916;
	ch[423] = -1670;
	ch[424] = 7210;
	ch[425] = 296;
	KaguTest(30019,1);
	CrossFade();
	Wait(15);
	
	// 落下中かチェック
	GetCharPos(0,x,y,z);
	if (z < 400)
	{
		// 場所移動
		CharPos(0,-2400,7350,450);
	}
	
	// 敵のそのそ出てくる
	int c;
	int pt;
	KaguTest(30025,1);
	c = ch[420];
	KaguTest(12004,c);
	pt = ch[420];
	KaguTest(12000,c);
	
	Walk2(c,0,4,100);
	ch[429] = 0;
	KaguTest(30039,0);

		// カメラ
	ch[420] = -3303;
	ch[421] = 7568;
	ch[422] = 932;
	ch[423] = -1738;
	ch[424] = 7298;
	ch[425] = 296;
	KaguTest(30093,90);
	KaguTest(30019,14);
	
	ch[420] = c;
	KaguTest(30063,0);

	Wait(100);
	Look(c,0);
	ch[420] = 2009;
	ch[429] = 1;
	KaguTest(30036,c);
	KaguTest(30063,-1);
	Wait(60);
		// 銃構える
	ch[420] = 18;
	ch[421] = 1;
	ch[422] = 15;
	KaguTest(12003,c);
	Wait(30);
		// 銃撃つ（ルーチン作ってから）
	KaguTest(30119,c);
	Wait(60);

	// 後始末
	KaguTest(30019,0);
	CrossFade();
	Wait(15);
	
	TekiStop(0);
	
	ch[420] = pt;
	KaguTest(12002,c);
	ch[420] = 3;
	KaguTest(12005,c);
}
#EndScript

// 601裏：あたりに触れるとトゲボール隊スタンバイ

}
#EndScript

// 601裏：あたりに触れると中ボスがこうもりに乗ってやってくる
#Script:01326
int main()
{
	int c;
	int i;
	int pt[4];

	ch[420] = 9998;
	KaguTest2(30003,2,"tekiatari2");
	
	ch[420] = 100000;
	ch[427] = 7;
	KaguTest(30015,50);
	KaguTest(30015,51);
	KaguTest(30015,52);
	KaguTest(30015,53);
	KaguTest(30025,50);
	c = ch[420];
	for (i = 0;i < 4;i++)
	{
		KaguTest(12004,c + i);
		pt[i] = ch[420];
		KaguTest(12000,c + i);
		ch[420] = 2;
		KaguTest(30041,c + i);
		Look(c+i,0);
		KaguTest(12011,c + i);
		ch[420] = 2;
		KaguTest(12012,c + i);
	}

	Look(0,c);
	
	ch[420] = -3045;
	ch[421] = -806;
	ch[422] = -307;
	ch[423] = -4427;
	ch[424] = -1264;
	ch[425] = 20;
	KaguTest(30019,1);
	CrossFade();
	Wait(15);

	ch[420] = -3086;
	ch[421] = -995;
	ch[422] = 216;
	ch[423] = -4520;
	ch[424] = -1256;
	ch[425] = -279;
	KaguTest(30093,75);
	KaguTest(30019,14);
	Wait(15);
	
	ch[420] = 2011;
	ch[429] = 0;
	ch[429] = 1;
	KaguTest(30036,c+1);
	KaguTest(30036,c+2);
	KaguTest(30036,c+3);
	
	Wait(60);

	// 中ボス飛ぶ
	ch[420] = 2011;
	ch[429] = 1;
	KaguTest(30036,c+1);
	KaguTest(30036,c+2);
	KaguTest(30036,c+3);
	Walk2(c,24,0,30);
	Wait(2);
	ch[420] = 1;
	KaguTest(30041,c);
	KaguTest(30041,c+1);
	KaguTest(30041,c+2);
	KaguTest(30041,c+3);
	ch[421] = 20;
	ch[422] = 1;
	KaguTest(30037,c);
	Wait(8);
	ch[420] = 0;
	KaguTest(30041,c+1);
	KaguTest(30041,c+2);
	KaguTest(30041,c+3);
	Wait(20);
	
	// 後始末
	KaguTest(30019,0);
	CrossFade();
	Wait(15);

	for (i = 0;i < 4;i++)
	{
		ch[420] = 3;
		KaguTest(12005,c + i);
		ch[420] = pt[i];
		KaguTest(12002,c + i);
	}
}
#EndScript

// ミニゲーム脱出
#Script:01329
int main()
{
	ch[2061] = 0;
	KaguTest(20057,0);
	Black(0,100,30);
	ch[3982] = 0;
	ch[2144] = 0;
	ch[2497] = 0;
	KaguTest(20010,0);
	int map;
	map = ch[420];
	Wait(30);
	LoadMap(map);
	KaguTest(12013,0);

	// マップに応じてデフォ位置、カメラ位置かえる	
	switch(map)
	{
	case 21:
		// 岩壊し
		CharPos(0,750,600,-150);
		Walk(-5,0,2);
		break;
	case 22:
		// レーザー避け
		CharPos(0,0,-900,0);
		Walk(0,5,2);
		break;
	case 23:
		// モグラタタキ
		CharPos(0,0,-1450,150);
		Walk(0,5,2);
		break;
	case 24:
		// サッカー
		CharPos(0,650,0,0);
		Walk(-5,0,2);
		break;
	default:
		// おかしい
		// 座標は０、０、０
		CharPos(0,0,0,0);
		Walk(0,5,2);
		break;
	}
	KaguTest(30057,0);
	Black(0,0,30);
}
#EndScript

// 005:Diskの店家具屋General Storeディスカウントショップルックポイント3：棚右
#Script:01361
int main()
{
    // JP line is この棚はお薬みたい…健康はなまるのわたしにはあまり縁がないわね

}
#EndScript

// 22:Docドック家２ルックポイント1：顔モニター①
#Script:01377
int main()
{
	Message(0,"|Romance　Compatibility　Test|","","","");
	Message(0,"Sounds　interesting.","","","");
	SelStart(50);
	SelText("Try　it",1);
	SelText("Don't　try　it",2);
	SelEnd();
	
	if (ch[50] != 1)
	{
		return 0;
	}

	Mes("Please　enter　a　name.");
	Wait(60);
	string txt;
	txt = Type(600);
	if (strcmp(txt,"Blank") == 0)
	{
		// エラー
		Message(0,"|Input　error.|","","","");
		Message(0,"Guess　you　have　to","enter　a　name.","","");
		return 0;
	}
	Mes("Enter　the　name　of　your　partner.");
	Wait(60);
	string txt2;
	txt2 = Type(600);
	if (strcmp(txt2,"Blank") == 0)
	{
		// エラー
		Message(0,"|Input　error.|","","","");
		Message(0,"Guess　you　have　to","enter　a　name.","","");
		return 0;
	}
	KaguTest2(10007,0,txt);
	KaguTest2(10007,1,txt2);
	KaguTest(13000,0);
	
	int a;
	if (ch[420] < 0)
	{
		ch[420] = -1 * ch[420];
	}
	a = ch[420] % 5;
	
	switch(a)
	{
	case 0://この機械No.
		Message(0,"|Tomorrow　will　be　warm　and　sunny.|","","","");
		Message(0,"...That　makes　absolutely","no　sense　whatsoever.","","");
		break;
	case 1:// 二人はラブラブ
		Message(0,"|The　two　of　you　will","overcome　all　difficulties","and　live　happily　ever　after.|","");
		Message(0,".....Who　comes　up　with","this　mushy　stuff?","","");
		break;
	case 2:// 親友
		Message(0,"|You　have　an　undying　friendship","that　even　the　gods　themselves","could　not　tear　asunder.|","");
		Message(0,"......So　I　guess　that","we're　really　good　friends.","","");
		break;
	case 3:// もうだめぽ
		Message(0,"|A　small　rift　between　you　will","grow　into　a　gaping　valley　if　you","don't　consider　the　other's　feelings.|","");
		Message(0,"Hmm....","I　suppose　that's　true.","","");
		break;
	case 4:// これからこれから
		Message(0,"|Your　future　is　yet　to　come!","If　the　two　of　you　don't　lose","heart，　one　day...|","");
		Message(0,"...I　think　I　get　the　idea.","","","");
		break;
	}
	ch[420] = a;
}
#EndScript

// 22:Docドック家２ルックポイント2：顔モニター②
#Script:01378
int main()
{
	Message(0,"|Today's　fortune.|","","","");
	Message(0,"A　fortunetelling　machine?","","","");
	
	SelStart(50);
	SelText("Have　your　fortune　told",1);
	SelText("Don't　have　your　fortune　told",2);
	SelEnd();
	
	if (ch[50] != 1)
	{
		return 0;
	}

	switch(rand() % 10)
	{
	case 0://大吉
	case 2:
	case 6:
	case 8:
		Message(0,"|You　are　incredibly　lucky　today.　","Miss　Lucky，　that's　you.|","","");
		Message(0,"Whoever　wrote　this　is　boring...","","","");
		break;
	case 1://大凶
		Message(0,"|You'll　have　bad　luck　today，","but　try　your　best　to　laugh　it　off.|","","");
		Message(0,"Hmm...　suddenly　I　feel　like","kicking　this　machine.","","");
		break;
	case 3:
	case 4:
	case 5://吉
		Message(0,"|Your　day　will　be　","ordinary　in　every　way","possible.|","");
		Message(0,"...Not　much　of　a","fortune，　huh?","","");
		break;
	case 7:
	case 9:// 末吉
		Message(0,"|Today　you　will　be　moderately","lucky.　Try　to　make　the　best　","of　any　situation.|","");
		Message(0,"I　guess　that　makes","sense...　But　it　seems","kind　of　generic.","");
		break;
	}
}
#EndScript

// 203:岩カウンターパターンにする
#Script:01404
int main()
{
	int x;
	x = Lift2C(-1);
	
	if (ch[2498] > 990 && !ch[2059])
	{
		ch[2498] = 990;
	}
	
	ch[420] = 97;
	KaguTest(12002,x);
	ch[420] = 99;
	KaguTest(12010,x);
}
#EndScript

// 203:岩カウント終了。宝箱出す
#Script:01405
int main()
{
	SaveCamera();
	ch[2059] = 1;
	TekiStop(1);

	ch[420] = 15;
	ch[429] = 1;
	KaguTest(30036,0);
	Wait(30);
	
	ch[420] = -412;
	ch[421] = 2736;
	ch[422] = 2501;
	ch[423] = -1503;
	ch[424] = 2736;
	ch[425] = 2471;
	KaguTest(30019,1);
	CrossFade();
	int x;
	int y;
	int z;
	GetCharPos(0,x,y,z);
	KaguTest(30005,0);
	if (y < 1650 || ch[422] < 1650)
	{
		Black(0,100,7);
	}
	Wait(20);
	if (y < 1650 || ch[422] < 1650)
	{
		Black(0,0,7);
		Wait(20);
	}
	
	ch[2498] = 1000;
	Wait(10);
	SE(950);
	Wait(40);
	
	ch[420] = -565;
	ch[421] = 2745;
	ch[422] = 3045;
	ch[423] = -806;
	ch[424] = 4299;
	ch[425] = 2421;
	KaguTest(30019,1);
	CrossFade();
	Wait(20);

	int ln;
	ln = Takara2C(2060);
	CharPos(ln,-825,4350,2400);
	SE(566);
	KaguTest(30018,ln);
	Wait(60);
	KaguTest(30019,0);	
	RestoreCamera();
	CrossFade();
	Wait(15);

	TekiStop(0);
}
#EndScript

// 103裏：橋壊すとツボ振ってくる
#Script:01406
int main()
{
	ch[420] = 0;
	KaguTest(30124,3726);
	if (ch[420])
	{
		KaguTest(30004,101);
	}
	ch[420] = 15;
	KaguTest(30042,381);
}
#EndScript

// 103裏：落ちてきたツボを止める
#Script:01407
int main()
{
	ch[420] = 0;
	KaguTest(30124,3726);
	if (ch[420])
	{
		KaguTest(30004,200);
		CharPos(ch[420],-750,450,75);
	}
}
#EndScript

// 113:敵装備はがしチュートリアル
#Script:01410
int main()
{
	TekiStop(1);
	Message(0,"Something　is　written　here.","","","");

	// チュートリアル表示
	KaguTest(10006,0);
	KaguTest(10007,7);
	KaguTest2(10009,0,"tute_11.bmp");
	ch[423] = 180;
	ch[424] = 42;
	ch[425] = 460;
	ch[426] = 438;
	ch[427] = 0;
	ch[428] = 0;
	ch[429] = 320;
	ch[430] = 452;
	ch[431] = 512;
	SE(399);
	KaguTest(10010,10);
	Wait(10);
	Message(0,"","","","");
	ch[420] = 0;
	KaguTest(10011,10);
	Wait(10);
	
	TekiStop(0);
}
#EndScript

// 607裏:メダルの宝箱
#Script:01416
int main()
{
	ch[396] = 1;
	
	TekiStop(1);
	
	Wait(15);
	
	SaveCamera();
	ch[420] = 575;
	ch[421] = 609;
	ch[422] = 370;
	ch[423] = 575;
	ch[424] = -438;
	ch[425] = 70;
	KaguTest(30019,1);
	CrossFade();
	Wait(15);

	int ln;
	ln = Takara2C(2611);
	CharPos(ln,575,-450,0000);
	SE(566);
	KaguTest(30018,ln);
	Wait(60);

	KaguTest(30019,0);	
	RestoreCamera();
	CrossFade();
	Wait(15);
	
	TekiStop(0);
}
#EndScript

// 006 -> 012
#Script:01418
int main()
{
	ch[3952] = 0;
	MapEvent(0);
	
	Black(0,100,15);
	Wait(15);
	Black(0,100,0);
	Event(110);
	Wait(5);
	Black(0,0,15);
	Walk(0,-8,15);
	Wait(15);
	
	MapEvent(1);
}
#EndScript

// 開発室のキャラ設定
#Script:01441
int main()
{
	int x;
	int y;
	int z;
	int i;
	
	for (i = 58;i < 66;i++)
	{
		GetCharPos(i,x,y,z);
		if (x > -20000)
		{
			ch[420] = 2;
			KaguTest(12005,i);
			// 全員待機させる
			ch[420] = 2;
			ch[421] = 1;
			ch[422] = 5;
			KaguTest(12003,i);
			ch[420] = -1;
			Look(i,18);
			KaguTest(12002,i);
		}
	}
}
#EndScript

// Developer's Room Character：Bobo
#Script:01442
int main()
{
	Look(58,0);
 // Commented out lines are about the original JP PC release's benchmark tool, but the benchmark tool doesn't come with Steam/GOG so it doesn't make much sense to leave it. Replaced with PSP's dialogue.
//	Message(58,"Hey! You're great!","","","");
//	Message(58,"By the way， have you heard?","","","");
//	Message(0,"Heard what?","","","");
//	Message(58,"The Gurumin benchmark， done in one day!","","","");
//	Message(58,"Told to do it just before release too!","","","");
//	Message(0,"Really?","","","");
//	Message(58,"Hahahaha!","","","");
	Message(58,"Hey! You're great!","","","");
	Message(58,"Oh，and have you heard?","","","");
	Message(0,"Heard what?","","","");
	Message(58,"While you're charging up your drill，","you can't fall，even if the ground shakes!","","");
	Message(0,"Really?","","","");
	Message(58,"Hey，that means that you won't be","affected by the rocks that I drop!","","");
	Message(0,"Probably shouldn't have told me then，huh?","","","");
	Message(58,"Hahahaha!","","","");
	Look(58,18);
}

// 026:噴水Pinoヒント
#Script:01451
int main()
{
	if (!ch[2506])
	{
		// 森まだ
		ch[2056] = 1;
		
		ch[400] = 18;
		Look(18,0);
		ch[420] = 15;
		ch[429] = 1;
		KaguTest(30036,18);
		Walk(1,8,25);
		Wait(30);
		Look(0,18);
		//Pino
		Message(18,"Parin!","","","");
		ch[400] = 118;
		Walk2(18,0,-16,30);
		Wait(10);
		Look(0,18);
		Look(18,0);
		Wait(10);
		Look(0,18);
		Look(18,0);
		Wait(10);
		Look(0,18);
		Look(18,0);
		
		ch[400] = 18;
		//Parin
		Message(0,"Pino!　What　are","you　doing　here?","","");
		//Pino
		Message(18,"I'm　looking　for　something.","","","");
		//Parin
		Message(0,"Really?","What　could　be　here?","","");
		//Pino
		Message(18,"I　love　this　spot","very　much.","","");
		//Parin
		Message(0,"Although　I've　never　been","here　before，　it's　relaxing.","","");
		//Pino
		Message(18,"I　feel　a　strange　power","at　that　stone　statue.","","");
		//Parin
		Message(0,"Stone　statue?","","","");
		//Pino
		Message(18,"Here.","","","");

		ch[400] = 118;
		Walk2(18,-5,14,15);
		int x;
		int y;
		int z;
		GetCharPos(18,x,y,z);
		ch[420] = x - 5;
		ch[421] = y + 14;
		KaguTest(30070,18);
		ch[420] = 1;
		ch[421] = 1;
		ch[422] = 5;
		KaguTest(12003,18);
		
		Black(0,100,15);
		Wait(15);
		Black(0,100,0);
		Wait(5);
		CharPos(0,-832,2160,0);
		CharPos(18,-1000,2009,0);
		Wait(5);
		ch[420] = -1085;
		ch[421] = 2225;
		KaguTest(30070,0);
		KaguTest(30070,18);

		Camera(0,211,2041,370);
		CrossFade();

		Black(0,0,15);
		Wait(15);
		
		ch[400] = 18;
		//Pino
		Message(18,"Puku　says　that　something's","sealed　away　in　this　statue.","","");
		//Parin
		Message(0,"Hmm....","","","");
		Message(0,"(Should　I...　drill　it?)","","","");
		//Pino
		Message(18,"I　should　be","going　now.","","");
		//Parin
		Message(0,"OK.　Take　care.","","","");
	
		ch[400] = 118;
		ch[420] = -50;
		ch[421] = -1000;
		KaguTest(30070,18);
		Walk2(18,0,-16,30);
		Wait(15);
		ch[420] = 3;
		KaguTest(30064,18);
		Wait(15);
		CharPos(18,-200000,0,0);
		ch[400] = -1;

		//Parin
		Message(0,"..............................","","","");
		Camera(-1,0,0,0);
	}
	if (ch[2506])
	{
		// 森済
		ch[2056] = 1;

		ch[400] = 18;
		Look(18,0);
		ch[420] = 15;
		ch[429] = 1;
		KaguTest(30036,18);
		Walk(1,8,25);
		Wait(30);
		Look(0,18);
		//Pino
		Message(18,"Parin!","","","");
		ch[400] = 118;
		Walk2(18,0,-16,30);
		Wait(10);
		Look(0,18);
		Look(18,0);
		Wait(10);
		Look(0,18);
		Look(18,0);
		Wait(10);
		Look(0,18);
		Look(18,0);
		
		ch[400] = 18;
		//Parin
		Message(0,"Haven't　you　returned","to　the　village　yet?","","");
		//Pino
		Message(18,"I　got　lost　and　tired.","I　decided　to　rest　a　bit.","","");
		Message(18,"It's　safe　here.","There　are　no　Phantoms.","","");
		//Parin
		Message(0,"Nice　and　relaxing","here，　isn't　it?","","");
		//Pino
		Message(18,"I　feel　a　strange　power","at　that　stone　statue.","","");
		//Parin
		Message(0,"Stone　statue?","","","");
		//Pino
		Message(18,"Here.","","","");
		
		ch[400] = 118;
		Walk2(18,-5,14,15);
		int x;
		int y;
		int z;
		GetCharPos(18,x,y,z);
		ch[420] = x - 5;
		ch[421] = y + 14;
		KaguTest(30070,18);
		ch[420] = 1;
		ch[421] = 1;
		ch[422] = 5;
		KaguTest(12003,18);
		
		Black(0,100,15);
		Wait(15);
		Black(0,100,0);
		Wait(5);
		CharPos(0,-832,2160,0);
		CharPos(18,-1000,2009,0);
		Wait(5);
		ch[420] = -1085;
		ch[421] = 2225;
		KaguTest(30070,0);
		KaguTest(30070,18);
		
		Camera(0,211,2041,370);
		CrossFade();
		
		Black(0,0,15);
		Wait(15);

		ch[400] = 18;
		//Pino
		Message(18,"Puku　says　that　something's","sealed　away　in　this　statue.","","");
		//Parin
		Message(0,"Hmm....","","","");
		Message(0,"(Should　I...　drill　it?)","","","");
		//Pino
		Message(18,"I　should　get　back","to　the　village　now.","","");
		//Parin
		Message(0,"OK.　Take　care.","","","");
	
		ch[400] = 118;
		ch[420] = -50;
		ch[421] = -1000;
		KaguTest(30070,18);
		Walk2(18,0,-16,30);
		Wait(15);
		ch[420] = 3;
		KaguTest(30064,18);
		Wait(15);
		CharPos(18,-200000,0,0);
		ch[400] = -1;

		//Parin
		Message(0,"..............................","","","");
		Camera(-1,0,0,0);
	}

	KaguTest(10600,ch[1107]-2260);
	MMV(StageMMV(ch[420]));
			
	TekiStop(0);
	MapEvent(1);
	
	return 0;
}
#EndScript
